story:
The Boost is a silicone insert that fits any mobile phone and immediately delivers increased battery life, faster charging and better battery health. It is a laboratory proven solution!

Campaign Summary: Fusion Battery Boost is a brand new technology product backed by executives with three years of manufacturing experience and fifty years of distribution experience. The Fusion Battery Boost is fully operational, manufactured, and "In Stock" on our web site, www.FusionBatteryBoost.com.  We just finished running a KickStarter Campaign where we did not reach our goal.  However, we still delivered over 200 units to backers that wanted to complete their purchase.

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/batteryboost/fusion-battery-boost-extended-battery-life-energy

Here is an example of the feedback left in our comments section:

"Just got mine in the mail today, seems to work great!!!" - Conner McGrew

We believe our goal was too high on the campaign ($90,000), which is why we have lowered our expectations for this campaign ($10,000).  We are specifically looking for backing to expand our marketing program to TV Advertising (more details below) as we believe we have a very unique product that needed is by millions of cell phone users globally. 

The offer is simple. Purchase or "Fund" our project and receive a Fusion Battery Boost at a big discount that is not available anywhere.  Even if we do not reach our goal you will receive your perk package, just as we did on Kick Starter!

Thank you for your time in reviewing our campaign!

- Matt Ryncarz and Fusion Battery Boost Team

The Beginning

As with many inventions, The Fusion Battery Boost was invented in a very serendipitous fashion. Early in 2013 we began experimenting with the effects of ions on mobile phone radiation in hopes of creating an anti radiation cell phone accessory. During testing we realized that the insert was having another profound effect, it was lengthening battery life between charges.  We took this breakthrough and ran with it. 


The Technology

Lithium Ion batteries suffer from a phenomenon called self discharge.  This is the process in which batteries degrade, causing poor performance.  Standard self discharge is 5% after the first 24 hours of manufacturing and then 2% month after month.  However, these numbers accelerate if the battery is ever exposed to heat. Within just one year your lithium ion battery can lose a large portion of its capacity, which is very frustrating.

The ions inside of the battery are the workhorse of the unit, moving electricity back and forth during charge and discharge. However, these ions degrade during self discharge allowing valuable electricity to become waste.

The Fusion Battery Boost is designed to deliver a constant flow of ions to the battery, effectively reversing the effects of self discharge on battery performance.  It is also designed to reduce heat which promotes better battery health and longevity. The technology in the boost never wears out or decreases in ionic production.

In the video you will see the extreme ionic production of the Fusion Battery Boost.


Laboratory Testing

In addition to our internal research we have hired a certified battery and fuel cell lab to test and certify our results.

See the Results Here:  Full Lab Report

Test Study Group

In addition to testing we rolled out a complete Test Study group to gain feedback on our product.  You can view the response HERE

"My phone never lasts through a round of golf. Once I installed the Boost it made it thru 18 holes and drinks after allowing me to stay connected." - Don

Universal Fit

The Fusion Battery Boost has been designed to fit in or on any mobile phone. For best results it should be inserted inside the battery compartment. However, for enclosed batteries like the iPhone it can be attached to the back of the phone with double sided tape or sit in between the phone and the protective case.  It can also be trimmed for smaller older style phones.


Green Initiative

Our team at Fusion Battery Boost is proud to offer one solution to help address the energy crisis that effects us, our children and our children's children.  Luckily, when you use a Fusion Battery Boost you will get more battery life in between charges, cutting down energy consumption.  In addition, your phone will charge up faster allowing you to disconnect it and get on with your day. Shorter charging means less electricity use.  The Boost will ensure that you use every bit of electricity efficiently as opposed to it turning into waste.

Legal

The Fusion Battery Boost has filed US Provisional Patent Application #620021182.  This gives us protection from July 6, 2014.  Additionally, the protection extends internationally as well.

Additional provisions have also been applied for, to extend the product offering to various sizes and shapes of the Boost material, to fit various battery sizes.

Fusion Battery Boost has been fully trademarked.

Manufacturing

Fusion Technologies has a longstanding relationship with the mineral provider in Japan as well as the production factory in Shen Zhen, China. They have successfully manufactured and delivered hundreds of thousands of other similar product units on our behalf.  We have initially manufactured 10,000 units to have on hand for our initial distribution roll out.

Here is a photo of the units being manufactured at our factory.


Retail Packaging Design

These are photos directly from our factory. As you will notice we have two packages being produced for big box stores. One in English and one in English and French for immediate distribution in Canada.

Sales and Distribution

Fusion Technologies has contracted with Fusion Distribution Worldwide (FDW) for worldwide distribution of the Fusion Battery Boost product.  They have established contracts with resellers and manufacturers' representatives that present new products to leading retailers.  They are also actively pursuing the largest supply chain channel provider in the industry for seamless integration into big box retail. In addition, a regional sales force of representatives that sell into small and medium size retailers is being assembled.

Fusion Distribution Worldwide (FDW) is an Alberta, Canada incorporated company.  FDW provides sales, logistics, and distribution services around the world for Fusion Technology products. FDW founders Garry Bachmeier and Cam Raison have a combined 50 years of distribution and international sales experience, and bring a wealth of knowledge and success to their business.  FDW currently distributes in the United States, Canada and set to expand operations into several foreign countries.  They own warehouse square footage in the US and Canada.

Executive Team Bios

Matt Ryncarz (Founder/Author) :  Matt Ryncarz grew up in Palm City, FL. After high school he attended Florida State University where he studied Biological Sciences. After college, he began developing cutting edge web based technologies, which have been featured in the Wall Street Journal, USA Today, Entrepreneur Magazine, Florida Trend Magazine among other publications.

Matt began researching ionic technologies in 2010 and launched Fusion IONZ in 2011, which has products that are now distributed worldwide. He has vast knowledge in product design and manufacturing as he as successfully manufactured millions of product units.

In addition to business, Matt is also a published author and health expert.  He is the author of The Metabolic Loophole Diet - Published by Square One publishing, which was one of the best selling health and fitness books of 2013. This journey began when he was in his early twenties. Although business was good, his waistline was expanding. He ballooned to an obese 315 pounds. His struggle with obesity and ultimate victory set him on a several year journey into the health and fitness industry. He lost over 115 pounds and completely transformed his physique. Along the way he became a CrossFit certified coach, certified Powerlifting coach and patented two natural health products that are currently being used by thousands of people including professional athletes. He has had numerous articles published regarding health and fitness and is routinely invited on TV in reference to health correspondence.  In Addition to writing The Metabolic Loophole, Matt is also on TV as a health correspondent.

Garry Bachmeier (COO - Fusion Distribution Worldwide) :  Garry Bachmeier has been involved in the distribution of office furniture worldwide since 1989. As an owner of a major Office Furniture dealership, he implemented process, managed, and oversaw the operation of a 75,000 square foot distribution warehouse facility. Garry setup logistics of this facility, and managed an on site staff of over 125 employees daily. His dealership carried the industry leading Office furniture products in the world, and with this vast umbrella of exclusive products, came some of the largest contracts in North America. Garry was instrumental in the logistics of relocating and supplying office furniture for one of the largest corporations in the world, so his experience and success in Global business dealings speak for themselves.

Cameron Raison (Global Sales - Fusion Distribution Worldwide): Cam Raison has 20+ years of Business Development, Marketing and Management experience, combined with an entrepreneurial attitude and extensive business knowledge. He has worked with several large international, billion dollar companies focusing, on IT, software and consulting services. He has personally driven very large business deals and managed large sales and marketing teams.

Use of Funds

As you have read we have completed the research, testing, patenting and initial manufacturing of the Fusion Battery Boost product. We currently have them in stock and are shipping to customers.  With that said, we are in need of large scale marketing to get the word out about our cutting edge product.

Television Advertising Agreement:  Fusion Battery Boost has a marketing agreement in place with Intellestar Direct. They have produced and ad funded millions of dollars worth of Television ads.  They have agreed to fund the advertising costs of a Fusion Battery Boost commercial as long we pay for the production. The production cost will amount to nearly $50,000.  We will use the profits generated from this campaign to help offset our production investment.  If our profits exceed $50,000 we will use the additional funds to run social media, email and google ad word campaigns to make our product known.

Our founder, Matt Ryncarz has worked with Intellistar Direct previously on the promotion of his book.  Here is some footage: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_GTgAQfwVeE

What do you get?  When you buy one of our perk packages you will receive our product at discounts ranging from FREE Shipping to 25% off.  We do not discount on our site as our retailer Lowest Advertised Price is $9.99.  This is an opportunity to buy our product at a deep discount.

Again, even if we are not fully funded, you will receive your perk package just as we did on KickStarter.

The Future

This mineral blended silicone material can be formed in many different sizes. Once the cell phone battery boost is in the market we are going to follow up with products for tablets, laptops and other Li Ion powered devices.  Our patents protect our product in different sizes and formats.

Help Spread the Word

Even if this campaign is not a good fit for you, please help us spread to word to friends and family who are looking for better cell phone battery life.

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/fusionbatteryboost

story:
A device that allows you to play retro games legally and without any difficulties to launch them. You only need your smartphone and a TV!


                              To launch the device you should do the following: 

                                        

  • GoBox supports lots of games from different old time consoles.

  • The purchases of games will be legal so you will support those who made them.

  • You can play with your friends using gamepads you like.

  • The process of launching an old game has never been so easy.

  • Unlike other game consoles GoBox suits in your pocket

  • Lots of freeware games.

    We provide a cheap and easy way to play retro-games comfortably with your friends and almost wherever you like. Recall the experience of playind good games which never get old!

     The original idea of GoBox has appeared in Siberia. Then the construction of the device was developped in the Ural Mountains. Our coworkers in Kaliningrad around the Baltic sea created the visual concept of GoBox project. The production itself takes place in Khabarovsk, the final version of the device is delivered to Moscow. And then you get the product from there.



   If you can’t support us with money, please share the information about us and our project in your favorite social networks via Indiegogo share tools.


1. Is it only a console with dosens of emulators?
    It is an ecosysteme for amateurs of classic games. GoBox itself works with the app on mobile device. GoApp is a shop-catalogue with legal games + emulator + convenient launcher + media-centre 
2. What is the main feature which distinguishes your device? 
     Firstly, the price. It is 8 time less than modern game systems. Secondly, GoBox supports a lot of gamepads. Also there is a great variety of classic game titles, retrogaming community etc. 
Moreover, you can work with your documents on GoBox, use the station for web-serfing or as the analogue of smart-TV. 
3. Why we can't just download emulator with the games?
     ROMs of games in the internet are illegal. GoBox offers only legal content from copyright owners

story:
Our Story

Yeeeeeeaaaaaaaaa!!!    The Hottie™ is now officially "In Demand".  

We very much appreciate everyone who joined us and made this happen!  We’ve actually exceeded our original goal of $25,000. by a bit.  The quickest way to get a Hottie™ of your own is to join us now by selecting one of our "In Demand" Perks! 

Now, we are ready to go into production and we’ll deliver the Hottie™s to everyone who has joined us and selected a perk - you know who you are!  

Whether you joined our original campaign, or are just now joining us, we are on schedule to deliver your Hottie™s when promised. We’ll continue to keep you up to date by email and we’ll verify your address prior to shipping.

For newcomers here is some background:

We developed the technology that makes the Hottie™ so very effective, to help everyone who uses a cell phone - and really, who doesn't?  

Over the past 5 years, the Hottie™ has been tested and proven with great success across the US in areas where cell phone signals are weak or inconsistent. 

Queries:

Does your cell phone ever drop a call or do you ever have trouble connecting?

...especially in certain parts of your home, office or on your commute? 

How about in a hotel room, conference room or shopping center?

Watch our video above (2mins, 19 secs) for a demonstration, as well as data on our testing, to find out exactly what the Hottie™ will do for you!

What Does the Hottie™ Really Do?

  • The Hottie™ focuses and enhances available cell phone signals, requires no batteries, charging cables, or power of any kind.  
  • Carry it with you in your pocket, purse, briefcase or on the dash of your car - wherever you carry your cell phone.  
  • Wherever cell phone signals are weak or inconsistent, the Hottie™  helps ALL cell phones connect and keep their connections, regardless of the type of phone you have or your service provider!

We developed the technology that makes the Hottie™ so very effective, to help everyone who uses a cell phone - and really, who doesn't?  

Over the past 5 years, the Hottie™ has been tested and proven with great success across the US in areas where cell phone signals are weak or inconsistent. 
 All Hottie™s are made in the USA and are Patent Pending 
Hot Wireless is a US veteran-owned small business

What We Need & What We'll Do

Hitting our $25,000 goal has enabled us to go into Hottie™ production.  

We are now:

  • developing final packaging
  • building our manufacturing tools
  • gearing up distribution

In Demand funding will help to initiate our marketing and advertising plans.

The Impact

My name is Mike Walker, inventor of the Hottie™ and a suite of products based on the Hottie technology, as well as the Hot Cloud™ and its suite of products. This is revolutionary technology and what the Hottie™ does is, in fact, revolutionary.  Hottie™ is a pocket-size device that enhances your cell signal. It requires no external power and works with any service provider.  How did this happen?  Well, read on.

One night, early-morning really, I woke up my wife to tell her about my idea for this technology.  Since that night, I have continued to develop and expand on this technology.  We formed a company and now have 4 US patents pending and although I still have ideas about other ways to deploy this technology, we are ready to launch our first exciting product, Hottie™, into the market.  

I have been in the electronics and wireless field since 1966.  In that year, I graduated from High School and joined the US Navy. Results of my placement exams produced an assignment in the Electronics Field and I attended schools for the next year and a half.  The instruction was fast, tough and thorough.  I graduated in the top 10% of my class.

I spent six years in the Navy, following which I finished my education as a Chemical Engineer.  Then I went to work and despite my fascination with Chemical Engineering and my education, I started a business and was responsible for designing, facility construction and commissioning of two full-size fiberglass manufacturing facilities.  In subsequent positions, I was responsible for the design and commissioning of production lines for several major companies such as Evans Products Company and Gillette-Papermate Company.

These experiences inspired me to start my own company and we focused our energies on wireless communications and building wireless networks.  After designing and building numerous wireless networks for communications in various industries including the oil industry, motion pictures, municipal water systems and commercial business. My last project was designing a device that could be used to propagate wireless signals with little footprint in high-end buildings.  That project opened the way for the design, prototype and vertical production methodology for the Hottie™.

Because I am a veteran, I have made the decision that Hottie™ will be made in the USA and we have contracted with a veteran-owned business to supply our packaging.  

Your contributions have enabled us to proceed with production of the Hottie™.  As described above, your contributions will further enable us to get the ball rolling on marketing, and advertising.  Our providers have been identified and are all ready to go!  

I am excited to see this come to fruition as I have helped many companies come to market with their products.  America has been good to me and I want to bring something to the everyday person that will make their life a little better.  

I designed the Hottie™ to be agnostic, (any cell provider may be used and the Hottie™ works with all cell phones), and, importantly for the environment, no external power will be needed to operate it - ever.  Please give us a good look and become one of our supporters.

Risks & Challenges
Testers across the US and in the UK, when introduced to the Hottie™ invariably ask....how does it work?  So, we show them how it works, with their cell phone - ANY CELL PHONE,  and then....they never want to give it up!  Everyone loves the Hottie™ because it really works, and you never need batteries, charging cables, or power of any kind!

We believe that introducing the Hottie™ through this Indiegogo campaign will shine a light on this technology and bring the Hottie™ to everyone who uses a cell phone.  And, yes, that's just about everyone!

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute now?  We are counting on your support to tell everyone in your contact file about the Hottie™

Spread the word.  Use the Indiegogo Share Tools (top left of this page) to send the people you know all about Connect With A Hottie!  

And, while you’re sharing, send them our web address:  www.hotwireless.net                             

We thank you!

Carry it with you in your pocket, purse, briefcase or on the dash of your car - wherever you carry your cell phone.  

Wherever cell phone signals are weak or inconsistent, the Hottie™  helps ALL cell phones connect and keep their connections, regardless of the type of phone you have or your service provider!


We developed the technology that makes the Hottie™ so very effective, to help everyone who uses a cell phone - and really, who doesn't?  

Over the past 5 years, the Hottie™ has been tested and proven with great success across the US in areas where cell phone signals are weak or inconsistent. 

 All Hottie™s are made in the USA and are Patent Pending 

Hot Wireless is a US veteran-owned small business


What We Need & What We'll Do 
Hitting our $25,000 goal has enabled us to go into Hottie™ production.  
We are now:



developing final packaging


building our manufacturing tools


gearing up distribution


In Demand funding will help to initiate our marketing and advertising plans.   The Impact

My name is Mike Walker, inventor of the Hottie™ and a suite of products based on the Hottie technology, as well as the Hot Cloud™ and its suite of products. This is revolutionary technology and what the Hottie™ does is, in fact, revolutionary.  Hottie™ is a pocket-size device that enhances your cell signal. It requires no external power and works with any service provider.  How did this happen?  Well, read on.
One night, early-morning really, I woke up my wife to tell her about my idea for this technology.  Since that night, I have continued to develop and expand on this technology.  We formed a company and now have 4 US patents pending and although I still have ideas about other ways to deploy this technology, we are ready to launch our first exciting product, Hottie™, into the market.  
I have been in the electronics and wireless field since 1966.  In that year, I graduated from High School and joined the US Navy. Results of my placement exams produced an assignment in the Electronics Field and I attended schools for the next year and a half.  The instruction was fast, tough and thorough.  I graduated in the top 10% of my class.
I spent six years in the Navy, following which I finished my education as a Chemical Engineer.  Then I went to work and despite my fascination with Chemical Engineering and my education, I started a business and was responsible for designing, facility construction and commissioning of two full-size fiberglass manufacturing facilities.  In subsequent positions, I was responsible for the design and commissioning of production lines for several major companies such as Evans Products Company and Gillette-Papermate Company.
These experiences inspired me to start my own company and we focused our energies on wireless communications and building wireless networks.  After designing and building numerous wireless networks for communications in various industries including the oil industry, motion pictures, municipal water systems and commercial business. My last project was designing a device that could be used to propagate wireless signals with little footprint in high-end buildings.  That project opened the way for the design, prototype and vertical production methodology for the Hottie™.
Because I am a veteran, I have made the decision that Hottie™ will be made in the USA and we have contracted with a veteran-owned business to supply our packaging.  
Your contributions have enabled us to proceed with production of the Hottie™.  As described above, your contributions will further enable us to get the ball rolling on marketing, and advertising.  Our providers have been identified and are all ready to go!  

I am excited to see this come to fruition as I have helped many companies come to market with their products.  America has been good to me and I want to bring something to the everyday person that will make their life a little better.  
I designed the Hottie™ to be agnostic, (any cell provider may be used and the Hottie™ works with all cell phones), and, importantly for the environment, no external power will be needed to operate it - ever.  Please give us a good look and become one of our supporters.
Risks & Challenges

Testers across the US and in the UK, when introduced to the Hottie™ invariably ask....how does it work?  So, we show them how it works, with their cell phone - ANY CELL PHONE,  and then....they never want to give it up!  Everyone loves the Hottie™ because it really works, and you never need batteries, charging cables, or power of any kind!



We believe that introducing the Hottie™ through this Indiegogo campaign will shine a light on this technology and bring the Hottie™ to everyone who uses a cell phone.  And, yes, that's just about everyone!   Other Ways You Can Help 
Can't contribute now?  We are counting on your support to tell everyone in your contact file about the Hottie™


Spread the word.  Use the Indiegogo Share Tools (top left of this page) to send the people you know all about Connect With A Hottie!  


And, while you’re sharing, send them our web address:  www.hotwireless.net                             


We thank you!

story:
Use Android's OTG function to

  • Make professional presentation
  • Play mobile game on big screen TV 

  • Integrate barcode scanner into mobile payment & inventory management system

  • Main video (if you can't play video on Indiegogo)
  • Play Game, Make Presentation on Big Screen TV (alternative video site)

PowerOTG Cable

Kudos integrates USB On-The-Go into everyday Power & Sync cable.  With Kudos PowerOTG Cable, you can 

  • charge Android phones and tablets 
  • transfer data, play music/movie stored on external memory
  • connect a mouse, keyboard, or USB flash drive to your Android phone/tablet
  • connect your laptop to internet via smartphone (USB Tethering)  

Development Status

  • 18 months in the PowerOTG hardware development. 
  • Production molds have been built.  Molding capacity: 500K/months
  • Tested with major smartphone brands such as Samsung, LG, & HTC.
  • Tested with major USB accessories such as memories, keyboards, mice and barcode scanners. 
  • FC-18XZ ASIC has been ordered for initial production. FC-18XZ detects connected devices and switches from OTG mode to Power/Data mode automatically.  It also tells you whether your mobile device supports USB OTG.
  • CE, FCC and RoHS have been certified.

Perks

Your Support

We need your support to move the product out of production lines.  We need you support to complete app development.  App #1: One-Button Back-up: Back up phone data, such as contacts, videos, photos & music to external USB memory  App #2: Use mobile phone to charge another mobile phone or transfer data between two phones.

Risks & Challenges

Not all Android phones support USB OTG.  The following phones support OTG. 

  • Samsung Galaxy S5, S4, S3, S2, Note 4,  Note 3, Note 2
  • LG Optimus G, G2
  • HTC X, One, One mini, One max
  • Google Nexus

With an LED indicator, Kudos PowerOTG will tell you whether your mobile device supports OTG, or whether your PowerOTG is in OTG mode or Power Mode.
Only majors brands have been tested.  However, not all USB accessories are compatible with PowerOTG.  
Spec

  • Output current from USB A / Male to Micro USB : 2A


  • Output current from USB A / Male to USB A / Female : 2A


  • Output current from Micro USB to USB A /Female : 500mA


  • Data transfer : 480 Mbps

  • Length: 13 inches (33 cm)

Operation Mode

  • USB power & sync mode


  • USB extension mode


  • USB OTG mode



Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our PowerOTG, please share this Indiegogo campaign with your friends.

story:
{ WHY }

Being an iPhone owner means you value design perfection, exceptional materials and state of the art technology, right? Because you live outdoors as much as indoors, you need an extra layer of protection on your iPhone, which will guarantee it remains safe in any circumstances. But this is not the time when you should compromise with any of your values…

{ HOW }

At Allroad Mobile, we want to preserve the perfection of your iPhone design and extend its playground, while making it much stronger, ready for the unpredictable.

{ WHAT }

The end-result is a shockproof case which first does not betray your iPhone X/Xs/Xs Max design and which makes your iPhone usable outdoors thanks to an extensive ecosystem of accessories.

 

 

#1 { PROTECT WITH STYLE }

The low density, high strength, and anti-corrosion properties of Titanium, guarantee an amazing resistance to shocks, drops, and liquids, while keeping your iPhone light enough at any time. Its purity enabled us to create a unique stylish case, without betraying the original iPhone design.

 

 

{ PICK YOUR STYLE }

For launch you are able to choose between 3 styles of Titanium Grade 5 frame colors:

 

#2 { CUSTOMIZE ENDLESSLY }

The iPhone is the world’s #1 smartphone. So you might want to stand out from the crowd and start expressing your own personality into your case. This is why Ti.X comes with many sliders to choose from. You can pick steel for the ultimate urban feel, swap it for wood at the weekend and swap it again for carbon for the next session with your MTB riding buddies. You don’t have to settle for one type of mood anymore.

 

 

#3 { EXTEND YOUR PLAYGROUND }

Creating a great-looking and premium protection for your iPhone was only one part of the AllRoad Mobile vision. We wanted to go much further. In order to be outdoor-ready, the iPhone needs to be much more "mobile". Ti.X opens new playgrounds to those of us who need adrenaline shots. It comes with an extensive ecosystem of accessories which allow you to use your iPhone as a stopwatch on your runs, as a tracker on your rides or even as a live action-cam.

 

 

{ CONCEPTION & DESIGN }

We preserved the perfection of your iPhoneX design, and even extend its playground, while making it much stronger, ready for the unpredictable. The purity of Titanium allowed us to create a super slick design, totally in line with the original iPhone X lines.

To match the design excellence of the iPhone, we could not knock at anyone’s door. So we wondered: is there any other high-tech object we can think of, which could compete with the iPhone design-wise? We could all agree on only one: the Devialet Phantom.

This is why we asked Fabien Deboves, the lead designer of Phantom to work on what would eventually become the Ti.X.

 

{ TECHNOLOGY }

In order to achieve the best possible protection for your iPhone, we used an innovative combination of materials:

1. TITANIUM Grade 5
2. Dupont KEVLAR®
3. BLUSHOCK® by AllRoad

The main frame is in Titanium grade 5, an exceptional metal known for its purity, very low density, high-strength and anti-corrosion properties.

The back cover uses Dupont's KEVLAR®, a material used in bulleproof vests.

It is combined with BLUSHOCK®, a brand new multiple impact protection material, absorbing up to 90% of kinetic energy of high-speed impact.

 

{ MANUFACTURING }

Because we are looking for excellence, we picked the best possible industrial partner in order to produce Allroad's TiX. Flex is a world-class manufacturer of many exisiting brands like Apple, Google, Dyson and Nike.

 

{ RECOGNIZED INNOVATION }

Ti.X innovating technology is already being recognized at the highest level. AllRoad Mobile was awarded one of the “Innovation Awards 2019” from the Consumer Electronics Show (CES).

Here is a recap of AllRoad's CES 2019 Experience.

 

TiX case is fully compatible with wireless charging so that you can carry on charging your iPhone exactly like you used to.

 

{ EXTREME TESTERS }

Real-life testing is essential when developing a product which is aimed to be used outdoor. This is why we constantly conduct extensive tests with a selection of high-end outdoor athletes and even include them all along our development process.

Once they join the AllRoad Crew Program, they push the usage limits of TiX far beyond what we could ever imagined. If it's good enough for them, it's good enough for you, right ?

 

{ THE BOX }

AllRoad's TiX is delivered in a premium box containing : the Titanium Frame, the back cover in Kevlar and BluShock and a pair of sliders.

 

 

{ THEY'RE TALKING ABOUT ALLROAD }

 

{ TIMELINE }

{ WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP }

At AllRoad, we value design perfection and beautiful materials and yet our lifestyle is outdoor as much as indoor. Our iPhone’s have suffered from this so far. Our goal is to solve a problem we’ve encountered on a daily basis and we believe a lot of people have experienced the same thing as we have.

What we’ve done so far is taking our initial idea and vision to the stage of working prototypes. They work great. They do an amazing job at protecting our iPhone's and they look stunning. Now we need to to the industrial stage.

Taking the leap to industrial production requires funds and your backing this project will contribute to make us go higher, quicker. With TiX we’re building a brand new experience and we target excellence. Having you being part the AllRoad community matters to us. As we’re revealing our project, we want to better understand your needs and expectations so that we can get even better at what we do and put the final touches to our project.

 

By now you’ve understood that TiX is not a product which is aimed to live on its own. Whether you ride, hike, climb or just run, carrying your iPhone can be painful. That’s why we are currently developing a whole set of accessories to get along with TiX. We need your help to speed things up in that matter.

Ready for a safe and exciting adventure with this reliable gadget!

The Blackview BV9800 Pro was born to meet the needs of serious adventurers who desire to embark on an unusual and exciting, typically hazardous journey. Tough, portable, multifunctional, BV9800 Pro prepares you to jump into a new adventure anytime, anywhere.

For wildlife photographers, seeing heat will make your job much easier. Animals are naturally camouflaged and can be very hard to see with the human eye, even when they’re in plain sight. With a thermal camera, a warm animal is visible.

Do you want to go where you feel most alive? Do it! Blackview BV9800 Pro is there for you at all times. With IP68 & IP69K & MIL-STD-810G certifications, this rugged outdoor smartphone is proven to be strong, durable, and reliable.

  • Stop staring at the mountains. Climb them instead. There’s always a breathtaking view on the summit.
  • No matter when you are caught in the pouring rain or on a trek through muddy waters.
  • Check Extreme Test, IP68&IP69K&MIL-STD-810G rugged phones.

     

Exposed to the elements and raw beauty of nature, it always ignites your impulse to capture these great moments. This is where the BV9800 Pro comes into play with its Sony® 48MP rear camera. Paired with advanced algorithms and masterful Helio P70 AI. BV9800 Pro captures great details in every photo.     

Based on the fact that the adventurer spends the most time on the road, it's paramount to lead the way with a powerful navigation tool for the complex terrain. 

Blackview BV9800 Pro is equipped with GPS & GLONASS & BEIDOU triple modes navigation systems. Nothing can stop you to explore or head to the destination.

  • Measure altitude with built-in barometer

Chart your progress when you're mountaineering or hiking. You could see where you were in relation to where you started.

With its 6580mAh battery, the BV9800 Pro breaks the boundaries to allow you to enjoy its features and its camera for as long as possible and even more besides, thanks to its power-efficient Helio P70 AI SoC.

 Unboxing & First Look 

 Select a BV9800 Pro perk 

  • Own a tough, portable, multifunctional Blackview BV9800 Pro. You don't need to pack extra DSLR, thermal imager, compass, barometer, waterproof phone pouch.

 

Looking for a pro-photography version? Check out the Blackview BV9800 option. BV9800 offers all of the features of the BV9800 Pro, including the superb Sony® 48MP triple camera, with no thermal camera.  

Designed for ultra-clarity, the 48MP Sony® lens is paired with advanced algorithms and masterful Helio P70 AI to capture great detail in every photo, while the 16MP ultra-wide angle lens is perfect for the landscape photos and macro shots and the 5MP lens achieves a beautiful bokeh effect in your photos.

Excellent at every detail. A new Sony® 48MP Camera powered by AI reveals life’s drama, texture, color, and beauty in every photograph that will take your breath away.

Broaden your horizons. With the 120° ultra-wide 16MP lens, 1.5 times broader perspective than a normal lens, users can capture an impressively wide perspective and produce breathtaking photos. Don’t let the camera limit your view.

The 5MP camera works to calculate the depth of field at different distances inside the frame and helps the system to simulate a bokeh effect so you can get photos with a sharp focused object on the front and a blurred out background.

 Select a BV9800 perk 

Blackview is a trailblazer in developing state-of-the-art rugged phones. Our aim is to bring the toughest and most reliable rugged phone with the world, hand-in-hand with you.

As a rugged phone manufactured based company, we have a 5,200 square meter factory, based in China, covering 15 production lines, each of which can produce 3000-3500 mobile phones per day.

Since founded in 2013, Blackview has been growing and expanding quickly over the years, with a total of 2.4 million sales volume in 2018. Blackview phones sell on leading e-commerce platforms like Amazon, eBay, AliExpress, Cdiscount, as well as Blackview official website. We have set up 30 agents with a business range covering 60 countries and regions.

  •  Learn more news! 

Are you a Reporter, Blogger or Vlogger? To request an interview, press kit or additional info, email us at hu@blackview.hk. 

Blackview fans from all over the world shared their stories and showed just how much they loved our previous rugged phones. We’re hoping to get great feedback from our fans to the BV9800 & BV9800 Pro.

After you've backed our campaign, help us spread the word by sharing our campaign page with your friends on Facebook!

story:
Shipping Delivered after purchase within 1 Week

  • Please help to leave your phone number when you purchase.(By DHL shipping request)
  • 3D Edison shipped over 37 counties

 

​3D Edison Type A - For Family theater - No Longer Needed 3D TV & 3D Projector

 

1. Play Your Love 2D/3D Games In 3D on your 2D - Projector/TV/Monitor

 If your projector is DLP projector , please select the exclusive perk 

               

2. Watch your love 2D/3D movie in 3D on your 2D - Projector/TV/Monitor

 If your projector is DLP projector , please select the exclusive perk 

               

A penny saved is a penny earned.

How to save your money?(Save around $1300 USD)

For example:

Compare cost 【4K 3D projector】with【4K projector + 3D Edison】that you can get similar 3D depth and will save cost around $1300 USD.  for TVs are so on.

 

Connection

 Enjoy 2D movie and gets exclusive shock for 3D video!

  • BD 3D DVD/Game + 3D Theatre can support HD resolution.
  • BD 3D DVD/Game + 3D Edison + 3D Theatre can support FHD resolution.
  • BD 2D DVD/Game + 3D Edison + 3D Theater can support FHD resolution.

Enjoy 2D movie and gets exclusive shock for 3D vision everywhere

[Type B - 3D Edison theater] & [Google Chromecast] Let you gets 3D vision everywhere

Overview

  • Resolution up to 1920x1080P @ 60 Hz 

This 3D Edison Theater Console Complete Package will allow you converter any 2D Image to 3D on 3D theater through HDMI. It can also generation frame rate convert 1080P@24 up to 1080P@60.  3D theater support FHD 1080P and HD 720P @ (2D to 3D mode). PS: 60Hz per eye.

  • 120 inch magnification field of 3 meter
  • Very Smaller : 170(W)x57(H)x76(D) mm

  • Light welterweight : 250g

     

To use your 3D Edison Theater:

 

With power adapter

Plug all cables to the appropriate locations on the 3D Edison box

  • Connect a HDMI input cable to the HDMI input.
  • Connect a HDMI output cable to the 3D Theatre.
  • Connect USB cable to 3D Theatre.  
  • Connect the 3D Edison power supply.

With power pack (Take out everywhere)

      

Plug all cables to the appropriate locations on the 3D Edison box

  • Connect a HDMI input cable to the HDMI input.
  • Connect a HDMI output cable to the 3D Theatre.
  • Connect USB cable to power pack. 
  • Don't connect the 3D Edison power supply.
  • Connect 3D Theater to power pack

 

The status of the red power led                                       

The power LED will glow red when in use. When the power cable input the power LED will quickly turn on, then BLINKING and waiting receives HDMI signal transit, and then on permanently to indicate that the 3D Edison handshake has been completed.

The status of LED in red may be used for troubleshooting:

  •   LED OFF: Insufficient power. Use the 3D Edison power supply.
  •   LED BLINKING: The 3D Edison is receiving power and is ready to accept an HDMI signal. (The 3D Edison into save power mode)
  •   LED ON: The 3D Edison is powered and receiving and decoding the HDMI signal.

Support myopic up to 500 degrees. Not support astigmatic eye-sight. Circle the ring counterclockwise for your right eye and left eye respectively.

Power on :Press Power button for 3 seconds

Power off :Press Power button for 4 seconds

            

                            

Quick Start Guide(3D Edison + 3D Theater)

  1. Plug all cables to the appropriate locations on the 3D Edison box
  • Connect a HDMI input cable to the HDMI input.
  • Connect a HDMI output cable to the 3D Theatre.
  • Connect USB cable to 3D Theatre.  
  • Connect the 3D Edison power supply.

2. Grab the remote that was included in the packaging. Place the batteries and also, make sure the batteries are alive.
 

3. Press【Power Button】on the remote towards 3D Edison to turn on system and check power led states.
 

4. Press【Power Button】on 3D Theatre (3 sec).

 

5a. HDMI Input is 3D Blue-ray DVD:

   Stay on selection menu

             

   Press【VR】on remote >【FHD】on remote>【3D Button】on 3D Theatre

 

  1. Press【VR】on remote: You will get side by side screen@720P                                                        
  2. Press【FHD】on remote: You will get side by side screen@1080P                                        
  3. Press【3D Button】on 3D Theater :You will get 3D screen L/R@1080P                                     

5b. HDMI Input is 2Dformate:

Press【VR】on remote >【3D】on remote>【3D Button】on 3D Theatre

Q&A

(1) Can 3D Edison Rev1.2 support DLP Projector? 

Actually Yes!Please select the exclusive perk (Update on 2018/3/9)

 

(2) Why 3D Glasses can't stay on 3D mode?After I push 3D glasses power button that glasses will auto off after 3 secs?

(a) Please unplug power cable from system then plug in power cable.

(b) Please keep away your wifi device (Ext: cell's wifi/wifi mouse etc....), 3D Edison have 3 channels to auto switch of 2.4G signal,if this 3 channels was busy to use by the other device that glasses can't workable.

 

(3) Can 3D Edison Rev1.2 support PS4/PS3 3D Games on 2D TV?

(a) 3D Edison Rev1.2 can support 2D to 3D when you play 3D Gams.

(b) 3D Edison Rev2.0 will support PS3/PS4 3D games.

 

(4)  Why my image break @FHD mode and it normally @HD mode?

story_txt:
Shipping Delivered after purchase within 1 Week
Please help to leave your phone number when you purchase.(By DHL shipping request)
3D Edison shipped over 37 counties
 ​3D Edison Type A - For Family theater - No Longer Needed 3D TV & 3D Projector
 1. Play Your Love 2D/3D Games In 3D on your 2D - Projector/TV/Monitor If your projector is DLP projector , please select the exclusive perk                2. Watch your love 2D/3D movie in 3D on your 2D - Projector/TV/Monitor If your projector is DLP projector , please select the exclusive perk                 A penny saved is a penny earned.How to save your money?(Save around $1300 USD)For example:Compare cost 【4K 3D projector】with【4K projector + 3D Edison】that you can get similar 3D depth and will save cost around $1300 USD.  for TVs are so on. Connection
          
3D Edison - Connection
1. Connect the an HDMI Cable to the INPUT of 3D Edison Console and the OUTPUT of any media source that is equipped with an HDMI Output.
You can connect the 3D Edison via an HDMI cable to ANY Media Sources of the followings:

Cable TV or TV Top Box with HDMI Output
DVD Player with HDMI Output
Bluray Player with HDMI Output
Game Consoles – PS3 / PS4 / X-Box / Computer PC / Mac with HDMI Output

You can connect the 3D Edison  via an HDMI cable to ANY TV / Monitor of the followings:

Ordinary TV Set of Any Sizes with an HDMI INPUT
Hi-End TV Set of Any Sizes with an HDMI INPUT
Ordinary Computer Monitor with an HDMI INPUT
Hi-End Computer Monitor with an HDMI INPUT

2. Connect a 2nd HDMI Cable to the OUTPUT of 3D Edison Console and the INPUT of any 2D TV / Monitor / Project / Display.
3. Connect the supplied Power Cord to the 3D Edison Console and the AC Output of the Wall AC Outlet.
*** The 3D Edison Console accepts AC Voltage between 100 – 240VAC 50/60Hz***
(UNIVERSAL VOLTAGE) 
 
3D Edison – Adjustment 6 levels of the “Depth” of 3D
The 3D Edison Console is equipped with 6 LEVELS of Adjustments in relation to the DEPTH OF FIELDand is separated into 2 Setting of “Inward 3D” and “Outward 3D.” Each of the 2 settings allows 3 different level of adjustments in both the (1) Inward Field Depth &(2) Outward Field Depthvia the remote control - (Strong / Medium / Weak).
3D Depth Adjustments – (1) Inward 3D & (2) Outward 3D Effects
(1) Inward 3D Effect – indicates the 3 Dimensional Field Depth that protrude INSIDE the different layers of 3D moving images / video.
(2) Outward 3D Effect –indicates the 3 Dimensional Field Depth that protrudes OUTWARD LAYERSof of 3D moving images / video outside your TV screen.
An Example:
Just imagine, in the movie when Pinocchio lied to his father and his nose grew longer and longer.
• You can adjust via the Inward 3D Effect of (3 Settings of Strong / Medium / Weak) to set how far INSIDE Pinocchio’s body go into the different layers of the background.
• You can also adjust via the Outward 3D Effects of (3 Settings of Strong / Medium / Weak) to set how far Pinocchio’s nose goes OUTSIDE of the SCREEN!
 
3D Edison – Adjustment of the 3D Active Shutter Glasses
The 3D Edison Console provides its users with precise calibration of the provided 3D Active Shutter Glasses to your TV or Monitor Screen. Thus, users must calibrate the 3D Edison Console & its accompanying 3D Glasses before the initial use.
By pressing the “ Glasses” button ONCE on the remote control, the user initiates a GUI screen on his/ her TV and enter into the 3D calibration mode.
With the LEFT & RIGHT buttons on remote control, the Correct 3D Calibration can be achieved.
*** ONLY ONE SIDE of Calibration is required***
Adjusting with your LEFT eye closed
• When looking from your RIGHT eye, the contents in the RIGHT or LEFT section of the screen should stay, the 3D Calibration is successful.
OR
Adjusting with your RIGHT eye closed
• When looking from your LEFT eye, the contents in the LEFT or RIGHT section of the screen should stay, the 3D Calibration is successful. 
Additional Notes with Calibration
Button Glasses Setting on Remote
1) LV Button: Delays 2 milliseconds (1~9 levels)
2) SL Button: Delays 0.2 milliseconds (1~9 levels)
For TV suggest: LV7 SL4 Inward Week
For  Projector : LV1 SL3 Inward or Outward Strong
Buttons on Remote and functional
【Power Button】Try to go nearly as possible to 3D Edison to power it on. IR must be within good range and in line of sight. Once you press the power button, the LED light behind 3D Edison goes red.
【3D Button】Press it once and it should turn your screen blurry meaning you are in 3D mode. It is converting a 2D image to 3D with a press of this button.
【Directional Buttons】These are the directional buttons. You'll be using this for cycling through different settings and hitting "Ok" to set the setting etc.
【OSD Button】(on-screen display aka menu).Here's where you'll access pretty much all the settings for 3D Edison except for the settings for the glasses.
【OSD Exit Button】(aka return/back button)Let's you go to your previous step or exit out of the OSD.
【Glasses Button】This open up a setting that's not available in the OSD menu. You get a menu with 2 panel settings: LV and SL. You can adjust both panel LV and SL from 1-9. This is basically where you try to get rid of any ghosting issues.
【HD Button】TV be compatible with 3D Edison if it's not compatible with FHD.
【FHD Button】Enjoy content in Full HD if your TV has Full HD capability.
【TV Button】To change things back to normal.
【VR Button】This is for people with Virtual Reality headsets. So, if you want to experience what guessing is limited VR this is for you.
【3D Depth Buttons】Left (purely white arrow) and right (black arrow with outer white line) arrows. The left arrow when pressed for the first time is adjusting for the inward setting. The left arrow when pressed during the inward or outward setting just cycles through their settings (but doesn't change to inward or outward.) The right arrow when pressed for the first time is adjusting the outward setting. The right arrow when pressed during the inward or outward setting just cycles through their settings (but doesn't change to inward or outward.) There are three settings to cycle through: weak, medium, and strong.
【Mute Button】Pressing it makes no difference. 
Quick Start Guide
1. Plug all cables to the appropriate locations on the 3D Edison box. 

Connector a HDMI input cable to the HDMI input.
Connector a HDMI output cable to the HDMI output.
Connector USB cable to 3D glasses(optional). 
Connector the 3D Edison power supply.

2. Grab the remote that was included in the packaging. Place the batteries and also, make sure the batteries are alive.3. Press 【Power Button】 on the remote towards 3D Edison to turn on system and check power led states.4. Press 【3D Button】on the remote towards 3D Edison. This will make the screen blurry. What you are doing here is converting a 2D image so that it can be seen in a 3D format.
5. There are two buttons with arrows at the very bottom of remote. They are   【3D Depth Left Arrow】 and   【3D Depth Right Arrow】.Press once   【Depth Left Arrow】 and Keep In world and Week for TV/Monitor(Medium/Strong setting are propose to using for project). 
6. Make sure you are in the right scene mode. You can see what scene you are in by going to the OSD menu. 【OSD】>【3D】>【2D-3D】Scene and you have four choices: 【Movie】【Games】【Picture】【Text】. If you are watching a movie, choose movie. If you are playing a video game, choose Games.※Note: Only stay on【2D-3D】mode that you can make this choice. 
The others options for SBS、T/B、2D mode:
【OSD】>【3D】>【3D(SBS)】Support input SBS format 
【OSD】>【3D】>【3D(T/B)】Support input Top/Bottom format
【OSD】>【3D】>【2D】Back to input 2D format
 7. Grab your 3D glasses. Hit the  【power button on glasses】 (small polygon shape button in the middle). You'll see the glasses turn darker. If the glasses stay that way the whole time, it's a success. If the glasses go dark for 4 sec or 6 and stay off, you are unsuccessful. Reason could be you are not in 3D mode. You must be in 3D mode to have the glasses stay on. ※(a)The glasses needs to charge    before you fist use. (b)After full charge, the LED will turn-off automatic.(c)Glasses will stop working once the system left the 3D mode(d)The glasses will automatically stop working after 5 seconds.  
8. Make sure your room is dark (Keep LUX <3) as possible to avoid the annoying constant flickering. Closing the blinds/shades should do a good enough job.
9. Play and pause around a movie (recommend animation or movies that include animation such as Avatar, Cars, Frozen, Toy Story etc.). If you are seeing constant flickering on the screen, try adjusting the Back-light/ Brightness of your TV. Also, disabling motion enhancers and some of the TV settings.
10. Press the 【Glasses Button】 on the remote towards 3D Edison. This is where you adjust the 3D image so the 3D image is as clear as possible. ※Right eye see right picture as Left eye see left picture.
11. Notice in the previous step (9.), there are 2 settings you have to adjust: LV and SL. You can adjust both from 1-9. Adjust until you see as minimal ghosting as possible. ※3D Mode recommend LV2 SL3 ,2D to 3D mode recommendLV1 SL3 / LV7 SL4/LV9 SL8 with 【Movie】 scene as the selection and a Weak Inward setting.
 
Specifications
■To support all glasses in the operative distance.
■ No need a 3D TV or 3D Projector, still enjoy 3D vision.
■ Support HD/FHD/4K 2D TV.
■ Support 4K 2D TV / 4K Active 3D TV @FHD Mode.
■ With chargeable shuttle RF2.4G 3D glasses, simply focus to have clear 3D image.
■ Depth of field adjust available.
■ Leverages NVDIA ‘s award winning 3D Vision technology .
■ HDMI inputs resolution : FHD/HD/480P (24Hz/60Hz) Supported 
■ HDMI outputs resolution : FHD/HD (60Hz)Supported
■ 3D Input Format : Side by Side (Half)/Top and Bottom/Frame Packing
■ 3D Output Format : 3D Frame Packing/Side by side supported
■ 2D to 3D conversion.
■ 2D Bypass,3D Bypass
■ HDCP1.2/HDMI 1.4a
■ 2D to 3D Image:

           (b) Inward  3 levels

           (d) user mode support
                   [Movie][Game][Picture][Text]
■ Power Supply: 
                            (a)AC100V-240V , 12VDAC/0.5A
                            (b)CEC&DOE
                            (c)LEVEL VI Compliant
■ System Size: 3.5(Ø)x 10(H) cm
■ System Weight: 300(g)

 Enjoy 2D movie and gets exclusive shock for 3D video!


BD 3D DVD/Game + 3D Theatre can support HD resolution.

[Type B - 3D Edison theater] & [Google Chromecast] Let you gets 3D vision everywhere

Overview
Resolution up to 1920x1080P @ 60 Hz 
This 3D Edison Theater Console Complete Package will allow you converter any 2D Image to 3D on 3D theater through HDMI. It can also generation frame rate convert 1080P@24 up to 1080P@60.  3D theater support FHD 1080P and HD 720P @ (2D to 3D mode). PS: 60Hz per eye.

To use your 3D Edison Theater:

Don't connect the 3D Edison power supply.

The status of the red power led                                       

The power LED will glow red when in use. When the power cable input the power LED will quickly turn on, then BLINKING and waiting receives HDMI signal transit, and then on permanently to indicate that the 3D Edison handshake has been completed.
The status of LED in red may be used for troubleshooting:

  LED OFF: Insufficient power. Use the 3D Edison power supply.
  LED BLINKING: The 3D Edison is receiving power and is ready to accept an HDMI signal. (The 3D Edison into save power mode)
  LED ON: The 3D Edison is powered and receiving and decoding the HDMI signal.

Support myopic up to 500 degrees. Not support astigmatic eye-sight. Circle the ring counterclockwise for your right eye and left eye respectively.
Power on :Press Power button for 3 seconds
Power off :Press Power button for 4 seconds

story: We want to develop and produce a speakerphone called "Rollset". We have the prototype and all the companies that produce the single parts of "Rollset" ready. There are still a few developments for the cable to be made and a "Rollset" of the first pilot series will costs about $ 55 (inclusively all the costs for tooling, assembling, packaging, import and shipping to you), whereas we need at least a few hundred orders to start with the production. We aim to produce a first series of 1,000 pcs and for $ 55 we give our best to send you one. "Rollset" is an elegant speakerphone solution and a high strenght flat cable (FFC) can be pulled out from both sides with different length and different speed. The roll-up body is located on the upper chest during use and a microphone is located in the rotating part. It's ready to use in less than a second and after use, "Rollset" can be rolled up again and stored without any cable tangle. Rollset can be connected to every mobile phone with 3.5mm phone jack: When a call is coming, "Rollset" is plugged into the mobile phone and while holding the phone jack with one hand, the earphones are pulled out of the device. "Rollset" locks automatically and the spool with micro is in speaking position in less than a second (30cm=12inch from roll-up body to headphones and 70cm=28inch to 3.5mm phone jack). Calls can be even taken (or stopped) thereafter by pressing the button cover of "Rollset". After use, the earphones and phone jack are pulled apart (as far as it will go) till the locking mechanism unlocks and while holding the earphones and phone jack under tension the cables roll up from both sides automatically. The phone jack can be plugged out and Rollset can be stored again. "Rollset" eliminates unpleasant cable tangle and mobile phone radiation, fits in every pocket and allows listening to music. This also increases the product life of speakerphone cables.
story_txt:
We want to develop and produce a speakerphone called "Rollset". We have the prototype and all the companies that produce the single parts of "Rollset" ready. There are still a few developments for the cable to be made and a "Rollset" of the first pilot series will costs about $ 55 (inclusively all the costs for tooling, assembling, packaging, import and shipping to you), whereas we need at least a few hundred orders to start with the production. We aim to produce a first series of 1,000 pcs and for $ 55 we give our best to send you one.

"Rollset" is an elegant speakerphone solution and a high strenght flat cable (FFC) can be pulled out from both sides with different length and different speed. The roll-up body is located on the upper chest during use and a microphone is located in the rotating part. It's ready to use in less than a second and after use, "Rollset" can be rolled up again and stored without any cable tangle. 

Rollset can be connected to every mobile phone with 3.5mm phone jack: When a call is coming, "Rollset" is plugged into the mobile phone and while holding the phone jack with one hand, the earphones are pulled out of the device. "Rollset" locks automatically and the spool with micro is in speaking position in less than a second (30cm=12inch from roll-up body to headphones and 70cm=28inch to 3.5mm phone jack). Calls can be even taken (or stopped) thereafter by pressing the button cover of "Rollset". After use, the earphones and phone jack are pulled apart (as far as it will go) till the locking mechanism unlocks and while holding the earphones and phone jack under tension the cables roll up from both sides automatically. The phone jack can be plugged out and Rollset can be stored again. 

"Rollset" eliminates unpleasant cable tangle and mobile phone radiation, fits in every pocket and allows listening to music. This also increases the product life of speakerphone cables.

story:
The Ultimate Movie App


WHAT IS FILMOJO?

Filmojo is the ultimate movie app!

At IncLabs, we believe that movies are a big part of our lives. In fact, they are a major aspect of who we are.

The current crop of movie apps are each very very limited in functionality. You're using different apps for - showtimes, reviews, trailers, suggestions, movie info. You do not have a way to manage all these things at one place. Well, now you do!

Our team has striven hard to develop that ONE APP which will make all of this easy and seamless. Filmojo is the first truly versatile and social app for movies. Here is an overview of what Filmojo does:


WHO ARE WE?

We are IncLabs!

IncLabs is a startup with a team of resolute designers and developers (read geeks) from the United States and India. We endeavor to develop next generation mobile platforms on the cutting edge of technology and crafted user experience. We have spent months developing what we are about to present to you - Filmojo.

And, we need YOU!

WHOSE APP IS IT, ANYWAY?

While developing Filmojo, our team kept you in mind. What features and capabilities are most important to you? How would you like the app to present information? How can Filmojo make your life easy? And how can we make you awesome?

Are you Chris Morgan?

Chris uses Filmojo to check out latest movies and their showtimes before he makes movie plans with his friends. Sometimes when his friends come over, he uses Filmojo to buy the group's favorite DVD. He is a Filmojo Newbie.

Are you Sarah Scott?

What can you say about a girl who loves Batman and Filmojo? She recommends movies to her Facebook friends using Filmojo movie cards. She has 20 odd flicks in her Favorites list which she maintains in Filmojo. 10 of those are Batman movies! She is a Filmojo Enthusiast.

Are you Bob Lee?

Bob takes his movies seriously. He watches a dozen movies each week. And he writes reviews for most of them. He loves movie suggestions made by Filmojo. He has more than 100 followers in his Filmojo circle. He is a Filmojo Movie-Buff.

Are you Casey James?

Casey has written a whopping 150 reviews and has close to 1000 followers on Filmojo. She frequently gets invited to private movie screenings. She is a Filmojo Aficionado.


WHERE WE ARE?

Over the last 5 months, we have designed and developed many prototypes. Currently, we are ready with the 2nd major build. In this prototype, we have made some major design changes to accommodate added features. We are now working with a few in-house alpha testers to make sure this is a stable and robust build before we go on to build the next prototype.

Our plan now is to recruit a dedicated product manager and a UX expert who can contribute major insights before we go into the final build cycle.


WHERE WE HAVE BEEN?

The idea for Filmojo was seeded when Viv, our CEO, was attending an international film festival. He downloaded the IMDB app. IMDB is the most comprehensive of all film databases. But he soon realized he had to download a different app each time he tried to do something new. And soon he had 9 apps to manage all his movie-related interactions.
Smith, another founding team member, had a similar experience. She is a social network buff. And none of the existing movie apps provided a seamless social integration. And hence, we build Filmojo!
So far, we have gone through 9 design iterations and build 2 stable builds. We haven't launched in the App Store so far, as we believe in going to the market with the very best.

WE NEED YOU!

We picked Indiegogo for our campaign because we thought this is a great way to get the word out and engage with you - our user. This is how you can be a part of the development story of Filmojo.
You contributions will go a long way in enabling us to develop the final build of Filmojo and make it reach our target of 1 million users by end of 2014.

WHAT WE NEED?

We need $19,000 to build and launch Filmojo in the App Store. We will use these funds to ramp-up our core team and also for the initial burst marketing of the app. Here is a breakup of how the money will be spent.


THE IFs & BUTs
-  If we are able to meet our goal, Filmojo will be launched on the App Store as per schedule.
-  If we are not able to meet our goal, we will still go as per plan and Filmojo will still be launched. But we might have to cut costs a little and postpone the launch date. And our target of reaching 1 million users by end of 2014 will become a little bit more difficult.
-  If we surpass our goal by at least 30%, we will be able to launch Filmojo for Android as well along with the Apple App Store. So, do contribute generously!

What You Get

We have designed some very unique giveaway perks for our patrons. Check out the perk-details on the right hand side bar. Here is a summary:

THANKS FOR WALKING WITH US!

We would like to heartily thank every backer for any and all contribution or other kinds of assistance in the realization of our final goal!

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Maybe you can't contribute money right now. But you can still help. Here is how:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about Filmojo among your circles.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools above.

LEARN MORE ABOUT US

Our website: http://filmojoapp.com/

Our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Filmojo

Our Twitter Handle: https://twitter.com/filmojo

The Ultimate Movie AppWHAT IS FILMOJO?
Filmojo is the ultimate movie app!
At IncLabs, we believe that movies are a big part of our lives. In fact, they are a major aspect of who we are.The current crop of movie apps are each very very limited in functionality. You're using different apps for - showtimes, reviews, trailers, suggestions, movie info. You do not have a way to manage all these things at one place. Well, now you do!Our team has striven hard to develop that ONE APP which will make all of this easy and seamless. Filmojo is the first truly versatile and social app for movies. Here is an overview of what Filmojo does:WHO ARE WE?We are IncLabs!IncLabs is a startup with a team of resolute designers and developers (read geeks) from the United States and India. We endeavor to develop next generation mobile platforms on the cutting edge of technology and crafted user experience. We have spent months developing what we are about to present to you - Filmojo.And, we need YOU!WHOSE APP IS IT, ANYWAY?While developing Filmojo, our team kept you in mind. What features and capabilities are most important to you? How would you like the app to present information? How can Filmojo make your life easy? And how can we make you awesome?Are you Chris Morgan?Chris uses Filmojo to check out latest movies and their showtimes before he makes movie plans with his friends. Sometimes when his friends come over, he uses Filmojo to buy the group's favorite DVD. He is a Filmojo Newbie.Are you Sarah Scott?What can you say about a girl who loves Batman and Filmojo? She recommends movies to her Facebook friends using Filmojo movie cards. She has 20 odd flicks in her Favorites list which she maintains in Filmojo. 10 of those are Batman movies! She is a Filmojo Enthusiast.Are you Bob Lee?Bob takes his movies seriously. He watches a dozen movies each week. And he writes reviews for most of them. He loves movie suggestions made by Filmojo. He has more than 100 followers in his Filmojo circle. He is a Filmojo Movie-Buff.Are you Casey James?Casey has written a whopping 150 reviews and has close to 1000 followers on Filmojo. She frequently gets invited to private movie screenings. She is a Filmojo Aficionado.WHERE WE ARE?
Over the last 5 months, we have designed and developed many prototypes. Currently, we are ready with the 2nd major build. In this prototype, we have made some major design changes to accommodate added features. We are now working with a few in-house alpha testers to make sure this is a stable and robust build before we go on to build the next prototype.

Our plan now is to recruit a dedicated product manager and a UX expert who can contribute major insights before we go into the final build cycle.



WHERE WE HAVE BEEN?
The idea for Filmojo was seeded when Viv, our CEO, was attending an international film festival. He downloaded the IMDB app. IMDB is the most comprehensive of all film databases. But he soon realized he had to download a different app each time he tried to do something new. And soon he had 9 apps to manage all his movie-related interactions.Smith, another founding team member, had a similar experience. She is a social network buff. And none of the existing movie apps provided a seamless social integration. And hence, we build Filmojo!So far, we have gone through 9 design iterations and build 2 stable builds. We haven't launched in the App Store so far, as we believe in going to the market with the very best.


WE NEED YOU!
We picked Indiegogo for our campaign because we thought this is a great way to get the word out and engage with you - our user. This is how you can be a part of the development story of Filmojo.You contributions will go a long way in enabling us to develop the final build of Filmojo and make it reach our target of 1 million users by end of 2014.

WHAT WE NEED?
We need $19,000 to build and launch Filmojo in the App Store. We will use these funds to ramp-up our core team and also for the initial burst marketing of the app. Here is a breakup of how the money will be spent.

THE IFs & BUTs-  If we are able to meet our goal, Filmojo will be launched on the App Store as per schedule.-  If we are not able to meet our goal, we will still go as per plan and Filmojo will still be launched. But we might have to cut costs a little and postpone the launch date. And our target of reaching 1 million users by end of 2014 will become a little bit more difficult.-  If we surpass our goal by at least 30%, we will be able to launch Filmojo for Android as well along with the Apple App Store. So, do contribute generously!
What You Get

We have designed some very unique giveaway perks for our patrons. Check out the perk-details on the right hand side bar. Here is a summary:
THANKS FOR WALKING WITH US!We would like to heartily thank every backer for any and all contribution or other kinds of assistance in the realization of our final goal!OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPMaybe you can't contribute money right now. But you can still help. Here is how:
Help us get the word out and make some noise about Filmojo among your circles.
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools above.
LEARN MORE ABOUT USOur website: http://filmojoapp.com/Our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/FilmojoOur Twitter Handle: https://twitter.com/filmojo

story:
POD is the world's first sustainable material privacy case that prevents the audio, visual and location tracking of your cell phone. 

Why do I need the POD?

Cell phones help us communicate rapidly and keep track of our lives - they also track our lives. They are highly engineered devices that are designed to maximize reception, pinpoint our locations, give us directions, recognize speech, faces and more. Cell phones are the perfect surveillance device, that allows the tracking of all who use them. Watch this short video by the ACLU detailing the information that can be learned about a person by just analysing your cell phone's location data:


How does POD work?

The inner fabric used on the POD is a blend of bamboo and conductive silver thread. When your phone is placed inside and the lid is closed, POD creates a
Faraday cage or conductive shield around your phone. This shield causes wireless signals meant for cell phones to pass around the surface of the POD (see illustration below), preventing wireless signals from reaching your phone.

The Impact

POD is a product that provides a solution to issues of privacy,  personal and environmental health. It's the intersection of sustainability, security, privacy and health.

Exterior

All our hemp fabrics/blends meet the following standards

100% Hemp Canvas

An excellent hard wearing, germ fighting fabric, hemp canvas is UV resistant, hypoallergenic and 8 - 10x stronger than cotton. Its growth process requires little to no pesticides and less than 50% of the water needed to produce cotton. Our hemp is also

70/30 Hemp/Silk Blend

The silk blended hemp has all the benefits of the hemp with a silky smooth exterior that is much stronger than conventional silk because of the hemp core.

Interior/Shielding Fabric

Bamboo/Silver Blend

The interior blend of 70% bamboo and 30% silver is the layer that prevents radio waves from reaching your phone. Bamboo is the worlds' fastest land growing plant and does not require intensive pesticides or herbicides. Excellent moisture wicking and germ fighting properties also make it an excellent choice.

Below are some of the prototypes we have designed and tested on the quest for materials that were sustainable and hypoallergenic.


What We Need & What You Get

We need funding to push through the stage of manufacture engineering to determine the lowest possible and final manufacturing cost. We've already invested thousands of dollars into getting the POD to this point.

The POD will be made in California, in a clean and equitable factory that is  certified to produce medical devices. Their level of craft will allow a consistent product that delivers your privacy.

You have the option to be a part of history - ourstory - the beginning of fighting back to control our privacy.

Some stills of the California factory floor where the POD are below.


About The Developer

I'm Preston, I've studied the history of ancient cultures/civilizations and counter intelligence. Most recently I've received my Masters in Regenerative Studies - or sustainable practices. POD is a fusion of my passion, experiences and studies.

Risks

In the past, privacy accessories have not been a product the average person has invested in, largely due to the lack of information on the subject of cell phone surveillance and privacy. On top of this, our choice of sustainable, high quality materials and domestic manufacturing leaves a high overhead cost. It's our final goal to get through the manufacture engineering process and make  the POD available at the lowest possible price.

Other Ways You Can Help PLEASE SHARE!

We are not a large company, by any stretch, but we believe in the power of the individual and the collective. Please share our project with your network and remember to spread love! 

FAQ

Can I still get texts, voice calls, emails etc, when my phone is in the POD?

No - your phone will not transmit or receive any wireless signals or data when placed inside the POD.

Can't I just power down my phone?

No, cell phones can still be accessed and used for surveillance when they are powered off. Most phones today power off on the software level, leaving the power circuit connected.

Why can't I just use "Airplane Mode?"

Airplane mode uses software to prevent your phone from transceiving wireless signals. Software is not the most reliable security measure to rely on - particularly in context of avoiding surveillance. POD guarantees your privacy by creating a privacy wall when you demand it.

Wouldn't removing the battery solve my issues with surveillance?

Not all phones have removable batteries. Further, there are reports that phones can still be located with their batteries removed. The POD requires you only to place your phone in and close the lid.
