story:
VITAphoneneo introduction and prototype action demo.

VITAphoneneo - Answer Your Door From The Cloud Anytime and Anywhere!

Quick links:

  1. What is VITAphoneneo?
  2. VITAphoneneo in press.
  3. Where is VITAphoneneo useful?
  4. More info about VITAphoneneo features.
  5. How it works?
  6. Technical specifications.
  7. VITAphoneneo user interfaces.
    • Device user interface.
    • Client user interface.
  8. A few words about device molding and mounting.
  9. VITAphoneneo has a comprehensive anti-theft system.
  10. Our main & stretch goals.
  11. Perks and prices.
  12. Stretch goal perks, prices and special offers.
    • Special offers!
    • Stretch goal perks description.
  13. The VITAphoneneo story.
  14. Who Can Benefit From VITAphoneneo?
  15. Why Crowdfunding?
  16. Fulfillment fund.
  17. Project deadlines.
  18. Our team.
  19. Stay in touch with us!

What is VITAphoneneo?

«VITAphoneneo» is a smart cloud-based intercom powered by Android OS, that mounts near or directly to the front door of any home. It features a 9.7" IPS LCD with touchscreen, dual cameras, microphone, speakers, biometric scanner, as well as light, temperature and humidity sensors. The device is connected to the Internet for full access from anywhere. When a visitor comes to your home, they'll use the touchscreen to do the equivalent of ringing a doorbell using the «call» button. A few seconds later you hear your doorbell ringing - from your smart phone! This lets you know about every visitor to your home even if you're in Hong Kong or Hawaii or anywhere in the world.

VITAphoneneo key features highlight.

After you find out who's at your door you can start a conversation right there with them from your phone to your front door. Even if your front door is a thousand miles away from where you are at the moment.

ANIMATION: Answer your door from the airplane.

Unlike other entryphones available on the market, VITAphoneneo requires no additional control panel installation for each apartment. All You need is an internet-connected PC, Mac or modern smart-phone or tablet to be able to use all VITAphoneneo features. Due to the fact VITAphoneneo is much more scalable, our product is far most cost effective when compared to the current generation of entryphones and significantly superior to them in features.

VITAphoneneo system provides SMS-based device management (SMS commands are free of charge): You can open and close the door, control the alarm and video recording systems or just send a simple text message that will be displayed on the VITAphoneneo display. We have implemented a web-based interface that allows you to use and administrate your intercom from any device with internet browser support.

VITAphoneneo is mostly cordless excluding the power supply, and features a built-in rechargeable battery that allows our intercom to actively run up to 10 hours in case of power failure.

VITAphoneneo in press.

Where is VITAphoneneo useful?

VITAphoneneo has almost endless possibilities. You can open the door for your visitor without even leaving the couch by pressing a single button on your smart-phone. It's equally easy to send a door lock command to the intercom. This is an indispensable feature for the elderly or the infirm living alone who find it difficult to make their way across their home to perform routine tasks.

Thanks to the built-in biometric scanner you don't need to carry a bunch of keys to your home or office anymore. Just swipe your finger over the sensor and your door will open.

ANIMATION: Biometric scanner in action.

You can always see what's happening on either side of the front door. All You have to do is open the application on the smart-phone and start watching. Built-in high quality infrared cameras are capable of monitoring and even recording what's happening even in total darkness. Thanks to the PIR-motion sensor, video streaming and recording will be enabled in case of movement detection with real-time imaging instantly available on your smart phone. All of these features makes VITAphoneneo a worthy and more economical alternative to expensive security systems. Alarm system could be activated in case of unrecognized movement detection. Electric lock is blocked by VITAphoneneo in case of unauthorized attempts to open the lock, thereby denying the possibility of using lockpicks to hack it.

When security alarm system is activated VITAphoneneo will:

  1. Block the electric lock.
  2. Turn on alarm siren.
  3. Make a call to 911 (this option is configurable).
  4. Speak personalized warning message. (e.g. "Please, step away from the door. Alarm system is activated!").
  5. Make a call to homeowner.
  6. Send a PUSH and/or SMS notification message to homeowner.

ANIMATION: The power of alarm system.

VITAphoneneo features voice control functionality. Additional microphone located inside communication center. This allows you to control the device without a smartphone when you are indoors. You can control videostream, answer the door and control door lock using voice commands. We have provided the ability to connect remote speakers and microphone. These features are very useful for people with disabilities. Imagine, that the doctor came to a sick elderly woman to make her an injection. Thanks to VITAphoneneo she can open the door and let the doctor come in without leaving the bed.

VITAphoneneo is equipped with the face recognition function. This gives VITAphoneneo ability to identify your visitors. Thanks to this feature our device can automatically open the door for registered users. VITAphoneneo has a «voice bell» option: when a visitor pushes a «call» button device speaks the name of the visitor, instead of playing default sound, if the visitor is registered in database.

One of the most useful and important applications of VITAphoneneo for hospitals. Possibility of the device installation in the wards allows remote monitoring of patients. Thanks to aforementioned voice control feature bedridden patients can easily send notification to the doctor or nurse. If the patient feels bad, he can instantly inform the doctor by saying the passphrase. We are planning to provide the VITAphoneneo system equipment for the hospitals on a charitable basis.

Another important device application that we offer is an equipment of classrooms in schools, kindergartens and child summer camps. In this way VITAphoneneo provides the real-time monitoring ability of the children activity for their parents. In the same time, multimedia features can be used to organize the process of interactive studying. Installed in office buildings, on factories, plants or enterprises VITAphoneneo can be used for surveillance and monitoring of employees and production processes.

ANIMATION: Visitors management made easy.

«VITAphoneneoAuto» version is useful for motorists. It can fully replace GPS navigator. Thanks to support of four external cameras it can act as a parking assistant, DVR and security system for anti-theft protection. This version provides an ability to control engine, door locks, sound system by voice commands, your smartphone or using VITAphoneneo touch screen, that mounts directly into the dashboard like standard sound or DVD systems. All VITAphoneneo features are available for remote control, thus allowing tracking the status and location, as well as watching real-time streaming from all cameras of your car, eg if your wife or son is driving your car. VITAphoneneo features an option to connect to the car's onboard computer via OBD connector, that allows to control mirrors, power windows, climate system, obtain computer data, perform diagnostics of Your car, as well as monitor the fuel consumption. Thanks to smart notification system you will always be informed about low battery level, tire failure, low fuel level and other options available in your car directly on your smartphone.

The simplest and most common usage case this is when you are roasting barbecue at your backyard and just can not hear the doorbell.

Communication center contains a smoke detector and in case of fire VITAphoneneo will enable an alarm siren, make a call to 911 and notify the homeowner using call, SMS and PUSH notifications. We have provided the support for remote wireless smoke detectors, that can be installed in remote rooms (sensors can be purchased separately and are not included in the package).

We decided to choose the image of the Indian Goddess of Luck and Fortune - Lakshmi, as our project logo, so she will protect your home and bring the good luck into it.

Our system provides an additional services for storing recorded data for any length of time in our remote cloud server infrastructure. Data transfer between client nodes and our secure cloud environment is protected by modern, reliable multilayered encryption algorithms keeping all of your recordings safe and secure.

You can purchase the device for yourself or if you live in an apartment building you and your fellow tenants can chip in. Once installed at the entrances of the apartment building, everyone will be able to use VITAphoneneo with personalized attention and security. The user database is unlimited so even hundreds of people living in a high-rise building can all use a single VITAphoneneo. All You need to do to get started is to install the VITAphoneneo app on a smart-phone, tablet or another device and bind it to the intercom. This is very simple task and can be easily done by the local device administrator in just a few minutes.

More info about VITAphoneneo features.

Built-in temperature sensors always remind you to dress a hat before leaving the house and a humidity sensor will let you know when you need to take an umbrella.

Your home address can be displayed on the VITAphoneneo start screen, thus allowing your visitors to locate your house more quickly and easily. This is a great benefit for delivery services couriers.

The GPS-enabled VITAphoneneo version is useful for mobile objects, like cars, motorcycles, yachts and so on. The built-in USB port allows awaiting guests to charge their mobile phone, PDA, MP3 player or even tablet while waiting for you by your door. Snow and rain are no problem since the USB is waterproof and features an overcurrent and short-circuit protection).

The built-in FM module allows You to listen to local radio stations. Support of Wi-Fi HotSpot technology provides the capability of sharing Internet connectivity with your guests. VITAphoneneo can display various information about house residents, upcoming events, announcements and other important organizational house-related information to all users and/or their guest. All the information is stored in our secure remote cloud infrastructure, so it will be left untouched in case of device failure and replacement.

You can connect multiple wireless cameras, located inside or outside of the building, thus giving you real-time streaming of what's happening at different locations in and around your residence. WiDi technology is intended to connect a remote wireless display and helps to redirect the image from cameras, show advertisements or any other desired information on any modern big-screen TV. The DLNA protocol support provides an easy way to stream real-time imaging from cameras directly to any DLNA-enable device, such as a Smart TV, TV Box and so on. Thanks to the HDMI port you can connect VITAphoneneo to any supported high definition external display for crystal clear image playback.

There are eight different models of the device available: starting from the entry-level model for the budget conscious with with a reduced feature set straight through to the full-featured «all-in-one»advanced version, including every feature and function we've outlined. VITAphoneneo is powered by a very customized version of the Android OS with a specialized interface. There is an option to run third-party application from Google Play Store, that can be installed on the device.

VITAphoneneo features an automatic software update system with crash protection and self-recovery options, thus allowing seamless deployment of bug fixes, improvements and enhancements. Drivers for the next generation 4G LTE USB wireless modem from Verizon can be installed making it possible to connect to the Internet using your new shiny Verizon modem immediately after update with no hassles.

An integrated SIM-card slot with support for GSM/GPRS EDGE/3G/4G/LTE technologies (mobile connectivity depends on device build) expands the functionality of VITAphoneneo into a full-featured cellphone (this option can be enabled or disabled by you or any device administrator at any time).

The local device administrator has the ability to enable or disable a wide range of advanced features such as phone functionality, Wi-Fi HotSpot access, Bluetooth, mobile data connectivity, Ethernet controller, DLNA protocol support, HDMI port, etc. This kind of flexibility makes it easy to configure a system that best suits your needs in any given situation. For example, VITAphoneneo can be used to share Internet connectivity with the visitors sitting in a waiting room ahead of their appointment.

How it works?

This simple scheme explains how does VITAphoneneo system works.

* Because of hardware limitations you can not use wireless Internet connection and Wi-Fi HotSpot functionality in the same time.

** Some features (e.g. HD real-time video streaming) may be unavailable, depending on the quality and speed of your mobile connection.

  1. VITAphoneneo is connected to the Internet via:
    1. 1.1. 3G/4G/LTE USB data modem. You can use any AT&T, T-Mobile or Sprint modems of your choice.
    2. 1.2. Mobile data connectivity, using built-in 3G/4G data modem.
    3. 1.3. Wi-Fi connection with a wireless router, connected to the internet.
    4. 1.4. Ethernet cable connection with a wired router, connected to the internet.
  2. Wireless or wired router and mobile data radio tower are connected to the Internet with any available methods: broadband, DSL or cable modem, T1 and so forth.
  3. VITAphoneneo has secure, encrypted P2P (peer-to-peer) connection with our cloud server infrastructure. Device communicates directly with our servers and transfer video streams, notifications, weather information and other data. All commands, received from clients are transferred to the cloud system and then sent to the device. There is no way to connect directly to the VITAphoneneo device bypassing our secure servers environment and obtain the unauthorized control or hack the device somehow.
  4. Client devices can be connected to the Internet using the same types of connection like our device uses.
  5. Intercom can be controlled using wide range of the devices: recent smartphones, tablet, PCs, MACs and other smart devices running a recent popular mobile OS or featuring HTML5-compatible web-browser are supported.
    1. 5.1. A tablet PC connected to the Internet via home or office wireless access point or router.
    2. 5.2. Smartphone with a mobile data connectivity. Any of GPRS/EDGE/3G/4G/LTE connection is supported, but some features may be unavailable if connection has a poor quality and/or speed.
    3. 5.3. PC or Mac computer connected via Ethernet to the home or office wired router. Intercom can be controlled using web browser or our native client.

Technical specifications.

VITAphoneneo user interfaces.

Device user interface.

Device home screen(Device color: WHISPER WHITE, all other colors are available for preorder)

Video call screen on device(Device color: BASIC BLACK, all other colors are available for preorder)

Client user interface.

Our system works on iOS, Android, Windows phone, Blackberry, Symbian, Mac OS, Linux and Windows.

Client UI: Inbound call Client UI: Video call
Client UI: Home screen Client UI: Intercom customization
Client UI: VITAphoneneo connectivity Client UI: Security settings
Client UI: Multimedia settings Client UI: Automobile settings

A few words about device moulding and mounting.

The device body is waterproof and is made of durable stainless steel. All device connectors, buttons and holes are rubberized in order to totally prevent moisture seeping into the unit. The touchscreen is made of shockproof glass. Acceptable device operating temperatures range from -22°F to 140°F. The device panel is securely attached to the entry door with a MultiLock protection system, which is almost impossible to open without a key (smart-phone or fingerprint in our case). The fastener is made from mounting loops, located on the four corners of the body. This allows anyone to attach the device to the door through mounting holes using bolts and nuts or to the wall using dowels. Mounting loops are protected with special locks that restrict access to the bolt heads.

The device consists of two different, integrated parts: the external control panel and internal coordination module. The external control panel is equipped with sensors, camera and microphone, speakers and touchscreen. All main components, including motherboard with CPU and memory, communication ports, 3G, Wi-Fi, FM modules, SIM slot is taken out to the coordination module. There is a special connector located on the back side of the control panel used to connect to the coordination module. This module is designed to be mounted inside the dwelling. The coordination module features a built-in alarm siren that can be activated on movement detection or electronic seals corruption. This behavior can be configured by device administrator.

Engineering drawing: items description

Engineering drawing: device moulding

Four mounting holes and one cable hole need to be drilled to attach the external panel to the door or wall. The rear (internal) camera is connected to coordination module and installed separately (rear camera is available depending on device build). In that way, a complete system can be installed after drilling nine holes in total: five for the external panel and four for the internal module. The cable length between main panel and coordination module can be up to twenty six feet long.

Color range.

We have chosen colors based on the ones that are used in the building and the door decoration, so they are not as rich and deep as for example, Apple used for iPhone 5c. Imagine how it would look bright yellow device on the dark brown door.

VITAphoneneo has complex antitheft system.

«But this device, mounted right near or directly on my door will surely attract the attention of a thief» - You may think. Don't worry! We have done our best to make theft almost impossible and meaningless. That's because:

  1. VITAphoneneo has an ultra-durable steel body, so any attempts to pry it open with a screwdriver will just not work.
  2. Mounting bolts are protected by special covers with locks, that can be opened by the key. All four mounting loops are protected by the electronic seals.
  3. In case a would-be vandal still managed to cut off the device, it will be completely non-functional without the communication module anyway. There is no sense in stealing the external front panel because it just can't work without the paired communication module.
  4. Our device is equipped with a camera and motion sensor. The remote server video recording service will be immediately automatically activated as soon as a would-be thief approaches the VITAphoneneo.
  5. In case of unauthorized violation of the electronic seal on any of the mounting bolts, an alarm will sound and your own personalized recorded message will be played (e. g., «MOVE AWAY FROM THE DOOR AND LEAVE! THE POLICE ARE BEING CALLED!») There is a configurable option that can intended to send a notification to the house owner or to make an emergency call to 911.

Clearly, there is no reason in the world for a thief to even try and steal the device.

Our main & stretch goals

As of now we have a working «VITAphoneneo Basic» draft version prototype and a full-featured client application for Android OS. We need funds for Indiegogo project promotion and marketing.

You can preorder any of the stretch-goal models. In case if we will not reach target goal, you will receive most advanced model and a partial refund, with difference amount.

Perks and prices.

Perk price: $1.00 - Thanks for your contribution - Thank you very much for your donation. Your contribution has made us one little step closer to the goal.

«Thank you» card for our backers

Stretch goal perks, prices and special offers.

Special offers!

Harley Davidson «Fat Boy» for the share!

Perk price: FREE - You can follow our campaign and share a link to it in social networks and become a participant completely FREE!

Perk price: $3.00 - Non-refundable donation to participate in raffle without any needs to share and/or follow our campaign.

Vitaliy was going to sell his motorcycle, Harley Davidson Fat Boy and invest the proceeds in VITAphoneneo promotion. But he decided that it would be better to just donate it to one of our backers who supported our project. We will raffle the Fat Boy randomly when the campaign goal will be reached. To participate in the raffle you have to follow the project and share it with your friends in social networks. If You don't want to follow or share the project, You can donate just $3 and become a participant of the draw. Use our $3 perk to donate.

Vitaliy's «Fat Boy»

Early birds awesome discounts.

Since we reached our main goal ultra fast we decided to make a special discount for our first backers. Discount is limited only to VITAphoneneo Mini and VITAphoneneo Basic versions. Only first three hundreds of VITAphoneneo Mini and VITAphoneneo Basic devices will be sold at special price. Hurry up!

The challenge for referrals.

Perk price: FREE - 10 free pieces of VITAphoneneo Basic for our TOP-10 referrers.

Want to get VITAphoneneo for free? It's easy! We will give a free «VITAphoneneo Basic» device for every user from the top 10 referrals list. We will periodically post an updated list of referrals to the campaign, so you will be able to keep track of the progress. Invite your siblings, friends and other potential backers to our project - it is suitable to all and sundry. The more backers you invite - the more chances you will have to win the challenge.

Stretch goal perks description.

The retail VITAphoneneo price will be $479 for entry-level model and up to $689 for the full-featured «all-in-one» version. During our crowdfunding campaign we offer steep discounts on pre-order pricing for as low as $319 up to $529 respectively.

We provide WORLDWIDE FREE SHIPPING for all VITAphoneneo versions!

Perk price: $319.00 - VITAphoneneo Mini – this build is almost identical to the «Basic» version (see below) except for a smaller 7.0 inches display size.
Approximate retail price: $479.00.

VITAphoneneo Mini(Device color: SKY, all other colors are available for preorder).

Perk price: $329.00 - VITAphoneneo Basic – this is the model for the budget-minded. It features all standard entryphone functions and is equipped with single IR-camera, PIR motion sensor, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth adapters, internal and external (protected charging) USB ports, mobile data connectivity, 100Base-TX Ethernet, two speakers, microphone, alarm siren and has built-in temperature and humidity sensors. This version has a built-in biometric scanner that can be used to control an electrical door lock system. This version is designed to install mainly to apartment or house door.
Approximate retail price: $489.00.

VITAphoneneo Basic(Device color: VERY VANILLA, all other colors are available for preorder).

Perk price: $379.00 - VITAphoneneo Standard – this is a mid-range build. It features all the same functionality as «Basic», but additionally has a rear camera. It also supports the DLNA protocol. This version is most useful for installation in a stairwell.
Approximate retail price: $539.00.

VITAphoneneo Standard(Device color: SMOKE, all other colors are available for preorder).

Perk price: $429.00 - VITAphoneneo Multimedia – this build features an FM radio module, HDMI connector, WiDi technology and GSM module with phone call support. It allows connections to an external display to show information or playback video stream right from the device. This version can be used in public places to provide a broad range of services from simple Wi-Fi HotSpot up to advertisements streaming over multiple external displays.
Approximate retail price: $589.00.

VITAphoneneo Multimedia(Device color: RIVER ROCK, all other colors are available for preorder).

Perk price: $479.00 - VITAphoneneo Security – this is a worthy alternative to full-featured alarm and security systems. It features all the same functionality, described in «Basic» version. Additionally, it provides a way to handle image streaming and recording from multiple cameras. It has internal and external GPS support, GSM module as well as WiDi and HDMI technologies support.
Approximate retail price: $639.00.

VITAphoneneo Security(Device color: LIGHT MOKA, all other colors are available for preorder).

Perk price: $479.00 - VITAphoneneo Auto – this build is designed to be installed in a vehicle such as a car. It features GPS-tracking capability, security and alarm systems that allows remote control of door locks and starting the engine. This version can be mounted on the dashboard, headrest, etc.. Biometric scanners can be installed on the doors and ignition. This device does not include any built-in cameras or motion sensors, but supports connecting up to 4 external ones: front, rear and two sides. Cameras can work as a parking helper, DVR or security system. This version can be connected to a car's audio system. Thanks to voice commands you can control engine - start and stop, manage security alarm system, door locks, audio system and GPS navigation. We have not yet finally decided about the screen size of this model. Possibly we will equip this device with portrait oriented 17-inch screen like Tesla motors does in it's cars. Please, give your opinion about screen size into campaign comments.
Approximate retail price: $639.00.

VITAphoneneo Auto(Device color: CINNAMON, all other colors are available for preorder).

Perk price: $529.00 - VITAphoneneo Professional – this is an «all-in-one», full-featured build, that provides all aforementioned functions and technologies (except for «Auto» version features).
Approximate retail price: $689.00.

VITAphoneneo Professional(Device color: SLATE GRAY, all other colors are available for preorder).

Perk price: $449.00 - VITAphoneneo Custom version – we will design and assemble the device with the features that you choose from those available. This model can be equipped with a custom-sized LCD display and include any described features. This version is highly business-oriented, as it allows you to create model that best meets all of your business requirements. Price indicated for a 13.3-inch multimedia version. Contact us with required build details to get exact pricing and deadlines.

VITAphoneneo Custom(Device color: CHOCOLATE CHIP, all other colors are available for preorder).

Remember - You can always can get together with fellow tenants in your apartment building and pool your resources to make the purchase allowing everyone to enjoy the benefits while saving money.

The VITAphoneneo Story

VITAphoneneo was born in Brooklyn, New York. Vitaliy lived at that time in Florida and in February, 2014 he came to Brooklyn to visit his mother. I (Igor) was living not far from his mother’s house at that time. Taking this opportunity and in spite of the terrible weather Vitaliy decided to drop by and visit me.

Winter 2013-2014 was among the coldest on record and in those days there was a heavy snowfall in Brooklyn. I was home and delved into my garage (I can’t remember what I was looking for, but it doesn’t matter anyway). Vitaliy rang my doorbell for a long time, since he knew I was home since the light was on in my kitchen.

Vitaliy began to freeze after about 5 minutes of trying to get me to come to the door. He took out his smartphone that flatly refused to work because he was wearing gloves and couldn't properly work his phone. Even after he took his gloves off, he had no luck because it was too cold for his phone's touchscreen to work.

Vitaily then went to a nearby cafe and ordered tea to keep warm. After a few minutes, his smartphone warmed and started working again and Vitaliy called me. We talked and after he finished his tea he went to my house again. This time of course I was waiting for him.

During the discussion of the occurred incident Vitaliy suddenly noticed: It would be cool if your entryphone could call directly to your smartphone. That evening we sat and chatted for a while and then Vitaly went home.

The next evening Vitaliy come to me with an USB pendrive and presented a new awesome project to me - VITAphoneneo. Since then we added new features almost every hour and nothing could stop us until we ended up developing the VITAphoneneo which we are now introducing to you.

We spent six months in planning and preparing VITAphoneneo and now we are ready to start device production.

Who Can Benefit from VITAphoneneo?

From the beginning VITAphoneneo was just a simple entryphone replacement with an Internet connection that allows anyone to «receive visitors» online using their smartphone.

At that time we had no idea how this project will grow, but right now we know that VITAphoneneo is useful literally for absolutely everyone! Now VITAphoneneo is not just a smart cloud intercom - it is a complex security system for your house, your business, your car, bike or boat as well as an interactive vehicle management system and DVR. VITAphoneneo can completely replace an existing visitor management system in your office. VITAphoneneo is an the heart of communication infrastructure that features notification, communication and organizational capabilities for residents of any home or apartment or office building.

Imagine: you have an urgent business trip and you are flying out of town. At the same time your mom suddenly decided to drop in for a visit and nobody's there to give her a warm welcome or even let her in. Thanks to VITAphoneneo, this is no longer a problem - you can remotely open the door, add her fingerprint into VITAphone's database or authorize her smartphone to control your device with just a few touches on your smartphone. You can talk with your mom right there from the airplane.

And this is just one of dozens of different scenarios. During preparation, planning and development of the system we have discovered hundreds and thousands of similar stories and we continue to discover more and more opportunities to use VITAphoneneo and make life easier.

So, if after reading this information you still think that VITAphoneneo is not suitable for you, it is likely that you just yet haven’t realized all the possibilities VITAphoneneo has - they are almost endless.

And if you come up with new and unique usage for VITAphoneneo, that makes it even bigger and better - we always happy to hear it and improve our device based on your suggestions!

Authors of the best ideas will be rewarded with the free VITAphoneneo device that will be improved based on their ideas.

Why Crowdfunding?

During the project preparation and development stages we have repeatedly raised the question about project financing. We considered various options on how to obtain money required to complete the project and start production.

After repeated evaluations of all pros and cons of borrowing money, start-up investments from outside investors and our own savings, we realized that we needed something totally different, something new and unique, as all evaluated options had more cons than pros.

Now, with our project in its final stage, we can’t think of anything better than crowdfunding to provide the money we need to make our idea a reality. That's because we can get the funds necessary to start production and our backers get new unique device at a substantial discount. In addition, we hope to get new ideas, comments and suggestions from the public. Every user can take a direct part in future VITAphoneneo product development by sharing their ideas and experiences with us.

VITAphoneneo has amazing properties. Only one VITAphoneneo device is needed to manage residential or office building, therefore its price for every user can be less than one dollar, because users can organize a collective purchase.

Fulfillment fund.

Here we providing approximate funds distribution based on our preliminary assessments.

Project deadlines.

Our team.

Our core team consists of only two members despite the stunning size of the project. During different stages of our project we have attracted a huge amount of human resources: hardware engineers, designers, software developers and marketers, but our team left the same. Meet:

We take this opportunity to thank all those people, who helped us to make VITAphoneneo such an outstanding project and who gave us their support during our work on this project. Thanks to all engineers, developers, coders, designers, marketers who gave part of themselves to our project.

We also want to thank our families, who have tolerated our nightly gatherings, discussions, debates and disputes, and also constant mess in their life and others inconveniences during preparation period. Thank you very much for what you were side by side with us in a difficult times!

Stay in touch with us!

We are always opened for new opportunities! If you have any ideas, questions or suggestions you can contact us using Indiegogo campaign, our project email info@softvit.com or give us a call to +1-855-SOFTVIT (toll free).

What is VITAphoneneo?«VITAphoneneo» is a smart cloud-based intercom powered by Android OS, that mounts near or directly to the front door of any home. It features a 9.7" IPS LCD with touchscreen, dual cameras, microphone, speakers, biometric scanner, as well as light, temperature and humidity sensors. The device is connected to the Internet for full access from anywhere. When a visitor comes to your home, they'll use the touchscreen to do the equivalent of ringing a doorbell using the «call» button. A few seconds later you hear your doorbell ringing - from your smart phone! This lets you know about every visitor to your home even if you're in Hong Kong or Hawaii or anywhere in the world.VITAphoneneo key features highlight.After you find out who's at your door you can start a conversation right there with them from your phone to your front door. Even if your front door is a thousand miles away from where you are at the moment.ANIMATION: Answer your door from the airplane.Unlike other entryphones available on the market, VITAphoneneo requires no additional control panel installation for each apartment. All You need is an internet-connected PC, Mac or modern smart-phone or tablet to be able to use all VITAphoneneo features. Due to the fact VITAphoneneo is much more scalable, our product is far most cost effective when compared to the current generation of entryphones and significantly superior to them in features.VITAphoneneo system provides SMS-based device management (SMS commands are free of charge): You can open and close the door, control the alarm and video recording systems or just send a simple text message that will be displayed on the VITAphoneneo display. We have implemented a web-based interface that allows you to use and administrate your intercom from any device with internet browser support.VITAphoneneo is mostly cordless excluding the power supply, and features a built-in rechargeable battery that allows our intercom to actively run up to 10 hours in case of power failure.
VITAphoneneo in press.
Where is VITAphoneneo useful?VITAphoneneo has almost endless possibilities. You can open the door for your visitor without even leaving the couch by pressing a single button on your smart-phone. It's equally easy to send a door lock command to the intercom. This is an indispensable feature for the elderly or the infirm living alone who find it difficult to make their way across their home to perform routine tasks.Thanks to the built-in biometric scanner you don't need to carry a bunch of keys to your home or office anymore. Just swipe your finger over the sensor and your door will open.ANIMATION: Biometric scanner in action.You can always see what's happening on either side of the front door. All You have to do is open the application on the smart-phone and start watching. Built-in high quality infrared cameras are capable of monitoring and even recording what's happening even in total darkness. Thanks to the PIR-motion sensor, video streaming and recording will be enabled in case of movement detection with real-time imaging instantly available on your smart phone. All of these features makes VITAphoneneo a worthy and more economical alternative to expensive security systems. Alarm system could be activated in case of unrecognized movement detection. Electric lock is blocked by VITAphoneneo in case of unauthorized attempts to open the lock, thereby denying the possibility of using lockpicks to hack it.When security alarm system is activated VITAphoneneo will:
Block the electric lock.
Turn on alarm siren.
Make a call to 911 (this option is configurable).
Speak personalized warning message. (e.g. "Please, step away from the door. Alarm system is activated!").
Make a call to homeowner.
Send a PUSH and/or SMS notification message to homeowner.
ANIMATION: The power of alarm system.VITAphoneneo features voice control functionality. Additional microphone located inside communication center. This allows you to control the device without a smartphone when you are indoors. You can control videostream, answer the door and control door lock using voice commands. We have provided the ability to connect remote speakers and microphone. These features are very useful for people with disabilities. Imagine, that the doctor came to a sick elderly woman to make her an injection. Thanks to VITAphoneneo she can open the door and let the doctor come in without leaving the bed.VITAphoneneo is equipped with the face recognition function. This gives VITAphoneneo ability to identify your visitors. Thanks to this feature our device can automatically open the door for registered users. VITAphoneneo has a «voice bell» option: when a visitor pushes a «call» button device speaks the name of the visitor, instead of playing default sound, if the visitor is registered in database.One of the most useful and important applications of VITAphoneneo for hospitals. Possibility of the device installation in the wards allows remote monitoring of patients. Thanks to aforementioned voice control feature bedridden patients can easily send notification to the doctor or nurse. If the patient feels bad, he can instantly inform the doctor by saying the passphrase. We are planning to provide the VITAphoneneo system equipment for the hospitals on a charitable basis.Another important device application that we offer is an equipment of classrooms in schools, kindergartens and child summer camps. In this way VITAphoneneo provides the real-time monitoring ability of the children activity for their parents. In the same time, multimedia features can be used to organize the process of interactive studying. Installed in office buildings, on factories, plants or enterprises VITAphoneneo can be used for surveillance and monitoring of employees and production processes.ANIMATION: Visitors management made easy.«VITAphoneneoAuto» version is useful for motorists. It can fully replace GPS navigator. Thanks to support of four external cameras it can act as a parking assistant, DVR and security system for anti-theft protection. This version provides an ability to control engine, door locks, sound system by voice commands, your smartphone or using VITAphoneneo touch screen, that mounts directly into the dashboard like standard sound or DVD systems. All VITAphoneneo features are available for remote control, thus allowing tracking the status and location, as well as watching real-time streaming from all cameras of your car, eg if your wife or son is driving your car. VITAphoneneo features an option to connect to the car's onboard computer via OBD connector, that allows to control mirrors, power windows, climate system, obtain computer data, perform diagnostics of Your car, as well as monitor the fuel consumption. Thanks to smart notification system you will always be informed about low battery level, tire failure, low fuel level and other options available in your car directly on your smartphone.The simplest and most common usage case this is when you are roasting barbecue at your backyard and just can not hear the doorbell.Communication center contains a smoke detector and in case of fire VITAphoneneo will enable an alarm siren, make a call to 911 and notify the homeowner using call, SMS and PUSH notifications. We have provided the support for remote wireless smoke detectors, that can be installed in remote rooms (sensors can be purchased separately and are not included in the package).We decided to choose the image of the Indian Goddess of Luck and Fortune - Lakshmi, as our project logo, so she will protect your home and bring the good luck into it.Our system provides an additional services for storing recorded data for any length of time in our remote cloud server infrastructure. Data transfer between client nodes and our secure cloud environment is protected by modern, reliable multilayered encryption algorithms keeping all of your recordings safe and secure.You can purchase the device for yourself or if you live in an apartment building you and your fellow tenants can chip in. Once installed at the entrances of the apartment building, everyone will be able to use VITAphoneneo with personalized attention and security. The user database is unlimited so even hundreds of people living in a high-rise building can all use a single VITAphoneneo. All You need to do to get started is to install the VITAphoneneo app on a smart-phone, tablet or another device and bind it to the intercom. This is very simple task and can be easily done by the local device administrator in just a few minutes.
More info about VITAphoneneo features.Built-in temperature sensors always remind you to dress a hat before leaving the house and a humidity sensor will let you know when you need to take an umbrella.Your home address can be displayed on the VITAphoneneo start screen, thus allowing your visitors to locate your house more quickly and easily. This is a great benefit for delivery services couriers.The GPS-enabled VITAphoneneo version is useful for mobile objects, like cars, motorcycles, yachts and so on. The built-in USB port allows awaiting guests to charge their mobile phone, PDA, MP3 player or even tablet while waiting for you by your door. Snow and rain are no problem since the USB is waterproof and features an overcurrent and short-circuit protection).The built-in FM module allows You to listen to local radio stations. Support of Wi-Fi HotSpot technology provides the capability of sharing Internet connectivity with your guests. VITAphoneneo can display various information about house residents, upcoming events, announcements and other important organizational house-related information to all users and/or their guest. All the information is stored in our secure remote cloud infrastructure, so it will be left untouched in case of device failure and replacement.You can connect multiple wireless cameras, located inside or outside of the building, thus giving you real-time streaming of what's happening at different locations in and around your residence. WiDi technology is intended to connect a remote wireless display and helps to redirect the image from cameras, show advertisements or any other desired information on any modern big-screen TV. The DLNA protocol support provides an easy way to stream real-time imaging from cameras directly to any DLNA-enable device, such as a Smart TV, TV Box and so on. Thanks to the HDMI port you can connect VITAphoneneo to any supported high definition external display for crystal clear image playback.There are eight different models of the device available: starting from the entry-level model for the budget conscious with with a reduced feature set straight through to the full-featured «all-in-one»advanced version, including every feature and function we've outlined. VITAphoneneo is powered by a very customized version of the Android OS with a specialized interface. There is an option to run third-party application from Google Play Store, that can be installed on the device.VITAphoneneo features an automatic software update system with crash protection and self-recovery options, thus allowing seamless deployment of bug fixes, improvements and enhancements. Drivers for the next generation 4G LTE USB wireless modem from Verizon can be installed making it possible to connect to the Internet using your new shiny Verizon modem immediately after update with no hassles.An integrated SIM-card slot with support for GSM/GPRS EDGE/3G/4G/LTE technologies (mobile connectivity depends on device build) expands the functionality of VITAphoneneo into a full-featured cellphone (this option can be enabled or disabled by you or any device administrator at any time).The local device administrator has the ability to enable or disable a wide range of advanced features such as phone functionality, Wi-Fi HotSpot access, Bluetooth, mobile data connectivity, Ethernet controller, DLNA protocol support, HDMI port, etc. This kind of flexibility makes it easy to configure a system that best suits your needs in any given situation. For example, VITAphoneneo can be used to share Internet connectivity with the visitors sitting in a waiting room ahead of their appointment.
How it works?This simple scheme explains how does VITAphoneneo system works.* Because of hardware limitations you can not use wireless Internet connection and Wi-Fi HotSpot functionality in the same time.** Some features (e.g. HD real-time video streaming) may be unavailable, depending on the quality and speed of your mobile connection.

VITAphoneneo is connected to the Internet via:
1.1. 3G/4G/LTE USB data modem. You can use any AT&T, T-Mobile or Sprint modems of your choice.
1.2. Mobile data connectivity, using built-in 3G/4G data modem.
1.3. Wi-Fi connection with a wireless router, connected to the internet.
1.4. Ethernet cable connection with a wired router, connected to the internet.


Wireless or wired router and mobile data radio tower are connected to the Internet with any available methods: broadband, DSL or cable modem, T1 and so forth.

VITAphoneneo has secure, encrypted P2P (peer-to-peer) connection with our cloud server infrastructure. Device communicates directly with our servers and transfer video streams, notifications, weather information and other data. All commands, received from clients are transferred to the cloud system and then sent to the device. There is no way to connect directly to the VITAphoneneo device bypassing our secure servers environment and obtain the unauthorized control or hack the device somehow.
Client devices can be connected to the Internet using the same types of connection like our device uses.
Intercom can be controlled using wide range of the devices: recent smartphones, tablet, PCs, MACs and other smart devices running a recent popular mobile OS or featuring HTML5-compatible web-browser are supported.
5.1. A tablet PC connected to the Internet via home or office wireless access point or router.
5.2. Smartphone with a mobile data connectivity. Any of GPRS/EDGE/3G/4G/LTE connection is supported, but some features may be unavailable if connection has a poor quality and/or speed.
5.3. PC or Mac computer connected via Ethernet to the home or office wired router. Intercom can be controlled using web browser or our native client.



Technical specifications.
VITAphoneneo user interfaces.Device user interface.Device home screen(Device color: WHISPER WHITE, all other colors are available for preorder)Video call screen on device(Device color: BASIC BLACK, all other colors are available for preorder)Client user interface.Our system works on iOS, Android, Windows phone, Blackberry, Symbian, Mac OS, Linux and Windows.


Client UI: Inbound call


Client UI: Video call





Client UI: Home screen


Client UI: Intercom customization





Client UI: VITAphoneneo connectivity


Client UI: Security settings





Client UI: Multimedia settings


Client UI: Automobile settings



A few words about device moulding and mounting.The device body is waterproof and is made of durable stainless steel. All device connectors, buttons and holes are rubberized in order to totally prevent moisture seeping into the unit. The touchscreen is made of shockproof glass. Acceptable device operating temperatures range from -22°F to 140°F. The device panel is securely attached to the entry door with a MultiLock protection system, which is almost impossible to open without a key (smart-phone or fingerprint in our case). The fastener is made from mounting loops, located on the four corners of the body. This allows anyone to attach the device to the door through mounting holes using bolts and nuts or to the wall using dowels. Mounting loops are protected with special locks that restrict access to the bolt heads.The device consists of two different, integrated parts: the external control panel and internal coordination module. The external control panel is equipped with sensors, camera and microphone, speakers and touchscreen. All main components, including motherboard with CPU and memory, communication ports, 3G, Wi-Fi, FM modules, SIM slot is  taken out to the coordination module. There is a special connector located on the back side of the control panel used to connect to the coordination module. This module is designed to be mounted inside the dwelling. The coordination module features a built-in alarm siren that can be activated on movement detection or electronic seals corruption. This behavior can be configured by device administrator.Engineering drawing: items descriptionEngineering drawing: device mouldingFour mounting holes and one cable hole need to be drilled to attach the external panel to the door or wall. The rear (internal) camera is connected to coordination module and installed separately (rear camera is available depending on device build). In that way, a complete system can be installed after drilling nine holes in total: five for the external panel and four for the internal module. The cable length between main panel and coordination module can be up to twenty six feet long.Color range.We have chosen colors based on the ones that are used in the building and the door decoration, so they are not as rich and deep as for example, Apple used for iPhone 5c. Imagine how it would look bright yellow device on the dark brown door.
VITAphoneneo has complex antitheft system.«But this device, mounted right near or directly on my door will surely attract the attention of a thief» - You may think. Don't worry! We have done our best to make theft almost impossible and meaningless. That's because:

VITAphoneneo has an ultra-durable steel body, so any attempts to pry it open with a screwdriver will just not work.
Mounting bolts are protected by special covers with locks, that can be opened by the key. All four mounting loops are protected by the electronic seals.
In case a would-be vandal still managed to cut off the device, it will be completely non-functional without the communication module anyway. There is no sense in stealing the external front panel because it just can't work without the paired communication module.
Our device is equipped with a camera and motion sensor. The remote server video recording service will be immediately automatically activated as soon as a would-be thief approaches the VITAphoneneo.
In case of unauthorized violation of the electronic seal on any of the mounting bolts, an alarm will sound and your own personalized recorded message will be played (e. g., «MOVE AWAY FROM THE DOOR AND LEAVE! THE POLICE ARE BEING CALLED!») There is a configurable option that can intended to send a notification to the house owner or to make an emergency call to 911.
Clearly, there is no reason in the world for a thief to even try and steal the device.
Our main & stretch goalsAs of now we have a working «VITAphoneneo Basic» draft version prototype and a full-featured client application for Android OS. We need funds for Indiegogo project promotion and marketing.You can preorder any of the stretch-goal models. In case if we will not reach target goal, you will receive most advanced model and a partial refund, with difference amount.

We will give a free «VITAphoneneo Basic» device for every user from the top 10 referrals list. Invite your siblings, friends and other potential backers to our project - it is suitable to all and sundry. The more backers you invite - the more chances you will have to win the challenge.Stretch goal perks description.The retail VITAphoneneo price will be $479 for entry-level model and up to $689 for the full-featured «all-in-one» version. During our crowdfunding campaign we offer steep discounts on pre-order pricing for as low as $319 up to $529 respectively.We provide WORLDWIDE FREE SHIPPING for all VITAphoneneo versions!Perk price: $319.00 - VITAphoneneo Mini – this build is almost identical to the «Basic» version (see below) except for a smaller 7.0 inches display size.Approximate retail price: $479.00.VITAphoneneo Mini(Device color: SKY, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $329.00 - VITAphoneneo Basic – this is the model for the budget-minded. It features all standard entryphone functions and is equipped with single IR-camera, PIR motion sensor, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth adapters, internal and external (protected charging) USB ports, mobile data connectivity, 100Base-TX Ethernet, two speakers, microphone, alarm siren and has built-in temperature and humidity sensors. This version has a built-in biometric scanner that can be used to control an electrical door lock system. This version is designed to install mainly to apartment or house door.Approximate retail price: $489.00.VITAphoneneo Basic(Device color: VERY VANILLA, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $379.00 - VITAphoneneo Standard – this is a mid-range build. It features all the same functionality as «Basic», but additionally has a rear camera. It also supports the DLNA protocol. This version is most useful for installation in a stairwell.Approximate retail price: $539.00.VITAphoneneo Standard(Device color: SMOKE, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $429.00 - VITAphoneneo Multimedia – this build features an FM radio module, HDMI connector, WiDi technology and GSM module with phone call support. It allows connections to an external display to show information or playback video stream right from the device. This version can be used in public places to provide a broad range of services from simple Wi-Fi HotSpot up to advertisements streaming over multiple external displays.Approximate retail price: $589.00.VITAphoneneo Multimedia(Device color: RIVER ROCK, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $479.00 - VITAphoneneo Security – this is a worthy alternative to full-featured alarm and security systems. It features all the same functionality, described in «Basic» version. Additionally, it provides a way to handle image streaming and recording from multiple cameras. It has internal and external GPS support, GSM module as well as WiDi and HDMI technologies support.Approximate retail price: $639.00.VITAphoneneo Security(Device color: LIGHT MOKA, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $479.00 - VITAphoneneo Auto – this build is designed to be installed in a vehicle such as a car. It features GPS-tracking capability, security and alarm systems that allows remote control of door locks and starting the engine. This version can be mounted on the dashboard, headrest, etc.. Biometric scanners can be installed on the doors and ignition. This device does not include any built-in cameras or motion sensors, but supports connecting up to 4 external ones: front, rear and two sides. Cameras can work as a parking helper, DVR or security system. This version can be connected to a car's audio system. Thanks to voice commands you can control engine - start and stop, manage security alarm system, door locks, audio system and GPS navigation. We have not yet finally decided about the screen size of this model. Possibly we will equip this device with portrait oriented 17-inch screen like Tesla motors does in it's cars. Please, give your opinion about screen size into campaign comments.Approximate retail price: $639.00.VITAphoneneo Auto(Device color: CINNAMON, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $529.00 - VITAphoneneo Professional – this is an «all-in-one», full-featured build, that provides all aforementioned functions and technologies (except for «Auto» version features).Approximate retail price: $689.00.VITAphoneneo Professional(Device color: SLATE GRAY, all other colors are available for preorder).Perk price: $449.00 - VITAphoneneo Custom version – we will design and assemble the device with the features that you choose from those available. This model can be equipped with a custom-sized LCD display and include any described features. This version is highly business-oriented, as it allows you to create model that best meets all of your business requirements. Price indicated for a 13.3-inch multimedia version. Contact us with required build details to get exact pricing and deadlines.VITAphoneneo Custom(Device color: CHOCOLATE CHIP, all other colors are available for preorder).Remember - You can always can get together with fellow tenants in your apartment building and pool your resources to make the purchase allowing everyone to enjoy the benefits while saving money.
The VITAphoneneo StoryVITAphoneneo was born in Brooklyn, New York. Vitaliy lived at that time in Florida and in February, 2014 he came to Brooklyn to visit his mother. I (Igor) was living not far from his mother’s house at that time. Taking this opportunity and in spite of the terrible weather Vitaliy decided to drop by and visit me.Winter 2013-2014 was among the coldest on record and in those days there was a heavy snowfall in Brooklyn. I was home and delved into my garage (I can’t remember what I was looking for, but it doesn’t matter anyway). Vitaliy rang my doorbell for a long time, since he knew I was home since the light was on in my kitchen.Vitaliy began to freeze after about 5 minutes of trying to get me to come to the door. He took out his smartphone that flatly refused to work because he was wearing gloves and couldn't properly work his phone. Even after he took his gloves off, he had no luck because it was too cold for his phone's touchscreen to work.Vitaily then went to a nearby cafe and ordered tea to keep warm. After a few minutes, his smartphone warmed and started working again and Vitaliy called me. We talked and after he finished his tea he went to my house again. This time of course I was waiting for him.During the discussion of the occurred incident Vitaliy suddenly noticed: It would be cool if your entryphone could call directly to your smartphone. That evening we sat and chatted for a while and then Vitaly went home.The next evening Vitaliy come to me with an USB pendrive and presented a new awesome project to me - VITAphoneneo. Since then we added new features almost every hour and nothing could stop us until we ended up developing the VITAphoneneo which we are now introducing to you.We spent six months in planning and preparing VITAphoneneo and now we are ready to start device production.
Who Can Benefit from VITAphoneneo?From the beginning VITAphoneneo was just a simple entryphone replacement with an Internet connection that allows anyone to «receive visitors» online using their smartphone.At that time we had no idea how this project will grow, but right now we know that VITAphoneneo is useful literally for absolutely everyone! Now VITAphoneneo is not just a smart cloud intercom - it is a complex security system for your house, your business, your car, bike or boat as well as an interactive vehicle management system and DVR. VITAphoneneo can completely replace an existing visitor management system in your office. VITAphoneneo is an the heart of communication infrastructure that features notification, communication and organizational capabilities for residents of any home or apartment or office building.Imagine: you have an urgent business trip and you are flying out of town. At the same time your mom suddenly decided to drop in for a visit and nobody's there to give her a warm welcome or even let her in. Thanks to VITAphoneneo, this is no longer a problem - you can remotely open the door, add her fingerprint into VITAphone's database or authorize her smartphone to control your device with just a few touches on your smartphone. You can talk with your mom right there from the airplane.And this is just one of dozens of different scenarios. During preparation, planning and development of the system we have discovered hundreds and thousands of similar stories and we continue to discover more and more opportunities to use VITAphoneneo and make life easier.So, if after reading this information you still think that VITAphoneneo is not suitable for you, it is likely that you just yet haven’t realized all the possibilities VITAphoneneo has - they are almost endless.And if you come up with new and unique usage for VITAphoneneo, that makes it even bigger and better - we always happy to hear it and improve our device based on your suggestions!Authors of the best ideas will be rewarded with the free VITAphoneneo device that will be improved based on their ideas.
Why Crowdfunding?During the project preparation and development stages we have repeatedly raised the question about project financing. We considered various options on how to obtain money required to complete the project and start production.After repeated evaluations of all pros and cons of borrowing money, start-up investments from outside investors and our own savings, we realized that we needed something totally different, something new and unique, as all evaluated options had more cons than pros.Now, with our project in its final stage, we can’t think of anything better than crowdfunding to provide the money we need to make our idea a reality. That's because we can get the funds necessary to start production and our backers get new unique device at a substantial discount. In addition, we hope to get new ideas, comments and suggestions from the public. Every user can take a direct part in future VITAphoneneo product development by sharing their ideas and experiences with us.VITAphoneneo has amazing properties. Only one VITAphoneneo device is needed to manage residential or office building, therefore its price for every user can be less than one dollar, because users can organize a collective purchase.
Fulfillment fund.Here we providing approximate funds distribution based on our preliminary assessments.
Project deadlines.
Our team.Our core team consists of only two members despite the stunning size of the project. During different stages of our project we have attracted a huge amount of human resources: hardware engineers, designers, software developers and marketers, but our team left the same. Meet:We take this opportunity to thank all those people, who helped us to make VITAphoneneo such an outstanding project and who gave us their support during our work on this project. Thanks to all engineers, developers, coders, designers, marketers who gave part of themselves to our project.We also want to thank our families, who have tolerated our nightly gatherings, discussions, debates and disputes, and also constant mess in their life and others inconveniences during preparation period. Thank you very much for what you were side by side with us in a difficult times!
Stay in touch with us!We are always opened for new opportunities! If you have any ideas, questions or suggestions you can contact us using Indiegogo campaign, our project email info@softvit.com or give us a call to +1-855-SOFTVIT (toll free).

story:
Hey TIKRHeads,

"In case you didn’t know, myTIKR helps manage all your favorite smartphone apps in one place with one swipe of your finger, with a cool, first-to-market patent pending stacked ticker-tape user interface."


I hope you liked the video……….:)


              

Cheers, my name is Brad Simpson. I am the creator of the myTIKR application. With myTIKR, you can access, check and manage your “always-on” apps with an elegant, customizable single dashboard screen (currently patent-pending technology). I created myTIKR to solve a few problems I was having with managing my smartphone application use. To date, there are over 1.5 million applications available for download from Apple iTunes and Google Play. On average, each smartphone user checks apps over 35 times a day, spending over 30 seconds per app. Whether or not we are ready to accept it, we now live in a society of “App-Addicted” people controlled by their “Most Used” apps. For me, having so many apps made my phone (and me) slow and inefficient.

I realized I was wasting literally hours each day simply pulling my phone from my pocket and switching between each app, one at a time, to see if there was anything interesting that caught my eye. Not to mention, I felt like I was running my battery down too quickly, and my ever-growing app collection was taking up way too much hard drive space on my iPhone.

I wanted to create a new way to review and engage the information of my most-used favorite apps all at once on my smartphone screen, instead of having to constantly open and close independent apps such as emails, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Newsy, ESPN, and Nasdaq. 

One evening — March 17, 2013 to be exact — I was watching a 60 Minutes segment on Twitter cofounder Jack Dorsey and his thoughts on social media.  During a commercial I checked my phone’s NASDAQ ticker notification panel, and something hit me!  I had the bright idea to use ticker tapes displaying real time data crawling horizontally for each app, with multiple tapes stacked on top of each other, comprising an integrated and comprehensive full-screen matrix snapshot of the user’s most used apps.  The user glances down at his phone and sees all desired app content moving slowly in real-time across the screen, and then taps a finger on the scrolling graphic or text hyperlink icon to view the full-sized native content. Once finished with viewing that particular content, one swipe takes the user back to the scrolling app matrix dashboard. 

My concept became the brainchild of myTIKR: to design a smartphone app aggregator that brings all your social feeds and content streams together in a simple, elegant, and customizable application across all your digital devices. 


                              


I need your help because I’m just a guy with an idea and I am not a programmer. Everyone has great ideas in this world. Those of us that are fortunate enough to have the ability to execute are the lucky ones. I have a satellite defense software background and have brought in a number of my former colleagues, but I’m not the guy that can sit and program my idea. I need your help with funding so I can hire the right people to work with me and build this app. Over the past 260 days or so, I’ve assembled an incredible team of people that know me on a personal level and help out in every way they can. Every one of them has jumped on board to help because they believe in the product enough to put their skin in the game. I have 7 friends that have also invested money in the project simply because they believe in it. Please help us realize this dream! I promise, we can make a difference in the world and take care of a few of life’s smartphone pain points at the same time.


             

                             

Here is the breakdown of funding we need to accomplish this goal. I have been fortunate to have been introduced to the CEO of a company in Barcelona called Golden Gekko. Golden Gekko is one of the world’s largest and prolific application development companies around. We have already worked through the Pre-Development of myTIKR to the point the wireframe is complete and we have already started the formal development of the first Feature Complete Version of the product. I’ve spent to date, over $60,000 of my own money as well as a few investments by friends and family. To complete the formal development and move to the Apple and Google Play stores, we need a total of nearly $200K. On this ASK, I am only raising $95K. This amount will get our expenses paid up to the release of the application at the Mobile World Congress trade show in Barcelona in February 2014. At that point, we hope to have gained enough traction that our revenue opportunities will take over to cover the remaining expenses. I’ve worked very hard at building a model that is self-sufficient with revenue streams on day one. While we need revenue to stay afloat, our main goal and purpose is to satisfy the pain points of “Constant Tasking” on our smartphones.

                                           

Even if we do not get the entire amount of money, we will push forward. I’m a “Don’t take NO for an answer” type of guy and I always have been. In my previous life I helped build a Government Defense Satellite Software company.  It was a very closely related field to what we are doing now. Braxton Technologies has been the go-to company for satellite software over the past decade.  Today I have the same drive and ambition as I pursue myTIKR. 


I envision future applications of the myTIKR concept of streaming data.   One cool example of how the business could scale to an enterprise model is through serving the global sports and events verticals, naturally including ideas surrounding the amazing world of NASCAR.  What we're working towards for the enterprise customer is called geoTIKR (Geo-Fence Technology), a stadium/coliseum/outdoor arena application for major sports team and venue owners.

Imagine if race teams, vendors and track owners could stream live content, offers, flash sales to fans on race day, directly to their phone.  Think of a dedicated to stream/channel serving that track, vendors, racing teams, and all the fans attending.  When we say that track, we mean that track!  As soon as a fan walks into the track/venue the application lights up the fans mytikr TIKRTRAK and welcomes them to the "Sears Point geoTIKR" for that event.  Fans are instantly notified of other friends that are there, they can engage with each other in a number of cool ways (like buying each other a soda or hotdog), vendors can pitch specials on food or merchandise, race teams can push stats or promote drivers, and third party marketers can geo-target content, offers, deals, anything specific to that track, it's vendors, and those exact fans.  All of this done in real-time.  We are currently already cultivating business deals with folks at the national/professional level of sports.  myTIKR even scales to a smaller retail stores ability to market their products directly to their customers on a daily basis. It's all really cool technology that's time has come. See the new splash screen graphics I’ve attached showing how the stacked TIKRTRAK looks and works. We’ve done great work already and we’re just getting started and we are keeping it simple.

The project time plan and milestones for the myTIKR project is outlined below.

Owners of each deliverable within brackets:

GG = Golden Gekko

VT = Vection Technologies

S = Project Start

Milestone

Date of delivery

Owner (First = Lead)

1

Approval of the proposal

(October 15th)

VT

2

Kick-off workshop

S = Start Date

(November 25th)

GG / VT

3

Pre-development phase end (Scope clear, project plan agreed, technical project manager assigned, handover from sales to development)

1-2 week(s)

GG

4

Graphical design assets delivered

S + 2 days

VT

5

Design mock-ups delivered

S + 1.5 weeks

GG

6

Feedback on design mock-ups delivered

S + 2 days

VT

7

Mature Development starts (Structure and graphics are in place)

S + 2 weeks

GG

8

Delivery of first iteration of application (Feature Complete Version)

S + 10 weeks

GG

9

Feedback on Feature Complete Version delivered

S + 3 days

VT

10

Delivery of second iteration of application (Release Candidate Version)

S + 1-2 week(s)

GG

11

Feedback on Release Candidate Version delivered

S + 3 days

VT

12

Quality Assurance Testing Begins

S + 6 weeks

GG

13

Mature Development Phase End (Main development phase is over, product ready for client acceptance)

S + 12 weeks

GG

14

Acceptance Phase: Acceptance testing completed

S + 1 week

VT

15

Ready for launch (Launch Candidate Version)

S + 13 weeks

GG / VT

16

Approval of app (Apple Appstore)

S + 14 weeks (Targeting February 2014)

GG / VT

17

Rollout Phase

Ongoing

GG/VT

                                  Cross Platform Applications...

               

  

Ok, I am a realist. I understand that some people simply are not in a position to help but still think this is a really cool product and worth backing. I appreciate that and still want you to be a part of the myTIKR explosion. We are unveiling myTIKR at the Mobile World Congress trade show in Barcelona, Spain between February 24th and 27th, 2014. We hope to get some great press while we are there as well as a mention on the big stage through the show. Golden Gekko will preview us at the show as the “NEW” hot application for 2014.  If you will email us at info@mytikr.com we will send you a live link to the show and any press we receive while there. I truly believe this App will make a positive difference in all of our lives; it's already made one in mine!

"What's Going On"

Namaste…Brad


SPECIAL THANKS TO THE TEAM BELOW:


Sadat Huq, for his dedication and detailed work. And overall help on all Operational matters. And that Stanford education really helped too…:)

Christian Prezgay, for his quick turn-around on the financial documents. As well as, his early help in setting up the corporation format.

Matt Mangold, for writing the original code on the stacked ticker-tape. It could not have been easy taking directions from scatterbrained me! Great work, you're the reason we are here!

Paul Plemel, thanks for keeping ALL of us in line and on task. You are the task master and have an incredible ability to see through the BS....

Dutch Heuzen, thank you for being a sounding board and the go to guy for all things Marketing on the big business side....

Armen Printsian, thank you for the IT guidance and support with the backend process...You make it look so easy! :)

Mark Weinberg, thank you for your ability to rally me and the troops. You are a never ending source of kudo's and support moving forward. Looking forward to your incredible PR influence as we grow...

Richard Kaleh, What can I say.....A champion for everything myTIKR and me......Thank you for the years and I hope there will be more.....You have an incredible eye for style and design, I look forward to your site design help... 

Michael Duffield, my longtime business partner and confidant. You have been an incredible source of strength and style across the board. Thank you for keeping me in line and on track, when I have a propesity to get a little scatterbrained...

Charley Hoefer, You have been an incredible friend in the short time we've been working together. You have a great eye for the big picture and always the pragmatist when I get on a tangent. You bring me back.....

Jon Hall.......:) What can I say! You taught me to be a "Well, not a fountain." Thank you....Always listen to those that teach…..

Jayce Simpson, Thank you son for all that you do. You really did get the "Simpson Tech Gene." We appreciate everything you bring to the table. You have a bright future in this business. I hope it's ready for you….:)

Please visit the gallery and view our Investor Deck, Executive Summary, myTIKR Wireframe document, and other gallery pictures...
