myTIKR explosion. We are unveiling myTIKR at the Mobile World Congress trade
show in Barcelona, Spain between February 24th and 27th, 2014. We hope to get
some great press while we are there as well as a mention on the big stage
through the show. Golden Gekko will preview us at the show as the “NEW” hot application
for 2014.  If you will email us at
info@mytikr.com we will send you a live link to the show and any press we
receive while there. I truly believe this App will make a positive difference
in all of our lives; it's already made one in mine!"What's Going On"
Namaste…BradSPECIAL THANKS TO THE TEAM BELOW:Sadat Huq, for his dedication and detailed work. And overall help on all Operational matters. And that Stanford education really helped too…:)Christian Prezgay, for his quick turn-around on the financial documents. As well as, his early help in setting up the corporation format.Matt Mangold, for writing the original code on the stacked ticker-tape. It could not have been easy taking directions from scatterbrained me! Great work, you're the reason we are here!Paul Plemel, thanks for keeping ALL of us in line and on task. You are the task master and have an incredible ability to see through the BS....Dutch Heuzen, thank you for being a sounding board and the go to guy for all things Marketing on the big business side....Armen Printsian, thank you for the IT guidance and support with the backend process...You make it look so easy! :)Mark Weinberg, thank you for your ability to rally me and the troops. You are a never ending source of kudo's and support moving forward. Looking forward to your incredible PR influence as we grow...Richard Kaleh, What can I say.....A champion for everything myTIKR and me......Thank you for the years and I hope there will be more.....You have an incredible eye for style and design, I look forward to your site design help... Michael Duffield, my longtime business partner and confidant. You have been an incredible source of strength and style across the board. Thank you for keeping me in line and on track, when I have a propesity to get a little scatterbrained...Charley Hoefer, You have been an incredible friend in the short time we've been working together. You have a great eye for the big picture and always the pragmatist when I get on a tangent. You bring me back.....Jon Hall.......:) What can I say! You taught me to be a "Well, not a fountain." Thank you....Always listen to those that teach…..Jayce Simpson, Thank you son for all that you do. You really did get the "Simpson Tech Gene." We appreciate everything you bring to the table. You have a bright future in this business. I hope it's ready for you….:)Please visit the gallery and view our Investor Deck, Executive Summary, myTIKR Wireframe document, and other gallery pictures...

story:
Short Summary

Online Bible Software is a tool used worldwide to study the Bible via desktop computers. From its early beginning in 1987 it was "ministry" based and since 1995 many titles have been freely accessed by those downloading from the

www.onlinebible.org website. These free downloads consists of a basic pack in different languages and additional downloads. The website experiences over 5000 downloads every month.

Unfortunately the current download facility is completely outdated and needs a new look and feel as well as a better multi-lingual support and an improved functionality. We are eager to do this in a professional way so that more people will feel attracted and benefit from the Online Bible software possibilities. We have found a graphic designer, a php-programmer and a copywriter eager to build this new download facility. However we do not earn anything from the free downloads and so we need your help to cover the costs.

The new download facility will be hosted on a new server under the domain name www.olb-downloads.org to guarantee optimal availability. An auto detect function pre-selects the users language to guide them directly to the most interesting downloads for them in their language. The available downloads will be presented in their language first and then followed by the other languages. The download procedure will be a simple click-and-go system. There will be additional information added to every available download, so one can obtain background information with Bible versions, commentaries and study books. This will help users to select those titles which are most appropriate to them.

With the new download site www.olb-downloads.org we trust we can attract more users and motivate them to benefit from the possibilities of the Online Bible software. At the same time it will be a pleasure for returning visitors to download their updates or additional titles, all free of charge.

Contributors will help fund the costs for www.olb-downloads.org. The end result will be a better experience for those visiting the download site and more people will benefit from the Online Bible software.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The cost of building www.olb-downloads.org is €2900.00.   With this amount we can pay the php-programmer, the copywriter, the graphic designer, the editor and the translators. The site will run in four different languages (English, German, French and Dutch)
  • Should we raise more than the €2900.00 mentioned, we would endeavour to add more languages, such as Italian, Spanish and Portuguese.
  • www.olb-downloads.org will auto-detect the language of the visitor and adapt to that language.
  • For all contributions making a donation of €75.00 or more we will send out a DVD-ROM containing all 1500 available Online Bible titles, including the titles we are not allowed to distribute by download.
  • If we do not reach the basic financial goal that is needed for this project, the money that is raised will be used to set up the site in a smaller version with reduced functionality.

The Impact

www.olb-downloads.org will offer a better download functionality for the visitor. It will attract more visitors and hopefully motivate them to download the Online Bible software. Your contribution will give every user a better download experience, a better overview of other download possibilities and background information on titles. And most importantly, your contribution will make it possible to spread the Word of God and give study possibilities to people all over the world.

 

Other Ways You Can Help
Tell others about the Online Bible software. Share this campaign with your friends. Help us to find professional translators; at this moment we are still looking for a translator Dutch-French. Should we raise sufficient money we will need a professional translator Dutch-Spanish and Dutch-Portuguese.

story:
Back in 2015, our team created our first Kickstarter Campaign, PIECE, raising over $402,214 with near 4000 backers. PIECE changed the way people use smartphones. Our team always wanted to improve the experience of using smartphones, and we found that looking for data when traveling overseas can be frustrating. The current solutions are either expensive or inconvenient. That’s why we created Tern to solve all this. Please help us bring Tern to life by backing us today!  

The only device that allows you to stay connected anywhere in the world. While having the freedom to choose the best plan that suits you, with the best price as cheap as local pre-paid SIM cards. 

Forget switching SIM cards or renting portable WiFi. Never spend time searching through websites to look for the most suitable plan for you. 

When you are looking for data connection overseas, you would either go for Pre-paid SIM cards, Rental Portable WiFi or Global SIM cards, but they can be really expensive. Since Tern works with local service providers, we offer plans with the most affordable prices. Unlimited 4G data plans cost as low as $0.2 per day! 

For more details on the prices, click here

Tern allows you to enjoy a truly global data access, no need to switch between SIM cards, no need to lining up and no contract is needed. Just select and purchase data plans of Tern’s supported countries, and simply activate it with one click when you are waiting to board the plane or waiting for your luggage upon arrival. 

Tern also allows you to make and receive phone calls using a local number*.

 

*Only available in limited countries and regions 

Wherever you are in the world, whether it be for business, or to simply keep in touch, Tern’s connectivity helps to make sure that you’ll have access to the Internet at any time of the day without a hitch.  

Just add US$6 to any reward to get this exclusive case. 

The Tern Carrier is the perfect protector for your Tern and your personal belongings. Tern can fit in perfectly while there is enough space for other items like keys or cards.  

 Our team of seasoned designers and engineers has managed to make Tern so powerful and looks fantastic at the same time. Here are some images throughout the R&D progress.  

To express our gratitude to all our PIECE fans, we would like to offer a Tern Carrier for free as a gift to all our previous backers from PIECE.  

Just back Tern using the SAME Indiegogo account that you used to back PIECE, you will receive One Extra Tern Carrier for FREE!

Dennis Wong

Co-founder and Serial entrepreneur whose products are used by over 8 million users. Previously, decades in sales and marketing.

Alex Chan

Software Engineer, MSc in Computer Science at Waterloo University. Years of experience in software design. Experienced in PCB prototyping and implementing embedded software.

Zhang Yin

Hardware Engineer, with over 8 years of experience in electronic engineering, Zhang is very fascinating in building devices to solve different problems.

The Indiegogo community allows us to design and develop with more freedom. Backers always provide valuable insights and comments that help us to improve our products. We hope to create a more connected world and crowdfunding have made it possible, your support helps us to realize that goal. Thank you! 

                         

Share Tern:  

   Disclaimer: This campaign has no affiliation with Tern Bicycles and Tern Cargo Node.

story:
Reduce your everyday carry and eliminate the fuss of external charge cables with the Ample Ultraslim Powerbank.        

    

 

When it comes time to refuel your powerbank, flip one of the integrated cables and charge via the USB C input. There’s no need to carry additional cables to recharge your Ample powerbank.          

  

 

Ample offers automatic power on and a pass-through charging capability that most powerbanks lack. Our pass-through charging feature allows you to refuel your powerbank plus two extra devices together from a single USB power source.          

  

 

Ample provides 5000 mAh of fast charging energy on the go and fits great in your pocket alongside your smartphone. Ample’s cables tuck neatly away to avoid any nasty scratches from exposed metal tips.            

 

Personalize Ample to charge all your favourite gadgets. Mix and match from six cable options to assemble your powerbank in one of nine possible configurations.

 

 

Charge your powerbank on the go with no additional cables. Flip one of Ample's integrated cables to charge your powerbank from any USB C or traditional USB A power source.

      

 

Ample can charge even your most power hungry devices. Choose from USB C, Micro USB and Apple Lightning compatible charge cables.

 

 

The average millennial spends 2.6 days per year attempting to align USB cables (source: personal experience). We understand the frustration of traditional USB A ports not aligning when you try to connect your cable. Ample’s unique design ensures that your USB cables always align on your first attempt.

 

Ample has a pass-through charging capability to refuel your powerbank plus two extra devices from a single USB power source. Ample will first charge your connected device(s), then refuel your powerbank. Note that the charge speed/rate is dependant on your power source.

         

 

Ample has a massive 2.4A of output power to charge your devices super-fast. Ample uses an adaptive charge algorithm to negotiate the highest output power that can be safely accepted by each connected device.

      

 

Automatic device detection means you don’t need to press any buttons to start your charge. Ample will automatically detect your devices upon connection.        

 

USB Type C is fast becoming the standard for gadget charging. Ample includes a USB C input to recharge your powerbank. Our USB C port accepts up to 2.4A of input current so your powerbank refuels mighty quick! Although Ample uses a USB C input, you can also top up your powerbank from a traditional USB A power source (just make sure to select "USB A <-> USB C" as one of your integrated cable choices).

    

 

Ample offers the perfect combination of power and portability. With 5,000 mAh of energy, Ample has enough battery capacity for approx two full charges of a typical smartphone (e.g. an iPhone 8 has a 1,821 mAh battery). To reveal Ample's current battery level, simply tap on the Ample logo.

 

 

Because Ample’s cables are removable, you can use them to charge your gadgets directly.

 

 

Ample ships with both American and European electrical safety approvals (FCC, CE, RoHS and UN38.3). Moreover, no less than seven redundant safety features ensure you and your devices are protected.            

 

Ample has contoured groves along the top and bottom edges so that charge cables are easy to access, without the need for awkward fingernail plucking techniques.

 

 

We designed Ample to be your smartphone’s best friend! Ample's compact size and flexible side cables make it possible to operate your smartphone with a single hand while it's being charged.

 

 

Ample is built from a hardened, scratch resistant polycarbonate plastic with a matte finish for improved grip. We really did think of everything!

Our passionate team has over 30 years of combined experience in product design and manufacturing.

With your support, the next step in our journey is to create plastic molds and PCB (printed circuit board) tooling.

Ample's compact size and flexible side cables make it possible to operate your smartphone with a single hand while it's being charged.  Ample is built from a hardened, scratch resistant polycarbonate plastic with a matte finish for improved grip. We really did think of everything!
 
 
 
 
We are Ample, a startup in Amsterdam founded by Simon, a technology enthusiast who was frustrated by the poor options available for keeping his essential gadgets charged up while travelling.            Our passionate team has over 30 years of combined experience in product design and manufacturing. 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
  
 

 

 
We want you to start using Ample as soon as possible. With this goal in mind, we devoted enormous energy to complete our detailed product design activities upfront, ahead of our crowdfunding launch. Our fully functional prototype is now ready to enter mass production.            With your support, the next step in our journey is to create plastic molds and PCB (printed circuit board) tooling.

story:
Quick summary

What is KeepOnWheels?

KeepOnWheels is a brand new website that collects different car services around the globe. Not only repair services but spare part shops, charging stations, inspection stations, car washes, dealerships, car rentals etc.

Is it working already?

Yes. The website is fully functional since a few months, we do not ask you to contribute for something which does not exist yet. Check it out by yourself!

What makes KeepOnWheels unique?

The goal of the website that car owners can easily select the best station around them. In one single view they can see all the service station nearby, their location on a map and their rating. One location can offer several services at the same time.
Users can also add, edit or review locations. Biz owners can take over their location and highlight them.

That's it?

No, there are still a bunch of feature we would like implement later to make KeepOnWheels even more useful, but the first priority now is to get users.

What would you like to achieve?

We would like to raise funds to launch a bigger advertisement campaign.

How can I help?

Check out the perks! Even 1€ contribution would make a huge difference!

You can help us enormously by sharing this campaign. Use the share buttons below the video.

The final goal is to have more KeepOnWheels users, so if you just register an account and add, edit or make a review about service locations around you, that is also a huge help.

Any contribution is appreciated very much!


And now with a little bit more details...


About

keeponwheels.com is a new website that collects car services around the globe. The users can rate and review car services on the map; they can also add new locations or edit existing ones. It is completely free of charge for any user.

Not only repair services, but inspection stations, tire services, spare parts shops, fuel stations, EV charging stations, car wash stations, dealerships and car rentals are included. The database contains more than 150 thousands places already.

The website is up and running. Take a look at here by yourself:  https://keeponwheels.com/

The road until today

I started to work-out the basic concept of KeepOnWheels starting October 2013. In January 2014 I've hired a design company to create the logo and the icons which are representing the different car services.

Some time later I've hired a website creator company to program the database and the functions. I did the website's structure and design by myself. Finally KeepOnWheels website went live early August.

Need a BOOST

For every new website the most difficult challenge is to gain users. The growth of the website can be sustained only if the critical number of users are reached.

So far I could finance the web hosting, the website programming, the logo/icon design, and some minor advertisement campaign by my own. But simply I ran out of money. I've spent approx. the same amount what I set now for funding goal.

I would like to ask for your support to reach the funding goal, which I would spend in majority for online advertisement like Facebook and Google ads. Maybe max. 25% I would spend on correction/changes on the website according the users/contributors feedback.


Stretch goal

The next milestone would be to create a smartphone application for KeepOnWheels. If the funding could reach 11.000 € I could immediately start this step. The app would be available free for every major smartphone OS (iOS, Android, BlackBerry, Windows phone).

Only for you

Keychain

Every time you grab your car's key, it will remind you that you have helped a lot. Good quality metal keychain with laser engraved KeepOnWheels logo.




Car Air freshener "New Car"

Do you remember for the smell of your car when it was still new? Now you can bring it back! Simple but fantastic air freshener with "New Car" scent and of course with KOW logo.

I'm thinking to order more air freshener and present it for every KOW user who creates a certain amount of locations and/or reviews on the website. I think it would motivate the people to fill up KOW with content. I'm also thinking to purchase the air freshener in different scent(s). Would you please help me and fill out this survey? Car air freshener scent survey. Thank you!



Why?

There are approximately 1 billion cars in the world. Many of us do not think on cars only as transportation tool which brings us from A to B. Majority of people wants to own nice, good maintained cars. Complete industries are present to serve this need. Next time you drive through your city check how many shops, stations, dealership you can count. There are sometimes entire streets full with different car services!

When you have to bring your car to annual check, repair or even to a simple wash, are you sure that you bring it to the best place? Isn't that you bring it there because you just used to? Do you know all such places around you? Aren't you just listening to urban legends when you are avoiding some places? If you are satisfied with the service are you sharing your opinion with others?

No risk, no fun

I believe in my idea. I know the basic concept is good. This is only the first step; there are plenty of options and ideas for further features.

The biggest risk is that I cannot promote KeepOnWheels well enough.

I need users, I need your help to bring KeepOnWheels on the road of success. I'm open for any of your suggestion regarding the marketing strategy or even regarding the website.

Vision

Imagine KeepOnWheels have millions of users and thousands of locations are reviewed and commented. The fellow car owners can select the most fitting service any time, they are no longer have to base their choose on rumors. The businesses are getting constructive feedback and they can improve further. The competition in the car service industry speeds up, the service quality increases, the prices are decreasing.

2030

Imagine you have just arrived home with your driverless car. You recognize your car is dirty again. What do you do? You open the KeepOnWheels app on the car's board computer, you check some washing station in the nearby, reviews, prices and offered service. You choose the best one and send your car there. The washing station is notified about your request, they schedule slot. They prepare everything before the car arrives therefore they can be more productive as well. In the meanwhile you are playing with your Kids at home, not even realizing the car left already just in time to arrive at the station some seconds before the scheduled slot. Some time later you leave your house with the family and your clean and shiny car is parking already front of the yard. Sound utopistic? It is not believe me. With your help we can do it together all of that, except the driverless car but lets also leave some work for others too!

How can you help?

Even 1€ would make a difference! If you can afford more select a perk, we will be happy to send it to you!

It's not just about the money! If you can't contribute, you can help us enormously by telling your friends, family, colleagues, neighbours and contacts about it. Just use the share buttons below the video, and ask your friends to re-share it.

The final goal is to have more KeepOnWheels users, so go to KeepOnWheels, register an account, add service locations around you, make a review about them. 

Any contribution is appreciated very much!

THANK YOU!

keeponwheels.com is a new
website that collects car services around the globe. The users can rate and review car services on the map; they can also add new locations or edit existing ones. It is completely free of charge for any user.
Not only repair services, but
inspection stations, tire services, spare parts shops, fuel stations, EV
charging stations, car wash stations, dealerships and car rentals are included. The
database contains more than 150 thousands places already.
The website is up and running. Take
a look at here by yourself:  https://keeponwheels.com/
The road until today
I started to work-out the basic concept of KeepOnWheels starting October 2013. In January 2014 I've hired a design company to create the logo and the icons which are representing the different car services.
Some time later I've hired a website creator company to program the database and the functions. I did the website's structure and design by myself. Finally KeepOnWheels website went live early August.Need
a BOOST
For every new website the most
difficult challenge is to gain users. The growth of the website can be sustained only if
the critical number of users are reached.
So far I could finance the web
hosting, the website programming, the logo/icon design, and some minor
advertisement campaign by my own. But simply I ran out of money. I've
spent approx. the same amount what I set now for funding goal.
I would like to ask for your support to
reach the funding goal, which I would spend in majority for online
advertisement like Facebook and Google ads. Maybe max. 25% I would spend on
correction/changes on the website according the users/contributors feedback.Stretch goalThe next milestone would be to create a smartphone application for KeepOnWheels. If the funding could reach 11.000 € I could immediately start this step. The app would be available free for every major smartphone OS (iOS, Android, BlackBerry, Windows phone).
Only for you

Keychain
Every time you grab your car's key, it will remind you that you have helped a lot. Good quality metal keychain with laser engraved KeepOnWheels logo.





Car Air freshener "New Car"
Do you remember for the smell of your car when it was still new? Now you can bring it back! Simple but fantastic air freshener with "New Car" scent and of course with KOW logo.
I'm thinking to order more air freshener and present it for every KOW user who creates a certain amount of locations and/or reviews on the website. I think it would motivate the people to fill up KOW with content. I'm also thinking to purchase the air freshener in different scent(s). Would you please help me and fill out this survey? Car air freshener scent survey. Thank you!







Why?

There are approximately 1 billion cars in the world. Many of us do not think on cars only as transportation tool which brings us from A to B. Majority of people wants to own nice, good maintained cars. Complete industries are present to serve this need. Next time you drive through your city check how many shops, stations, dealership you can count. There are sometimes entire streets full with different car services!
When you have to bring your car to annual check, repair or even to a simple wash, are you sure that you bring it to the best place? Isn't that you bring it there because you just used to? Do you know all such places around you? Aren't you just listening to urban legends when you are avoiding some places? If you are satisfied with the service are you sharing your opinion with others?

No risk, no fun

I believe in my idea. I know the basic concept is good. This is only the first step; there are plenty of options and ideas for further features.The biggest risk
is that I cannot promote KeepOnWheels well enough.I need users, I need your help to bring KeepOnWheels on the road of success. I'm open for any of your suggestion
regarding the marketing strategy or even regarding the website.VisionImagine KeepOnWheels have millions of users and thousands of locations are reviewed and commented. The fellow car owners can select the most fitting service any time, they are no longer have to base their choose on rumors. The businesses are getting constructive feedback and they can improve further. The competition in the car service industry speeds up, the service quality increases, the prices are decreasing.2030Imagine you have just arrived home with your driverless car. You recognize your car is dirty again. What do you do? You open the KeepOnWheels app on the car's board computer, you check some washing station in the nearby, reviews, prices and offered service. You choose the best one and send your car there. The washing station is notified about your request, they schedule slot. They prepare everything before the car arrives therefore they can be more productive as well. In the meanwhile you are playing with your Kids at home, not even realizing the car left already just in time to arrive at the station some seconds before the scheduled slot. Some time later you leave your house with the family and your clean and shiny car is parking already front of the yard. Sound utopistic? It is not believe me. With your help we can do it together all of that, except the driverless car but lets also leave some work for others too!
How can you help?
Even 1€ would make a difference! If you can afford more select a perk, we will be happy to send it to you!It's not just about the money! If you can't contribute, you can help us enormously by telling your friends, family, colleagues, neighbours and contacts about it. Just use the share buttons below the video, and ask your friends to re-share it.The final goal is to have more KeepOnWheels users, so go to KeepOnWheels, register an account, add service locations around you, make a review about them. Any contribution is appreciated very much!THANK YOU!

story:
Our Story

(I am a single father of a beautiful 7 year old daughter. I had been out of work for 2 years until January this year I make very little money and with no help from her mother I have to count every penny. Last month I dropped my cell phone twice and it cost me $90 to get it fixed the first time and $130 to fix it the second time and that hurt me big time. I looked for a solution that already existed and couldn't find one so I came up with one myself.)


The Impact

(Companies that make these products cell phones, mp3's, and the other devices that we carry and use daily, want us to have them repaired. So they make cases that only prevent scratches and pretend they're concerned with keeping our devices protected. They also offer insurance and even that only covers certain situations and parts of the phone. We spend millions annually for keep devices we already paid for. With my case it will be almost impossible to drop your phone unless you want to. We all spend a lot of money on these new devices with the intent of keeping them until we want to upgrade them. The big companies are only interested in keeping us coming back and spending and spending... let's decide that where only going back when we're ready.)


What We Need & What You Get

(The money will be used to get my design patented and trade marked, launching the website, and getting it mass produced. For all who makes a donation of $30-$50 once launched will get a case, $50-$75 will get 2 cases for devices of your choice, $100 or more will get you three devices and you will get another case from a future design for other products.)


Other Ways You Can Help

(Just spreading the word and helping out with getting this launched please.)

story:
Thank you to everyone who contributed to our original Robohand campaign.

In order for us to continue providing mechanical hands and fingers to those who cannot afford them, we need to have a continous source of funding.

We are in the process of registering as a Non Profit Organisation in South Africa which could take approximately 90 days but Indiegogo seems to be the easiest way for our Contributors to make donations to our project.

You can visit our original campaign for more information at: www.indiegogo.com/projects/robohand

Funding recieved to date has helped so many children with Amniotic Band Syndrome as well as other children and adults that have sustained major injuries.

Please see our website and facebook page for tons of photo's and stories.

Original Story: Robohand was established in 2011 when Richard van As had a woodworking accident and lost 4 fingers on his right hand. He is right handed.

During his very short time in the hospital he decided he would create himself a mechanical finger to replace his lost digits.

After researching prosthetcs it was apparent there was nothing available to replace his lost fingers and companies that were experimenting with finger prosthetics wanted exhorbitent amounts of money.

Richard then began his journey of developing his own finger. It all started in his garage with bits and pieces and many trips to the hardware store.

During his year long struggle and many prototypes later, he engaged with another gentleman in the USA and they collaborated together. They were donated two MakerBot Replicator 2 3D printers to assist with prototyping.

Things took off and soon Richard had finalised his Robofinger and created a mechanical hand. Between SA and the USA the file was scripted and the first Robohand was printed in 3D in SA!

The first hand was fitted to a 5 year old boy Liam who has come leaps and bounds with using his Robohand. This was done for free. Robohand has helped 4 children in total in South Africa with Robohands but we have run out of funding to continue to provide this device for free.

If you follow our Facebook page or our Blog you will be enthralled by the stories of the children that are now able to use BOTH of their hands.

Your funding will supply the necessary materials, like Orthoplastic/Thermoplastic, hardware for putting the hands together (nuts, bolts, bungi cord), rolls of PLA plastic for the 3D printer to print the actual hands, plastidip for the fingers, anodizing materials (like sulphuric acid, desmutting liquid, colourant/dye and distilled water) the time and committment from Rich to create these hands.

Robohand has been nominated for the Rockafella Innovators award as well as been given an opportunity to create a display in the Science Museum of London.

Your contribution will help aid the continuation of this project:

  • Initially to keep us going we are aiming to reach a goal of $10,000.
  • This is a humanitarian project and we are working on a "pay it forward" method.
  • We have been requested to present Robohand at Congress at the end of 2013 and your funding will help get us there.

The idea of Robohand is "Open Source" and the file is available for download from Thingiverse.com. Visit our blog at www.robohand.blogspot.com for more information or follow our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/pages/Robohand/260864887366912?ref=hl

Please share our story with your friends and family. Robofinger and Robohand are not only available to SA, but all over the world.

Please also use the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
Our Campaign is over, if you like a ERI you can preorder at 

www.digi-care.com

In the Press


TechCrunch The Digi-Care ERI Wearable Tracks Your Activity Without GPS

TechCrunch中国 ERI手环，从运动记录到运动激励

TechInAsia ERI is a new fitness-tracking sports band that’s made in Hong Kong

Wearable Tech Watch ERI is the next-generation wearabletech wristband

StartupsHK Hong Kong-Based Wearable Tech Startup Digi-Care Building A Lightweight Healthcare Wristband With Long Battery Life

_______________________________________________________________________


Why we make ERI

Everyone wants to do exercise to keep fitness but continuous exercise is difficult for most people. Many of us have bought pedometer but can not keep using it for a long time. We always have many excuses for doing exercise, for example, working, meeting, playing electronic games. So to help you keep healthy by doing exercise, we want to develop a stimulating way to make people enjoy fitness exercise. After some investigation, ERI came up to our mind. 

What is ERI

Elegant


 ERI is a newly-designed smart sports wristband. It is particular engineering craft, built with nano silica unibody technology. The nano silicon material is so comfortable to touch but lasts longer. It is extraordinary thin and feels weightless. A perfect sports and health companion.



Smart

Every sensor power and every design of ERI are precisely meaning how we care about user’s experience. The built-in hardware and software working together is so smart to constantly collect your motion information and it automatically figures out the type of motion you are doing whenever you are running, swimming, cycling, climbing, sleeping and other else. Even more, it track your route with our great algorithm. ERI is strongly water-proof and is perfect for everyday wearing. With our great new engineering design, ERI’s battery is curved by our patent and can work for half a month with one charge. 


Stimulation

To let people have more fun while doing exercise, we develop a new social game as racing. When you are hanging out for some fitness exercises, just browse what activities favors to challenge around you. Join one and wear ERI to start. You will earn more points if you reach an achievement. Challenge with people and share your achievements. Just have fun with ERI. 


Open

ERI has more potentials in its smart body. We will open SDK to access ERI sensors and open API for the motion database. It help developers to make ERI more extensible and powerful. 


Key Features

Elegant: Nano silica unibody
Extremely thin: 6mm
Smart: automatically recognize motion type - running, swimming, cycling, climbing and other else. Track route without GPS.
Long-life: more than half a month battery life
Stimulation: challenge game as racing, reach achievements, exchange gifts
Potential: open SDK, message notification, unlock door, pay bills with NFC, gesture control.


Specs

Size: Adjustable(L)*20mm(W)*6.2mm(H)

Weight: 20g
Battery: Polymer lithium battery 160mA/h; more than half a month

Water-proof: IP67

Sensors: high accuracy motion tracking sensor; ambient temperature sensor; high accuracy pressure sensor

Communication: Bluetooth 4.0, NFC

Compatibility: iOS, Android, Mac OS, Windows 8.1

Charger:

Team

ERI is DigiCare first product. Founded 2012 in Hong Kong SAR, our team features experts in mobile and electronic technology, located in the Hong Kong SAR, China mainland and USA.

Over the years, our team has worked for world-class companies, including Nokia, Docomo, Konami, NANT, Huawei, ZTE, LAVA, Mixi, among many others. We have rich experience in mobile internet and electronic industry. 

We aim to devote ourselves to developing wearable gadgets for mobile health and fitness.


Why we need your support?

ERI is now ready for production by our over a year hard working.

We need your support to manufacture so we can have the first great ERI in your hands before Christmas! We are very excited about this project and hope you too. We appreciate your support and please share ERI with your friends too.


Where the money goes?

The funding money is spent for only manufacture of ERI wristband. There are eight molds to make the every parts of ERI. 


Q&A

1.How the ERI track route?

With our great algorithm, ERI runs its smart sensors to collect geomagnetic variation data of your activities route.


2.What should I add for shipping?

Simple. We're asking please:

  • Free for US Shipping
  • $10 for Canada
  • $15 for anywhere outside North America


3.How many colors of ERI will be provided?

We will provide Black, White, Wine Red, Pink, Mint Green, Army Green, Blue, Gray.


4.What can I engraving on the ERI?

We will offer a special engraving for you on the metal clamp.

5.What happens when the funding goal is not reached?

All backers will get the ERI whatever the funding goal reached or not.

story: We are raising money to get our club started and off the ground. The money will go towards facility costs, project ideas, and development!
story_txt: We are raising money to get our club started and off the ground. The money will go towards facility costs, project ideas, and development!

story:
What is the Wired Gaming Network?

Wired Gaming Network was created in late 2011 as a place for any users of the internet(specifically looking at gamers) to come and be themselves. This is a community made by a tight knit group of people who are looking to expand their project to every end of the internet as a go to "hotspot" for people to hang out. We aren't interested in any sort of profit, but we are here to provide a place for anyone who likes online gaming of ANY genre(MMORPG,FPS,MOBA etc).

What are our major goals for Wired Gaming Network?

  • To Host massive gaming tournaments for our users, including cash prizes, and other cool gadgets for many different genres of gaming.
  • Expand to become a massive gaming community.
  • Host several tools for community use(Website w/ forum, VOIP, Game servers like Minecraft)
  • Listen to what gamers want, and tell them how they can get it or help them.
  • Find deals on gamer related goods for our users i.e. headsets, monitors, computers
  • To host consistent VOIP chat allowing users access to their own private section of the server in which they can invite their friends, as well as a region of the VOIP for users to collaberate together and find new people.
  • Promoting small time organizations like ourself, and games that are great but need more publicity.

Why we need help:

As a community we have worked hard together to create what we have so far, but of course the main problem is very much so the funding... Many of us are 18-30 years old(although we have all age groups), and can't really afford to be putting money into our community. I myself have spent several hundred dollars putting together what we have so far, and we are overdue in our hosting as  is. We really need to build up the community and create something great.

How you will help:

Every cent you donate will help. Feel free to keep donating even if we hit our goal <3!

The impact of any donation will be HUGE on the improvement of our community. I myself, and many of our staff members are very wise with our money, and we know how to spend it to improve the community... $2500 would take our community a VERY VERY long way, which is why we are asking for even the slightest amount of help.

Donations will go toward:

  • The hosting of game servers and tournaments
  • Creation of a website, and forum
  • Current bills for the VOIP server
  • Introduction of new services for the community
  • Improvement of current services for our community

The Wired Gaming Network has already hosted a 50 person tournament composed of 10 different teams on the game "League of Legends(created by Riot Games), with our cash prize being only $20.. So imagine what we could do with a little help!

Feel free to join our Teamspeak 3 Server and talk to us.
You can download Teamspeak 3 at http://teamspeak.org

Our connection info(entered into the actual Teamspeak 3 client, not a web browser) is:

wiredgaming.servequake.com

If you need to submit a direct inquiry of any type to the Wired Gaming Network, feel free to send an email here: WiredGamingNetwork@gmail.com

We're looking to do great things, we just need a little help! Any sort of help is appreciated, although we are SEVERELY lacking funding. Even if you can't donate money, you should hop on and tell us other ways that you can help.

Help us spread the word! We need people to know about the WGN! We are looking for people to create and operate a youtube channel, twitter, google +, facebook page ETC! If you can help in any of these ways it would be greatly appreciated.

story:
The Short

Hey Indiegogo'ers. My name is Joel Schwartz and I am the founder of www.GroupCall.me. I love telecom and technology and have spent the last few years trying to fix a few things that drove me crazy. That is how www.GroupCall.me came about.

I'm a little old fashion in the sense that I still prefer to talk rather than text, especially when it comes to a group of people. Whether for work or something personal, I was never satisfied with any of the free choices. Skype wasn't good at all for people on the go and all of the Free Conferencing services had these ultra-annoying pin numbers and many other problems that stopped me from using their services while at home or abroad.

  

And Now

We have done the heavy lifting and have put up a great site and a kick-ass free service. Go to www.GroupCall.me for an awesome beta and give it a try for yourself. In addition to getting the word out, we would like to launch an iPhone, Android and Blackberry app as well. We have negotiated some great deals to get these applications made for us, and are looking to Indiegogo for the $25,000 that they will cost to build.

  

Our Needs

In addition to creating the smartphone applications, we are also looking for early users. If you know anyone that makes international calls or uses some sort of conference calling service, then let them know about www.Groupcall.me. Every time you, or someone you forward this to, uses www.GroupCall.me for free international or group (conference) calls, our system will play a short ad before their call is connected. Those ads generate the revenues we need to continue making awesome free products that people around the world will benefit from daily.

  

Absolutely

Since the greatest business tool is word-of-mouth, forward this to friends who make international calls, programmers looking for new exciting projects or to anyone with good ideas. Part of our vision is to give non-profits, professionals and small businesses a free service that will enable their work to continue and expand. Please reach out to us if you feel GroupCall.me can help you or someone you know.

 

Thank you,

The GroupCall.me Team

Hey Indiegogo'ers. My name is Joel Schwartz and I am the founder of www.GroupCall.me. I love telecom and technology and have spent the last few years trying to fix a few things that drove me crazy. That is how www.GroupCall.me came about.
I'm a little old fashion in the sense that I still prefer to talk rather than text, especially when it comes to a group of people. Whether for work or something personal, I was never satisfied with any of the free choices. Skype wasn't good at all for people on the go and all of the Free Conferencing services had these ultra-annoying pin numbers and many other problems that stopped me from using their services while at home or abroad.
  
And Now
We have done the heavy lifting and have put up a great site and a kick-ass free service. Go to www.GroupCall.me for an awesome beta and give it a try for yourself. In addition to getting the word out, we would like to launch an iPhone, Android and Blackberry app as well. We have negotiated some great deals to get these applications made for us, and are looking to Indiegogo for the $25,000 that they will cost to build.
  
Our Needs
In addition to creating the smartphone applications, we are also looking for early users. If you know anyone that makes international calls or uses some sort of conference calling service, then let them know about www.Groupcall.me. Every time you, or someone you forward this to, uses www.GroupCall.me for free international or group (conference) calls, our system will play a short ad before their call is connected. Those ads generate the revenues we need to continue making awesome free products that people around the world will benefit from daily.

Since the greatest business tool is word-of-mouth, forward this to friends who make international calls, programmers looking for new exciting projects or to anyone with good ideas. Thank you,
The GroupCall.me Team

story:
Sound Familiar?

You sit down in front of the TV, turn on your TV/media player, browse Netflix, choose a movie and start streaming. And just when you're all cozy and comfy and ready for the "good part" the movie stops, restarts, begins buffering, etc. How annoying!!! Or you fire up FaceTime on your iPhone to have a chat with a friend and suddenly the video starts pixelating and the audio begins to break up. Ugh!!!

The issue more often than not is your wireless home network (Wi-Fi). And it doesn't have to be that way.

The Problem

Your Wi-Fi is a shared connection. As such the more than six connected devices in the typical American home take a toll on your wireless performance creating congestion especially as the bandwidth needs of any given device continue to escalate with more and more bandwidth intensive content and applications being used at home. Additionally your environment is always changing with devices connecting and disconnecting, interference from other neighboring networks especially in dense environments like apartment buildings, and more and more interfering noise sources in the home from the myriad electrical devices we all have.

Wireless router companies have tried to help with complicated and highly technical administrative functions, apps, etc but these fall short and face it, how many of us even know what all that technical mumbo jumbo means? And have you ever had to call your service provider for help? Good luck with that "black hole." Can't somebody just create a solution that you control and can set and forget with your mobile? 

The Solution


At ASSIA, Inc. we've spent the last ten years designing and building cloud based systems that monitor and optimize broadband connections and help service providers deliver the best broadband experience possible to their subscribers. And for the last two years we've been working on what we call Cloudcheck® which brings this same deep technical knowledge base to consumer Wi-Fi connections. Cloudcheck launched in February 2014 as an internet connectivity diagnostic utility application for iOS and Android devices and we are now ready to introduce an extension to the app we call Smartifi. Smartifi is a Wi-Fi monitoring and optimization service that uses machine learning and decision algorithms to intelligently monitor and optimize on a dynamic basis all of the physical settings of a Wi-Fi router. Our Cloudcheck "brain" monitors your Wi-Fi router from the cloud and based upon learning the specific characteristics of your network, usage patterns, etc makes changes to your wireless router to insure you achieve optimal performance.

But Does It Really Work?

You betcha. We've spent the last six months working with many of our service providing customers to trial the basic benefits of Smartifi. All told we've trialed the service with three major operators in various parts of the world with about 5,000 subscriber Wi-Fi routers (provided by the service providers) and the summary results of the trials shown below are the improvements Smartifi made to wireless routers that were rated at a 54 Mbps theoretical maximum data rate.

As you can see from the above there were previously no subscribers that could achieve the practical maximum throughput of > 20 Mbps before Smartifi whereas after Smartifi that number rose to 18% of the subscribers. And the worst case performance of < 3Mbps which effected 17% of the subscribers disappeared entirely after Smartifi was applied.

So How Does It Work?

It's super easy. Once you've downloaded the Cloudcheck app for either your iOS or Android device we automatically can detect if your Wi-Fi router is Cloudcheck enabled. If the wireless router is enabled you can immediately  opt in to the Smartifi service and from there we can detect all the devices that are connected to the Wi-Fi network and the individual speed the network provides to each device.


We then allow you to  choose any device on the network to prioritize over the others. This provide and instantaneous "boost" to the performance of the device you most care about. A good example of this might be your connected TV when you want to prioritize your Netflix experience over other devices being used at the same time. 

Once this is complete we then configure your router settings to optimize for this device and over the next several days begin a process of optimizing the entirety of your network based upon what we learn about your networks behavior. And at any time the device prioritization you initially made can be changed or removed entirely so that all devices on your network are treated equally.

At any time you can launch the Cloudcheck app to see exactly what your network performance looks like and the performance history of the devices on your network.

Why Do We Need Your Help?

In order to bring you this cool service we need to Cloudcheck enable Wi-Fi routers. This means we need to add a tiny amount of software to the WiFi routers operating system program space. This software, which we call an "agent," talks to the Cloudcheck cloud server and collects the information from your WiFi router that allows us to learn about your network and also change the physical settings of your WiFi router to dynamically optimize your WiFi router settings. We need your support here to prove to the WiFi router company's that you as a consumer want cloud based monitoring and optimization of your WiFi router. For more than a decade there has been no significant innovation in WiFi routers other than speed increases, which are mostly marketing hype, but that doesn't solve the problem. With the explosion of devices in the home creating congestion problems a higher speed limit doesn't allow traffic to move any faster. With your support together we can do for WiFi routers what Apple did for the mobile device which is to "open up" and allow for third party apps/services to provide Better, Faster Internet.

And if you cannot support us here you can help spread the word by using the Indiegogo share tools. And tweet and post your favorite WiFi router brands Twitter and Facebook and tell them you want Cloudcheck enabled WiFi routers. Every little bit helps!!!

Where Will The Funds Go?

The funds we receive here will be used to pay for the engineering costs associated with integrating our Cloudcheck agent in to Wi-Fi routers. While this is a relatively simple process that is neither time nor labor intensive there are costs associated with these software integration efforts and we may need to pay the Wi-Fi router company's to assist with their technical support of this.

A Special Note on Cloudcheck Enabled Wi-Fi Routers

While we need your support to help us convince Wi-Fi router companies to Cloudcheck enable their Wi-Fi routers we've been successful integrating our Cloudcheck agent into the following  ASUS brand Wi-Fi routers to ensure that our supporters have access to a Cloudcheck enabled Wi-Fi router when the service becomes available. These routers are available at a variety of locations including Amazon.com.

  • ASUS Model RT-AC66U
  • ASUS Model RT-N66U
  • ASUS Model RT-N66W

Where Are We At In Our Development?

We're almost finished.

  • We finish Cloudcheck server software (August 2014)
  • We finish Cloudcheck app updates for both iOS and Android (September 2014)
  • And commercially release the Cloudcheck Smartifi service (October 2014)

Our Perks

We expect our Smartifi service will cost consumers US$1.95 per month when we commercially launch. As a supporter you have access to a variety of perks that afford you significant discounts on the service for varying durations and at price points that won't be offered to others. And we thank you for your support in bringing Better, Faster Internet to consumers.


That's it!!! It couldn't be easier and if you have questions feel free to email us at indiegogo@assia-inc.com.

UPDATE: We want to thank all of our supporters. We anticipate we'll begin fulfilling perks in late October 2014 and we'll update you via email at that time. Don't forget to be sure and acquire one of the ASUS routers listed above to redeem your perk and be sure to follow us on Twitter (@Cloudcheckapp) and like us on Facebook (Cloudcheck).

story:
Hi we are HN1. Thank for your interest in our project. We love tablets and we want made tablet of your dream.

Technologies do not stand still. Every year we meet new processors, screens, cameras ... tablets have their RAM memory space and built-in memory being grown, and to replace one component we have to buy a new tablet. Also, the biggest part of modern tablets on the market have delimited functionality, we often meet that they do not have a memory card slot, HDMI, 3G, etc., and if there is, either the price is high, or the processor, screen, ROM, RAM ... not that are needed.
HN1 Modules Tablet is a tablet in which you can select the desired configuration, and when new components are released you do not need to buy a new tablet, you will only have to replace the components you need.

A pleasant surprise for fans to play on the tablet is removable gamepad with two extra batteries 18650.

For fans of e-books this novelty will be also of interest, since 6 inch E-Ink screen with optional battery or hard drive of 320 or 500GB can be installed in back of the tablet.


The project started on сrowdfunding platform indiegogo.
The minimum cost of the tablet is $ 140



Price from 140$

story:
Second Round

In June 2013 we launched a second round Indiegogo campaign. Our first campaign did not raise the required funding and so we have followed up with a second round.

If you contribute to the campaign you will be helping us get Combimouse into production. Here is the link to the campaign.

Campaign Wrap Up

There was a lot of interest in this campaign. The campaign pitch video was viewed over 29,000 times and many websites blogged about the campaign.

The campaign has now finished and we received $7,000 of the $20,000 goal.

This means that we have had to to adjust our objectives.

We still expect to deliver the perks we offered.

The main objective is to design and make Pre-Production units and to show everyone that they work as well as we say they do. To do that, we need an independent reputable organization to test the Combimouse Keyboard. This will also ensure all issues are resolved before we go to the manufacturing phase.

Working on an adjusted and limited budget we have found ways to make the Pre-Production units. As you have seen the new right hand Combimouse is representative of what we expect the final product to look like. It is much better than the previous prototype and it is very exciting to see the improvements, especially using a better keyboard and seeing the keyboard mode immobility solution. The next stage is to make the new circuit board to interface to these two new technologies along with the new mouse sensor we are using. We expect to have the new prototype ready by the end of June.

We were quoted $5,000 by the university to evaluate the Combimouse Keyboard, which is currently beyond our budget. As there is a lot of interest in the Combimouse and we think that many organizations would be interested in getting involved with the Combimouse. We are going to investigate alternatives shortly.

We have managed to reduce costs by hand making the prototype and for the evaluation we will use the old left hand unit. We don’t expect the different keyboard technologies to affect the evaluation.

In our campaign we talk about how we will use the funds if the target goal isn’t achieved.

We would like to thank the people who purchased the Perks and look forward to delivering them. 

Media Coverage

Ubergizmo: Combimouse Hits Indiegogo

Gagadget (Russian): Combimouse (Indiegogo)

Tom's Hardware: CombiMouse Hybrid Keyboard & Mouse Arrives on IndieGoGo

Gizmag: Combimouse is both keyboard and mouse

Bit Rebels: Combimouse Combines Keyboard & Mouse Into One Device

and many more.

Overview

The Combimouse is a Combination Keyboard and Mouse that makes computer input easy and very fast.

Before we go into manufacturing, we need your help to design and make pre-production units, so that we can commission a university to evaluate the Combimouse. Evaluation will confirm that the mouse and keyboard functionality is not compromised compared to conventional devices and that the integrated mouse function is optimised.

We are a small startup company based in Perth Australia.

Project Milestones

  • 1999 - Combimouse invented and patented by Ari Zagnoev
  • 2003 - Evaluated by Wichita State University. Click here to view the report
  • 2003 - Winner Australian IT Secrets competition. The award was presented to Ari by the Australian IT Minister, Senator Richard Alston. Click here to view the certificate
  • 2003 - 2013 - R&D (See blog - Combimouse Design Evolution.)
  • March 2013 - Prototype ready

Pre-Production Combimouse

Using funds contributed during this Indiegogo campaign funds we have made the Pre-Production model shown below. Note that this is not a "Photoshop virtual model" as some people have suggested.
It would appear that we won't reach our fund raising goal and so we have changed our objectives which you can read about below. We also discuss this in the latest Update which you can read by clicking the Updates tab above.
A high resolution photo has been uploaded to the Indiegogo Gallery.

 

What is the Combimouse?

The Combimouse is a combination keyboard and mouse. The right part doubles as a keyboard and mouse. When you grip it, it becomes a mouse and specific keys switch to mouse click buttons.

You don't have to move your hand off the keyboard to operate the mouse. You just drop your hand, grip it and move the mouse making Computer usage more efficient and less tiring. This is the main advantage of the Combimouse.

The right part works and feels exactly the same as a regular mouse. Thanks to patent pending technology, the right part doesn't move around during typing.

The Combimouse website details how it works. 

Below are two photos showing the two ways it can be gripped during mouse mode.

The first one is exactly the same way as gripping a normal mouse. It takes fractionally longer to reach then the second method, but it is more accurate because you wrist is supported on the table.

The time to grip using the second grip mode is virtually zero. Pointing is slighly less accurate than the first method because you wrist isn't supported on the table.

When the unit is touched on the right side by the small finger, a sensor is activated and the unit switches to mouse mode. The keyboard keys then become the click buttons.

Videos using the Combimouse

These videos show a video within a video of the two views - screen and Combimouse. It is not possible to show then simulatenously in the same view, as the text entered would not be visible. The videos of the Combimouse have been deliberately blurred as explained previously.

It's best to set the resolution to 720p HD by pressing the gear at the bottom. Also set them to full screen.

  1. Video showing Text selection
  2. Video showing the Difference between the two mouse grips
  3. Video using Mouse Grip 2

Background

My name is Ari Zagnoev and I am CEO of Combimouse. Combimouse has been my obsession for the last 15 years. Overcoming the technological and ergonomic issues has taken a lot of work. 

We are a startup company with 4 shareholders and 3 team members.

We need financial assistance to continue. Thanks to continous R&D work and technology improvements we now have it working well and it is fully manufacturable.

  • The latest version is fully manufacturable (funding is required to confirm some details)
  • The latest version is is stable during typing - the right part does not move around during keyboard mode
  • All ergonomic issues have been resolved
  • Technology has progressed to a point where the Combimouse is now feasible. This includes long battery life, thin wall plastic and light notebook keyboard technology.

The next step is to have the Combimouse evaluated before the expensive manufacturing phase commences.  

Why is this campaign for the Evaluation phase only?

It helps investors minimise their risk as follows:

  • You can contribute a small amount in this first Evaluation phase and build up purchase dollars (with a 10% early backer’s bonus earned)
  • you can then wait for the University to evaluate and report back before committing additional purchase dollars
  • you now have confidence in the product and you can then add to your purchase dollars by contributing in the second Manufacturing phase which will be a separate Indiegogo campaign.

What’s in it for you?

If you are quick enough and claim the limited number early bird perks you will get a Combimouse at a big discount. This is our way of saying thank you for starting to get the ball rolling.

For the other perks you will be placed in the queue to receive a Combimouse. The earlier you make your first contribution, the higher up in the queue you will be.

Contributions to the two Indiegogo Campaign phases (ie. Evaluation and Manufacturing phases) accumulate, with your contribution in the Evaluation phase earning you a 10% bonus and contributions in the Manufacturing phase earning a 5% bonus.

When the Combimouse goes on sale you can purchase a Combimouse using your accumulated contributions. If your contributions are less than the retail price you will need to top up and pay the balance.

If you need to top up, you will need to do so within one month from when you are invited to do so, so that you don’t lose your place in the queue.

We expect the Combimouse to intially sell for under $100 - see the Blog "What should the Combimouse sell for?". 

Refunds

Details of refunds for eligible Early Bird specials will be posted soon. These are the people who purchased the Early Bird $110 and Early Bird $190 Perks. We are considering offering $30 and $40 refunds to make up the difference with the later perks.

How will the funds be used?

  1. Design and build two pre-production units. One will be used by Curtin University for their evaluation. We will design new plastics, circuit boards and flexible membrane circuits and have them manufactured.
  2. Commission Curtin University to evaluate Combimouse. This will be co-ordinated by Professor Straker. They will evaluate posture, movement and muscle activity variables on a number of users. They will also evaluate the usability compared to a regular keyboard and mouse. Curtin University has quoted to do the evaluation.
  3. Enlist a patent attorney to draw up and lodge a Provisional patent which covers the solution of preventing the right part moving during typing. The patent must be lodged before the Combimouse is shown to anyone. Currently only Ari Zagnoev is aware of the idea.
  4. Commission the manufacturing partner and local mechanical engineers to confirm manufacturability of Combimouse.
  5. Ongoing product development.
  6. Prepare for the Manufacturing phase of Combimouse.

If the campaign is overfunded and the university's results are favorable, we will continue straight into the Manufacturing phase.

Timeline

  • First two months - Tasks 1 and 3 above
  • Next two months - Task 2 above

Tasks 4 and 5 above will be done in parallel with the other tasks.

The subsequent manufacturing phase will take about 6 months.

Use of funds if campaign goal is not reached

If the campaign is only partially funded the following tasks in descending order will be done:

  1. Curtin University evaluation. This is the main objective.
  2. Design and build two pre-production units. If funding is not available, we will handmake a copy of the existing prototype for Curtin University. This is not ideal as we will have to use an old notebook keyboard. Modern keyboards are much better and will be used on the final Combimouse.
  3. Patent. If funds are not available we will prepare and lodge the patent ourselves without consulting a patent attorney.
  4. Confirm manufacturability.
  5. Prepare for commercialization.

How can I follow progress

We will regularly update the blog Combimouse Pre-Production Model Status. We will tweet whenever an update is made, so be sure to follow @combimouse.

Frequently Asked Questions

Why contribute?

Without your contribution we can't continue and Combimouse may not come to be.

We are offering very attractive perks for early investors - especially the limited number Early Bird perks.

Why has it taken so long?

Technology is only now available to make it feasible - including thin wall plastics, plastic mold flow analysis software, light weight notebook keyboard technology and ultra low power electronics.

Overcoming design problems has taken time. Especially making it light and mobile as a mouse AND immobile as a keyboard and at the same time making it manufacturable. For details please read the blog Combimouse Design Evolution. The solution of making it immobile as a keyboard was only achieved in early 2013 and will be patented. (Unlike some, we appreciate patents which give us the opportunity to protect 15 years work!).

Why only start with the Evaluation phase and not Full project?

This is to give you, the contributor, confidence before funding the complete project. We have tested it and it works well. In this phase it will be evaluated by a University and you will then have confidence in investing in the full project.

We have phased it with you in mind.

If Wichita State University tested it successfully why wait another 10 years?

The prototype used by them was not manufacturable.

It moved around during typing.

As discussed above technology was not available at the time to make a commercial product.

Why show the old prototype and not the latest?

The latest prototype is handmade and crude. It doesn't photograph well. Significant funds are required to clean it up. The design is complete.

Will the keys be user configurable?

Yes

Is the Right Unit too heavy as a mouse?

No, it isn't. See here.

Apple Magic Mouse = 108 grams.

Combimouse Right Unit = 74 grams (this includes 26 grams of lead weights to optimise the centre of gravity and weight distribution).

Does the Right Unit move during typing?

No, it doesn't. See here.

Team

Ari Zagnoev, CEO. Main engineer. Majority Combimouse shareholder.

Learn more about Ari at Linked In.

Roger Larcome, Software Engineer. Combimouse shareholder

Learn more about Roger at Linked In.

Simon Herron, Accountant and Business Development. Combimouse shareholder

Learn more about Simon at Linked In.

Follow Combimouse

www.combimouse.com especially the blog and comments

http://twitter.com/combimouse

http://facebook.com/combimouse

Thank You

By contributing and telling your friends, you will be helping me on what has been a long and interesting road to make the Combimouse available for you to use and enjoy.
