story_txt:
Second Round
In June 2013 we launched a second round Indiegogo campaign. Our first campaign did not raise the required funding and so we have followed up with a second round.
If you contribute to the campaign you will be helping us get Combimouse into production. Here is the link to the campaign.
Campaign Wrap Up
There was a lot of interest in this campaign. The campaign pitch video was viewed over 29,000 times and many websites blogged about the campaign.
The campaign has now finished and we received $7,000 of the $20,000 goal.
This means that we have had to to adjust our objectives.
We still expect to deliver the perks we offered.
The main objective is to design and make Pre-Production units and to show everyone that they work as well as we say they do. To do that, we need an independent reputable organization to test the Combimouse Keyboard. This will also ensure all issues are resolved before we go to the manufacturing phase.
Working on an adjusted and limited budget we have found ways to make the Pre-Production units. As you have seen the new right hand Combimouse is representative of what we expect the final product to look like. It is much better than the previous prototype and it is very exciting to see the improvements, especially using a better keyboard and seeing the keyboard mode immobility solution. The next stage is to make the new circuit board to interface to these two new technologies along with the new mouse sensor we are using. We expect to have the new prototype ready by the end of June.
We were quoted $5,000 by the university to evaluate the Combimouse Keyboard, which is currently beyond our budget. As there is a lot of interest in the Combimouse and we think that many organizations would be interested in getting involved with the Combimouse. We are going to investigate alternatives shortly.
We have managed to reduce costs by hand making the prototype and for the evaluation we will use the old left hand unit. We don’t expect the different keyboard technologies to affect the evaluation.
In our campaign we talk about how we will use the funds if the target goal isn’t achieved.
We would like to thank the people who purchased the Perks and look forward to delivering them. 
Media Coverage
Ubergizmo: Combimouse Hits Indiegogo
Gagadget (Russian): Combimouse (Indiegogo)
Tom's Hardware: CombiMouse Hybrid Keyboard & Mouse Arrives on IndieGoGo
Gizmag: Combimouse is both keyboard and mouse
Bit Rebels: Combimouse Combines Keyboard & Mouse Into One Device
and many more.
Overview
The Combimouse is a Combination Keyboard and Mouse that makes computer input easy and very fast.
Before we go into manufacturing, we need your help to design and make pre-production units, so that we can commission a university to evaluate the Combimouse. Evaluation will confirm that the mouse and keyboard functionality is not compromised compared to conventional devices and that the integrated mouse function is optimised.
We are a small startup company based in Perth Australia.
Project Milestones

1999 - Combimouse invented and patented by Ari Zagnoev
2003 - Evaluated by Wichita State University. Click here to view the report
2003 - Winner Australian IT Secrets competition. The award was presented to Ari by the Australian IT Minister, Senator Richard Alston. Click here to view the certificate
2003 - 2013 - R&D (See blog - Combimouse Design Evolution.)
March 2013 - Prototype ready
Pre-Production Combimouse
Using funds contributed during this Indiegogo campaign funds we have made the Pre-Production model shown below. Note that this is not a "Photoshop virtual model" as some people have suggested.
It would appear that we won't reach our fund raising goal and so we have changed our objectives which you can read about below. We also discuss this in the latest Update which you can read by clicking the Updates tab above.
A high resolution photo has been uploaded to the Indiegogo Gallery.

 
What is the Combimouse?
The Combimouse is a combination keyboard and mouse. The right part doubles as a keyboard and mouse. When you grip it, it becomes a mouse and specific keys switch to mouse click buttons.
You don't have to move your hand off the keyboard to operate the mouse. You just drop your hand, grip it and move the mouse making Computer usage more efficient and less tiring. This is the main advantage of the Combimouse.
The right part works and feels exactly the same as a regular mouse. Thanks to patent pending technology, the right part doesn't move around during typing.
The Combimouse website details how it works. 
Below are two photos showing the two ways it can be gripped during mouse mode.
The first one is exactly the same way as gripping a normal mouse. It takes fractionally longer to reach then the second method, but it is more accurate because you wrist is supported on the table.
The time to grip using the second grip mode is virtually zero. Pointing is slighly less accurate than the first method because you wrist isn't supported on the table.
When the unit is touched on the right side by the small finger, a sensor is activated and the unit switches to mouse mode. The keyboard keys then become the click buttons.

Videos using the Combimouse
These videos show a video within a video of the two views - screen and Combimouse. It is not possible to show then simulatenously in the same view, as the text entered would not be visible. The videos of the Combimouse have been deliberately blurred as explained previously.
It's best to set the resolution to 720p HD by pressing the gear at the bottom. Also set them to full screen.

Video showing Text selection

Video showing the Difference between the two mouse grips

Video using Mouse Grip 2

Background
My name is Ari Zagnoev and I am CEO of Combimouse. Combimouse has been my obsession for the last 15 years. Overcoming the technological and ergonomic issues has taken a lot of work. 
We are a startup company with 4 shareholders and 3 team members.
We need financial assistance to continue. Thanks to continous R&D work and technology improvements we now have it working well and it is fully manufacturable.

The latest version is fully manufacturable (funding is required to confirm some details)
The latest version is is stable during typing - the right part does not move around during keyboard mode
All ergonomic issues have been resolved
Technology has progressed to a point where the Combimouse is now feasible. This includes long battery life, thin wall plastic and light notebook keyboard technology.
The next step is to have the Combimouse evaluated before the expensive manufacturing phase commences.  
Why is this campaign for the Evaluation phase only?
It helps investors minimise their risk as follows:

You can contribute a small amount in this first Evaluation phase and build up purchase dollars (with a 10% early backer’s bonus earned)
you can then wait for the University to evaluate and report back before committing additional purchase dollars
you now have confidence in the product and you can then add to your purchase dollars by contributing in the second Manufacturing phase which will be a separate Indiegogo campaign.

What’s in it for you?
If you are quick enough and claim the limited number early bird perks you will get a Combimouse at a big discount. This is our way of saying thank you for starting to get the ball rolling.
For the other perks you will be placed in the queue to receive a Combimouse. The earlier you make your first contribution, the higher up in the queue you will be.
Contributions to the two Indiegogo Campaign phases (ie. Evaluation and Manufacturing phases) accumulate, with your contribution in the Evaluation phase earning you a 10% bonus and contributions in the Manufacturing phase earning a 5% bonus.
When the Combimouse goes on sale you can purchase a Combimouse using your accumulated contributions. If your contributions are less than the retail price you will need to top up and pay the balance.
If you need to top up, you will need to do so within one month from when you are invited to do so, so that you don’t lose your place in the queue.
We expect the Combimouse to intially sell for under $100 - see the Blog "What should the Combimouse sell for?". 
Refunds
Details of refunds for eligible Early Bird specials will be posted soon. These are the people who purchased the Early Bird $110 and Early Bird $190 Perks. We are considering offering $30 and $40 refunds to make up the difference with the later perks.
How will the funds be used?

Design and build two pre-production units. One will be used by Curtin University for their evaluation. We will design new plastics, circuit boards and flexible membrane circuits and have them manufactured.
Commission Curtin University to evaluate Combimouse. This will be co-ordinated by Professor Straker. They will evaluate posture, movement and muscle activity variables on a number of users. They will also evaluate the usability compared to a regular keyboard and mouse. Curtin University has quoted to do the evaluation.
Enlist a patent attorney to draw up and lodge a Provisional patent which covers the solution of preventing the right part moving during typing. The patent must be lodged before the Combimouse is shown to anyone. Currently only Ari Zagnoev is aware of the idea.
Commission the manufacturing partner and local mechanical engineers to confirm manufacturability of Combimouse.
Ongoing product development.
Prepare for the Manufacturing phase of Combimouse.
If the campaign is overfunded and the university's results are favorable, we will continue straight into the Manufacturing phase.
Timeline

First two months - Tasks 1 and 3 above
Next two months - Task 2 above
Tasks 4 and 5 above will be done in parallel with the other tasks.
The subsequent manufacturing phase will take about 6 months.
Use of funds if campaign goal is not reached
If the campaign is only partially funded the following tasks in descending order will be done:

Curtin University evaluation. This is the main objective.
Design and build two pre-production units. If funding is not available, we will handmake a copy of the existing prototype for Curtin University. This is not ideal as we will have to use an old notebook keyboard. Modern keyboards are much better and will be used on the final Combimouse.
Patent. If funds are not available we will prepare and lodge the patent ourselves without consulting a patent attorney.
Confirm manufacturability.
Prepare for commercialization.
How can I follow progress
We will regularly update the blog Combimouse Pre-Production Model Status. We will tweet whenever an update is made, so be sure to follow @combimouse.
Frequently Asked Questions
Why contribute?
Without your contribution we can't continue and Combimouse may not come to be.
We are offering very attractive perks for early investors - especially the limited number Early Bird perks.
Why has it taken so long?
Technology is only now available to make it feasible - including thin wall plastics, plastic mold flow analysis software, light weight notebook keyboard technology and ultra low power electronics.
Overcoming design problems has taken time. Especially making it light and mobile as a mouse AND immobile as a keyboard and at the same time making it manufacturable. For details please read the blog Combimouse Design Evolution. The solution of making it immobile as a keyboard was only achieved in early 2013 and will be patented. (Unlike some, we appreciate patents which give us the opportunity to protect 15 years work!).
Why only start with the Evaluation phase and not Full project?
This is to give you, the contributor, confidence before funding the complete project. We have tested it and it works well. In this phase it will be evaluated by a University and you will then have confidence in investing in the full project.
We have phased it with you in mind.
If Wichita State University tested it successfully why wait another 10 years?
The prototype used by them was not manufacturable.
It moved around during typing.
As discussed above technology was not available at the time to make a commercial product.
Why show the old prototype and not the latest?
The latest prototype is handmade and crude. It doesn't photograph well. Significant funds are required to clean it up. The design is complete.
Will the keys be user configurable?
Yes
Is the Right Unit too heavy as a mouse?
No, it isn't. See here.
Apple Magic Mouse = 108 grams.
Combimouse Right Unit = 74 grams (this includes 26 grams of lead weights to optimise the centre of gravity and weight distribution).
Does the Right Unit move during typing?
No, it doesn't. See here.
Team
Ari Zagnoev, CEO. Main engineer. Majority Combimouse shareholder.
Learn more about Ari at Linked In.
Roger Larcome, Software Engineer. Combimouse shareholder
Learn more about Roger at Linked In.
Simon Herron, Accountant and Business Development. Combimouse shareholder
Learn more about Simon at Linked In.
Follow Combimouse
www.combimouse.com especially the blog and comments
http://twitter.com/combimouse
http://facebook.com/combimouse
Thank You
By contributing and telling your friends, you will be helping me on what has been a long and interesting road to make the Combimouse available for you to use and enjoy.
Blogs
Attempt at printing the Combimouse plastic using 3D printing (Posted 18 May 2013)
Combimouse Pre-Production Model Status (Posted 2 May 2013)
What should the Combimouse sell for? (Posted 22 April 2013)
Should we make a Left Handed version Combimouse? (Posted 17 April 2013)
Scroll solutions for the Combimouse (Posted 16 April 2013)
What's it like using the Combimouse? (Posted 14 April 2013)
Combimouse Design Evolution (Posted 14 April 2013)
The PC is dead – Touch devices are the future – No need for Combimouse? (Posted: 13 April 2013)
Why not use Bluetooth – Question from Indiegogo (Posted: 11 April 2013)

story:
Hitting delete doesn't actually get rid of your data, so if you don’t want someone sifting through your personal life when ditching your old computer, use Redkey to erase everything. 

Easy to use!

Redkey is specifically designed to be easy to use - it works automatically! Just plug it in to a spare USB port then power on your computer to initiate the wipe. Once loaded, any interaction is optional!

The end result is a fresh clean computer - ready for safe sale or disposal. Now you can wipe all of your old computers - effortlessly! Quick-start guide included. 

RECYCLING / DONATING?

Redkey is suitable for home & business use. Wipe computers at home, wipe computers for work. Wipe as many computers as you want - no one is counting because Redkey uses a non-restrictive perpetual software licence - no expensive pay per use rip-off here! No hassle and no fuss. Finally - a product that is easy to use! It will serve you for years to come! Good value - a smart investment! 

Some ideas for when to use the Redkey:  

Prior to sale: eBay｜Amazon｜Gumtree｜Facebook｜Craigslist｜Auctions 

Prior to recycling: Free-cycle｜Collection companies｜Municipal / Domestic Waste sites

Prior to donating: Charity｜Schools｜Education｜Non-Profit Organisations

In the workplace: System Admin｜Liquidation｜Asset Redeployment｜GDPR NIST Compliance

When Buying?!: Tip - when buying a used PC, make sure it's clean! Who knows whats on it?!

Gifts: Hand-me-downs｜Giving an old computer to family, friends, Etc. Make sure its squeaky clean!

Redkey has several other uses too: 

It will properly and completely remove Spyware｜Virus｜Trojan｜Malware from Disks.

Use it to digitally sanitise computer equipment when travelling in/out of certain regions.

Stop Hackers｜Snoops｜Law Enforcement ｜Government｜Companies｜Spies digging up dirt!

Speed up a slow PC by wiping it properly clean and starting fresh. Like new again!

Connect multiple drives and create a cleaning station on an old PC. Up to 6 at once! 

Use in a crisis / emergency situation. If the zombies are coming and you gotta get gone fast, then activate the Redkey protocol. 

+ Much more...

Redkey stops your personal information being discovered when a computer is disposed of.  Personal Information can easily be found on computers - even after it's been deleted because computers never actually delete data properly. This is a kind of flaw in the way all computers work. 

Data is stored on the "hard drive" inside every computer. The Redkey uses a special process to wipe the contents of your drives in a way that is much more secure than just "deleting" or "resetting." Redkey permanently erases data. It uses a combination of techniques to do so, including cryptography. Ordinarily - a computer will not go to this extreme - it takes too long! But when it comes time to dispose of a computer, use the Redkey to force your computer to erase the data properly. 

Simply plug your Redkey in to a spare USB port on the computer to be wiped, then switch on power to initiate a wipe. Once loaded, it's designed to work automatically, and any further interaction is completely optional. Your computer will start to wipe after a couple of minutes (this can be skipped if urgent) and after several hours, the wipe process is usually complete. When the wipe is complete, this is visually indicated on your screen, and also indicated by audio beeps every 5 minutes. How long the wipe takes depends on the size and type of the disk drive(s) in your computer. 

*RedKey USB works on most home / business type computers with a spare USB port available. This includes PC's, Desktop's & Laptops made since 2000 & Mac / Macbooks made since 2006. 32+64 Bit supported. X86. It works with both HDD Hard Drives and the latest SSD Solid State drives, and combinations thereof.  The Redkey can work with either a keyboard, a mouse, or both, or neither. It can even work on partially broken computers where you can't see the screen. For this reason, audio beeps are included so you can hear when a computer has been wiped.  It works on both PC's & Macs including laptops although with Macs you may need to hold down function key to use the "F" keys. This can be circumvented easily by using an external keyboard or mouse. Redkey works with SSD and M2 type discs. We are currently working on compatibility for eMMC disks too. Redkey may not work on some server / virtual / specialist type computers. We are currently working on RAID compatibility. 

No. The Redkey is a "pay-once" product and is designed to last for years. Every Redkey obtained through crowd-funding includes free software updates for life. That means that whenever future updates come out for the Redkey, you can upgrade your Redkey to the latest version for free, for life! In regards to durability, the Redkey is very tough for a USB stick because its made from a single piece of steel and the working parts are encapsulated. It can stand up to heavy duty use, and can be stored on a key-ring without deforming in your pocket. It is tough and does not scratch easy - the result of a great deal of product development and field testing.   

This is the second crowd-funding campaign for the Redkey on Indiegogo and it's 4th in total. The V2 Redkey has all the features of the V1 Redkey + some new features that improve the product. The new features are mostly based around the software system that is embedded in to each Redkey and enhance the capability of the product several-fold. 

New｜Remote Update Service. (www.redkeyupdater.com)

Update your Redkey online to the latest version of software whenever future updates are released. Simply connect your Redkey to your computer and log in to the Redkey website, and download the software update tool. All Redkey's obtained through crowdfunding carry free software updates for life. 

New｜Optional Text Interface.

The Redkey uses a Graphical User Interface. A TUI gives you additional options to use Redkey through a simplified text only mode.  

New｜Language Support.

Redkey has been converted for use in several languages. English loads by default if no other option is selected after a 10 second timer. Options include:

Dutch ｜Nederlands

German ｜ Deutsche

Swedish  ｜Svenska

Japanese ｜ 日本人

French ｜ Français 

Italian ｜ Italiano

Spanish ｜ Español

Korean ｜  한국어

Hindi ｜ हिंदी

Chinese｜ 

 

New ｜ Cryptographic Erase. 

Introducing a new wipe stage designed to prevent data recovery by all known forensic techniques by employing Blow-fish 448-Bit cryptography to fully encrypt a drive as part of the wipe process. The "crypto" keys are then discarded rendering any data completely useless. 

 

New ｜ Enhanced Secure Erase (In Progress)

A new feature that will add an additional layer of security to the wipe process. Will erase "Hidden" areas of a Disk drive that are otherwise unreachable.  This feature is still under development and is due to be introduced soon via software update.  

 

New ｜ 100% Verification.

This new mode forensically scans your computer for any remaining bits of data following a wipe - just to make sure everything is gone! Should anything be detected, it will be identified and erased. Works independently of the wipe process for complete autonomy. 

 

New ｜ Report Feature.

This feature allows you to view a report and save it as a text file, so it can kept, printed or forwarded on for compliance reasons etc. Ties in with verification. Gain NIST, GDPR, HIPAA compliance by ensuring safe asset disposal through verifiable data destruction.

 

New ｜ Software certification.

Redkey will apply to have the software certified by an industry recognised professional organisation. This adds an element of assurance that the product does what it says it does. This stage is currently pending completion.

The Redkey is available on it's own, or as part of a kit containing other coloured keys. 

The other coloured keys are not the same as the Redkey. The Blue & Green keys are simply regular, empty, USB sticks - made in the same form as the Redkey. They are for storing your data files like any other regular USB stick, however - they are manufactured to the same high quality specification as the Redkey. 

Use the Blue or green Keys prior to, or following the use of the Redkey to store or transfer files that you actually want to keep. You must make sure you back up any data you want to keep before using the Redkey, because once it's gone, it's gone forever! 

The Blue and Green keys are optional extras that help simplify your backup and restoration tasks if applicable, but the Redkey will still work fine on it's own, without them. Full comprehensive instructions and advice is included in a printed instruction manual covering various uses for each key.

 

 

TRUST REDKEY USB

REDKEY WORKS HARD TO PROTECT YOUR PRIVACY. ELIMINATE THE POSSIBILITY OF DATA RECOVERY FROM A USED COMPUTER. PREVENT EVEN FORENSIC GRADE DATA RECOVERY ATTACKS. REDKEY WILL STOP HACKERS, GOVERNMENT, OPPORTUNISTS OR EVEN THE POLICE IN THEIR SEARCH THROUGH OUR PERMANENT, THOROUGH AND IRREVERSIBLE DATA ERASURE PROCESS. SAFE & SECURE. RECYCLE WITHOUT RISK. SEE OUR 5* CUSTOMER FEEDBACK - IT JUST WORKS! DATA GONE FOREVER. 

☆☆☆☆☆ GOOGLE REVIEWS (LINKS EXTERNALLY) ☆☆☆☆☆

 

The following section is for Indiegogo admin shipping stage verification:
Video of key features and functionality of the final product:

 

A series of photos that highlight the current stage of production (manufactured components):
 
A video / series of photos showing completed components being prepared for shipment and/or packaging:
All pledges ship within 7-14 days

REDKEY WILL STOP HACKERS, GOVERNMENT, OPPORTUNISTS OR EVEN THE POLICE IN THEIR SEARCH THROUGH OUR PERMANENT, THOROUGH AND IRREVERSIBLE DATA ERASURE PROCESS. SAFE & SECURE. RECYCLE WITHOUT RISK. SEE OUR 5* CUSTOMER FEEDBACK - IT JUST WORKS! DATA GONE FOREVER. ☆☆☆☆☆ GOOGLE REVIEWS (LINKS EXTERNALLY) ☆☆☆☆☆ The following section is for Indiegogo admin shipping stage verification:Video of key features and functionality of the final product:

 
A series of photos that highlight the current stage of production (manufactured components): A video / series of photos showing completed components being prepared for shipment and/or packaging:

All pledges ship within 7-14 days

story:
Protect your cables from wearing off.

Most cables fail to work because they are damaged close to the connection point: USBGuard protects the cable where it needs it.

Protect your USB cables

Manufacturers usually decide that it's better to produce a nice looking cable, than a strong one.

That's typically the case of Apple Lightning cables: those cables are pretty nice, but wear out typically in less than six months! At 20$ each, or more, that might turn out to be pretty expensive.

Sure, there are unofficial cables out there, but they stop working after a while or, if MFI cables, are still quite pricey.

Furthermore, original cables are guaranteed to charge at the maximum speed your charger can supply, while unofficial ones might offer slower performances, if not even damage your device!

Why do cables wear out so quickly? Because they have a weak spot. The red part is mechanically stressed most times you use your cable. That's how USBGuard works: it covers this weak point and keeps the cable going straight.

USBGuard is flexible, so it helps the cable bend in a smooth and safe way!

Easy and safe

USBGuard is easy to install. You can mount it literally in seconds, and you're ready to go.

Colorful

USBGuard gives your charging cable a touch of personal style, while keeping a sleek and nice design. USBGuard is available in eight different colors.


Compatibility

USBGuard is designed over the Apple Lightning cable that comes with iPhones, iPad, iPods etc.

Anyway, it is compatible with any charging cable with a similar form factor! We're pretty sure USBGuard can save most cables out there, being Lightning or microUSB cables.


How can I help

If you like USBGuard, don't wait longer! Order yours now and get it at a special price. Keep in mind that, with a very small investment today, you'll be able to save serious bucks you would have spent in cables.


Referral program

Please, don't forget to share USBGuard with your friends!

If you use the Indiegogo referral function - the Share button at the top of this page, you will receive a free USBGuard pair for every contribution you refer!

story:
MAGIBLE is an innovative cross-device charging cable that combines 7 functions in one cable. With 5 interchangeable connectors, it’s super easy and convenient to charge and transfer data to your iOS, Android, USB and USB-C devices. The premium material used on MAGIBLE makes it inherently tangle free and extra durable. MAGIBLE is all you need to ensure your gadgets are at full power wherever you go. 

 

 

     

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

24 AWG copper wires carry larger current up to 2.4A, making MAGIBLE charges 1.5 times faster than regular cables. Plus, MAGIBLE is not just for charging.Data transfer with MAGIBLE is 30% faster thanks to the premium material it made with.

 

 

 

With OTG functionality enabled, MAGIBLE will turn your USB-C smartphone into a computer! Yes, you heard it right. You can use the USB-C to USB Female adapter on MAGIBLE to connect basically any USB device to your USB-C smartphones, such as a keyboard, mouse, controller, flash drive, external hard drive, printer and etc.

What is USB OTG cable?

USB OTG is short for USB On The Go. It is a specification that allows USB devices such as smartphones and tablets to act as a host device, enabling other devices to be connected to them for charging and data transfer.

 

 

Having a dead phone when you are out for work or fun is the worst thing ever! Many people prefer to bring a charging cable with them but not every coffee shop/restaurant/conference room has a USB outlet :(

How about making other devices the power sources for your phone? With MAGIBLE, you can charge your iOS and Android devices from any USB-C phone/tablets. Isn’t it a great way to save your phones on the verge of dying!

 

 

 

 

We provide a lifetime warranty covering manufacturer defects for the cable part. Connectors are not covered under the lifetime warranty. See details in the FAQ section below.

 

 

 

The tough nylon braiding material keeps the MAGIBLE inherently tangle-free and much more durable than regular cables.

 

 

 

                      

Please note that this function requires duet display app.

 

                      

 

                                

                         

 

 

 

 

 

The era of Lightning & Micro USB is coming to an end. USB Type-C is taking over.

Switching to a latest USB-C phone is cool, but it also means you need to pack multiple cables with you when you leave the house, simply because your gadgets might use different cables. It’s a pain to mentally sort out, and a real hassle if you need to then buy a bunch of adapter cables to make sure your new phone still plugs into your old laptop.
 

MAGIBLE is the perfect solution for your USB-C phones! Charge your phone from any power sources and easy data transfer (and charging as well) between your USB-C phone and your New Macbook Pro.

 

Connect Phone To Keyboard

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are a team of young people who are extremely passionate about high-tech products. Fun, breakthrough, and innovation are our tags; Uniqueness is our philosophy. The life improvements and changes that are brought by new technology and products are the greatest pleasure for us. We are willing to be the earliest supporters and participants of creative products.

story:
Connectros is a Simple, Secure & Safe way to give you Power wherever you want +More.

Just plug in Connectros into your power outlet and select which Connectros module you need, from Plug Sockets, USB Chargers, Night Light or Extension Cable, to give you power wherever you need it.



Quick Facts about Connectros 

Unique Patented Design featuring :

Interchangeable Components : 
Allows for Connection of any Module in seconds , giving you Power whenever you need it. The Components Designed for Connectros include USB Chargers, a Night Light, Extension Cable, Multiple Sockets and a Cross Junction for even more room for Connection.
An Ergonomically Designed Stainless Steel Lever : 
This sturdy Stainless Steel Lever will be used to make the attachment and detachment process impel and effortless



Unique "Innovative" Design

Easily broken, unpractical or badly designed power strips/bars/extension sockets ranks as some of the most annoying things that can cause the most hazards domestically. What many people do not realize is that it can become a potentially life-threatening event if the product lacks any quality and safety standards.

Although a few have attempted to differentiate themselves from the traditional designs, many have failed in producing such extensively researched and innovative design like us.

With a Connectros kit, you will notice the simplicity and extreme practicality of the product as it integrates a number of your essential daily components into one.

When you're in an awkward place or situation where you are in need of multiple power outlets, Connectros will no doubt become your saviour!

What do we mean by a 'Quality' product?

For us, the definition of Quality means using Premium Materials and putting emphasis on International Safety Standards thus creating a beautifully designed and robust product.

Connectros will be available to a number of countries including the U.S. (UL Certified), U.K. (BS Certified), Australia (SAA Certified) and the EU (VDE Certified) providing you with Unmatched Safety and Quality wherever you are.

Connectros' unique design has a strong emphasis on safety, currently unmatched by many other chargers or power bar/strips/extension chords available on the market today.


Safety Standards for Plug and Socket type Products

Our product Differs itself from the Majority of power-based products Manufactured in China, which are Mostly Profit-Driven and Poorly Made with practically No Certification. 

We Pride ourselves of producing Premium Product with the Consumers in Mind and Not to Release a potentially Dangerous Product to the Mass Market.

Our Team of Designers with over 20 years of Experience in producing Electrical Goods for the Majority of the Leading Electronics Companies out there, know how many manufacturers cut corners to minimise production costs. This is why we want to become the benchmark of electronic goods safety and provide a product that is customer orientated.

Our Primary Concern is giving our customers the Best Product possible which means that the Quality and Safety will Not be Compromised.

The Connectros designs have complied with the testing standards requirements for UL, SAA/BS/VDE certification. If there are any unforeseen issues, we will make the necessary modifications so that it can pass all the required tests.

This is one of the areas that we excel in, giving us the confidence that Connectros will pass the tests with flying colors and become a huge success.

Our partner for the Testing & Certification will be DEKRA, a very reputable German company with a huge global network.

DEKRA has already evaluated our Connectros system and has given us an optimistic view on the project outcome.

Connectros is very diverse with many of our separate modules serving its own purpose.  As new things come out OR if you like to see a new section/function for Connectros, let us know! It is our long-term strategy, we aim to add more useful additions and functions to our current Connectros lineup.

How Many Connectros Modules can I Connect Together?

With multiple sockets from one outlet, the key is how how much power you will draw from it. For our Connectros it is Rated at 10A, so you can connect as many modules together as you wish, just as long as the power you draw and its use overall is within 10A you are fine. In any case, we have a Power-Circuit Breaker if more than the rated power is used, Connectros, will simply it cut off power for safety.


Our campaign and why it is important for us?

" Whatever I have done before Connectros has always been done with limitation , no matter how enjoyable the process was. With Connectros, it was a very different story as I was working in a team where we had total control of how the product was designed . For our campaign, we want to see whether Our Beliefs in this Innovative Product can be justified. 

We want to Deliver the Best Product of its kind, in terms of Premium Quality, International Safety and a being bit Special, something not available till now. "

We want to deliver the best product possible of its kind in terms of Premium Quality, International Standard Safety and a little bit of that special something. Something that hasn't been available on the market until now."

Wun Suen - Co Founder of Connectros


How Connectros can be an everyday product for You and Others 


How Connectros Came About?

Connectros's story starts with a Classic : Lets Design the Best Product that we have Knowledge about

Two product designers (Andy & Wun) with very contrasting backgrounds met up one day and as designers do, discussed products. However, unlike the normal conversations that usually ensues like how amazing their product is, how it's going to change the world or how much money they were going to make if it was successful; Andy and Wun took a different turn to ask, what they thought was the million-dollar question. "Why don't companies spend a bit more on quality materials and components so that the end products for the consumers can be much better?"

Andy, being a designer with more than 20 years of experience designing various electrical products throughout his career, saw a gap in the market and said to Wun on a separate occasion "I think I'm onto something special….but it's not finished yet, (a typical designer's pun) but you can come over and take a look at it to give me a second opinion."

What they saw when Wun visited Andy's workshop, was the start of an exciting partnership and the birth of Connectros. His product was not merely a concept design, but a groundbreaking product with a prototype ready and waiting to be tweaked and then mass-produced. Wun was taken aback by the beauty of the product and expressed to him how shocked he was. (in a good way of course)   

Andy said to Wun, "I've been working on a quick release mechanism for a power strip/bar/extension for the past few years and I think I've finally perfected it...and yes, I have filed the design for a patent already."

After analyzing the prototype, more ideas came to mind and they found many ways in which the product could be improved. Initially, the Connectros system only featured Interchangeable Multi-Sockets and Extension Chords, but now they have witnessed the Development of a Cross-Junction Connector, a Night Light and USB Charger as well as customizability in terms of color schemes.

….More products are being lined up!


So what do we have planned for the Perks?

Here it is :



You as Contributors can make a Bigger Change than you think because Only You can decide whether there is a need for Change in Usability, Quality and Safety Reassurance.

There are too many unworthy products on the market with some that are the good, but still cut corners in terms of quality to minimize costs. You, as the general public should make a statement by using a product that says no to compromized safety and cost-cutting. 

By using Connectros as a platform for your everyday power provider, we hope that we can start a movement in making premium quality products for everyone to use. You can make a difference in the way that better quality products are introduced into the market with a strong competative edge in terms of quality and uniqueness. 

Our true goal is to make a product that can honestly be Classified as Premium Quality, more Innovative, Safer by Certification and to provide you (the Pledgers) Live Feedback.



Risks and Challenges

1. Risks

We have worked extremely hard to prepare Connectros for mass production; however, we are still faced with several challenges which include sticking to our planned timeline. As we have a great relationship with our tooling makers and suppliers, I believe that this challenge will be made easier, especially as our collaboration with them has already produced many different products in the past.

Our partners are fully supportive of the Connectros product, which gives us confidence when facing any obstacles as both parties will work hard to ensure that problems are solved swiftly and smoothly so that our manufacturing risks are minimized thus meeting out deadlines.

2. Shipping

Shipping costs will vary depending on the country and their specific location. To reduce the cost of the Connectros system as much as possible and to be fair to our customers, the cost that we are quoted for shipping will be exactly the amount that you will be charged in addition to the cost of the Connectros system. Once the campaign is over, we will send you an email to collect some basic details such as your name and delivery address. Of course, you are free to choose your own option for shipping. However, shipping is another risk which may be out of our control during delivery so it is recommended that we help select the best shipping option for you based on your location. In accordance to your shipping preference, we will charge you the exact costs for the shipment. Please note that we will arrange for shipping only after your payment has been confirmed.

story:
MISSION

LineBot’s mission is to disrupt the service industry by manufacturing inexpensive, easy-to-use, durable robots to run food and drinks to guests.

 

WHAT IS A “RUNNER”?

In restaurant jargon, a “runner” is a specialized type of food server responsible for delivering meals and getting drinks for guests.  In addition to increasing efficiency, they also help to free up the waitperson, so they can focus more on customer service.

 

WHAT IS DRINK RUNNER?

Drink Runner is a line-following service robot that delivers individual drinks in total darkness non-stop for up to 4 hours per charge.  Swarms of them act like a conveyor belt, shuttling drinks along a closed-loop course.

 

WHY GET DRINK RUNNER?

 

3 BUILT-IN PROGRAMS

  • LINE FOLLOWER - Drink Runner delivers drinks on a looped course, like a conveyor belt.
  • MAZE SOLVER - Drink Runner delivers drinks from point-to-point.
  • SPINNER - Drink Runner plays our version of the classic game Spin-the-Bottle. 

 

YOUR PERSONAL BEER BUTLER

Don't miss a second of the game going to the kitchen for a fresh one.   Drink Runner will tirelessly serve you and your friends for up to 4 hours per charge!

 

THE PERFECT ICE-BREAKER

Want an easy way to meet people?  Take Drink Runner to your favorite bar to play Spinner, our version of Spin-the-Bottle.  Everyone will notice you and want to join in!

 

A PRACTICAL DIVERSION

Do you run a bar or restaurant?  When your staff is in the weeds and you see that guests are beginning to get frustrated, send out Drink Runner!  Like Joe’s Crab Shack waiters dancing on tables, Drink Runner will divert your guests’ attention long enough for you to catch up.

 

SELL MORE DRINKS

For business owners, automated drink delivery means a more efficient bar and more drink sales.

Less waiting = more drinking = bigger tabs = better tips.

 

COMPACT

Since it's only 4" wide, Drink Runner can operate on a standard bar top without interfering with guests.

 

QUICK SET UP

To create a closed-loop course, apply ¾” wide black electrical tape to any available flat surface.  Drink Runner will follow it, indoors or out.

 

EASY TO USE

To load and unload drinks, block Drink Runner's path to stop it and remove the obstacle to let it go.  What could be easier?

 

SOFT START / SOFT STOP FEATURE

Drink Runner decelerates smoothly to a complete stop when it detects an obstacle in its path and  accelerates smoothly to full speed once that object has been removed.

 

LONG LIFE

Drink Runner’s 6 AA NiMH batteries power it for up to 4 hours per charge and can be recharged up to 1000 times.

 

NIGHT VISION

Because it sees in the infrared spectrum, Drink Runner can follow a line and detect obstacles in total darkness.  Perfect for dark clubs, bars and restaurants!

 

TEXAS TOUGH

Drink Runner may look delicate, but it’s built for daily use.  Its impact-resistant polycarbonate shell protects it against accidental falls and spilled drinks.

 

FULLY PROGRAMMABLE

Be creative!  Write your own programs using a free Integrated Development Environment (e.g. Atmel Studio 6.0) and install them using an AVR USB Programmer.

 

ABOUT US

LineBot Inc. is an international group of craftsmen, programmers, and engineers who are on a mission to design and manufacture inexpensive, easy-to-use, durable robots for the service industry. 

 

WHERE’S THE MONEY GOING?

  • Tooling
  • Components
  • Assembly
  • Packaging
  • Shipping

 

WHAT'S THE PLAN?

We’ve been working closely with a local injection molding company.  All of our other component suppliers are located in the U.S. and most of them have sufficient parts in inventory to produce 350 units.  Once we reach our goal, we are ready to begin production immediately.  Here are our next steps:

 

  • Activate customer service team and update backers.
  • Begin tooling and update backers.
  • Obtain supplies and packaging and update backers.
  • Stage parts and assembly and update backers.
  • Generate fulfillment tickets and label and update backers.
  • Ship rewards and update backers. 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

SUPPLY CHAIN

We have a sufficient inventory of components necessary to assemble three hundred fifty (350) LineBots and can easily acquire more if demand requires it.  However, there are 2 components which may pose a challenge.

 

BATTERY TRAYS

Drink Runner requires 6 AA NiMH batteries to function.  Prior to operation, the User inserts them into a plastic battery tray inside Drink Runner.  Unless we place a large order for this component, our supplier can’t guarantee he’ll have more than 350 units in inventory.

In the event we need more battery trays, we’ll either rely on another supplier or install a more commonly available battery pack constructed of 6 AA NiMH batteries wired together and shrink-wrapped into a single bundle.

 

INJECTION MOLDS

Having inspected samples manufactured by our injection molding company, we’re satisfied that they produce high quality components.

In the event they produce components which are of substandard quality, we have 2 other firms standing by to produce them for us.  However, this would delay our project by approximately 60 days.

 

FAQs

 

WHAT SIZE DRINKS DOES IT HOLD?

Drink Runner fits most cans, bottles, and glassware.

 

HOW CAN IT CARRY SUCH HEAVY LOADS?

Drink Runner makes carrying drinks look easy, but it has 3 unique features which makes this possible:

 

  • Our custom swivel caster virtually eliminates all third wheel drag.
  • Our custom drive motors are geared to deliver lots of low-end torque.
  • Our perfectly balanced shell and rigid suspension virtually eliminate all roll and pitch.

 

HOW CAN IT FUNCTION IN TOTAL DARKNESS?

Drink Runner’s Line Following and Distance Sensors emit infrared light and then detect that light when it’s reflected back from objects around it.

 

HOW DO I CHARGE IT?

Our custom international Smart Charger will charge Drink Runner’s 6 AA NiMH batteries in about 4 hours.  Before charging, connect the Smart Charger to an AC wall outlet (90V – 260V).  Then, insert its male barrel connector into the DC barrel jack beneath Drink Runner’s tail.  A Red LED will turn on to indicate that it’s charging.  When fully charged, the Green LED will turn on and it will stop charging automatically.

 

HOW DO I PREVENT GUESTS FROM TAKING IT?

We recommend installing a Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) tag in each unit and concealing an RFID Reader and a surveillance camera near each exit.  When a tagged unit leaves your premises, the RFID Reader triggers an alarm and the camera records the event for later prosecution.

 

HOW DO I CREATE A LOOPED COURSE?

First, Locate a smooth, flat, light-colored surface. White is preferable, but not required. Then, using ¾” wide black electrical tape, lay down a continuous line which loops back upon itself.    Avoid creating hard right-angle turns.  Finally, make sure the line passes by an area dedicated to loading drinks, such as a kitchen or service bar.

 

HOW WIDE SHOULD IT BE?

While Drink Runners are only 4” wide, we recommend that you allow 3" of clearance on either side of the line.

 

CAN YOU HELP ME DESIGN A LOOPED COURSE?

Yes.

 

CAN I RUN MULTIPLE DRINK RUNNERS ON THE SAME LOOPED COURSE?

Yes, so long as they are all moving in the same direction.

 

WILL A DRINK RUNNER COLLIDE WITH ANOTHER UNIT?

No.  Drink Runner’s Obstacle Avoidance System would stop it before such a collision could occur.

 

HOW DO I LOAD AND REMOVE DRINKS?

Each Drink Runner has a Distance Sensor which detects objects up to 10cm away (“Obstacle Avoidance System”).  When you place your hand in its path, Drink Runner will stop and turn on its lights.  Once stopped, you may load or remove a drink.  When you remove your hand, Drink Runner will turn off its lights and continue on its way.

 

WHAT HAPPENS IF I SPILL A DRINK ON IT?

In the event of an accidental spill, turn off Drink Runner and wipe off the shell.  Apply Isopropyl alcohol to a clean, dry towel and wipe the shell to remove any residual fluids.  Allow to dry.  DO NOT IMMERSE IN WATER.

 

HOW WILL GUESTS DISTINGUISH ONE UNIT FROM ANOTHER?

If you give each Drink Runner a unique appearance, guests will be able to identify them from a distance.  Since it’s difficult to discern colors in low light, we recommend you use numbers, letters, or symbols.

 

CAN YOU CUSTOMIZE A SET OF DRINK RUNNERS FOR ME?

Yes.  Here are some motifs to choose from:

 

  • 3 - Primary Colors: Red, Green, Blue
  • 3 - U.S. Flag Colors: Red, White, Blue
  • 3 - High Contrast Colors: Red, White, Black
  • 4 - Elements: Earth, Air, Fire, Water
  • 4 - Baseball Diamond: 1st Base, 2nd Base, 3rd Base, Home Plate
  • 4 - Card Suits: Spade, Heart, Club, Diamond
  • 4 - Top Cards: Ace of Spades, King of Clubs, Queen of Hearts, Jack of Diamonds
  • 5 - Sports: Football, Baseball, Basketball, Soccer, Ice Hockey
  • 5 - Zener ESP Testing Cards: Circle, Plus, 3 Wavy Lines, Square, Star
  • 7 - Disney’s 7 Dwarves: Bashful, Doc, Dopey, Grumpy, Happy, Sleepy, Sneezy
  • 7 - Colors of the Visible Spectrum: Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo, Violet
  • 8 - Animal Skins: Tiger, Zebra, Giraffe, Leopard, Dalmation, Peacock, Snake, Crocodile
  • 10 - Bowling Pins
  • 12 - Zodiac Signs
  • 15 - Billiard Balls
  • 16 - Top Cards in All Suits
  • Sports Teams
  • Disney Characters
  • Custom Graphics

 

HOW WILL A GUEST KNOW WHICH DRINK RUNNER IS CARRYING THEIR ORDER?

Once you’ve loaded a drink onto a unit, tell the guest which Drink Runner to look for. 

 

HOW DO I TRACK DRINK DELIVERIES?

When operating multiple units, we recommend appointing an attendant to supervise operations and track drink deliveries.

 

HOW DO I PLAY SPINNER?

  1. Position Drink Runner in the middle of a table.
  2. [Optional] Insert a prize of your choice.
  3. Press the Spinner Button once to select the Spinner Program.
  4. A confirmation tone will acknowledge your selection.
  5. Press this button again.
  6. Another confirmation tone will alert you that Drink Runner is ready to begin.
  7. To begin the game, wave your hand in front of the Distance Sensor.
  8. Drink Runner will emit a confirmation tone and begin spinning.
  9. Drink Runner will spin for 5 – 10 seconds.
  10. Drink Runner will stop and pause for 3 seconds and then turn 90 degrees to the right or left.
  11. The player facing Drink Runner wins!
  12. To end the program, press the Stop Button once.
story_txt:
MISSION
LineBot’s mission is to disrupt the service industry by manufacturing inexpensive, easy-to-use, durable robots to run food and drinks to guests.
 
WHAT IS A “RUNNER”?
In restaurant jargon, a “runner” is a specialized type of food server responsible for delivering meals and getting drinks for guests.  In addition to increasing efficiency, they also help to free up the waitperson, so they can focus more on customer service.
 
WHAT IS DRINK RUNNER?
Drink Runner is a line-following service robot that delivers individual drinks in total darkness non-stop for up to 4 hours per charge.  Swarms of them act like a conveyor belt, shuttling drinks along a closed-loop course.
 
WHY GET DRINK RUNNER?
 
3 BUILT-IN PROGRAMS


LINE FOLLOWER - Drink Runner delivers drinks on a looped course, like a conveyor belt.

MAZE SOLVER - Drink Runner delivers drinks from point-to-point.

SPINNER - Drink Runner plays our version of the classic game Spin-the-Bottle. 
 
YOUR PERSONAL BEER BUTLER
Don't miss a second of the game going to the kitchen for a fresh one.   Drink Runner will tirelessly serve you and your friends for up to 4 hours per charge!
 
THE PERFECT ICE-BREAKER
Want an easy way to meet people?  Take Drink Runner to your favorite bar to play Spinner, our version of Spin-the-Bottle.  Everyone will notice you and want to join in!
 
A PRACTICAL DIVERSION
Do you run a bar or restaurant?  When your staff is in the weeds and you see that guests are beginning to get frustrated, send out Drink Runner!  Like Joe’s Crab Shack waiters dancing on tables, Drink Runner will divert your guests’ attention long enough for you to catch up.
 
SELL MORE DRINKS
For business owners, automated drink delivery means a more efficient bar and more drink sales.
Less waiting = more drinking = bigger tabs = better tips.
 
COMPACT
Since it's only 4" wide, Drink Runner can operate on a standard bar top without interfering with guests.
 
QUICK SET UP
To create a closed-loop course, apply ¾” wide black electrical tape to any available flat surface.  Drink Runner will follow it, indoors or out.
 
EASY TO USE
To load and unload drinks, block Drink Runner's path to stop it and remove the obstacle to let it go.  What could be easier?
 
SOFT START / SOFT STOP FEATURE
Drink Runner decelerates smoothly to a complete stop when it detects an obstacle in its path and  accelerates smoothly to full speed once that object has been removed.
 
LONG LIFE
Drink Runner’s 6 AA NiMH batteries power it for up to 4 hours per charge and can be recharged up to 1000 times.
 
NIGHT VISION
Because it sees in the infrared spectrum, Drink Runner can follow a line and detect obstacles in total darkness.  Perfect for dark clubs, bars and restaurants!
 
TEXAS TOUGH
Drink Runner may look delicate, but it’s built for daily use.  Its impact-resistant polycarbonate shell protects it against accidental falls and spilled drinks.
 
FULLY PROGRAMMABLE
Be creative!  Write your own programs using a free Integrated Development Environment (e.g. Atmel Studio 6.0) and install them using an AVR USB Programmer.
 
ABOUT US

Components
Assembly
Packaging
Shipping

story:
A better experience with ANYPOST

First, Let's show anypost video on Youtube. The Anypost is gift for your friends.


This is definitely a world first.
Be the first to get your hands in the world. 
And we say that you're true early adater!

Anypost is designed to make it easy for people with disabilities to free their hands. 
We spent last two years, where we developed a portable kit for disabled people. 
Anypost is good for playing, working because it leaves both hands free to work. 
It's also good for people with disabilities like those who only have one hand.

  • Multi-function sticky pad with super strong adhesion
  • Portable design to stick your device without shaking and tumbling
  • Clean water to renew stickiness.
  • Made with soft, washable, removable and reusable Pad

One of the features is the slim design.


We're diversifying our designs.  

Let's draft designs.


Package A 'Animal' 

Package B 'Nature' 

Package C 'Robot'

Package D 'Egyptian'

Package E 'Masterpiece'


The key features of Anypost are exactly what we've been looking for.
Anypost allows for hands-free viewing. 
An obvious advantage was keeping yours hands free to work.

This product is famous for its slim design and compatibility.
And it is said that Anypost have more functions.
The Anypost don't leave any sticky marks when you remove it.

A distinctive aspect of Anypost is its ease of use.


We really appreciate your precious time.

After the Indiegogo campaign, 
we’re going to donate a part of the earnings to disabled people.
If you buy it, you can contribute to this campaign.

Please upload review on your Blog, Youtube, SNS. We'll send you a free gift.

story:
What is LoveHub?

LoveHub is a new dating resource app that will help its users manage all aspects of their dating lives, especially those who are communicating/dating more than one person at time. The Love Hub app boasts dozens of features that will enable its users to plan, schedule, and organize their dates. In additional, the app keeps vital dating statistics, including each date’s pro and cons, the places you’ve been with them, the amount of time and money spent, and relationship milestones to name a few. Love Hub is also compatible with existing dating websites and apps.

Dating these days is hectic, complicated, and requires a lot of time and effort. The Love Hub app helps make this often difficult task much, much easier!!! 

  

Features:

    Date Scheduling

       Notifications

       Unique Video & Text Messaging

    Date Suggestions

       Alerts

       Dating Statistics

      Milestone Tracker

       Date Pros & Cons

      Gift Purchasing

...Much much more!


Our Goal

Without your support, the production of the LoveHub App cannot happen. Each contribution goes directly to the app firm tasked with building this groundbreaking dating tool. Upon the successful completion of this campaign, development and production of the app will begin immediately. Our goal is to have the LoveHub App in the marketplace by January 2015. 

    LoveHub Creators

     ANTHONY McLEMORE

    Why did you choose to date online?

    When a relationship I was in for 4 ½ years ended, I found myself facing a new and difficult reality. I’m a 30 something year old professional who spends a lot of time at work, and hates the bar/club scene. Online dating was the only option for meeting a variety of women…quality women.

    What made you create the Love Hub app?

    At this point in my life, finding a wife and having a family is VERY important to me. That's why I approach online dating like job. Like most people, I’m  communicating with multiple people simultaneously. It quickly becomes difficult to manage it all, including planning/scheduling dates, keeping statistics (money spent, pro & cons, etc), keeping reminders, and a whole array of other things those who are dating must juggle.

    How do you think Love Hub will help its users?

    I think Love Hub will definitely help people who live busy lives manage this VERY important aspect of their lives. Because the app also keeps each individual’s vital dating statistics, the Love Hub app will give its users much needed perspective about the people they are dating and allow them to make informed decisions.

     DAVE DOERRE

    Why did you choose to date online?

    I choose to date online because I work from home and I have limited exposure to meeting new people.  The club/bar scene is not where I want to meet ’the one’ so I think most people now feel online dating is a pretty significant tool when it comes to finding love. 

    What made you create the Love Hub app?

    If you’re like me, finding a great partner online is like a job. You’re going to get out of it what you put into it.  I tell people all the time, why not cast a wide net?  Why not increase the odds of finding the one by interacting with multiple dating sites instead of just one.  The problem is the sheer time and headaches it takes to manage such an endeavor.  We set out to create a solution and that’s why we created Love Hub. 

    How do you think Love Hub will help its users?

    People like a single efficient and effective resource for almost all aspects of their lives both professionally and personally….so why not your dating life!  We hope to help people harness the amazing tools of online dating in a a way that increases the chances of finding that special one, while not going crazy in the process.

    Thank You!

    We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. Please share our project through Facebook, Twitter and Google Plus.  We will be happy for any help!

    If you have any questions, comments, or want to simply wish us well, be sure to contact us at contactlovehub@gmail.com

story:
“The tough Doogee S90 has power for days and can see in the dark” -- Digital Trends

“The S90’s chassis blends metal and plastic to deliver an elegant smartphone that should survive more than a few knocks. Rubber reinforcements on the four vertices will mitigate any falls and we applaud Doogee’s decision to add a plastic edge that makes the screen recessed.” -- Tech Radar

“The modules themselves are ridiculously easy to install, and connect gracefully to the phone thanks to a simple magnetic mechanism. There’s surprisingly little faffing about. It works really well.” -- The Next Web

The Doogee S90 simply does more. Its revolutionary module design creates a mobile experience like never before. It all begins with four powerful specialty modules that expand the core functions of a smartphone. With the S90, you can go further, accomplish more, and power your adventures longer.

Snap on Doogee S90 module and enjoy a professional mobile experience you’ve never had before.  

1. Attach the module to the back of S90.

2. Open the APP of the certain module.

3. Enjoy a upgraded S90 experience

The S90 transforms into a professional night vision camera simply by attaching the cam module. The night vision camera module is specially designed to absorb a greater range of light waves and algorithmically optimize them to improve image detail and accuracy. The process makes it possible to capture incredible shots in low light or backlight conditions. 

DOOGEE S90 Night Vision Camera Module VS Normal Smartphone Camera

Power for days. Adding the 5000mAh extra power module instantly turns the S90 into a 10050mAh battery behemoth. It provides enough juice for two-days of non-stop outdoor use without re-charging.

No signal? No problem! Talk to your friends without the need for network coverage, even in remote areas. The S90 intercom module covers a wide range of 400-480MHz frequencies for reliable off-grid communication for outdoor adventure. Never be out of touch.  

Get your game on anywhere, with accurate control, easy installation, and super portability. Add the professional gamepad module for an upgraded mobile gaming experience that includes an ultra-responsive joystick and zero delay buttons to elevate your gaming and help you win.

Just how tough is the S90? It’s designed to meet military specs and operate in the most challenging of outdoor and heavy duty environments. It meets or exceeds MIL-STD-810G specification tests of temperature & transport shocks, humidity, mold, salt spray corrosion, explosive gas, vibration, ballistic shock and more. 

It meets IP68/IP69K water and dust resistance standards and is so tough that it can survive being submerged in 1.5 meters of water for 2 weeks and come out totally unharmed. It is simply the toughest rugged-duty smartphone available today. 

The 6 modules of 29 bands Full Netcom S90 guards you to travel all around the world freely with worldwide 4G coverage and dual SIM compatibility. It’s the ultimate go-anywhere communication solution.  

The S90 equips the concise and sweet Android 8.1 Oreo system, versatile software pack and complete positioning sensors to help you explore further at outdoors.

The S90 is incredibly strong but it’s also super smart. It is powered by a next-generation CPU – the Helio P60 octa-core chipset fabricated in 12nm process and Mali-G72 MP3 GPU clocked at 800MHz. That powerful engine means that the S90 is fast enough to run the most useful apps and the best mobile games and with multi-core AI Processing Unitand NeuroPilot AI technology, S90 is able to deep learn user behaviors and perform facial recognition, scene identification and more advanced features.

Housing 16+8MP dual rear AI cameras, the S90 acts as a smart photographer. The features of user behavior learning, facial recognition and scene identification adjust light and tone intelligently. While the enhanced multi-frame noise reduction, depth of field and various filters even offer the best stunning masterpiece in all environments. 

The convenient NFC (Near Filed Communication) leads a smarter life style for users. Fast data switching, mobile payment, electronic ticketing or access control all can be achieved in an instant on the DOOGEE S90, making life easier and quicker.

With the support of 10W wireless charging, the S90 has faster power recovery. The big battery and rapid charging speed are mutually reinforcing to speed up the pace of boring recharging period.

DOOGEE's supply chain team have more than 10 years’ experience to ensure high quality for all the components. We have experience to manufacture and deliver millions of DOOGEE phones to countries and regions all over the world. 

In March 2013, DOOGEE was set up in Spain, which contributes to bring high performance products to the global market, with beautiful design and features, Smart operation, and “micro-innovation”. DOOGEE always transmits enthusiasm and positive attitude towards life, focusing on improving user experience and bringing people more convenience and joy.

DOOGEE’s new slogan is “Live Your Life”. By delivering fashionable products with new technology, DOOGEE is targeting to be the most popular smartphone supplier in the world.

See How Users Are Using  S90‘s Predecessors

Test unkillable monster! DOOGEE S80

S70 Gamepad Test

story:
Thin Soft-Touch Waterproof High-Capacity 8000mAh Portable USB Power Bank
Powerful External Battery for iPhone, Android, iPads, Laptops, Cameras and More!

About Four Times More Use Time on Your Phone!
& Made Using Eco-Freindly Materials!

People can contribute to my campaign by buying one or more power banks Currently I offer two styles - a stylish electric lime green fabric or an elegant white leatherette. Both are eco-friendly synthetics offering waterproof protection. Many design innovations on this unit translate to a really nice feel in the hand and in the pocket in addition to functionality. Besides just contributing for the fun of it, you can buy a $1 'perk' which essentially is a vote on the future colors and materials they would like to see in our upcoming models. We really look forward to this kind of feedback and will rely on it in our product development work.

Playful & Unique!
Early-Bird Discount Perks!

This is an exciting line of external battery packs. Commonly called "power-banks," a digital user can garner longer use times on their devices. The format of my campaign is essentially a pre-sale. My campaign is designed to give me an accurate order count while simultaneously funding manufacturing. I am very excited about this sales format that indiegogo makes available because it's a step closer to real-time manufacturing. With indiegogo, I can directly match customer orders to production quantity. This affords me tremendous business flexibility while at the same time minimizing the exposure of my capital to risk related to purchase quantity decisions.

Two Synthetic Exterior Material Option Perks
  • Electric Lime Green Fabric
  • Elegant White Leather

Features

  • IPX65 Waterproof & Dust Proof
  • High-Capacity, 8000mAh Power
  • Drop Resistant, Not East to Break
  • Nice & Smooth in any Breast Pocket
  • Utilizes Eco-Friendly PU Material Exterior
  • Thin - 1/2 Inch Width
  • Long Lifespan - Over 500 [Charge/ Drain] Cycles!
  • Safe Recyclable Lithium-Ion Polymer Battery Inside
  • Will Hold Main Charge Even After 2-3 Months!

8 Levels of Protection - Prevents

  • Over Current - Will Not Transfer Power to Quickly
  • Over Voltage - Ensures Voltage Flow is Stable
  • Over Charge - Will Stop Charging Your Device When Charging is Full
  • Short Circuit - Will Not Short Circuit
  • Over Heating - Requires Initial 12 Hours to Charge Yet Will Not Get Hot
  • Over Powering - Will Stop Re-Charging Itself When Battery Capacity is Full
  • Discharging - Will Hold Charge
  • Internal Explosion - Due to Internal Protection Circuit
Single Unit Perk Includes
  • Thin (.5") 8000mAh Soft-Touch Waterproof Power Bank (6.3" x 3.3" x .5")
  • USB Terminal Plug in Matching Color
  • Instructions
  • One-Year Warranty

The campaign will be complete on March 15th. Then, we will finalize manufacturing and ship to our contributor-customers. Pending sales volume, we will begin fulfilling orders in batches before the campaign is over. We hope this campaign will be wildly successful, growing, and shared. We are planning for all customer deliveries to take place up to one month after the campaign closes.

I am raising funds primarily as a personal business venture. My goal is to generate income for my family. Long-term, this project is a stepping-stone for my real passion- a crowd-funded vehicle manufacturing company.

My background is in industrial design. I am passionate about exploring new technologies, developing new ideas, and bringing unique and fresh designs to the marketplace. This is my first crowd-funded campaign, involving social media, and in many ways a 'testing ground' for what I hope will be many future projects. 

Please Contribute By Buying Yours Today & Share!

Tuvyah Schleifer, Product Developer

story:
What is SEENIXX ?

SEENIXX is a small  access point to protect your privacy.
SEENIXX encrypts all your internet traffic.
SEENIXX have a constant connectivity to the Tor network.
SEENIXX hides all your private traffic information.

  • nobody can see where you are from
  • nobody can see what kind of browser do you use
  • nobody can see where you been before
  • nobody can see what kind of computer do you use
SEENIXX route the whole Internet traffic to protect your privacy.
SEENIXX connect all your devices like PC/MAC-Phone-Tablet.
SEENIXX is your guard, he will tell you all about your connection.

Why SEENIXX ?

SEENIXX is the easy way to protect your privacy. It's a small device you only
have to plug in  your PC , Mac, Linux Computer or directly in to your old router.
You will have a new and clever access point to protect your privacy.


The Hardware

  1. 600Mhz ARM11 Prozessor

  2. 128 MB Flash RAM

  3. 512 MB RAM

  4. Wifi IEEE 802.11 b/g/n


The Software

The device run with a small linux version and the TOR kernel.


How SEENIXX works ?



SEENIXX based on a small and low Power Applications Processor .
SEENIXX includes a small router WIFI device as well and can be use as an access point for all your devices like your Phone or Tablet. 

After you plug in SEENIXX in your Computer SEENIXX is booting ( it takes about 20 seconds) .

After the install is finished the Software ask you if you want to use SEENIXX as an access point. Answer with YES and thats it. Easy or?  If you only want to use your notebook where you run SEENIXX press NO.

Now you can connect  all your devices with the SEENIXX WLAN and browse safe in the Internet over the TOR-Network.


If a new Software version is available you will see this screen. Press Update
and the new Version will be installed.



The LED on the SEENIXX Stick will show you that you are connected with Tor and
that the access point work well.


Who are we ?

We are 2 people with backgrounds in internet security , software development
and hardware design.


What is the retail price of SEENIXX ?

$59.99 (Shipping not included)

    WHY INDIEGOGO ? Why we need you?

    After 4 months of development and testing the Product we are ready to share it with you. We are not a big company that has unlimited resources, just two people. With your support we want to produce and distribute SEENIXX and make it available for you and many people.

    Why we need your help?


    1. Production Tooling
    2. Design the packaging
    3. Firmware Refinement
    4. We want to produce more color of SEENIXX and design a new shape.
    5. We want to deliver in January 2014


    Perks for your help....

    For your support you will get a unique unit to protect your privacy.
    Choose your perk!

    Thank you very much for your help!

    The SEENIXX TEAM



    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

    • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
    • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
We want to bring an alternative to a market that is full of overly feminized apps that try to focus around pregnancy and family planning, without any consideration of people who just want to track their cycles or even use it to avoid getting pregnant.

Our app was created by a small team of developers who collaborate on our sex education website, Sexmind.com. 

In sexmind, we believe that diversity is essentially good, and we want to offer products and services that embrace this idea (just like our website!), we are always open to include, adapt and improve our products so that they can be used by the largest amount of people we can, that way we can help people that are usually not considered just because they are not a part the biggest demographic.

We have the skills, and we are more than eager to start this project, but we need your help to make Mcalc for Apple devices a reality.

Here´s how we plan to invest the funds we raise:

  • 40% of the funds will pay for the actual development of the app, the collaborators were kind enough to work for a low fee just so that we can make the goals of this app become achievable.
  • 10% of the funds will go to advertising the app, even after reaching over 60.000 users with our viral campaign, we know there are other users who don´t know about Mcalc and that could benefit from its services.
  • 30% of the funds will be used to pay our medical and social consultants, this way we can make our app more reliable and have more backup from several doctors and psychologists. 
  • 20% of the remaining funds will be used to pay the assorted fees we may stumble along the way, such as licences for the software and legal consultancy.

What happens if we don´t reach our main goal?

If that happens, we will still use any of the funds we gather to improve our current version of Mcalc for android, we may still try to find other funding sources to develop the IOS version, but it will take several months before we can even start to develop it without the help of the online community.

What features will Mcalc have in the future?

Aside from the current features our beta app already has (which you can read more about them by clicking here ) We will include the following additions:

  • FAM/NFP support: Currently our app uses an extended rhythm method developed by Dr. Juan Aller, a Venezuelan Gynecologist who was kind enough to let us use his approach to this formula to create our app, The Mcalc pro version will be rebuilt from the ground up, and we will add support for the Fertility Awareness method that is more reliable for tracking and predicting since it takes basal mucus and body temperature into consideration.
  • More tracking options: We want to make our calendar support more daily inputs, adding a Mood tracker as well as more specific tracking options for each day.
  • Neutral mode: We are already working on the "Neutral mode" on our android version, and we want to include this as well on the following upgraded versions.
  • More Informational pages: we want to make beautiful infographics for our informational pages, we understand that visual language is easier to understand, and thanks to the current technology, information has never been so colorful. We want to add many infographics on our app regarding menstrual cycles and contraception

Why is this so important?

There is a large amount of people in the world who do not identify with the traditional conception of gender, or who don´t express their gender in the same way as others. A gender neutral app like Mcalc is the perfect alternative for people who menstruate and have a hard time using overly feminized apps, or simply, for people who don´t want their tracking app to assume their gender and their sexual orientation. Aside from that, Mcalc helps to promote the inclusion of the LGBTQA community in the app market , joining plenty of other apps that have been supportive from the start.

We have already worked in collaborative projects in the past, our own website, sexmind.com is an example of that, it started out as a simple sexual enciclopedia and it has grown to be a bigger site that offers more services than just a space to publish sex education articles. We hope we can get Mcalc to grow into a better app with the help of the online community.

We pay very special attention to our users, we don´t have any external investors and we don´t want to. We think you are our main investor, so your feedback is the one that matters most. If you think of any way we can improve our app or if you want to collaborate in any way you can think of, you can contact us at info.sexmind@gmail.com

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate, it doesn't mean you can't help. We need all the exposure we can, so if you can signal boost our campaign on your blog, tumblr, twitter, facebook, or any social media site you are in, you would be making us and everyone who wants this app for their device, a huge favor.

Who is behind this project?

We are a very small group of designers web developers business designers and internet junkies that work from different parts of the world. Even if our headquarters are located in Barcelona, Spain, we consider ourselves a very international team we are all quite excited to be involved in similar projects since 2011 and we are very enthusiastic about creating a good app that can help people with their sexual health.

When will pledge rewards be fulfilled?

As soon as the countdown finishes we will start the fulfillment process.
