story:
The Switch AVM has been created to solve the problem of the need to remove hands from the keyboard to answer or use mobile or tablet apps: chat messages (Whatsapp, line...), emails, SMS, Internet, search-engines, Facebook, Twitter...

El Switch AVM ha sido creado para solucionar el problema de tener que levantar las manos del teclado del ordenador para contestar a los Whatsapps, correos, sms y otras notificaciones que nos llegan al teléfono móvil o Tableta. Haciendo posible utilizar el ratón y el teclado de tu ordenador de sobremesa con tu teléfono móvil o tableta.

Switch Specs

  • Size/Tamaño: 50x42x25mm
  • Weight/Peso: 100g
  • Compatibility/Compatibilidad: iOS and Android
  • USB connectors: 1 for the PC, 1 for your Mobile/tablet, 2 x External devices (Keyboard, Mouse, Pen-Drive, External Hard Disk)
  • Accesories: Android or Apple wire (you can select in your perk)

Explanation Diagram

You will be able to type with the same Desktop PC Keyboard and Mouse with your computer and devices (mobiles and tablets) only pushing the Switch AVM button. For Apple devices is only possible to use the keyboard at the moment.

Lo único que tendrás que hacer para que tu teclado y ratón funcionen con tu dispositivo es pulsar el botón del Switch AVM. Para dispositivos Apple no es posible usar el ratón, pero si el teclado que es el objetivo principal del Switch AVM.

Additionally, we are working to improve the Switch AVM (For the first version, indiegogo one) to add the functionality of Switch between devices with a combination of keys, eg: CTRL + 1 to control PC and CTRL + 2 to use one of your devices, at the same time we are thinking in the people that have more devices at the same time.

Se esta trabajando para que se posible el conmutar el teclado y ratón no solo con el botón del Switch AVM sino también con combinaciones del mismo teclado como serían CONTROL + 1 para manejar el Ordenador de sobremesa y CONTROL + 2 para controlar el dispositivo enchufado al Switch AVM.

Design


Other Uses:

The Switch AVM also allows you to share files between your PC and your device using a pen-drive or external hard disk as intermediary as well as your SD reader and other USB devices...

 El Switch AVM también te permite intercambiar ficheros entre tu ordenador y tu móvil, puesto que puedes conectar al Switch una memoria USB o un disco duro, copiar de tu ordenador los ficheros a estos, y después haciendo clic en el Switch podrás ver el contenido de la memoria USB desde tu dispositivo móvil.

Also it is possible to share your gamepad between your PC and your device only pushing the Switch AVM button and play with your gamepad with your Android and iPhone games.

También es posible utilizar tus mandos de juegos USB con tu dispositivo móvil simplemente conectándolo al Switch AVM.




The Switch AVM allows to charge the device all the time

El Switch AVM estará cargando tu dispositivo móvil/tablet en todo momento, por lo cual puede ser usado para cargar el móvil y tableta.


Specs Universal Holder / Soporte

  • Size: 100x100x160mm
  • Weight: 350g
  • Compatibility: All SmartPhones and Tablets
The Universal Holder has been designed to charge your devices and at the same time it is possible to read it and to interact with them. It has an space in the bottom holders to be accessible the iPad and iPhone central buttons. You can place your devices in portrait or landscape position.

El Soporte universal ha sido diseñado para ser compatible con casi todos los dispositivos móviles, ideal para poder ver si te escriben, leer y además utilizarlo con tu Switch AVM, para poder ver lo que escribes con tu teclado gracias al Switch AVM.

Perfect for Skype and FaceTime videocalls

And Designed Carefully


I hope this perfect couple improve your productivity and the way to interact with your devices.

Espero que esta pareja de Switch AVM y soporte mejore tu productividad y la forma de trabajar en la oficina tal y como ha mejorado la mía.

TimeLine

The first units will be delivered in February 2014.
Las primeras unidades esta prevista su distribución en Febrero de 2014.

story:
Short Summary

The Friye (Friend In Your Ear) Platform was designed to give people who know how-to do things a residual income by sharing their special knowledge.

Friye Is Different (Than The Other How-To’s) - We use 21st Century technologies to provide voice activated, ad free, flexible, entertaining, audio instructions one-step-at-a-time, in-your-ear. The other how-to guys are using antiquated schoolbook teaching methodology, shoved into todays technology. Video how-to providers do not give any way to navigate through the steps. None of them are hands-free and none of them are ad-free. Like GPS, Friye focuses on step-by-step audio instructions, and a Friye can include videos, pictures and other media to make each step as clear as possible.




A Friye Is:

  • Step by Step audio instructions on how-to complete a specific task or project.
  • Delivered in the FriyeCooks voice (but not required)
  • Accompanied by pictures, video, graphics and other media (but not required)
  • Usually has an ingredients list (but not required)
  • Asks questions and evaluates the answers (but not required)
  • Can branch into different instructions based on different answers
  • Can drill down from general to specific as directed by the FriyeCook
  • Has unlimited number of steps
  • Has unlimited number of questions
  • Has unlimited number of answers to those questions
  • Can be created in almost any language
  • Can be used in almost any language
The FriyeCooks will be able to make friyes from the depths of their creativity with the purpose of creating experiences for those who choose to use them. We are so excited to see what the world will do with this tool without borders. 


Calling All FriyeCooks!

Are you a FriyeCook? Friyes are created by FriyeCooks, people just like you, who share their specific knowledge of how to do something through this platform. Friyes can then be sold in the FriyeStore to others who need that knowledge, creating income for the FriyeCooks. It is our desire that Friye will allow thousands of people to create an income for themselves by helping millions of people all over the world get the information they need. If you have knowledge on how to do things and want to be one of the first to give that knowledge to the world through the Friye Platform, look at the rewards to the right that have the ► chevron. Those are special rewards for up-and-coming FriyeCooks.

Monetize Your Knowledge: Be the FriyeCook™ For Your Specific Niche. You can establish yourself as the FriyeCook for your area of expertise. There are literally thousands of specific markets that can be tapped by making friyes:

  • Home Improvement
  • Auto Repair
  • Landscaping
  • Cooking
  • Outdoor Activities
  • Education
  • Home Repair
  • Dating
  • Assembly of molecular deconstruction linear accelerator devices

You Get The Picture – Thousands of Friye niches are waiting to be serviced!





Friye Has Three (3) Major Applications:


The Friye App
Where People
Use Friyes

The FriyeStore
Where People
Purchase Friyes

The FriyeMaker
Where FriyeCooks
Create Friyes

The Friye App

This phone/tablet/computer application uses primarily a conversational interface where the user communicates the commands to the application with simple English (or whatever language).  When the application hears the word "friye" it evaluates what comes after it for a command.  If the user wants to go to the next step, he will say "Friye Next".  Friye also looks for synonyms as well like "Friye start over" is the same as "Friye go back to the beginning". 

The Structure of a Friye is generally step by step instructions. At any time, the FriyeCook can make the friye ask a question and depending on the answer, decide on what path a friye might go. For instance: If someone is using a friye to set up a new Blu-ray player, the friye might start by asking if they have an HDMI cable or an RCA Cable.The friye will perform a different set of steps depending on the verbal response.

Social Responsibility. At the beginning of each friye there will be positive uplifting message from celebrities and famous figures from around the world. We want to empower people in many ways and this will add to cultural diversity in a creative and on-going way.

Many of our perks contain the “Immortalize Yourself” reward. Like the celebrities, this is your way to have your message heard forever. You record a 3-6 second message saying something positive and uplifting that you would want to say to someone starting a friye; such as: “This is Wen Boley saying, you are creating your reality, make it a good one." This message will be put into the rotation of messages that will be heard by whomever uses Friye. Your positive inspiration could be heard for generations to come!

Are we using AI? Even though the Friye application is conversational, we are not using artificial intelligence. Our proprietary methodology of determining what to ask and how to determine answers is simple, elegant, requires less code to operate, requires less data to be transmitted, and gives the user a more consistent experience.

The Audio Component The current prototype requires the user to push a button to speak but when the new version is complete, we plan to have the application listen continuously while the user is engaged with it.

The UI is simple and consistent in every friye, so the Friyer (user) knows what to expect every time they begin a step or project.


Translation Matrix The Friye app is also tied to a translation matrix that will allow friyes to be created in just about any language and then used in just about any other language. 

Friyes are Yours and Yours alone.  And we think it is important that you can use the friyes you purchase on any device. Your account uses your name and voice print as your username and password. When you purchase a friye, it’s your forever and cannot be transferred or used by others. Voice print identification is how we give people the fairest access and provide the best security.

The Friye Store

The Friye store will be a business model similar to other content models where the application is free, but the content that plays through the application may or may not cost money. Of course we will have a place where users can browse through Friye categories with many different ways to discover what they can do with the application, but because we are a conversational application, friyes will usually be found through searches. Searching is unique with Friye as it is usually initiated through the conversational command “Friye, How do I” or “Friye, I want to” ... The work is then done on the back end bringing the information to the user by letting them know what is available and how much it costs.

The Friye Maker

The Friye Creation Application makes the friye creation experience as easy as possible without sacrificing the ability to make a complex set of instructions. A FriyeCook has at his disposal, an infinite number of ingredients, steps, questions, answers to those questions, synonyms to the answers, branches the path can go, and so on.  We believe in giving our creators infinite resources to be as complete as possible.

    No Advertising?

    Our CEO, Wen Boley says, "With Friye, we have the ear of millions. That is an awesome opportunity and a tremendous responsibility." Our business model is to derive revenue from the sale of content. There are enough ways people can receive advertising information in the world. When it’s time to focus on a project and get something completed, you want to be encouraged, not distracted. 

    Risks & Challenges

    The biggest risk and challenge we have is time. This is an awesome idea whose time has come. Even though our branding is solid and we have an exceptional marketing team, those with deeper pockets could beat us to the punch. By initiating this campaign, we’ve tipped our hand to the world. With a phone/web application, patents and intellectual property can only go so far. We must act quickly and capture the market if we are to become the “Kleenex” of the How-To marketplace.

    We have the executive team in place and resources to find all the right people to hire to make this happen quickly, we just need the funding required to pay them appropriately. We fit nicely into the criteria of many tech funds, and have already talked to several funders that are interested in putting the big money in that we will need for the marketing, so we are confident that when we are ready to launch the big money will be there to take us to the world.

    There is also a lot of well-established competition in the How-To market and though they have not addressed their responsibility with “New World” eyes like we have, they have done a great job in gathering information. We feel these sites are not competition at all, but future partners who can utilize our tool in concert with their own to offer expanded service to their customers. If we come to them with a generous attitude (which we have in abundance in our company) we will be able to create one big happy How-To family.


    Lets Grow The Status-Quo


    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't make a monetary contribution, we'd love it if you could help us spread the word on your social networks. The share buttons on our campaign work great and you can also use the press images and links on our website. 

    You are appreciated! Thank you so much!

story:
From September internet shopping is set for a seismic change.

Touted already as a worldwide internet game-changer, haveyouseen allows people to earn money when their friends or connections buy a product or service recommended by them.

The unique site will launch in the UK on 11th September at an event in London attended by celebrities, business leaders, online influencers and the world’s press. 

Retailers pay out billions of pounds every year to shopping websites through affiliate fees. Now for the first time, haveyouseen will enable that money to go direct to the individual recommending the product.

            

Managing Director of haveyouseen, Ben van Rooyen, explained: “Every hour in the UK thousands of people recommend a product or service to a friend. From fashion to tech, holidays and more, we send links to products we know our friends will want to see or buy. The retail industry refers to this as ‘social shopping’.

“What many people don’t realise is that retailers are happy to reward advocates and pay a fee or commission for any resulting sale. Put simply haveyouseen enables everyone to make money from their recommendations.

“We believe our service will empower shoppers like never before – and enable them to get the cash rewards that readily exist and that they deserve.”

The platform has the backing of more than 2500 big-name retailers with more joining every day.

                                            

Charities can also benefit from haveyouseen, with the option of users directing rewards to any charitable organisation of their choice.


Stretch Goal 1 - £3000


Stretch Goal 2 - £5000


But no matter how much you're able to help, our mascot @PennieThePoodle will be forever grateful!

story:
Thank to this campaign I have Good News; I excited to share with you that some Key factors started to show interest in Conkey. This can be a Game Changer!

Hi everybody !!!

Result of positive development, we preceded the prototype schedules so we already started the final preparation to produce it.

We strongly believe in Conkey and very determined to make it happened and start producing. 

To Achieve this, we intend to re-launching the campaign and present the prototype in the coming few weeks.

In addition we brought improvements in planning ‘ Conkey’, the cable will be detachable and can be replaced more colors.

To thank the contributors who contribute in this stage of the campaign, they will be given a gift of more cable set color of their choice.




My name is Yud, I'm the founder of Conkey. I am more than believe that Conkey is the next thing in smartPhone charger. I invested a lot of time and efforts on Conkey, and I am motivated to bring Conkey to mass production and make it available for all.

** Help spread the word about this campaign  Click here to share by Facebook

Thank you!!


What is ?

Conkey is a cool and smallest wall charger that has everything you need to charge your device and to save data - anytime and anywhere.

Conkey has a folding power plug, Internal Li-ion Backup battery (300mAh), built-in cables for charging and data transferring and also internal SD card.

All this in a very compact and smart design that can be attached to your keychain.


Conkey Built-in features


 

* Conkey will be available in Rounded / Flat / Square pins.

  Countries compatibility list  




Why  

Today, the notion that we might get stuck without a battery sometimes forces us to carry a bulky cargo and a cumbersome cables that are not comfortable to carry... Moreover, we sometimes carry a backup battery and a portable memory card, just to be prepared for any trouble...

All these products provide a partial solution only, both in terms of functionality and size and mobility comfort.

But not anymore!! All you need from now on is Conkey - a smart and compact packaging that contains everything.

All this in a very compact and smart design that can be attached to your keychain.




  So small 

Conkey size is less then car remote. 

Conkey is to be with, and feel without… It doesn't only contain everything, it's also so small that you can hook it to your keychain and have it with you every day, everywhere…





These are the colors we had in mind. If you have any advice and idea, we will be more than happy to hear from you.

* At the end of our campaign, we will contact you about your preferred color.


Compact and Unique design

Although Conkey is so small, it contains all the solutions of charging and saving data wherever you go.

A Wall charger, a cable of charging and data, a backup battery and even a portable memory card. All this in one product that is smaller than a car's remote control.

Conkey has a unique design of easily folding elements for maximum comfort.

Conkey is to be with, and feel without......



Data Cable 

Backup battery 

Charging Cable



Easy Fastening cables

When we designed Conkey, we took into consideration the convenience of opening and shutting quickly in one swift motion, therefore, we chose a solution of flat cables that fold in a smooth motion. But that's not all of it, we broke it down to the tiniest details... It's also very important to us that the cable lock will be handled easily, so we chose a unique solution of quick and swift magnetic lock, utilizing a special rear heart neodymium magnet. 



Features


Which device Conkey supports?
Conkey is compatible with most of the devices that are in the market. It comes in two versions:


Lightning connector:   Used in the new generation of iPad ,iPod , iPhone with                                                          lightening connector. Starting from models:  iPhone5, the                                                    fifth-generation iPod touch, the seventh-generation iPod                                                      nano, the fourth-generation iPad,  iPad mini                                                                               and up

                                         Lightning compatibility list

microUsb :                        Used in the most common smartphone and tablets in the                                                      market. Used in brands like Samsung, Lg, Htc , Sony ,                                                          Motorola etc.

                                             MicroUsb phones compatibility list 

With Conkey you will never run out of  battery again!,  Today you can find a USB port or Electrical outlet anywhere.

In any case! You have your backup battery.


Status of the project & next stage

You will be the first to receive Conkey at a price significantly lower than the future retail price. We hope that you will like Conkey and we will stand by to answer your questions and will be happy to hear your suggestions.

* we are very optimistic that we meet this time table.


Risks and Challenges

We have been working intensively for more than 5 months developing Conkey and getting it ready to make it happen. From our experience we know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and have great partners ready to start. However, we know that before mass production begins, we may encounter some problems. We have plans to mitigate all the risks and have enlisted great advisors that will also help

- Development:

From our experience as employees in various hi-tech fields, we were exposed to different minimization solutions. When we developed and designed Conkey We used this experience so that Conkey will be based on existing solutions, what make it applicable and possible to manufacture.

Now we have reached the stage where we are ready to start, but we need your help.

- Prototype:

We have successfully completed the development of the electronic part, including the  electronic prototype. In addition, as you can see, we completed the product definition and its mechanical workings. 

To move the product to the final production stages, we are required to produce a fully prototype with all the mechanical assembly to ensure that no further mechanical improvements are required.

To show the greatness of the solution Conkey brings, we use photo illustration.

We understand the importance that the final product will look as similar as possible to the displayed charger and we will be sure to make any effort to get there.

After testing our prototype, you will be informed of every step of the development.


How could you help?

Even if you are not in the position to fund us, we will appreciate it if you will be kind enough to share it (using the share buttons under the video) with your friends and family. This will help lot to spread out the word about this campaign.


reportcrowd


About

I am  engineer with 12 years of extensive experience in hi-tech project development and management. During my work, I have been exposed to different areas and acquired a professional experience in leading products from design to production. In my line of work, I have established relationships with professionals and leading suppliers.

I am the entrepreneur and designer of Conkey and have been working with a body of professionals, all that to bring about the realization of that project.


Thank you!



FAQ's

Here are the questions more frequently asked!

Feel free to leave a comment or email us at Conkey4u@gmail.com

we will update FAQ  according yours common comments during all campaign life.

1.  what’s the capacity of the internal battery?

     The capacity is 300mh (Significant capacity), . We are looking for bigger                        capacity that meet our shape requirements.

 2.  what is the output current of Conkey?

      Conkey is a fast charger, the output current is 2A.

3.  Which countries Conkey support?

     Conkey supports most countries!

    Conkey available in Rounded & Flat pins & Square 

     Countries list  Supported

4.  Does Conkey compatible with iPhone 4?

      No. Conkey compatible with iPhone 5 and up.

     Conky also compatible with new generation of iPad and iPod with lightening                connector. iPhone 5, the fifth-generation iPod touch, the seventh-generation             iPod nano, the fourth-generation iPad, and the new iPad mini and up

    (Coney also compatible with devices with microUsb connector.)

 5.  How can i choose Conkey color, power plug type and connector type                   (microUsb, lightening) 

       we will contact you by E-mail at the end of campaign to choose  the connector            that work for your device

6.  What is the size of the memory card?

      The standard memory of Conkey is 16G, bigger memory may  be                                       vailable, depend       of the demand.

7. Do we have to purchase again in the new campaign?

 

    The next campaign, you will not have to contribute again.

    This is a continuation of the current campaign.

    Your details will be stored in our system for future contact.

8. If I forgot the 10$ shipment addition, what should I do?
     you can pay now or wait and pay next-campaign of your choice.

Hi everybody !!!

started the final preparation to produce it.
We strongly believe in
Conkey and very determined to make it happened and start producing.

intend to re-launching the campaign and present the prototype in the coming few
weeks.
In addition we brought
improvements in planning ‘ Conkey’, the cable will be detachable and can be
replaced more colors.
To thank the contributors
who contribute in this stage of the campaign, they will be given a gift of more
cable set color of their choice.

name is Yud, I'm the founder of Conkey. I am more than believe that Conkey is the

Why  


Today, the notion that we might get stuck without a battery
sometimes forces us to carry a bulky cargo and a cumbersome cables that are not
comfortable to carry... Moreover, we sometimes carry a backup battery and a
portable memory card, just to be prepared for any trouble...
All these products provide a partial solution only, both in
terms of functionality and size and mobility comfort. 
But not anymore!! All you need from now on is Conkey - a
smart and compact packaging that contains everything.
All this in a very compact and smart design that can be
attached to your keychain.









  So small 


Conkey size is less then car remote. 

Conkey is to be with, and feel without… It doesn't only contain everything, it's also so small that you can hook it to your keychain and have it with you every day, everywhere…

story:
Short Summary

Our website at http://www.cheapsubliminals.com sells subliminal mp3s. Subliminal messages are a form of hypnosis which can be used to bring positive change into anyone's life. Subliminal mp3s reprogram your unconscious or subconscious mind which allows you to make lasting changes to your thoughts, habits, and behaviour to dramatically improve your life, and help you to achieve your goals much easier.

The website needs a lot of enhancements to become more attractive. Our project is to create a new catalogue of subliminal mp3s and have more than 300 titles once our new website launches.

We also want to develop a new mobile application for both android and apple devices. At this stage we do not want to give too much information about the mobile application as there are none which are similar available at the moment and we want to be the first to develop and distribute it.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need $5,000, if we reach this goal we will spend them as follow:

  • $1,000 will be used to produce the new titles of our catalogue and to redesign our website including all graphics and content.
  • $1,000 will be used for advertisement
  • $3,000 will go towards developing the new mobile application

To help us achieve our goal we will give you coupons to use at our website up to 5 times the value of the contribution made.

You can help us our with as little as $1

Don't have any money? No problem.

Help spread the word on Twitter and Facebook. Tell your friends, your neighbors, tell everyone about this new project.

story:
**IMPORTANT**

NOT ONLY DO WE NOT NEED THIS MONEY, WE ENCOURAGE YOU TO NOT DONATE UNLESS YOU ARE SURE! We do not need this money. there is enough money in the kitty to keep us running for months. we have recieved bad press recently for making money from this, what people dont understand is that we have touched none of it. we pay the admins, and run the cost of the server, and the rest goes to a kitty we will use when donations stop! Whether you believe that or not is your choice, but thats what happens :) 

Currently there is enough money in the kitty to last us, if the donations STOP NOW, another: 5 months.

AFTER DONATING, PLEASE LEAVE YOUR INGAME NAME AND PREFERRED GUN IF APPLICABLE IN THE COMMENTS TAB!!! WE CAN NOT PUT GUNS OR ANY OTHER ITEMS IN BACKPACKS!

We have been required to introduce a cost to perk changes for two reasons. one, because it takes a fair amount of time to remake a perk, and two, it is easier for us to keep track of who has what, and the extra need to keep records of how many changes have been made etc.


you can NOT spawn with any of the following:

1. items in BAGS

2. repair equipment (tyres, fuel etc)

3. rpgs, satchel charges, grenades or smoke grenades

4. radio

5. bags any larger than Alice size

6. any form of machine gun


IF YOU DONATE, the procedure for spawning with weapons is as such:

step 1; create a new character

step 2; once logged in, log out within 25 minutes of creating the character, and wait at the lobby for 1 minute

step 3; log back in, once logged in, you will have your weapons and will spawn at your vehicle location (if you have that perk)

step 4; if this does not work, repeat. if it still does not work, contact krauterz or mancow ingame or on teamspeak.
step 5; DONATORS CAN NOT CHANGE THEIR PERKS ONCE THE ORIGINAL REQUEST HAS BEEN PROCESSED!

**DONATION PERK RULES**

*1 DO NOT TELL ANYONE THE LOCATION OF VEHICLES!

*2 no deliberate trolling, or exploiting. this includes using vehicles that you have not got the perk access to use

*3 NO SPAWN CAMPING. it is ok to sit in capitals and murder innocents, but give them a change to get out of the city first..

*4 NO WASTING VEHICLES. dont crash one helicopter into 8 others..


*5 TRY NOT TO ADD TOO MANY VEHICLES TO THE GAME! take a chopper to a capital, but HIDE IT WELL. OR imobilize it.

*6 AND FINALLY, DONT DEATHMATCH OR SHOOT OTHERS AT PERK LOCATIONS!!! it takes up to 10 minutes to respawn there each time. please dont do it! DOING IT WILL RESULT IN A ONE DAY BAN, second warning is removal of perks for 2 days, third warning is permenant removal of perks.

*7 WE OFFER FULL REFUNDS FOR DONATIONS FOR ONLY 48 HOURS. AND ONLY IF PLAYER GIVES A RELIABLE REASON FOR THEIR REFUND REQUEST! THIS IS A DONATION SYSTEM! NOT A PAY TO RECEIVE SYSTEM!

**DONATING ACCEPTS THESE RULES. BREAKING RULES MAY RESULT IN SUSPENSION OF PERKS, REMOVAL OF PERKS AND DEPENDING ON THE MAGNITUDE OF THE INCIDENT, BANS MAY BE APPLIED**

Short Summary

ZUST is the most popular Day-Z sanctuary (private hive) server currently running. Funding is running well, the server is stable and we do not need any donations. however, due to popular demand, we will be keeping this donation page up :)

(the reason the perks are not cheaper, is so that not too many people are running around with 50 cals ;)
we just upgraded our server! its now an 8 core with HT (meaning 16 virtual cores!) 8gb of ram and almost 1gbps connection!


What We Need & What You Get
Realisticly, all we need is one months worth of funding, which is $560. ($260 for the server and $300 to hire 3 full time RDC admins) however, the more we collect, the better this server will become. more money means more slots, better uptime and less lag. granted, at the moment we are not looking to expand, but any excess money made gets added to a kitty, which will be used in the event that donations stop :)


QUIRKS INCLUDE WEAPONS AND VEHICLES! depending on how much you donate, we can set you up with weapons, and other items. if you donate a lot, we can even make you spawn at a bunch of Hueys, littlebirds and MI-17's. If we do not reach our goal of $460, no big problem, money will be taken from the kitty to pay for the server until funding is at its target once again.

The Impact
You will be securing ZUST's future in the world of Day-Z. This includes standalone, and many many months, if not years to come.



Other Ways You Can Help
If you cant donate, dont worry, just like us on facebook! and of course feel free to connect to our server to talk directly to an admin!

connect to our TeamSpeak and just talk to us! we like to make new friends :)

story:
DOCCASES is a young enterprise created by 2 young spanish businessmen, David León and Cristobal Triviño , with a large experience in furniture wood sector.

Both are creative and smart and they are very interested with turn on this new business project and join efforts to combine his capabilities in technology and his knowledge of wood industries looking for new innovative products than get join handcraft and new technologies in industrial design.

                                  


  • iPhone Nature was born with 3 objectives:


  1. To protect your/our iPhone devices from crashes and other damages can suffer covering with a noble material, highly strong, damages proof and with a silky touch as olive tree wood is.

  2. To get an exclusive, cool, and a touch of class to your/our smartphone to wake a very big difference from other cases because our iPhone Nature are limited editions laser engraved, including a collection of wildlife illustrations from Diego Ortega Alonso.

  3. To Preserve our environment, iPhone Nature Cases are made with olive tree wood from pruning. In our country, Andalusia, in the south of Spain, were olive oil production creates tons of olive tree wood in the pruning season, and we thought in this wood qualities: olive tree wood is 40% stronger than bamboo and it’s, in fact, and excellent material to care and protect a device so important as your/our cell phone. So we device do more for our environment helping to recover landscapes and forest life, preserving biodiversity so, 10% benefits are dedicated for conservation projects by Non government Organizations for helping environment.



Economic collaborations of our helpers will get our products in order to get visibility we need to get new international markets, so for make viable our way of business, and decrease the risk for the environment using pruned olive tree wood for making our handcrafted iPhone Nature Cases. In this way benefits will go directly to finance environment conservation with ONG´S.



Our project is beginning, we have finished yet all the development and investigation, ready prototypes and production. Money we get will be dedicated to promotion and diffusion, publicity of our Nature Cases, made by pruned olive tree wood.

                                   


In Function of total money we get, we can present our cases in some countries or, as we will present our business to be more competitive and get benefits to our country, increasing respect to our environment.

                         


If we can't get enough money to arrive our biggest objective, in all case this money will be dedicated to promotion and show our iPhone Nature Cases at the level we can arrive.


Our project is valuable for our collaborators and helpers because our products are created with respect to environment in an active way. Using olive tree wood from pruning to create an exclusive, beautiful cases that includes you in a selected group of people and, at the time, our benefits help to care environment.




THANKS TO ALL WHO HAVE SUPPORTED AND IF YOU CAN SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN.
story_txt:
DOCCASES is a young enterprise created by 2 young spanish businessmen, David León and Cristobal Triviño , with a large experience in furniture wood sector.
Both are creative and smart and they are very interested with turn on this new business project and join efforts to combine his capabilities in technology and his knowledge of wood industries looking for new innovative products than get join handcraft and new technologies in industrial design.

                                  iPhone Nature was born with 3 objectives:
To protect your/our iPhone devices from crashes and other damages can suffer covering with a noble material, highly strong, damages proof and with a silky touch as olive tree wood is.
To get an exclusive, cool, and a touch of class to your/our smartphone to wake a very big difference from other cases because our iPhone Nature are limited editions laser engraved, including a collection of wildlife illustrations from Diego Ortega Alonso.
To Preserve our environment, iPhone Nature Cases are made with olive tree wood from pruning. In our country, Andalusia, in the south of Spain, were olive oil production creates tons of olive tree wood in the pruning season, and we thought in this wood qualities: olive tree wood is 40% stronger than bamboo and it’s, in fact, and excellent material to care and protect a device so important as your/our cell phone. So we device do more for our environment helping to recover landscapes and forest life, preserving biodiversity so, 10% benefits are dedicated for conservation projects by Non government Organizations for helping environment.
Economic collaborations of our helpers will get our products in order to get visibility we need to get new international markets, so for make viable our way of business, and decrease the risk for the environment using pruned olive tree wood for making our handcrafted iPhone Nature Cases. In this way benefits will go directly to finance environment conservation with ONG´S.Our project is beginning, we have finished yet all the development and investigation, ready prototypes and production. Money we get will be dedicated to promotion and diffusion, publicity of our Nature Cases, made by pruned olive tree wood.                                    In Function of total money we get, we can present our cases in some countries or, as we will present our business to be more competitive and get benefits to our country, increasing respect to our environment.                          If we can't get enough money to arrive our biggest objective, in all case this money will be dedicated to promotion and show our iPhone Nature Cases at the level we can arrive.Our project is valuable for our collaborators and helpers because our products are created with respect to environment in an active way. Using olive tree wood from pruning to create an exclusive, beautiful cases that includes you in a selected group of people and, at the time, our benefits help to care environment.THANKS TO ALL WHO HAVE SUPPORTED AND IF YOU CAN SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN.

story:
Why we are doing this...

We were watching an episode of one of our favorite YouTuber (video down below) and he was talking about how Minneapolis Police officers will be wearing body cameras in 2014.  Great idea for safety and evidence collection.  But, what about the rest of the police officers around the nation and the citizens?

We had an idea! We wanted the device to be rugged like an Action Camera + Video Display + GPS + 2 Way Talk + Infrared + Internal Memory.  A tall order indeed, especially since it needs to be light weight like an action camera with full HD video and tons of extras.


Concept to Working Model Is Now a Reality


David I worked many months and long hours to find a manufacturer that combined skill and capability to facilitate our every request to accommodate a working model of our vision.

We utilized every relationship we have available to us from engineers to designers, testers and your average individual for feedback.

Finally, with the help of a talented team of individuals, Black Mamba Protection, built a strong and trusting relationship with the manufacturer that will build The Hornet™.  A little over a year into the initial concept, we are very excited and proud to introduce you to The Hornet™!


The Basics of The Hornet

  • Compact:  The Hornet can be worn on your shirt pocket or belt loop,  mounted on your vehicle dash,  stationary mounted in any office, building and/or home, motorcycle, bicycle, stroller, sport events, and much more
  • Quality:  Dust-proof, Waterproof, and enforced ABS plastic (survives a 6 foot drop with no worries) while recording in 1080p
  • Modes: Record video with audio in 1080p, 12 Megapixel photos, automatic night / day, and with PitchBlack™ Auto Engagement Infrared Night vision with 120° camera angle
  • Sharing:  The Hornet’s files are GPS tagged onto 16 GB of internal space for playback on the device, remote, or TV / monitor.  Quick transfer via USB and you can share via YouTube or email.
  • Extras: USB cable, Intercom cable, remote, manual, lapel bracket, and universal body clip



Car Mount - suction cup bracket included




Funding goal for The Hornet with your help

With your help, we will be able to finalize the prototype (both features and cost) and bring it to market.  Our goal at Black Mamba Protection is to bring the best technologies together so “he said, she said” is replaced with a true representation of what happen.

To date, we have self-financed up to the prototype, including research and development, project management, product's design, support and documentation, branding, and communications.

We need your help to fund manufacturing and the funding will be allocated as follows:

  • Final production unit
  • Certification (UL, FCC, CE)
  • Quality Control
  • Distribution to end users


THE GOAL

The goal is set for $50,000 so we can finalize:

  • Design
  • Final Testing
  • Assembly and Production
  • Packaging, documents and cables
  • Shipment

With your support, you will be the first to own The Hornet

To date we have finalized the specs and internal parts for the The Hornet

Specs

FUNCTION:  THE HORNET ™ by Black Mamba Protection
1）The Hornet is rugged enough to be dropped from 2.3M/7.5ft onto concrete and the device including screen would suffer virtually no damage and data would remain 100% intact.
2) Innovative waterproof/rainproof design completely blocks the rain from penetrating the device externally guaranteeing the internal components are safe and secure.
3) It has passed the strict waterproof test-IPX6 with the housing was bunged by leathery plug.
4) Easily able to withstand  and be used in a heavy rain environment.
5) Glass fiber is added in high strength ABS plastic shell and it becomes lighter and more environmentally friendly solution.
6) It can be used in the extreme temperatures from (-45º)- (75ºC) with normal operation.
7)  The  machine  adopts  H2.64  image  compression  format  and  its  video  definition  is  up  to 1920X1080 30frame/s , 848X480 frame/s.
8) Photo definition is up to 1200 pixels
9) Its camera angle is 120°, the photo has no blind angle.
10) Built-in high-performance infrared lens and powerful infrared light sources support up to 8 meters of crystal clear resolution in a pitch black environment for night time operations.  It is rated in the highest market standards within it's category.
11) The Hornet has the function of infrared night vision, using an on-board automatic day/night switching filter it is able to implement a perfect auto combination between the night infrared and day recording and shooting conditions, ensuring the clear effect of night recording and the real color of daylight recording.
12) The universal clip is will fit on preexisting clothing items such as garments, belts, shirtpockets, should straps, vehicle dashs, bicycles, and to many more to name.  The clips are adjustable to meet the needs of use and ensure the the highest quality result.
13) The Hornet ™ camera  relies on a posting function to easily adjust the shooting angle, providing the most effective video capture.
14) Integrated High Powered LED Flashlight can be used with 10X better results then your average off the shelf flashlight.
15)  A key  controlled  variable  times  lens  can  be  used  to  near  and  far  distance  of  shooting supporting 8X digital zoom
16) It can link to the interphone, and can be used as a shoulder microphone. Compatible with most Two-Way radios
17) The battery on The Hornet has a 3300mah capcity, (Max: 3800MAH) 1080P High resolution supporting video continuously for 9 hours.
18) Its storage capability is 16G (standard match) 64G Max.
19) Includes HDMI connection for viewing in 1080P High Definition on any compatbl HDMI device
20) GPS positioning feature is included in all device to determine the exact location and time video was capture


Water Proof


TIMELINE

  • Verify address and t-shirt size - March 2014
  • Finalize Design - Late March 2014
  • Final Testing and Quality Control - April 2014
  • Production - First part of May 2014
  • Packaging, documents, cables, and Shipment - Late May 2014


The Hornet's Layout

Front


Back

Side 1

Side 2

Bottom

Remote


Support the project with the Black Mamba Protection T-Shirt! IndieGoGo exclusive!

We will be shipping them once the successful campaign ends and we receive verification on size and address.


WHO WE ARE:

Black Mamba Protection, LLC, was founded in 2012 and is located in Austin, TX. Our mission is to fully utilize technology to provide custom tailored mobile video and tracking solutions in order to improve operations, management, and overall safety.

David McAnulty - President and Co-Founder

Daniel Fisk - VP and Co-Founder


Special Thanks to:

Kilted KingPin Studios

and

Tania Lyerly


Thank you all for your time, support and sharing!  We look forward to shipping the first units of The Hornet to you all!










Q&A:

How can I know where the Hornet is pointing without looking at the screen?

On the side of the Hornet there is a "Camera Positioning Button" that activates a red laser light.  Red laser pointer makes for easy positioning of the Hornet.


What are the shipping costs?

All Shipping in the US will be free of charge.  There will be additional cost for international shipping.  Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. 


Can I purchase more then one Hornet?

Yes!  We offer the "Distributor Pack - 10 Units" and "Early Bird Special - 2 Units" 


Why did we choose Flexible Funding?
We wanted to give our contributors and supporters the flexibility to use PayPal and/or Credit Cards.

Can I use this in the car?
Yes, The Hornet will include a suction cup mounting bracket.















Philip DeFranco "It's the Internet's Fault!!!!"  It starts at 1:10

story:
OUR NEWEST CAMPAIGN

Imagine if you could take the wall outlet anywhere. PLUG is the first truly portable power supply that allows you to power anything, anywhere. The first battery pack with 2 AC wall outlets. No other portable battery pack compares. This is the new and improved version of the original which has been called "The best battery pack of all time." Be the first to know.



WANT THE ORIGINAL?
GET SAME DAY SHIPPING!

Yep, you heard it correct. The original World's Smallest Portable Power Outlet is now available for purchase on ChargeTech.com or Amazon.com (Over 620+ positive customer reviews). Why wait for another campaign?

CLICK HERE TO BUY NOW


Charge Anything, Anywhere.

Have you ever wished you could take the wall outlet on the go? 


Power up anything, anywhere, anytime! The first portable battery pack with an AC wall plug outlet for your cell phone, laptop and more.


ChargeTech lets you power anything, anywhere:



Yep, you read that right, curling irons! 

It's so small and compact you can literally put it in your pocket, your purse or your backpack. 


The Problem: Look Familiar?

With our on the go lives and reliance on our portable electronic devices, you can nearly be certain, you will never have enough juice or find a power outlet.

At a cafe

At the airport

During an emergency


The Solution: World's Smallest Portable Power Outlet

Wherever you go, so should your portable power outlet. 

Stay connected and stay powered up in all of your daily activities. Give all your devices that extra emergency jump start to keep going throughout the day. 


Portable for on the go!

We designed the battery to be lightweight and convenient to bring around. 

It is fully mobile and will fit in your backpack, purse, and even in most pockets. 

With ChargeTech, you will have power within arms reach wherever you are!

It's just like those bulky portable power supply generators or the outdoor generators you find at hardware stores, except it fits in your pocket.



Compact, Yet Powerful

In terms of size, it's almost comparable to that of an iPhone. 


ChargeTech  contains enough power to charge your phone for an entire week or fully charge your laptop multiple times. 


The Perfect Mix

NOTHING compares to the portability and power of ChargeTech. 

  • Gigantic Powerful Generators - Perfect when the power goes out, but not practical to carry around. 
  • Portable Lipstick Charger - Only work with your phone, not powerful enough to work with your laptop computer or anything else that requires an electrical outlet. 

ChargeTech, it's the perfect blend of size and power. 


Available In Two Sizes

Choose your size: The PPO small (12000 mah) or the PPO large (18000 mah)


The large size has 50% more capacity than the small size. It also has an additional two USB ports and battery capacity indicator.

Both units uses AC power for your household appliances, and DC power for your 12V electronics.


Works Internationally


Stretch Goals

We wanted more power, but less bulk. 

Most products fail in execution because the engineers/designers fail to realize the technological hurdles they will need to overcome during production. We worked closely with our manufacturing partners.

That's why we made sure we partnered with a manufacturer that understood our most important wants and features.

We worked with our engineers to design an IC board that combines both the electrical outlet and USB port component. This was the biggest puzzle, a configuration that would work physically as well as aesthetically for the exterior design and overall layout for the lithium ion cells. In the end, we created something amazing.


What Can you Charge?

Or should we say, what can't you charge? Any electrical wall outlet device under 85 watts. 

Check the manufacturer's specifications for more information. If you are using a device with a variable setting, use the lowest for your safety.

Field tests were conducted with different household products under the recommended 85 watts limit. The actual results may vary. 

There are limitations:

The 18,000mAh (large) ChargeTech can power devices up to 85w and the 12,000mAh (small) ChargeTech can power devices up to 65w. It is not possible to use high power demanding electronics. An internal safety fuse will cut the power and shut off your energy pack if done so. 

We embedded this safety feature to protect someone from getting hurt. After the safety cut-off has been triggered, simply recharge the device again to resume operation. 

**Actual charge and run times will vary. Divide 12000 mah or 18000 mah for an approximate number of charges you can expect from a fully charged small or large ChargeTech.


NEW CAMPAIGN LAUNCHING
AUGUST 2016!

Sign up and get notified first! We're launching a brand new power outlet that's 3 times powerful than the original. 48,000 mah battery capacity, 250 watts of power, Tesla grade battery cells, worldwide travel adapter and solar rechargeable.

CLICK HERE TO GET NOTIFIED FIRST


WANT THE ORIGINAL?
GET SAME DAY SHIPPING!

Yep, you heard it correct. The original World's Smallest Portable Power Outlet is now available for purchase on ChargeTech.com or Amazon.com (Over 620+ positive customer reviews). Why wait for another campaign?

CLICK HERE TO BUY NOW


We Need Your Help

Developing cutting edge technology isn't easy, and it's also very costly/time intensive. With your support, we can finally hit mass production and meet the factory's minimum order quantities. We choose our manufacturing partner based on their long track record of producing high quality portable battery chargers.

Current Progress: We already have fully functional versions of both the portable and powerful from our manufacturer overseas. The overall build is excellent and identical to what would be the mass produced version.

Manufacturing Production Plan: A large cash outlay is always required to start production. Plastic molds, high quality battery cells and circuit boards need to be purchased upfront. With the support of the Indiegogo community, we can finalize our designs and start manufacturing.

The Final Product: A portable and powerful battery pack with an AC wall plug outlet. Power in the palm of your hands.


FAQS

What devices are supported? Can it charge anything?

Like we stated above, the battery pack can charge any phone plugged into it via USB. In terms of the AC outlet, the small pack can support up to 12000 mAh and the large pack can support up to 18000 mAh max. Anything above the max capacity will trigger a safety mode where your pack will shut down. Recharging will then be required to reuse the battery pack again.

How long can this device charge for?

It really depends on how much power your devices use. When comparing the 12K to the 18K, the 18K can provide about 50% more charging power than the 12K.


Warnings

  • Do not drop, or place heavy weights on top of the battery.
  • Never try to open the battery case or make your own repairs. 
  • Do not expose to rain or moisture. 
  • Keep away from moisture and humidity.  
  • Do not expose the battery to high temperatures. 
  • Do not charge the battery with anything but the recommend AC wall charger.


Risks and challenges

One of the biggest challenges is the manufacturing process. Quality control will be at the top of the list and most important issue. There are many reasons why the manufacturer's cooperation will not be easy. We understand that Indiegogo backers want their product as soon as possible, but we are limited by factory's capabilities. In our experience, most pre-production samples still have a slight variation from the final mass produced unit.



Want to become a Reseller or purchase in Wholesale quantities?

Always powered, always ready. Looking for corporate promotional gifts or custom branding? Are you interested in buying hundreds or thousands of ChargeTech products? Please e-mail wholesale@ChargeTech.com. Learn how you can profit from this opportunity and become a reseller of ChargeTech products. Please e-mail resellers@ChargeTech.com.

CLICK HERE TO VISIT OUR WEBSITE

What devices are supported? Can it charge anything?
Like we stated above, the battery pack can charge any phone plugged into it via USB. In terms of the AC outlet, the small pack can support up to 12000 mAh and the large pack can support up to 18000 mAh max. Anything above the max capacity will trigger a safety mode where your pack will shut down. Recharging will then be required to reuse the battery pack again.
How long can this device charge for?
It really depends on how much power your devices use. When comparing the 12K to the 18K, the 18K can provide about 50% more charging power than the 12K.



Warnings



Do not drop, or place heavy weights on top of the battery.


Never try to open the battery case or make your own repairs. 


Do not expose to rain or moisture. 


Keep away from moisture and humidity.  


Do not expose the battery to high temperatures. 


Do not charge the battery with anything but the recommend AC wall charger.






Risks and challengesOne of the biggest challenges is the manufacturing process. Quality control will be at the top of the list and most important issue. There are many reasons why the manufacturer's cooperation will not be easy. We understand that Indiegogo backers want their product as soon as possible, but we are limited by factory's capabilities. In our experience, most pre-production samples still have a slight variation from the final mass produced unit.






















Want to become a Reseller or purchase in Wholesale quantities?


Always powered, always ready. Looking for corporate promotional gifts or custom branding? Are you interested in buying hundreds or thousands of ChargeTech products? Please e-mail wholesale@ChargeTech.com. Learn how you can profit from this opportunity and become a reseller of ChargeTech products. Please e-mail resellers@ChargeTech.com.
CLICK HERE TO VISIT OUR WEBSITE

story:
It's not news that multimedia technologies provide us with the opportunity to meet people and establish new relations. But how about saving, developing and improving your relationship? Who will help with that? The cheLOVEky app is one of the pioneers in this area. cheLOVEky is a unique relationship management platform which helps bring your relationship to a new level. 

cheLOVEky offers a SET OF USEFUL FEATURES:

    • Mood Meter - learn how your mood affects your behavior;

    • Event Tracker - be aware of all the changes in your life
    • Navigator - this smart option collects and analyzes your statistics; it will let you know what and how to correct if something goes wrong
    • Personal Consultant - provides support any moment you need it
    • My notes – a fun way to keep and share your thoughts, ideas and impressions

    • Tips of the Day - everyday tips on how to make your life happier

    • And - finally - Interactive Diary - which provides you with your personal step-by-step relationship improving algorithm

Using mobile apps for "emotional life" improving is becoming a growing trend all over the world. Last year gifted us with a few apps helping couples to understand each other and this is so good! cheLOVEky hides complicated psychological methodology and can be compared with the medical program for treating psychological problems. We are happy to receive support from practicing psychologists who are ready to use our app for remote supervising and consultations. 

A unique, interactive app for resolving personal problems. 

This is really what everybody is looking for!  Do you have a personal problem? Who doesn’t? Have you started to think about a divorce? Feel lonely and unhappy? Is your mom irritated with you? Or have your lovely kids turned into monsters? Relax, now you can do something about it.

Just install the app, load your data, describe your problem, follow the easy instructions and great result will come.  Magic? Yeah, magic!


"After 3 years of marriage something went wrong... We started to argue without any reason, he got so distant and somebody told me that he goes to lunch with the same lady every day. At that very moment I was offered to participate in tests of the cheLOVEky program. Well, I had nothing to lose! And it was fun! The program was telling me what I should do today and I was doing things I've never done before! But now we have a second honey-moon and do the "child" planning! It really works!"

Anonymous tester


The CheLOVEky app adapts to your particular personal problem and generates a step-by-step solving algorithm. In fact, it consists of a personal set of everyday tasks. And all you need is to do your tasks.

"...This is unbelievable! You spend 15 minutes a day and in about 14 days you start seeing results. Life's changing! It's like putting efforts exactly where they are needed and where they bring the greatest results. Moving on is easy!"

Anonymous tester


THIS FUN AND PRODUCTIVE APP IS A COMBINATION OF: 

  • A unique step-by-step methodology which is the result of two years work by a team of psychologists. The methodology includes five stages necessary to go through for solving relationship issues. We studied hundreds of scientific sources and managed to build a system able to help every single person in the world. Yes, we are sure about that.
  • A sophisticated but easy to use software platform dedicated to adapt to user's personal needs, features, conditions and his reaction to the implementation of the tasks. Every user gets a personalized algorithm and a set of tasks.
  • For maximized effect the program can also be supervised and changed manually in cooperation with our staff.
    • "In developing the program we were guided by two fundamental principles. First, if you want to change the situation start doing something. And second, when doing something, be sure there will be no harm. And this is all about us. All the tasks and tips of the program are easy, safe, positive, and give guaranteed results. But only for those who are motivated to make their life better and are ready to get off their butts :)"

    Nataliia Ch.-Busch, co-founder cheLOVEky

    A few weeks with cheLOVEky bring sustainable changes for the whole life.
    Better spend those years on a new life :)

    "First, I was very skeptical...like what in the world are they thinking about? How can I let some program into my life, how can I believe it's going to change my situation? 
    But after I started I realized that it's me who is changing things. The app was asking me the right questions and giving tips on how to get the answers. It turned out to be my way... and this is what I really need and want. I understand it now."

    Anonymous tester

    CheLOVEky will hack your understanding of love, partnership, marriage, parenting, friendships, connections, soul mates and life. It will help to create what really works for you, what makes you feel right every day.
    "No man - no problem?" With this app you don't need to kill anybody :)"

    Anonymous tester

    Well, let's be honest here. The app won't turn your girlfriend into a sexy blond with big boobs. It won't bring you an obedient kid instead of your naughty one. It won't make your husband a billionaire. It will simply make you happy together. 
    In my language "cheloveky" means humans. And I believe that "love" is not just a coincidence of letters in this word, I am convinced it is the core of every human. ...Perhaps, this is the most human app. ...It ruins the stereotypes and limits in our heads...."

    Anna Rybachenko, co-founder cheLOVEky


    WHAT IS ALREADY DONE?
    100% Methodology
    70% Software platform

    WHAT DO WE NEED TO FINISH?
    We need to strengthen the adaptive part of the software platform and develop the web-application interface. After that we plan to develop and release the app for mobile platforms (iOS, Android, Windows)

    So WE STILL NEED YOU.
    • If we raise $5,000, we will be able to finish the software platform development and get a flexible and adaptive system. All we described before is possible with a serious, strong and sophisticated platform. This is the most important part of the project. And we need $15 000 to finish the development, not more because the biggest part of the work is already done. 
    • With $10.000, we will make the app available for mobile platforms (including iOS, Android, Windows). For the best result you need to have cheLOVEki with you wherever you are. And we are going to do this in the best possible way. A distinctive, modern and convenient interface on every device. Your private interactive diary is full of nice features: you can track your mood and moments of your life, you’ll have your personal navigator, coach and shrink there, you can also use it for your notes, and many other funny and useful little things and tips that will help you enjoy your journey with cheLOVEky. This amount will help us to start cheLOVEky as we imagine it, and it will impress you!
    • $25,000. Wow! Great!! Perfect!!! Now we can do almost everything we planned to do from the beginning:
  1. Adapt the program for different countries. According to your votes and requests we will release cheLOVEky for other countries. The adaptation means a deep study of the cultural, religious and mental features of the nation and tuning the program accordingly. Huge work, but it’s so important.
  2. Release a special version for teenagers. It will help parents and teachers to handle teenage crisis and difficulties. Also it will show our boys and girls what positive and constructive relationships are all about. Nobody was teaching us how to be happy in a relationship. Let's help the next generation!
  3. Involve in our program many people who really do need this. Your help is crucial for them.


So WHAT'S GOING TO HAPPEN?
  • February, 2015 - Finishing the software platform
  • March, 2015 - Web-app (beta) release
  • May, 2015 - iOS, Android, Windows mobile apps (beta) release
  • July, 2015 - We are on the air! Full versions of the web and mobile apps in English, Ukrainian and Russian
  • September, 2015 - Release of the app in other languages
  • October, 2015 - Release of the program for teenagers
    The idea of this project came to us almost three years ago. And we invested in it all the knowledge, energy and time we could. So many people were helping us and most of them were volunteering. We are grateful for that! Because the main idea of this project is to help people. Simply help them become happier... Sometimes we think we are crazy to start such a huge thing... But we are not going to stop! So this is a moment of truth. We are so excited... Are you with us? Do you share our conviction that this is what everybody needs? Does it touch your soul? Will you support us?

    Anna Rybachenko, co-founder cheLOVEky 


    You like our project and want to help us more? Here are some other ways to contribute:
    • Join our pages in social networks. We are creating a community of people who know how to love. You can be a part of it.
    • Invite your friends and relatives to join us. After changing your own life, don’t you want to have a common language with them?
    • Give us feedback. Together we’ll make our program perfect.
    • Do something good every day. Yes, that helps.
    • Do something good for someone important to you. Hug your mother, or call your grandmother. Take your nephew to the park, or join your father on a fishing trip.


    Mother Teresa once said: “What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family.”

    The changes can start today, at this exact moment. There are people who really need you. Don’t hesitate,THE TIME HAS COME.

story:
————————————————————————-
Mojipic Company Info
Web:  mojipic.co
For general issues: click here

Only for wholesale issues: click here

  • Facebook link
  • Instagram link
  • Twitter link
  • Youtube Сhannel
  • Facebook Messenger

————————————————————————-

 

Meet Mojipic

Introducing Mojipic. The world’s first smart voice emoji device.

Use Siri or Google Assistant to show everyone on the road how you feel with fun emojis and GIFs. Now, you can make driving more fun than ever!

Send smileys out to considerate drivers, show your love for your favorite sports team or send love hearts to that cutie in the car behind.

Express yourself and get creative on the go!

.


Visibility

Day or night, low-light or super-bright light. Everyone will be able to see Mojipic. It’s bright enough to be seen, without being blinding.

 

Voice Control

 

 

Sometimes you just don't have time to get onto your phone, not to mention how stupid it is while driving. You can use Siri or Google to change EMOJIs or GIFs while you drive.

 

Express Yourself

 

More than 1500 GIFs, Smiles & Emojis. Baseball Teams, NFL, NBA, NHL, Soccer, flags of countries, national symbols and more.

 

Get creative

 

 

Want to really get creative? Use your phone to create your own unique art. Then use Mojipic to display it to the world!

 

Drawing in Realtime

 

8-Bit Games

Miss the days of Tetris and Snake? Mojipic keeps your passengers entertained with pre-installed 8-bit games.

 

Generate QR-Code

Want to share your story? Your business? or you just want an easy way to exchange your details with the love of your life while you drive? QR codes will help you share in seconds.

 

Emojis and GIFs

You can display static emojis and animation images (GIFs)

 

 

For Sport Fans ⛹‍♂

Show your love for your team by displaying your badge on Mojipic. Perfect for the journey to the game. Even better for tailgating! Baseball, NFL, NBA, NHL, Soccer and more.
 
 

 

For Fun 

What better way to say thank you to that kind driver who let you out than a smiley emoji? Or use an angry face to tell that tailgater to back off!

 

 

Social 

Display QR codes to link to your Facebook, Twitter or Instagram.

For Taxi Drivers 

If you drive for Uber, Lyft or any other taxi service, use Mojipic to make it easy for your customers to find you. Display their name on your window.

 

For Home

Mojipic isn’t just for the car. Use Mojipic to brighten up your home, use it to warn cold callers, criminals or just to celebrate a holiday!

For Business

Use Mojipic to advertise your business as you drive. Or display Mojipic in your shop or café. Use QR codes to share discount vouchers.

Display

  • 6000 Cd outdoor LEDs. 32x32p.

Battery

  • 8200 mAh. High-quality Li-Pol rechargeable battery

Power

  • Car Charger. Onboard car power 12V maximum power consumption 4А (At maximum brightness in white)

Dimensions

  • Device: 140x153x27mm / 5,5 x 6 x 1 in 
  • Mount: 258x54mm  / 10.1 x 2,1 in

Wireless Control

  • BLE 4.0 (Bluetooth Low Energy)

Temperature

  • Operating Range -25+60c / 13-140F

In Box

  • Mojipic Device
  • Car plag-in (lenth 5 meters)
  • Mount
  • Manual

 

All Apps features

  • Catalog more than 1500 gifs. We update the catalog every week.
  • Several devices in one app at the same time
  • Drawing in Real-time
  • Drawing! while the device is working, you can draw something and save your image to the catalog.
  • Upload your own design and customize. Upload from URL link or from your phone library
  • Gif maker - create animated videos right in Mojipic App
  • Brightness control
  • Time out control for the device (if connect lost)
  • Glow mode. Constant or ask yourself how many seconds the picture on the device glows.
  • Siri control and Ok Google control
  • Synchronization. If you connected a new device. You can run full device sync. So that the app knows all the settings of the device and the files loaded into it.
     

 

Manage Multiple Devices With One App Simultaneously

 

 

Easy to Install

 

 

 
 
Hello, We are Ilya and Igor- the founders of Mojipic.
 
The idea for Mojipic was a simple one, we wanted to showcase the love for our favorite hockey team 'Pittsburgh Penguins'. We wanted something permanent, something that can be changed or customized easily. The idea soon morphed into what Mojipic is today.
 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

--- Features ---
We have been developing hardware and software since 2012 and have gained sufficient experience in this area. Based on 7 years of experience, we know about many pitfalls that can arise at different stages of development and production. Therefore, in order to avoid and minimize all risks, we chose to create the product first and then go to crowdfunding.

--- Development -
We have been working on MojiPic for more than a year and have gone through all the main obstacles, including design at all stages, prototypes, creating a working mobile app for both ios and android. We even managed to build a full catalog of 1500 EMOJIs and GIFs.

--- Resolved Issues —
One of our biggest challenges was creating a mount that can be used for not only cars but also attached to any type of window. We found that some mounts only worked for certain type of cars, so we created a special mount with two hooks that can be applied to all without any issues.

We also decided to change the Indoor led 1000 cd/sqm to 6000 cd/sqm indoor to make sure the picture is clearly visible even in blazing direct sunshine.

---Manufacturing & Production---
We have already started making molds for our case and mount, as this is the most engaging process. 

We have already made the battery at 8000 max and silicone suction cups for our dimensions. We have agreed to a partnership with a reliable proven manufacturer.


The production process looks like this:

1. case production with mount

2. battery production

3. production of silicone suction cups

 4. production of PCB

5. production of led displays

6. supplier of electronic components, and charging cables

7. PCBA, assembly, and packaging

8. Delivery

--- Our Commitments ---
We will keep our Backers at every stage of our progress. Thus, if there are any unexpected obstacles, you will be the first to know what is happening and what we are doing to eliminate them, but we will try to prevent it. As for Backers you will receive all the behind-the-scenes information about MojiPic. Also, we will post some stories in our accounts in the instagram and Facebook about our progress.

---Dear Bakers---
All rights with the images of emblems and logos belong to their rightholders, our applications is distributed absolutely free of charge and we do not pursue commercial goals to earn on emoji and gifs with these images.

 

Our Partners

Easy to Install


 









 











 


 
Hello, We are Ilya and Igor- the founders of Mojipic.
 
The idea for Mojipic was a simple one, we wanted to showcase the love for our favorite hockey team 'Pittsburgh Penguins'. We wanted something permanent, something that can be changed or customized easily. The idea soon morphed into what Mojipic is today.
 



  Risks & Challenges--- Features ---We have been developing hardware and software since 2012 and have gained sufficient experience in this area. Based on 7 years of experience, we know about many pitfalls that can arise at different stages of development and production. Therefore, in order to avoid and minimize all risks, we chose to create the product first and then go to crowdfunding.--- Development -We have been working on MojiPic for more than a year and have gone through all the main obstacles, including design at all stages, prototypes, creating a working mobile app for both ios and android. We even managed to build a full catalog of 1500 EMOJIs and GIFs.--- Resolved Issues —One of our biggest challenges was creating a mount that can be used for not only cars but also attached to any type of window. We found that some mounts only worked for certain type of cars, so we created a special mount with two hooks that can be applied to all without any issues.We also decided to change the Indoor led 1000 cd/sqm to 6000 cd/sqm indoor to make sure the picture is clearly visible even in blazing direct sunshine.---Manufacturing & Production---We have already started making molds for our case and mount, as this is the most engaging process. We have already made the battery at 8000 max and silicone suction cups for our dimensions. We have agreed to a partnership with a reliable proven manufacturer.The production process looks like this:1. case production with mount2. battery production3. production of silicone suction cups 4. production of PCB5. production of led displays6. supplier of electronic components, and charging cables7. PCBA, assembly, and packaging8. Delivery--- Our Commitments ---We will keep our Backers at every stage of our progress. Thus, if there are any unexpected obstacles, you will be the first to know what is happening and what we are doing to eliminate them, but we will try to prevent it. As for Backers you will receive all the behind-the-scenes information about MojiPic. Also, we will post some stories in our accounts in the instagram and Facebook about our progress.---Dear Bakers---All rights with the images of emblems and logos belong to their rightholders, our applications is distributed absolutely free of charge and we do not pursue commercial goals to earn on emoji and gifs with these images. Our Partners

story:
The concept of the Tooyn Charger was introduced when we realized that our newer laptops did not have the inputs we use every day. More so, we had to pay a fortune to buy each and every adapter device. So we developed an AirTag wallet size multifunctional charger.

 

 

Rather than carrying around a million impractical dongles, we designed the Tooyn Charger. It has everything we need for our Macs. Whether we’re working or just having fun, the Tooyn Charger has everything we need to bring our laptop to its full potential.

 


Tooyn Charger is more than just a Type-C Charger. Incorporated inside are: a fast data USB port, a fast charging USB 3.0 QC port that will charge any device at lightning speeds. The extra USB-C input, HDMI port and 2 different sized SD/Memory Card slots will ensure your being always connected to your environment. Tooyn Charger also incorporates a built-in wireless charger for your phone and iWatch. No more extra cables! Just rest your phone on Tooyn and get charging! 

 

We used the highest quality components for Tooyn, to guarantee the fastest connectivity and unparalleled upload and download speeds. The new generation quality parts ensure that you receive an industry-leading product. Never again will you be slowed down by outdated technology.

 

The Tooyn Charger was conceptualized with a team of designers. We chose a form and aesthetics that complement your Mac becoming an extension of the laptop itself. Presented in color combinations that suit your personal laptop, there is a Tooyn perfect for you.

To perfectly suit your laptop we developed the Tooyn Charger in colors most compelling to the modern laptops. Available in three options: Space Grey, Silver and Rose Gold. Coated in Aluminium and Acrylic glass, the Tooyn Chargers are perfect both in looks and functionality.

 

 

 

The Tooyn Charger Ultra charges your MacBook and all other devices from the wall socket or power bank. The Tooyn Charger Basic is super slim and does not have AC power input and needs an external power source.

 

 

 


 

For those days when you need most energy, whilst staying unplugged, we have a power bank, especially develop to work with the Tooyn Charger. With 20,000 mAh capacity, the Tooyn power bank will ensure, that you never run out of energy.

The Tooyn Power Bank can be used to charge your devices through a wire or wirelessly through the Tooyn Charger Basic and all of those plus your laptop through Tooyn Charger Ultra.

The Tooyn Power Bank will be available for pre-order in your post-purchase surveys with 26% off from the retail price.

 

Tooyn is not a concept. We already have the contracts with our suppliers and are simply waiting for the orders to launch the production line. We are launching our project with the intent to start shipping immediately after the campaign ends. When you back Tooyn you are guaranteeing a pre-order. 

 

 

AS SEEN ON
