story:
“JUS is effectively strapping a super advanced solar panel to the back of your phone" ~Digital Trends

“JUS looks beautiful, ultra thin without adding unnecessary bulk and feels like it is barely there yet built rugged, durable and drop safe to protect your phone." ~ListHunt

“Thinnest iPhone Solar Battery Case Ever" ~DailyMotion

“JUS is built to go far past ‘hoping for a few extra minutes’" ~State of Tech

                             

        

                                                                        

JUS is a hybrid all-in-one solar-powered rechargeable battery pack and slim case that fits your iPhone 6 , 6 Plus, 6S and the 6S Plus like skin and never runs out of power. Ever!  We also intend to create a stretch goal to offer JUS for the iPhone 5S.
If you do not have an iPhone but want to support JUS and team JUS, you can help with a contribution or by sharing the love for JUS on  Facebook, Twitter, Google+ or LinkedIn.
What if you could use your phone without worrying about your battery life ever again?

What if you never have to plug in ever again?


Each year our devices get smarter, faster and more intelligent. However, better battery technology simply hasn't arrived yet and battery life hasn't kept pace with advances in mobile computing.

Mobile computing promises the world: web access, photos, music and maps, everywhere you go. And it can really deliver - for a while. But poor battery life means you'll probably soon run into problems, with some devices leaving you staring at a useless blank screen well before the end of the day.  And when the phone battery dies, the phone becomes useless.



Battery life is still one of the most important issues when it comes to our phones. So to conserve energy, experts recommend you

  • Dim the screen brightness
  • Keep the screen timeout short
  • Turn off Bluetooth
  • Turn off Wi-Fi
  • Go easy on the location services, and GPS
  • Don't leave apps running in the background
  • Don't use vibrate
  • Turn off this and that, …etc. 

NOT A SMART PHONE ANY MORE. Who Needs This? So Much Work and Not Ideal! So...

JUS: A real alternative for everyone who loves to stay connected and truly a remarkable advance in green approaches to powering your iPhone when you need it without the need for cords, chargers and holes in walls.

Limitless Energy! JUS sees to it that you are never without power, harnessing the light around you to power the iPhone that is an indispensable part of your work and play.

Using the latest advances in solar technology, JUS incorporates the most efficient cells available to capture the power and stores it in a 4000/5000 mAh Lithium-Polymer battery to deliver enough power to charge your phone twice. In short, it triples the talk time of you iPhone! That’s 42 hours of talk time! And if you have access to ambient indoor light or sunlight, JUS will never run out of power, ever again.

Let's Face it, the current battery life span on the iPhone–every phone– is just not enough!!

Battery life is inadequate for a top-end smartphone, meaning there will certainly be no abatement of the periodic shouts of ‘has anyone got an iPhone charger’ across the office.

And sadly there's little sign of radical, transformative improvements coming any time soon!

What if you could use your phone without worrying about your battery life ever again? What if you never have to plug in ever again? What if you never run out of power again?

Meet JUS, an iPhone battery case and solar charger that would fundamentally change the way you use your phone by replacing conventional charging with solar solving. "Let's create a cleaner, greener world where everyone has JUS to power their phone."




On a full charge, even without access to any light at all, JUS can recharge your iPhone from 0 to 100% twice. In short, it triples the talk time of your iPhone! That’s 42 hours of talk time! And if you have access to outdoor or indoor light-any light–even on cloudy days, JUS will never run out of power, ever again. 

We understand how frustrating it is to carry around all of your smartphone accessories. The "classic" tangled cables, power bank, phone charger,...the list is endless. Enough! We also know how frustrating it is to run out of battery power on your phone! 

"If you've ever experienced the horror of reaching into a bag only to find that you've forgotten to bring a charger for your dying phone's battery, or never finding a power outlet then you'll understand why JUS is rather appealing"

Don't Miss that Important Call. A dead battery = Business Hazard.

Always Have Power - Green Power Wherever You Are!

So don’t let your battery bring you down; free yourself from walls and take your phone camping, hiking, to the beach if you like because when your phone is charged, you are ready for anything!

Peace Of Mind that you Always Have Power? Priceless
And knowing that your phone power is environmentally friendly with JUS is an added benefit to be proud of and we certainly hope you think the same way too.

By supporting us on Indiegogo, you will receive the revolutionary ground breaking hybrid, all-in-one solar-powered rechargeable battery pack and slim case, for your choice of iPhone 6, 6S, 6 Plus or 6S Plus and the true frictionless charging dock so you never need to plug your iPhone into anything again!

And all at a cost well below suggested retail. JUS is different than any other battery or case on the market because it truly changes the way you use your phone. With other battery cases, your phone actually takes longer to charge and you are always relying on cables, outlets, sockets and adapter. With JUS, your phone use is never interrupted and recharging is a click away. 

JUS currently supports the iPhone 6, 6Plus, 6S and the 6S Plus and with your help, we want to expand JUS to even more phones, introduce more colours and optional Auxiliary Port. As you can see, we have working prototypes and we have our manufacturing partners all lined up. With our Kickstarter campaign successfully over we are working on our mass production of JUS to get it to all our Backers.

So don’t let your battery bring you down;

Free yourself from walls

And take your phone camping, hiking...

To the beach if you like

Because when your phone is charged, you are ready for anything!

Installation is as Easy as 1, 2, Done!


Installing the case is easy: 1. align your iPhone lightning port to JUS MFi Certified Apple lightning interface on a flat surface like a desk, 2. then plug the interface into phone and push the top of phone into case. That’s it!

The super slim case fits your iPhone like skin.

Powering your iPhone when you need it without the need for cords, chargers and holes in walls is only 2 seconds away.


Lithium-Polymer battery to deliver enough power to charge your phone twice. ! And if you have access to outdoor or indoor light-any light–even on cloudy days, JUS will never ever run out of power!

JUS Charges and protects your iPhone without the bulk

Features like the camera, headphone mini-jack, and controls are still just as accessible as before and most importantly, JUS looks beautiful, ultra thin and fits your iPhone like skin without adding unnecessary bulk and feels like it is barely there yet built rugged, durable and drop safe to protect your phone.




GOALS When we started this project, our goal was to bring a product that solves a big problem, that's cool, durable and useful. We believe JUS is just that! We had a great time working on transforming the concept to reality. We cannot wait to finalise JUS and put it in your hands. All we need now is your help and support to cover the cost of what remains. We are well versed in the challenges involved in delivery, so we hope our experience in delivering products will help us to make sure that your rewards arrive on time and in mint condition.

Our initial goal was the minimum amount needed to cover the cost of the mould and first production run. We have also set a couple of stretch goals, one to create an Apple Watch Stand that would be included in addition to the standard back support and another to replace the Micro USB Port with a USB-Type-C Port or a Lightning Passthrough Port. With the support of some amazing backers, we reached the first stretch goal and we are here to reach the second. If we exceed the stretch goal, it will position us to create additional colours and possibly a case for the iPhone 5S.

But to make this happen, we need your support. Please help support us on Indiegogo and help us create a cleaner greener environmentally friendly solution where no one has to plug his or her phone or ever be without power again. We thank you for your support and please remember to share this campaign with everyone you know and let's make our world a cleaner, greener and safer place, and never without power.

TIMING We have prepared for every step to successfully deliver rewards to all of our AWESOME Backers. With working prototypes in hand and we will begin the tooling process and cut the mould. First samples will be approved or sent back for adjustments and once samples are approved, we will move into production followed by packaging and shipping. This entire process will take approximately 13 weeks and JUS will ship to all the backers in February 2016.

Risks and challenges

We are ex Apple and Microsoft Engineers and we’ve worked hard over the last year to get JUS to this point and we successfully completed critical milestones. We have been using JUS on our iPhones for nearly 6 months and have not charged our phone by any other means even once and we simply cannot wait to put JUS on your iPhones and into your hands. We also used reputable manufacturers who offer great engineering support and development tools. What remains is completing the manufacturing phase and that’s where our training and experience comes in.

We have successfully launched multiple products into the marketplace including Tago (www.Tagoworld.com), Qube (www.Qubio.us) and Kuddles, so we are confident that manufacturing risk is at a minimum.

Thank you for reading this far - let's make this happen and hope to have you as a Proud Backer and please Share this campaign with everyone you know for JUS and for a Better, Greener, Cleaner World.

We are almost ready to push the green button and start production with our manufacturer. We have done our testing and know what needs to happen to get JUS into your hands.

BACKERS ROCK! Launching a new idea takes time, diligence, and courage. We've got all three but we need to meet our goal to continue our quest. We sincerely appreciate each and every Backer and each and every pledge and we thank you for your support. Many thanks to the Indiegogo Team for providing this platform of opportunity.

We thank you for your support and please remember to share this campaign with everyone you know and let's make our world a cleaner, greener and safer place, and never without power and please remember to share the love of JUS on  Facebook, Twitter, Google+ or LinkedIn.

story:
Hello everyone! 

We always wanted to make a perfect mobile application to allow people from all over the world to listen to the original Fallout radio tracks.

For more than 2 years our online radio Fallout.FM gave such possibility to many Fallout game fans. 

After the Fallout 4 release our team quickly added original tracks from Diamond City and Classical Radio channels.

Fallout.FM is a non-profit project, but still, it’s impossible to stay in progress without any investments. We have to pay for servers, domains and for the programmers work. The website where the radio channel is placed is partially compensated by donations.

We seek to develop an excellent mobile app of great quality with a friendly interface. Unfortunately, we do have some limitations for doing that.

So we’ve invested our money to hire the professional designer, who has already started to work on a prototype of our future application (see the screenshot).

 


The baseline is to create a really beautiful and convenient mobile application which will be able to brighten your phones screen life up. We want the interface of the app to look like a Pip-Boy which will be in accord with the world of beloved game. From our point of view, the designers succeeded in this.

For further development we need to make other investments. We are increasing our qualitative and technical requirements. We want to purchase additional server broadcasts.

Actually, the app will be free, but it will have a small space for advertisements, which then will be used for the projects progress support.

We are also thinking of creating the second app version which will be offered without any advertisement but will be paid. Of course our sponsors will receive the ad-free version for free.

At the moment, we have 7 stations:

- Main station (original music from ingame radiostations of Fallout 3, Fallout NV, Fallout 4)

- Fallout 3 OST

- Fallout NV OST

- Fallout 2 OST

- Fallout 1 OST

- Fallout 4 Diamond City Radio 

- Fallout 4 Classical Radio

IMPORTANT: Fallout.FM - fan project with audio preview of Fallout Soundtrack. You can buy all that perfect soundtracks on iTunes and Google Play. Fallout is TradeMark of Bethesda Softworks LLC, a ZeniMax Media company.

From our point of view, the designers succeeded in this.For further development we need to make other investments. We are increasing our qualitative and technical requirements. We want to purchase additional server broadcasts.Actually, the app will be free, but it will have a small space for advertisements, which then will be used for the projects progress support.We are also thinking of creating the second app version which will be offered without any advertisement but will be paid. Of course our sponsors will receive the ad-free version for free.At the moment, we have 7 stations:- Main station (original music from ingame radiostations of Fallout 3, Fallout NV, Fallout 4)- Fallout 3 OST- Fallout NV OST- Fallout 2 OST- Fallout 1 OST- Fallout 4 Diamond City Radio - Fallout 4 Classical RadioIMPORTANT: Fallout.FM - fan project with audio preview of Fallout Soundtrack. You can buy all that perfect soundtracks on iTunes and Google Play. Fallout is TradeMark of Bethesda Softworks LLC, a ZeniMax Media company.

story:
Short Summary

One day I and my co partner woke up and decided that after endless trouble and confidence issues with women, it was time for a change. We all know speaking to women online is much easier than in person, so we began brainstorming ideas on how this could be done in real time anywhere in public! 

So then we came up with this app idea - Imagine an app where you can talk to a woman that we may have seen in public, or sitting at a table in a cafe` and break the ice before actually approaching her to conversate in person. Or seeing if she is even interested in us coming over! The use of WIFI/Bluetooth, and the wireless chat and notification function make this possible.

How many times may you have walked past the PERFECT match for you in public and not realised? The apps optional questionaire and preferences for your perfect match will match you with this person, and you will receive a text notification when a perfect match is in the area! you can then view there profile/pictures and about me section and receive a % match then ask where they are to meet up. You can also make your preferences as simple as: Notify me when a female from the ages of 18 - 20 is in the area, check our their profile, and decide whether you would like to chat to them to see where in the area they are!

This is not only a great way to meet people, it will also become viral amoung teens, because of the casual sophistacated layout of the app, its not going to be a typical corney cheesy dating app. Can you imagine kids at highschool all connecting with the app, using the group chat function? Perhaps even in a club, everyones heads will be burried in their phones, trying to find women in their area that they wish to approach in conversation, but break the ice before doing so!

This app will also connect with local business - how? we will be in contact with local social venues on times they would like to organise for a concept we came up with called "meet spots". this is where singles, or any social group meet at a venue at a certain time, specified by the venue, to us to update/notify everyone in the local area. When everyone with the app arrives, they are notified of people in the area and % matches. Its a perfect way of single people to meet up and chat, knowing they are all there for the same reason. Being able to break the ice and check if someone is a match before talking, could connect people that may have never been connected otherwise!

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have been in contact with the APP developers APPSTER. They think our idea is AWESOME, and if done correctly with the right amount of funding and effort could be VIRAL. We have received a quote at an estimation of $60 000 to create the app, and perhaps more for advertising/marketing. APPSTER also market and advertise apps and have had 35 apps in the top 100 apps of all time, and are repped as the best app developer in Australasia. We plan to advertise on facebook at $100 a day, and may advertise on radio down the track.

The perk of investing with us Investor recognition and advertising for your business!

If the entire goal isnt reached, the funds will still go towards developing the app, we may have to go to someone else for development, or get a personal loan from the bank to cover the rest. Thats if the funding comes close in anyway to our target.

 

The Impact

This app will be benificial to the world because its an icebreaker to shy people, and could connect people who otherwise would have never met if it wasnt for the app and give people social meeting spots where they can meet people they may hit it off with. The app will be free which will boost the downloads, money will be made out of advertising and sponsors, and perhaps one day a large company purchasing it!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Sharing our campaign ambition would help, share on facebook or use the Indiegogo tools! even just tell your friends and spread the word on how this idea could help a lot of people.

story:
Where Technology meets Nature

 

Montelouro is born of a love story between technology and nature. Between what we like to do and what we like to feel. The practical and the emotional. It is an object which adapts to your needs and reminds you where you come from.

Our devices are part of our lives: they help us to communicate, to entertain ourselves, to learn, to work… What lies within them relates to us, to the world we create for ourselves. But what about the exterior? Everything is aseptic and cold; all is pure symmetry and perfection.

But that is not us, is it?

 

 

Montelouro is here to change that. Here to make your surroundings more natural, more human and relatable. That is why it is handcrafted in ceramic, and its design draws inspiration from nature and reflects the beauty of what is imperfect, what is real.

A stand for mobile devices which adapts to all models and that will help you and your family to do everything you love. From the moment the alarm goes off in the morning, until you fall asleep to your favorite tunes; and throughout the day while watching a film, looking for recipes, reading a book, video calling or just when you need to leave your devices somewhere safe as you disconnect for a while.

 

 

 

Limited Editions

 

This object was created for those who want to live it all; those who seek to surround themselves with objects with a history, objects that transmit something unique. For them, less is not enough.

This is the reason why Montelouro is launched as a Limited Edition. It is not an object for everyone, but for those who want to make their homes a special place that relates to them.

Because Montelouro is handcrafted, we only offer 200 numbered units in each edition. Once the first Edition is sold out, the second will be available.

 

 

 

Inspiration

It takes its shape and name after a hill by the beach where I spent the happiest summers of my childhood; the place I go back to when I want to connect with what is authentic, the things that matter.

 

 

 

About us

 

 My name is Rafa, and I am a product designer and a vocational maker. This is why I founded Oitenta, an independent design studio located in A Coruña (Spain), devoted to creating special handcrafted objects for those seeking designer products which not only suit their needs, but also relate to their values and particular worldview.

I firmly believe in functionality and sustainability as a requirement in everything that surrounds us; but mostly I believe in the magic of objects. I believe in how the stories they tell build our reality, and how our every choice shapes what we are.

 

 

Project information

 

 

 

 

Making Montelouro. Production process

 

Just as design should not be explained, for it either reaches you or it is empty words, it is not the same with manufacturing. I believe it is important to tell what cannot be seen, in order to understand the value of things.

Montelouro is 100% handcrafted. It is the product of the collaboration with Alejandro a ceramic artisan, owner of Arobe ceramica's workshop, who works with me from the development stages, when I learn about the characteristics of ceramic and how to design and work with it. An artisan who has dedicated many hours to this project, and who transmits a passion for his trade in every move.

 

 

The process begins with the making of plaster molds from an original piece. After letting the mold harden for a couple of days, and after it is completely dry, the ceramic is poured in and is let sit for some time to thicken the walls of the piece. Afterwards, the piece undergoes different drying processes at 1200ºC. Finally, it is enameled to get a delicate finish which does not harm your devices, because we believe that in our world durability means sustainability.

 

 

Gallery

 

Montelouro’s design was conceived to make the use of mobile devices easier, and it invites you to imagine your own ways of doing it. Here you can check out some examples.

 

 

Help us spread the word!

 

 

 

Acknowledgements

Alejandro; Arobe Cerámica, Carlos Álvarez; who helped me with the storytelling, Locuens; for the translations and locution. Iago and Laura for Monte Louro's short video clips, and my family for their performances as acting models and support!

 

Special thanks to our Growing Community of Backers!

Stefan, The Creative Fund, Eric, Javier, Jonas, Silvia, Antonio, Sim Li, Alberto, Carlos, Ángel, Antón, Luis, Julio, Rafa, Bea, Fer, Aldo, Jacobo, Luisa, Cris, Rubén, Alejandro, Rob, Alberto, Comper, Fernando, Arne, Iago, Laura, Antón, Berta, Xose, Stacie, Pachín, Tim, Dennis, Takuji, Brian, Ana, Iago,Tais, Linda, Setiyane, Lorenzo, Tamara, Melissa, Xan

We'd love to add your name to this list and count with your support!

 

Contact info:

Rafael Fernández

E-mail: hola@oitenta.com

Website: www.oitenta.com

Instagram: @Oitenta

 

Thank you for your support!

I hope you like this project and decide to sup

story:
We all know that we need a smart mobile desk stand

for our laptop computers, tablets, and books.

To protect your neck, we present it. 

 

 

For a book, a laptop computer, tablet, and document.

Easy to carry.

 

We here at Grape Lab admire the special art world of young artists with developmental disabilities. To make these art-editions, we had a lot of meaningful workshops with them. We were inspired by each other at the workshops, and finally our beautiful art editions came out. We really love these processes and will keep going with this work, sharing profits with more vulnerable people. 

 

Partnership with RawSide

  

Raw+Side is a non profit organization for artists with developmental disabilities. It was started to reconsider the seemingly repeated and meaningless scrabble done by people with mental disabilities and autism, from an artistic perspective. We also introduce the unique and creative visuals to our society as an art form.

 

Now we need your help to take production to the next level and distribute worldwide. Please help us and our artists by backing us and as thanks we will send you the lightest and most eco friendly desk stand in the world.

 

+

Mini G.stand is a DIY crafts project, provided for each of our backers. We hope that you enjoy making it and using it to cushion your smartphone or other small items.

 

 

Every G.stand comes with an eco-friendly custom case which does not needs a sticker or buckle to lock.

 

Size

 

Weight : 100g (including a case)

 

 

Perks

 

 

 

Timeline

 

 

 

About Grape Lab

Grape Lab is a design studio which is exploring environmental and social issues to find sustainable solutions from a designers' points of view. We are developing design products and services, holding workshops and exhibitions and providing consulting under the theme of sustainable design. We are focusing on a responsible life cycle of our products, from the manufacturing process to disposal process. We make not only design items, but also a mutually beneficial economic platform, sharing profits with vulnerable people, unable to participate in the economic mainstream.

 

 

About Founder

I am a designer who runs a sustainable design lab called Grape Lab. Originally, my design background was based in the IT industry, making mobile applications, such as games and messenger services. In spite of the flood of digital gadgets and screens, I was always attracted by analog emotions and materials like paper. After leaving my comfy job to make dream come true, I studied sustainable design in the U.K and now I'm taking a big step for sustainable design.  

 

Risks & Challenges

Because this is an eco friendly product, we didn't add any chemical coating on the paper.

So, fluids, such as water, and strong shocks should be avoided. Do not place objects over 3kg on this product. 

The colors of G.stand on the screen could be a little different with real products. We did our best to take pictures exactly, but this kind things always happen on the online. Please understand about that...

story:
This is a powerful 6 watt pocket sized solar usb phone charger that can rapidly recharge your devices directly from sunlight!

The "Pocket Panel" is a 6 Watt Portable Solar USB Charging Panel designed to Rapid Charge power hungry cell phones and other USB devices that can be charged via their USB port. This panel is rated to produce up to 1.2 Amps of power @ 5v via the standard USB charging output port and this allows rapid solar phone recharging in bright sunny conditions and this also allows quicker recharging in partly sunny conditions.

Today's new smart phones, iPhone, Android, Droid smart cell phones demand larger batteries and much more power per day compared to phones from just a year ago and this means it takes a lot more power to rapidly recharge your new smart phone. If you want to solar charge your cell phone or iPhone then you need a portable solar charger that is capable of producing enough power to rapidly recharge your phone in good sunny conditions and this is where most solar cellphone chargers fail and fall short since they are under sized and simply do not produce enough power to quickly recharge your USB devices.

The panel we have here is using the highest efficiency solar cells on the market, the same type Mono Crystalline solar cells that are used in the popular glass solar panels you see on the top of large buildings and homes all over the world. The solar cells are 17-18% efficient at turning sunlight into electricity vs. the other folding solar panels that use ThinFilm solar cells that are only 8-9% efficient at turning sunlight into electricity. The higher the efficiency of the solar cell the less surface area it takes to generate 1w of power. Since we are using 17-18% efficient solar cells our portable solar usb cell phone chargers are as small as you can currently make them without using super expensive NASA grade 25%+ efficient solar cells.

Mono Crystalline Solar cells also provide another benefit over Thin Film solar cells which is a much longer life span when it comes to producing the power its rated to produce. Mono Crystalline solar cells are usually rated to produce 85% of their rated output power over a 25 Year time frame which is something you will not see thin film solar cell manufacturers claiming. Bottom line is that our portable solar USB charging panels will keep producing close to their rated 6 watt power output rating for up to 25 years if properly taken care of.

Our goal is to offer a high quality portable solar usb cell phone battery charger to the world to recharge all their USB electronics free from sunlight every day and offer this extremely useful product for a price that is lower than anything else that is currently on the market so more people can enjoy the benefits of constantly recharging their devices anywhere and anytime there is sunlight outside. Below are some reasons we really love our portable solar usb charging panel.

You can recharge the following batteries with these additional adapters:

  • Charge AA & AAA batteries with this Smart USB charger - Amazon Link
  • Charge CR123A batteries with this Smart USB charger - XTAR MP2 - Ebay Link
  • Charge 3.7v Camera Batteries with Smart USB charger - Video - Amazon Link
  • Charge 2 USB Devices at the same time with this Y adapter - Amazon Link

We have tried all of the USB Solar Phone Chargers on the market and this one is our favorite because:

 

  • It is small enough to fit into your pocket. Many of the solar USB chargers are much larger.
  • It is powerful! USB current maxes out at 1 amp. This panel can produce up to 1+ amps = FAST RECHARGING.
  • The panel is lightweight, soft and flexible. Other options are large, hard, heavy, and bulky.
  • This solar USB panel has a standard USB output port into which you can plug your devices. No Special Adapters to lose.
  • It works correctly. From our testing, some of the more advanced units simply do not work correctly.
  • It is weather resistant.
  • It is extremely portable and lightweight. Pocket Sized Solar Charger.
  • It is a universal USB charger - charges cell phones, MP3 players, GPS, PDA, and batteries via USB.
  • It is highly efficient, and it exhibits the highest power-to-weight and power-to-surface area ratio in the industry.
  • It is using 17-18% Efficient Mono Crystalline Solar Cells instead of 8-9% Efficient ThinFilm Solar cells
  • Mono Crystalline Solar Cells Produce Their Rated Power Output Many Years Longer Than ThinFilm Solar cells.

Unique Advantages Of This USB Solar Mobile Phone Charger

  • In Peak Sunlight the Panel will Produce Enough Power to Charge + Actively USE Most of Your Devices
  • It Will Recharge Most of the following cellphones & smartphones - Android, Blackberry, Droid, HTC, Iphone 3g, 4g
  • It Can Also Recharge Gaming Devices Like the Nintendo DS , Nintendo 3DS, ect.....
  • It Can Also Recharge MP3 Players Like the Microsoft Zune, Apple Ipod Touch, Ipod Nano, Sony Walkman, Sandisk
  • It Can Also Recharge a lot of GPS Navigation Units & GPS Location Devices
  • It Can Solar Recharge Any Device That Can Be Recharged Via USB Power
  • It Can Recharge Android Tablets & Apple Ipad's that can be recharged via USB but not as fast as the AC wall charger.
  • No Internal Battery to Go Bad or Replace. This also keeps the size and weight down on this panel setup.
  • Other units that use 2 AA Batteries to store power provide very little power and charge very slowly, Tried it, didn't like it.
  • Other units that have internal batteries usually only provide 1/2 the advertised rated capacity since they forget to tell you that you lose almost half the stored battery power when you convert the 3.7v battery power to USB's 5V power. Beware.
  • Some Other Solar USB Chargers use special output connections other than regular USB outlets which forces you to carry a bag of special cords or connector tips that once lost or misplaced makes the whole unit worthless until you find the lost part or contact the manufacturer for their special one of a kind cord to make it work again. Far From Ideal.

Small enough to fit into your pocket, and, most importantly, it actually works!

6w Portable Solar USB Phone Charger Specs

  • Regulated output: 6W - 5V - 1.2A
  • Folded size: 7.08 x 4.52 x 1.37 Inches
  • Unfolded size: 21.65 x 7.08 Inches
  • Weight: 0.83Pounds

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Here is the 12 Watt Portable Solar USB Charging Panel designed to Rapid Charge power hungry iPads, tablet PC's, and the latest power hungry smart phones and other USB devices that can be charged via their USB port. This panel is rated to produce up to 2 Amps of power @ 5v via the standard USB charging output port and this allows rapid solar phone recharging in bright sunny conditions and this also allows quicker recharging in partly sunny conditions.

12w Portable Solar USB Phone Charger Specs

  • Regulated output: 12W - 5V - 2A
  • Folded size: 7 x 4.75 x 1.75 Inches
  • Unfolded size: 18.25 x 14 x 1.8th Inches
  • Weight: 1.7Pounds

Risks and challenges 

If we meet the funding goal of this project the panels will be manufactured immediately. We have never had issues in the past with manufacturing portable solar panels. We anticipate no issues with the manufacturing all the panels within 30-55 days even if the quantity is in the thousands.

The higher the efficiency of the solar cell the less surface area it takes to generate 1w of power. Since we are using 17-18% efficient solar cells our portable solar usb cell phone chargers are as small as you can currently make them without using super expensive NASA grade 25%+ efficient solar cells.

Mono Crystalline Solar cells also provide another benefit over Thin Film solar cells which is a much longer life span when it comes to producing the power its rated to produce. Mono Crystalline solar cells are usually rated to produce 85% of their rated output power over a 25 Year time frame which is something you will not see thin film solar cell manufacturers claiming. Bottom line is that our portable solar USB charging panels will keep producing close to their rated 6 watt power output rating for up to 25 years if properly taken care of.

Our goal is to offer a high quality portable solar usb cell phone battery charger to the world to recharge all their USB electronics free from sunlight every day and offer this extremely useful product for a price that is lower than anything else that is currently on the market so more people can enjoy the benefits of constantly recharging their devices anywhere and anytime there is sunlight outside. Below are some reasons we really love our portable solar usb charging panel.


You can recharge the following batteries with these additional adapters:

Charge AA & AAA batteries with this Smart USB charger - Amazon Link

Charge CR123A batteries with this Smart USB charger - XTAR MP2 - Ebay Link

Charge 3.7v Camera Batteries with Smart USB charger - Video - Amazon Link

Charge 2 USB Devices at the same time with this Y adapter - Amazon Link




We have tried all of the USB Solar Phone Chargers on the market and this one is our favorite because:
 

It is small enough to fit into your pocket. Many of the solar USB chargers are much larger.
It is powerful! USB current maxes out at 1 amp. This panel can produce up to 1+ amps = FAST RECHARGING.
The panel is lightweight, soft and flexible. Other options are large, hard, heavy, and bulky.
This solar USB panel has a standard USB output port into which you can plug your devices. No Special Adapters to lose.
It works correctly. From our testing, some of the more advanced units simply do not work correctly.
It is weather resistant.
It is extremely portable and lightweight. Pocket Sized Solar Charger.
It is a universal USB charger - charges cell phones, MP3 players, GPS, PDA, and batteries via USB.
It is highly efficient, and it exhibits the highest power-to-weight and power-to-surface area ratio in the industry.
It is using 17-18% Efficient Mono Crystalline Solar Cells instead of 8-9% Efficient ThinFilm Solar cells
Mono Crystalline Solar Cells Produce Their Rated Power Output Many Years Longer Than ThinFilm Solar cells. 



Unique Advantages Of This USB Solar Mobile Phone Charger


In Peak Sunlight the Panel will Produce Enough Power to Charge + Actively USE Most of Your Devices
It Will Recharge Most of the following cellphones & smartphones - Android, Blackberry, Droid, HTC, Iphone 3g, 4g
It Can Also Recharge Gaming Devices Like the Nintendo DS , Nintendo 3DS, ect.....
It Can Also Recharge MP3 Players Like the Microsoft Zune, Apple Ipod Touch, Ipod Nano, Sony Walkman, Sandisk
It Can Also Recharge a lot of GPS Navigation Units & GPS Location Devices
It Can Solar Recharge Any Device That Can Be Recharged Via USB Power
It Can Recharge Android Tablets & Apple Ipad's that can be recharged via USB but not as fast as the AC wall charger.
No Internal Battery to Go Bad or Replace. This also keeps the size and weight down on this panel setup.
Other units that use 2 AA Batteries to store power provide very little power and charge very slowly, Tried it, didn't like it.
Other units that have internal batteries usually only provide 1/2 the advertised rated capacity since they forget to tell you that you lose almost half the stored battery power when you convert the 3.7v battery power to USB's 5V power. Beware.
Some Other Solar USB Chargers use special output connections other than regular USB outlets which forces you to carry a bag of special cords or connector tips that once lost or misplaced makes the whole unit worthless until you find the lost part or contact the manufacturer for their special one of a kind cord to make it work again. Far From Ideal.



Small enough to fit into your pocket, and, most importantly, it actually works!

6w Portable Solar USB Phone Charger Specs

Regulated output: 6W - 5V - 1.2A
Folded size: 7.08 x 4.52 x 1.37 Inches
Unfolded size: 21.65 x 7.08 Inches
Weight: 0.83Pounds
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Here is the 12 Watt Portable Solar USB Charging Panel designed to Rapid Charge power hungry iPads, tablet PC's, and the latest power hungry smart phones and other USB devices that can be charged via their USB port. This panel is rated to produce up to 2 Amps of power @ 5v via the standard USB charging output port and this allows rapid solar phone recharging in bright sunny conditions and this also allows quicker recharging in partly sunny conditions.















12w Portable Solar USB Phone Charger Specs

Regulated output: 12W - 5V - 2A
Folded size: 7 x 4.75 x 1.75 Inches
Unfolded size: 18.25 x 14 x 1.8th Inches
Weight: 1.7Pounds

Risks and challenges 
If we meet the funding goal of this project the panels will be manufactured immediately. We have never had issues in the past with manufacturing portable solar panels. We anticipate no issues with the manufacturing all the panels within 30-55 days even if the quantity is in the thousands.

story:
Short Summary

Factory collaborative robots are allowing more jobs to return to the U.S. as factory workers use these simple robots to help them accomplish more than ever before. We are making software that amplifies the power of these new robots by making them easier to program and capable of many more tasks. 

What We Need & What You Get

Your donation will help us purchase electric components and other tools we need to build our prototype, as well as pizza to sustain our late nights of coding!

There are servos, cameras, wires, chips, solder, and many other components needed to test our prototype on the different robots we’ve built our product for.

Your help at this stage of our company’s growth is so greatly appreciated that we want to thank you and make you feel like the part of our team that you truly are! So we're making shirts and hoodies with our logo that you can wear to show of your support of American technology and entrepreneurship!

The Impact

This project truly has the potential to accelerate robotics in the way that graphical user interfaces accelerated the practical applications of computers.

I’ve been working on this idea for some time and plan to pursue it until it’s done. I have received nothing but intense interest and business cards from everyone I’ve discussed it with. Once we build this product it will change the world, and you can help us get there.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

•  Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!

•  Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you!



We'll ship to you for free!

Please let us know what sizes you want by emailing your name on the order and size preferences to contact@orchidrobotics.com



-Orchid Robotics

story:
Transform your standard USB C or micro USB Android cables into UNIVERSAL magnetic Chargers!

Make your already existing cable more functional with the VOLTA Magnetic Adapter 2.0​

 




Make your life easier by making your existing standard cables more functional with the VOLTA Adapter.​  Never buy multiple cords AGAIN!



Say goodbye to hoarding multiple chargers in your bag, at home, or at the office. All you’ll be needing is the small, yet powerful Volta magnetic adapter, to transform any Android Charger cable to power your USB devices, anywhere, and at any time.








Compare Adapter Models 









No more carrying multiple chargers for your iPad Pro, iPhone, and Airpods... all you need is a Volta Magnetic Adapter for all your Apple USB Devices.

 






 

1. Insert the charging tip into the port of your USB device or Smartphone.

2. Attach the adapter to your existing USB-C or micro USB Android cable

3. The VOLTA Magnetic adapter will now magnetically connect when placed near the tip inside your device(s)

VOILA!!!







Our super awesome adapter does not only charge your device, but it also synchronizes your data.




Don't let low battery hold you back. VOLTA Adapter gives you the gift of time.




The VOLTA Magnetic Adapter 2.0 is powerful and supports Dash charge, SuperCharge Quick Charge 2.0, and Qualcomm Quickcharge 3.0 for Tablets, Smartphones, digital cameras, console pads, and other compatible devices.







Connect anyway and anyhow. The perfectly aligned rare Earth N52 Neodymium magnets got your back.




SnagProof - Just like the famous MagSafe, but for your USB devices and Smartphones.
  • Samsung S6/S7/S7 Edge
  • Kindle
  • HTC Devices
  • Motorola
  • Nexus
  • Nokia
  • LG
  • Other Micro USB Devices
  • iPhone X/iPhone 8
  • iPhone 7/7 Plus
  • iPhone SE
  • iPhone 6S/6S Plus
  • iPhone 5/5S/5C
  • iPad Pro
  • iPad Mini
  • iPod
  • Other Lightning Devices
  • Pixel 1/2/3/XL
  • Huawei Mate Pro
  • OnePlus
  • Nexus 6P
  • Nokia N1 Tablet
  • LG V30/G5/G6/HTC U11
  • Samsung S8/S8+/S9/S9+
  • Huawei Mate 10, 10 Pro, P10/P10 Plus/Mate 9/Mate 9 Pro
  • Other USB C Devices

 







 

 

RIGHT ANGLE CABLE 2.0



 



The long-awaited 3AMP VOLTA 2.0 Right angle Magnetic cable is here! 

 


 

If you have been searching for a charger that is compatible with your Samsung devices - Samsung S8+, S9/S9+, S10, Note 8/9/0, you are in luck! The 3AMP VOLTA 2.0 Magnetic Cable is specially built for devices that require lower amperage. 




Each VOLTA magnetic charger comes with two tips of your choice which will allow you to charge any device using the single volta cable. All you need to do is insert the tip into the device(s) and this will allow you to charge ALL your devices with a single volta cable!

 

 



The VOLTA magnetic Right Angled cable comes in Black & Red and options of 1m & 2m lengths.

 

 
  • Samsung S6/S7/S7 Edge
  • Kindle
  • HTC Devices
  • Motorola
  • Nexus
  • Nokia
  • LG
  • Other Micro USB Devices
  • iPhone X/iPhone 8
  • iPhone 7/7 Plus
  • iPhone SE
  • iPhone 6S/6S Plus
  • iPhone 5/5S/5C
  • iPad Pro
  • iPad Mini
  • iPod
  • Other Lightning Devices
  • Pixel 1/2/3/XL
  • Huawei Mate Pro
  • OnePlus
  • Nexus 6P
  • Nokia N1 Tablet
  • LG V30/G5/G6/HTC U11
  • Samsung S8/S8+/S9/S9+
  • Huawei Mate 10, 10 Pro, P10/P10 Plus/Mate 9/Mate 9 Pro
  • Other USB C Devices

 

Volta XL

The VOLTA XL cable is a new fast-charging USB-C cable that includes a built-in magnetic connector much like the MagSafe connector Apple removed from its MacBooks in the transition to USB-C for power.





 

You can add any of these items as add-on during checkout.

 

18W Power Brick

30W Power Brick

 

  

5Amp Volta 2.0

Volta 2.0 Tips
   

Volta XL Cable

Volta XL Tip
   

Volta Wall Charger

Volta Car Charger
   

USB C-A Adapter

USB A-C Adapter
   





 

With the success of the VOLTA Magnetic Charging cable, having over 100,000 units sold to over 80 countries, countless 5/5 star rated reviews and having reviewers such as the likes of Linus Tech Tips, giving amazing reviews. You can rest assure VOLTA only produces  QUALITY PRODUCTS!

The all-new VOLTA Magnetic Adapter is no different and we once again have created a product of superior quality, functionality, and style. We are so confident in our products, that all VOLTA products come with a LIFETIME GUARANTEE*!

Check out what people said about our previous product, The VOLTA Magnetic Charger...

Welcome to TEAM VOLTA, we are an Australian start-up located on the beautiful Gold Coast. Our team has sacrificed up everything from jobs, houses, businesses, taste buds (2min noodle life) and even schooling degrees so that VOLTA could become a success! We were passionate about creating a company that produced products that set the standard for the industry. We refused to take shortcuts as many do in order to make a larger profit margin. Rather we focused on producing a quality product that our customers would be glad to purchase without any regrets!



 

Click here to learn MORE. 



Be sure to follow us on our various social media platforms to stay updated about all things VOLTA and take part in our various competitions and constantly thriving community (click to connect)!




Do you want to talk about The VOLTA Magnetic Adapter? We have a prewritten article for those who wish to share something great with their viewers. Along with amazing photos, videos, and other advertising materials.

HOW TO ORDER

1. Select a perk from the option on the right side of this campaign.

2. Select product options that fits your device.

3. Click Continue to Payment button and enter your payment information, you will no be charged until the end of this campaign.

story:
Phone Silks – Maximize Your Smartphone!

You and your smart phone have a lot of capabilities, now you can stay connected to them no matter what you might be doing. 
Quick, easy access to calls, workout and fitness apps, music, texts, emails, and social media.

Our Phone Silk is a patent-pending, comfortable sports sleeve for holding your smart phone, and is proudly made in the USA. The see-through pocket material is lightweight yet strong so you can make & take calls using speaker phone, and change music.

The full accessibility to apps on your smart phone is great for any sort of conditioning or speedometer applications so you can check as you go. Great for both human and equine athletes! The secure pocket is stitched all the way around the sleeve, providing ample room for your keys, cash, credit cards and ID, which is important when you are outside or involved in an activity. Your Phone Silk is also a great way to carry your music player.

Available in a variety of colors and sizes ranging from S-XL.

Phonesilks are available & ready to ship!


How will you use your phonesilk?

Whether you’re working out, working in, or on your favorite adventure, the possibilities are endless. Answer important calls, texts, and emails...have your apps handy at your fingertips...easily change music...chat with your friend while doing necessary activities...Here are just a few ways to enjoy your phonesilk:

Running - monitor your distance, pace, speed, steps, etc with your favorite running app, or just enjoy quickly and easily changing your music...

             

Gym Wokouts - easily access your favorite app to follow your workout plan...


Horseback Riding - use apps to track your speed, distance, pace...instruct your  students on speaker phone...listen to music...keep your phone securely with you in case of an unexpected dismount on the trail...


Skiing & Snowboarding - use apps to track distance travelled, vertical feet, etc...easily change music...stay connected on the lifts with no worries of dropping your phone...


Trail Running - use gps and fitness apps to track your route, check your pace/speed/distance, etc...



Cycling

Skating

Hiking

Golf

Everyday Work

Gardening

Moms with Babies

House Cleaning

Walking the Dog...

Any of Your Favorite Activities!


Phonesilks are currently available in black, red, blue, purple, or pink to match your favorite outfits, and in sizes from small to extra large.

Phonesilks are a great way to maximize the capabilities of your phone, without spending a fortune on specialized electronics. Whether you are able to contribute or not, please share with your friends using the Indiegogo share tools! And thank you - your support is much appreciated!
Facebook
Website


Frequently Asked Questions

What activities can I use the Phone Silk for?

  We’ve had customers use the silks for a huge range of activities, from sports (running, gym workouts, cycling, horses, skiing, golf, hiking, mountain biking, etc) to gardening, work, cleaning, busy moms with babies…anything where you want secure access to your phone while having your hands free.

Which types of phones work with the Phone Silk?

  Any phone that will fit comfortably on your forearm is a good fit with the Phone Silk. It also works with most fingerprint phones, just slide your finger under the edge of the pocket to activate your phone. If you should find that your fingerprint phone doesn’t work well with the silk, please return it for a refund.

What size should I order?

To determine the size of your Phone Silk, the measurement is taken around the elbow in inches:

Small:  8" - 9.5 " circumference

Medium:  9.5" - 11" circumference

Large: 11" - 13" circumference

X large: 13" - 15" circumference

Sizes are the same for Men & Women. Phone Silks can also be worn over your jacket to easily answer your phone, change music, use apps and such while enjoying your favorite cooler weather activities - just take the measurement with your jacket on.

If you receive your silk and feel it is too tight or loose, please remove it and return it within 2 weeks to exchange for a different size.

What if my phone screen doesn’t appear bright enough?

  We designed your Phone Silk to last, so the pocket was carefully engineered to be sturdy while still retaining as much visibility of your phone as possible. Be sure to adjust your phone screen to full brightness when using the Phone Silk. Some phone screens may be difficult to view in very bright sunlight.

How do I wash my Phone Silk?

  Your Silk can be washed in cold water on gentle cycle, inside out, or hand wash. Drip dry – no dryer.


Please feel free to contact us with any additional questions you may have!

story:
What is Weezzi?

Weezzi idea was born from the need to reach people efficiently, easily, without having to login on multiple websites or send emails from multiple accounts or applications.

Its goal is to make our day-to-day web life easy! Giving you the power to create and efficiently interact with all your contact networks.

Centralizing your contact network and enabling you to reach them at any time wherever they are, Weezzi allows you to target messages to specific contact groups by gender, age and location or other rules so that you can reach the right people in the right time.

Weezzi combines email, social networks, online storage, newsletters system and website all in one-single-place! It's Weezzi - The Web Easy! ;)

All-in-One

With Weezzi you can send messages to any contact or contact groups in whatever network they are and Weezzi will take care of deliver it. Either email, Google+, Facebook, Linkedin, Twitter, Gmail, Yahoo, chats messaging or even SMS.

And it is as simple writing any other message!

Your Files Online

In Weezzi you have a built-in online file system where you can add files, images, videos and sounds having even document versioning so that you can access older versions of those files at any time from anywhere.

This system is also fully integrated with your Weezzi website so that you can reuse your files, images, sounds & videos on your website or share them with your contacts or groups so it can be super easy to manage your site or work in collaboration with your team!

Dynamic Contact Grouping

Weezzi gives you the power to create dynamic contact groups that you configure by gender type, geographic location, age group and much more like last login on your website, last purchase on webstore of X value, purchase of X items, purchase of X value, etc.

And each group is automatically updated without you having to do anything.

Website – Personal or Professional

From simple personal or business websites Weezzi allows you to add modular features to it, like blog, news, photo albums, events, services, product catalogue, etc.

You can have your website and manage it easily with Weezzi!

Ecommerce for everyone

If you have or want to start a new business Weezzi is perfect for you. It allows you to sell online your products and services and even add advanced options such as vouchers, stocks management, product promotions, order management, shipment tracking and many great features!

Newsletters

Creation of good looking newsletters and ability to manage and reporting them effectively is normally a difficult task. In Weezzi this is made easy and simple made because of our unique and awarded CMS system.

Weezzi Content Management System

Every website needs a CMS to support it, however most CMSs are too techy and complex to manage specially when there is multi-language, catalogs, etc.

Weezzi CMS is simple, intuitive and easy to manage and was awarded by the Portuguese Innovation Agency by its easiness of use and friendliness.

Team & Technology

Our team is on the website software business for more than 16 years we are a few but very talented people.

We have been doing projects worldwide for many companies such as Oracle, IBM, Verizon in countries from India to the Caribbean including Germany, Ireland and Portugal.

During this time we have developed a innovative technology that supports our online solutions that allows us to develop web sites much faster, with higher quality and in a much easier development process.

Weezzi technology was also awarded in 2005 by the Portuguese Innovation Agency.

Where will your contribution go?

Your contribution will go for finishing the developments, expand our team, get better development resources and ensure proper scalable solution for hosting Weezzi.

The Weezzi Hall Of Fame

Because we believe this is a idea can have huge success we want to ensure that you will be remembered and always feel belongingness to Weezzi, so there will be a Hall of Fame page in the website where all of you will be named (if you wish of course) for your contribution.

And as we grow everyone on Internet everyone can see that you were there in the first place supporting us!

The names will be ordered by donation and the amount donated will be kept private.

Donations and Weezzi Licenses

We made our perks related to Weezzi licenses.

The basic features of Weezzi will be offered as a FREE service TO EVERYONE!

And there will be more advanced options that people can purchase, which we are naming Professional and Premium Licenses. Accordingly to the donation you will have Professional or Premium licenses being offered to you.

We are still working on the final prices for general public for Professional and Premium licenses but they should go from $4,99/month to $49.99/month range.

Weezzi – Be part of it!

With your help this exciting new product can become a reality!

And its YOU that MADE IT HAPPEN! So we will praise you, love you and thank you for all Weezzi life time!

You will also become part of the Weezzi community and if you wish you can get involved even more close with the product roadmap and its features, you are most welcome to send your ideas as well! 

When will be Weezzi released?

The amount of financial resources is directly related with how fast we can make Weezzi a reality, with more people and better resources the quicker the release dates will be.

Our estimations is that a public beta version will be available in the first quarter 2013 and a final public release in last quarter of 2013.

How can I contribute more?

YES!! Please, please! Share this idea with your friends and family and HELP SPREAD THE WORD!! Bring more people to support this amazing idea and make it become a reality for everyone.

Please click on the SHARE in Indiegogo tools!

THANK YOU SO MUCH!!

Looking forward to see you in a browser near you… ;)

The Weezzi Team
story_txt:
What is Weezzi?
Weezzi idea was born from the need to reach people efficiently, easily, without having to login on multiple websites or send emails from multiple accounts or applications.
Its goal is to make our day-to-day web life easy! Giving you the power to create and efficiently interact with all your contact networks.
Centralizing your contact network and enabling you to reach them at any time wherever they are, Weezzi allows you to target messages to specific contact groups by gender, age and location or other rules so that you can reach the right people in the right time.
Weezzi combines email, social networks, online storage, newsletters system and website all in one-single-place! It's Weezzi - The Web Easy! ;)

All-in-One
With Weezzi you can send messages to any contact or contact groups in whatever network they are and Weezzi will take care of deliver it. Either email, Google+, Facebook, Linkedin, Twitter, Gmail, Yahoo, chats messaging or even SMS.
And it is as simple writing any other message!
Your Files Online
In Weezzi you have a built-in online file system where you can add files, images, videos and sounds having even document versioning so that you can access older versions of those files at any time from anywhere.
This system is also fully integrated with your Weezzi website so that you can reuse your files, images, sounds & videos on your website or share them with your contacts or groups so it can be super easy to manage your site or work in collaboration with your team!

story:
The patent-pending SmartPurse™ provides better protection than your average case and screen protector all while you tote your phone in style. 

WHY DO I NEED THE SMARTPURSE™ ? 

  • Have you ever dropped your phone? 
  • Have you ever scratched your brand new screen? 
  • Have you been frustrated when you get sand in your headphone jack while trying to listen to music at the beach?
  • Have you had to put your phone in rice after dropping it in the toilet or getting it drenched in rain?
  • Have you ever wanted to clean your phone but were worried about damaging it? 
  • Have you ever emptied everything out of your purse to find your phone at the bottom? 

The SmartPurse™ answers these problems in an instant: 

  • Have you ever dropped or cracked your phone? Never worry about dropping your phone again! The double layer interior padding decreases the chance of cracking your phone significantly. 
  • Have you ever scratched your brand new phone’s screen? The plastic pocket protects your phone so you don’t have to worry about scratches from keys or sharp objects. 
  • Have you been frustrated when you get sand in your headphone jack while trying to listen to music at the beach? The special plastic pocket zips shut to keep out sand, dirt and rain. You can even close it around your headphone cord or charger.
  • Have you had to put your phone in rice after dropping it in the toilet or getting it drenched in rain? The plastic pocket repels water so you never have to fear texting in the rain or your phone slipping out of your back pocket into the toilet. Note- it is water-resistant NOT waterproof!
  • Have you ever wanted to clean your phone but were worried about damaging it? With the SmartPurse™ you can wipe down the plastic pocket from all the gross germs your phone is covered in daily. Use any wipe or spray on the plastic and your phone will be good as new! 
  • Have you ever emptied everything out of your purse to find your phone at the bottom? The bold black and white chevron fabric is designed to be eye-catching so can't lose it! It is the perfect size to store in larger totes without it getting buried in the bottom (you can even convert it to a wallet by wrapping the wristlet around the body of the purse as pictured below). You can hook it on the straps of a larger back or wear it as a wristlet so it will always be attached to your body. 
 

WHAT IS THE STORY BEHIND THE SMARTPURSE™? 

After ripping apart my old purses and teaching myself how to sew, I finally developed my first prototype of the SmartPurse™. I received compliments wherever I went and realized that I needed to get my purse in the hands of women everywhere! One year later, after hand sewing over 250 purses, I am ready to move forward with manufacturing. With your help I can eliminate the the frustration of keeping smartphones safe for women everywhere.

WITH YOUR SUPPORT I CAN MAKE THE SMARTPURSE™ IN AMERICA!

WHAT MAKES THE SMARTPURSE™ SPECIAL?

The SmartPurse™ is patent-pending and unlike any other purse, wallet, or wristlet on the market currently! It is the first wallet/wristlet/purse through which you can actually text, touch, call, listen to music, charge, and connect to bluetooth all while your phone is still stowed. 

HOW DOES IT WORK?

Touch screen phones work using the electrical field coming out of your body, so direct contact isn't necessary. The plastic I use is a special thickness that allows you to still have full functionality while providing a thick enough layer of protection to prevent scratches and damage. 

 

WHAT IF I DON’T HAVE AN IPHONE? 

No worries! The SmartPurse™ not only fits iPhones, but it also fits Android phones and any other smartphone. If you don’t have a smartphone you can even store your passport, pens, makeup, first aid supplies, and much more! 

 

WHAT WILL THE FUNDS BE USED FOR? 

I need your help to move forward with manufacturing a USA MADE PRODUCT!  Please help spread my message by sharing on Facebook, Twitter, email, and more so I can revolutionize the accessory industry forever. 

1. First, I will buy fabric in bulk from my supplier (I need to increase the volume of my purchase to decrease the cost) 

2. Then I will get my labels custom printed so they can be sewn into each purse (the minimum order for custom labels is very high as well). 

3. Next, I will send all the supplies to my manufacturer so they can begin production (I need to place a large order with my manufacturer to reduce production costs and keep the price low for you!). 

4. After production is complete, I will pay my manufacturer to ship the purses directly from their facility to you so they can get into your hands as fast as possible!

 

 

REWARDS

 

$10- THINK SMART STICKER

$40 and 50- SMARTPURSE

$90- 2 SMARTPURSES

$225- PICK YOUR FABRIC SMARTPURSE™ REWARD 

$400-CUSTOM SMARTPURSE™

 

$1000- RETAIL PACK

$5000- MOTIVATION PACK

story:
Blutracker is an ultra small Bluetooth GPS locator. It has a range of over half a Mile, the battery lasts for over 2 months in between charges, it has a full GPS engine and motion detector. There are absolutely no service fees!

  • Most pets that are lost, are within a couple of blocks from your home.

  • Track your kids in large playgrounds, parks or in your neighborhood.

  • Discover the exact outdoor location of the BluTracker within 10 feet at any time.

  • Built in motion detector notifies you if your item is moved or missing.

                             -- Meet BlueTracker :                                                 

 

LONG RANGE Bluetooth 4.0

Over half a mile Range (US Version)! How did we achieve such amazing range? We are using in-house custom modified RF amplifiers designed for very long range. We also use a special Omni directional Antenna designed for long range. This enables a line of sight Radius Range of more than half a Mile. (about 800 meters)

 

We made an amazing app for BluTracker,with many features...

The first feature is Maps and Virtual Fence.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Pinpoint the BluTracker easily on a map. On Google Maps you will see yourself as a blue dot and BluTracker as a red dot. You can also draw a circle  to create a Virtual Fence around you. Any time the BluTraker moves outside this Virtual Fence, your phone will alert you.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This is a great feature if you want to let your dog roam free in the park. If it wanders off, you will be notified. Then find it easily using the locator App.

Best of all, No monthly fees!

But what about indoors?

GPS doesn't work indoors... So we created the Radar feature.

 

 

 

 

The Radar Screen will display BluTracker in a Radar type Screen. Of course, because we don't really know direction, the radar Screen can only be used to approximate the relative distance of the BluTracker to your phone, but not direction. So once you have located on the Radar Screen a BluTracker you would like to find, you start walking in a specific direction, and see if it gets closer or farther.

 

Water Resistant, No- ON/OFF button!

 

 

The battery last for about 2 months with continuous use. That means you can attach it to your Pets collar, and literally forget about it. Or Attach it to a kids sneaker, bag pack etc.

 

 

When the battery is low, it takes about 1 hour to fully charge it!

So many use cases...

 

Get an Alert if someone is moving your bike.

But, where did you park it? BluTracker will  help you find it too.

 

 

Don't loose your Bike!

 

 

 

 

Know where your workers are. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

BluTracker has a Motion Detector. Get an alert on your phone, if someone touches your stuff.

 

What about an API? We will release an API for BluTracker soon after launch! You can make your own custom apps for BluTracker.

Our API will support iOS, Android, Mac OS X, and Windows 8.

Preorder your BluTracker now, and get the early bird price.

You can have one BluTracker or 20. Your phone can find them all. 

Requirements: 

  • iOS devices with Bluetooth 4.0 (iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, new iPad, New Touch, mini iPad) 
  • Android devices supporting Bluetooth Low Energy, running Android 4.0 and newer. We have tested it with Samsung S3, and Note 2. We will post more phones tested as we finish the Android app.

Specs:

  • Technology: Bluetooth 4.0 (Bluetooth Low Energy) 
  • Range: US Version Approximate 2500 Feet with line of sight, European Version 120 Meters with line of sight. Customer sets the range based on the location BluTracker is being used.
  • Battery: Lasts up-to 2 Months with continuous use. Battery is rechargeable. Takes about 1 hour to fully re-charge it.
  • Water Resistant.
  • GPS Sirf IV Engine
  • Operation temperature range: 15°F (-10°c) to 150°F (65°c).

 

Size and weight of each BluTracker: 1.62 Inches x 1.6 Inches x 0.65 Thickness  (41.5mm x 41mm x 16.6mm Thickness) Weight: 0.57 ounces (16 grams)

FAQ:

What is the difference between the US Version and the European version.

  • It is the same unit. When you set up your unit for the first time, to meet European laws and Certification, selecting Europe as your location will load the EU profile. The US profile transmits a stronger signal than the European one. To meet European CE and ETSI Certification, we had to lower the transmission signal for the European profile. For the US Profile we meet the maximum allowance per FCC Title 47, Section 15.247.

How many BluTrackers can 1 Smartphone find?

  • We recommend using no more than 20 BluTrackers at the same time.

Can multiple phones connect to a BluTracker?

  • You can pair a Blutracker to many phones, and even see all the BluTrackers in range on the Radar screen from many phones at the same time, but only one phone can make connect to a BluTracker. (make it Buzz, or create the Virtual Leash at a time)

Is the signal with coordinates being transmitted from the BluTracker encrypted?

  • BluTracker encrypts the signal, and only a phone that was paired with BluTracker will be able to decode the signal.

What to do if my pet is lost, and I can't locate BluTracker on my phone?

  • Start walking or driving in any direction. The Blutracker app will keep searching for the BluTracker. You only need to pick up the BluTracker signal very briefly to know its exact last known GPS coordinates.  Once that signal is received, it will pinpoint the location on the BluTracker Map view app. With the US Version we have picked up weak signals as far as 1 mile with direct line of sight.

How easy is to pair a BluTracker to your smartphone?

  • You only need to pair the BluTracker once with your phone and after that it is automatic. To pair the first time launch the BluTracker app, select to add a new device, then the app will prompt you to scan a barcode or enter the Private key belonging to the BluTracker. You are done.

 What Smartphones does the BluTracker work with?:

  • BluTracker works iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, New Ipad, iPad mini, New iPod touch. It also works on Android devices supporting Bluetooth Low Energy, running Android 4.0 and newer. We have tested it on the Samsung Galaxy S3, and Note 2, and it works great! (Since the support for Bluetooth 4.0 on the Samsung S3 is bad, we wrote the Bluetooth drivers on our own)

Do I need a separate adapter or special case for my phone?

  • Nothing special is required. BluTracker will communicate directly with your Smartphone via Bluetooth Low Energy.

What is the Line of sight range of BluTracker?

  • US Version is Approximate 2500 feet or 0.5 miles.
  • European Version is approximate 120 Meters.

What is the range of BluTracker when there are buildings or trees between the Smartphone and BluTracker?

  • US Version is approximate 250-1000 feet.
  • European Version is approximate 40-80 meters.

How long will the battery last and is it rechargeable?

  • The included battery inside is rechargeable and lasts about 2 months with continuous use. It charges in about one hour and is ready to use again.

What kind of battery does the BluTracker use?

  • The BluTracker uses a Li-Polymer rechargeable battery.

Will the BluTracker radar app, show me the indoor direction to my lost object?

  • Because we don't really know direction, the radar Screen can only be used to approximate the distance of the BluTracker to your phone, but not direction. So once item you are looking for is on your Radar Screen you start walking in a specific direction, and see if it gets closer or farther.

How do you attach a BluTracker to your dog?

  • BluTracker comes with a rubber-mounting holder, which will attach it to any Pet’s collar. You can also thread in the collar if you prefer not using the rubber holder.

How do you attach a BluTracker to a backpack ?

  • BluTracker comes key ring, that easily enables it to be connected to any zipper, or fabric loop.

Is the BluTracker water resistant?

  • Yes, the design of BluTracker is water resistant. This doesn't mean that you can go diving with it. Blutracker will not work underwater.

What type of charger comes with the BluTracker?

  • BluTracker comes with a USB type cable charger. You can plug it to any computer USB port or USB charger.

PROJECT TIMELINE

We currently have fully working pre-production units.

Our hardware and software is finalized; our app development is in beta phase now.

We have identified all of the components to be used in mass production and built the latest samples using those components. We have started a pilot production of 100 units.

 

December:

  • Pre-production run of 50 samples have been completed with T2 off-tooled plastic.
  • App Development: App Development has started beta phase in mid-December for iOS. 

January:

  • CES! We will be exhibiting the BluTracker at CES in Las Vegas! Checkout real working units!
  • Late January Product will be submitted for FCC, CE certifications. This can take about 6 weeks for completion.
  • App submission to Apple Store for approval.
  • Android app enters Beta phase.
  • Setup QC and assembly line in China.
  • Product testing: We will start in middle of January an extensive 30 day product testing using beta testers. Product will be tested in USA (New York and Florida), Germany, Netherlands, Hong Kong, and China.
  • Packaging: Retail Packaging will be finalized.

February:

  • Final adjustment to Electric board, pending Certification results.
  • Certification completed for BluTracker.

March:

  • Mass Production, Quality Control
  • Prepare for Distribution 

April:

  • Distribution! - Backers get their BluTrackers.

About us

We have been designing, and managing the production of various products for many large companies for the last 12 years. We specialize in very small Bluetooth designs. Many Bluetooth solutions and Bluetooth gadgets sold for cars by large and very known companies in USA are our designs. We also have designed various Health and fitness Bluetooth products currently being sold in retail outlets worldwide. We also have designed and brought to production home environment sensors with Wifi that plug into AC outlets. We have great contacts with many factories in China, and have years of experience getting FCC, CE, Wifi, BT, etc Certifications.

We have a great team of embedded hardware engineers, RF engineers, embedded software engineers, and mechanical engineers.

Use of Funds

We've built our prototypes. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to put BluTracker into production. We know what we’re doing; we've led the development and manufacturing of more than two dozen hardware products for many large companies, so we know exactly what's required to pull this off. You are getting in early and receiving a premium product ahead of everyone else.

 

We’re asking you to help us make BluTracker a reality.
