story:
Note: The ATOM is currently on backorder and we won't be accepting any new orders at the moment. If you'd like us to e-mail you when we are in stock, please feel free to sign up through this link.

Reserve your ATOM




It's really that simple. To top it all off, the ATOM can be fully charged in under 90 minutes. Are you ready to feel the power?



Read on or jump to:
  • What devices can I use?
  • Tech Specs
  • Pre-order your ATOM now
  • Frequently Asked Questions


A whole lot of power in one device. ATOM contains enough power to charge your phone for 13-18 full charges or even power your guitar amp for approximately 10 hours. 

If you choose to get an extra battery with your ATOM, you can power all your devices for TWICE as long, giving your speakers up to 28 hours of music or your monitor 8 hours of video. If you want to know more about the extra battery, check out our Frequently Asked Questions.

Electronics anywhere. Aside from being able to charge your phones and tablets, with ATOM's universal power outlet, you can now use your...

ATOM can power a whole range of electronics from phones to musical instruments. The only question is - what will you do with portable electricity? 


Ever gone somewhere just to charge your laptop or phone? Tried looking for a power outlet but couldn't find any? Traveling or going outdoors? With the importance of technology in our everyday lives, we can never have enough juice.

Now, you no longer have to worry about whether there's a power outlet or extension cord nearby. Stay connected and powered up throughout the day! Wherever you go, so should your ATOM.


We've managed to bring down the size of the ATOM by over 30% through several design iterations.

The ATOM conveniently splits into two halves for easy carrying and storage. When you need to use it again, it easily snaps back into place. 

If you're only using mobile and tablet devices, the bottom half is all you need. It functions as a standalone power bank.


Check out the ATOM powering speakers, lights, a monitor, a guitar amp, a glue gun and even soldering equipment. 



The ATOM can power all your electronics up to 150W. Here are the tech specs of our portable power outlet. 

For those of you interested in more detailed technical specifications, ATOM's Continuous Power Output is 150W and its Peak Power Output is 300W. 

ATOM produces a pure sine waveform to ensure your devices are safe.

Pure sine waves are the form of electricity that you get at your house - all electronics are designed to be used with this waveform.  Today’s devices are extremely finely tuned and any small changes may cause your electronics to malfunction. It's not just the quantity of energy, but also the quality of energy that matters. 


We've built a comprehensive set of safety features into the ATOM to ensure you and your devices are always protected.  


After months of prototyping, tests and development, we know ATOM is ready for the world. All we're missing is your help to make it a reality. If you share our vision for a newer and free-er age of portable power, please back us. 
By helping us meet our goal, we can start manufacturing the ATOM and let people from all over the world experience a new age of portable power. 

 


To ensure your ATOM gets to you on time, we've personally visited the factories to streamline manufacturing processes and source the highest quality components. 


Dependable Delivery

As a backer, you'll be updated with complete transparency on our journey from manufacturing to fulfilment through social media, e-mail and of course, our Indiegogo campaign page. 

We love your involvement and are always open to feedback and suggestions. Feel free to ask us anything by emailing us at contactus@getyouratom.com.


The ATOM InDemand Special is available at $199 for a limited time only! Order your ATOM now and enjoy $50 off retail price. 

Note: Orders will be delivered to you on a first come first serve basis. Shipping begins April 2016.

What's an Extra Battery? The ATOM can split into two halves. The top half has the power outlet. And the bottom half contains the battery, USB port and power button. Getting an extra battery is the same as getting an extra bottom half of the ATOM. If your ATOM ever runs out of battery outdoors, all you have to do is switch out the bottom half with another one that's fully charged.

Want more than one ATOM?

Whether you need to power a whole bunch of electronics or know a friend who'd like one, these perks are for you:


We're offering free shipping to the United States and Hong Kong! As is customary for crowdfunded projects, we will be reaching out to you via email to confirm and finalize order details prior to shipping.


If you have any questions about selecting perks or completing your payment, ask us in the comments section or email us at contactus@getyouratom.com and we'll get back to you!


We're a passionate group of individuals working towards solving an important problem. Come say hi in the comments section! Here's who we are:

Feel free to contact us personally via email at luv@getyouratom.com or avi@getyouratom.com. 


We couldn't have made it here without these awesome people

Mom, Dad, and the Red Bird - You've encouraged us since the very beginning of our mission to make electronics truly portable. Thanks for bearing with our late night discussions, for your constant feedback and for always being there.

You - Thank YOU for believing in us. Without you, none of this would be possible. Backing or sharing this campaign brings us one step closer to making ATOM a reality. 

Freepik - Thanks for the wonderful icons. Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com are licensed under the Creative Commons BY 3.0 attribute. 


Q: How long does it take to charge the ATOM?

A: The ATOM can be fully charged in under 90 minutes. It can power your iPhone 6 14 times or your speakers for 7-14 hours without having to charge the ATOM itself. Get an extra battery and use the ATOM for twice as long. 

Q: What's an extra battery?

The ATOM can split into two halves. The top half has the power outlet. And the bottom half contains the battery, USB port and power button. Getting an extra battery is the same as getting an extra bottom half for your ATOM. If your ATOM ever runs out of battery outdoors, all you have to do is switch out this bottom half with another one that's fully charged. The great part is, the extra battery also acts as a power bank for your USB devices. So, if you're only using your phone or tablet, the bottom half is all you need.

Q: Does the ATOM come with a charger?

A: Yes, and you can charge your ATOM in 90 minutes!

Q: What's the difference between ATOM and a portable charger?

A: The ATOM has a built-in power outlet - similar to the wall outlets in your homes. It can power all your electronics up to 150W. Aside from being able to charge your laptops, phones and tablets, the ATOM can power a whole range of electronics including amps, lights and projectors.

Q: Does it have a battery indicator?

A: Yes! The ATOM has an LED battery life indicator next to its power button to let you know how much battery is left.

Q: Can I use the power outlet and USB port at the same time?

A: Yes, that means you can power your monitor while you charge your smartphone at the same time. 

Q: Is it waterproof?

A: Nope, and chances are your electronics aren't waterproof either! To make the ATOM waterproof would just mean more parts, and more money. Instead we decided not to include this feature and pass on the savings to you.

Q: Can I connect a multiplug to the ATOM?

A: Yes! You can connect a multiplug or extension board to the ATOM to power multiple devices at once, as long as the total power is under 150W. 

Q: Does it support 120V or 220V input? Is it compatible with US devices?

A: Upon choosing the perk for ATOM, you will be able to choose from either 120V or 220V based on your preference. We'll confirm your choice with you via email.

Q: So, what's Feature X?

A: For those who have been with us from before the campaign, you've probably heard about Feature X -  ATOM's surprise feature. Feature X is the Instant Battery Swap. If your ATOM ever runs out of battery outdoors, you can still keep using it if you decide to get an extra battery. The great thing is ATOM's batteries also function as standalone power banks, so that's all you need to carry if you're using just your phone or tablet!

Q: When will ATOM be shipped to us?

A: We'll start shipping out ATOM to you in April 2016! For more details, please see the "Roadmap to Delivery" section above.

Legal Disclaimer

"Funds raised through crowdfunding platforms are subject to PayPal's crowdfunding guidelines. Delivery of rewards cannot be guaranteed. All liability is held by ATOM Power Ltd, and PayPal Holdings Inc holds no responsibility for fulfillment."

Why is there a disclaimer?

PayPal requires that crowdfunding campaigns add a legal disclaimer to their campaign page to receive the funds at the end of the campaign. You can read more about their policy here.


Enjoy discounts by referring your friends to our campaign! Get $20 off for every friend who pre-orders an ATOM. That means if 5 friends pre-order an ATOM, you get a $100 rebate or an extra battery for free!  Got 7 friends to pre-order an ATOM? You can get a free ATOM or a 140$ rebate!

How do I refer friends to ATOM?  

  1. Log-in to Indiegogo (Click here to create an account if you don’t already have one)
  2. Share your unique link with people through Facebook, Twitter and e-mail.
  3. That's it!

Please make sure that you're logged-in to Indiegogo! It's the only way to track when a referral comes from you.

How do I track my results?

1. Log into your Indiegogo account and view “My Profile” by clicking on your name on the top right corner of the screen.

2. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions. (Referrals update every 24 hours)

Let us know if you have any questions on the comments section or e-mail us at contactus@getyouratom.com.

story:
BoltHub Pro is launching now！

World's 1st Invisible USB-C Hub for Your New MacBook Pro & iPad Pro

Firmly fastened | 2 x USB 3.0 (5Gb/s) | 4K HDMI | 3.5mm headphone | USB-C PD power flow @ 60W max

 

 

BoltHub Pro is an upgraded version of its predecessor, the BoltHub, with a much wider compatibility and a thoughtful power-saving design to make it a perfect constant companion to your Apple devices. It is a first in engineering, a near unnoticeable USB-C hub for use with all MacBooks and iPads. It allows you to work with the add-ons your busy day demands while also ensuring your power stays topped-up and ready for anything. 

Click HERE to learn more!

 

 

 

 

BoltHub fits perfectly and matches seamlessly to your iPad Pro that is almost invisible. It is specifically designed to unlock the full potential of your iPad Pro by allowing you to conveniently access all your favorite ports and devices while simultaneously charging the device.

 

BoltHub is the world’s first truly invisible USB-C hub specially designed for iPad Pro 2018. It sticks to and overlaps the bottom surface of iPad Pro 2018 when plugged without protruding on any side. It is super thin and sleek and its color and texture perfectly matches your iPad Pro to reveal its iconic design.

 

 

 

BoltHub allows you to simultaneously connect USB-C, USB-A, HDMI, microSD, SD and 3.5mm audio while keeping your iPad Pro fast charged. It saves your money, helps you stay organized and increases your work efficiency.

 

 

 

BoltHub can be securely attached by aligning its L-shaped holder against the corner of your iPad Pro and plugging its integrated cable to the Type-C port. 

 

 

No flaky connection even when all the ports are occupied.

 

 

 

The soft grip allows for a secure connection to your iPad Pro 2018 without metal-on-metal scratching; it is removable in case you want to connect to your iPad Pro 2018 while using a third-party case.  

 

 

 

BoltHub also works with other tablets like Samsung Galaxy Tab S4. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

BoltHub’s HDMI supports 1080p@60Hz, 2K@60Hz for 2018 iPad Pro and 4K@30Hz for others, in accordance to the capacity of the device.

 

 

 

Connect to a keyboard with fully applicable function keys.

 

 

 

Lightning-fast transfer speeds of documents, images and videos up to 5Gbps

 

 

Connect your smartphone to your iPad Pro.

 

Update: BoltHub Now Supports USB Mouse!

 

Apple just announced that iOS 13 and iPadOS will work with USB devices. So when a usb mouse is plugged into the usb port on BoltHub, it will be available to access iPad with a wired USB mouse. iPad with a mouse delivers a laptop experience! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Note

Due to the limitation of iOS system, only images in .jpg and .gif format and videos in .mp4 format can be imported to iPad Pro from flash drive or SD/TF card through BoltHub.

iOS system can only read images and videos saved in a folder and named in a certain format. For instance, iOS system can read camera folders named as 100CANON or 100APPLE. If not, please rename the files and folders on your computer as they can not be edited on iPad Pro:

Navigate to the root directory of the flash drive and create a folder named “DCIM”;

Under “DCIM”, create another camera folder named “100CANON”, “100APPLE” or alike;

In the camera folder, make sure to rename the images and videos using 3 digits of letters and 5 digits of numbers, such as “abc12345.jpg”. Please also make sure that the format of the images is .jpg or .gif and the video is .mp4.

BoltHub is compatible with file system of FAT32, not NTFS stored in the flash drive or the SD/TF card.

Flash drive, SD and TF card cannot be read simultaneously when plugged in BoltHub. Only one can be read at a time, on the first-in-first-read principle.

Images and videos can only be browsed after being imported to the album on iPad Pro.

 

TEST VIDEO

 

 

 

 

 

Design

 

 

About us

 

We aim to solve those neglected details and helps more and more people achieve the best user experience. Apart from focusing on highly precise technology, the team also pay great attention to stylish design and products with extremely exquisite craftsmanship. We do small things, but we do them perfectly. Make your life easier.

story:
To make sure you'll never have to experience these problems again.

 

Whether it is prolonging battery life, charging faster to save your time or makes charging your smartphone more convenient – Charby Sense has it all covered. Not to mention, it’ll also save your money from frequently replacing fragile cables.

We combine the best material to give you the best quality that you deserve. 

Integrated with sophisticated technology – Charby Sense has current sensing ability which allows it to cut off charging automatically, detect charging speed, and also boosts charging from laptop USB port. 
 

Charby Sense prolongs your battery life by helping you to stop charging completely when your device is fully charged, so it won't be kept at its max capacity for a longer time than it needs which puts stress on the battery.

 

As we charge our devices overnight, we are decreasing its lifespan at the same time.

That is why we invented Charby Sense, to allow you to charge overnight without compromising your battery life.

 

We know your time is precious, that is why Charby Sense is integrated with smart charging to ensure you a faster charging speed in every scenario.

Charby Sense allows you to spend less time charging and more time using your device.

Takes forever to charge on your laptop? Just press the button to enter CHARGE BOOSTER mode which disables data transfer and instantly charges 2x faster.

 

Often find yourself forgetting to charge your phone? 

The LED lights up when you plug in, so you will know whether the power source is connected.

With Smart LED indicator, never find yourself forgetting to plug in your charger or unknowingly charging with a slow charger again.

 

Reinforced with Aramid fiber, Charby Sense is so strong, it can even support your own weight! 

Charby Sense has been tested in lab to be able to bend for over 15,000 times, which is up to 3x more than any regular cables.

Charby Sense is 4 ft./1.2m long as we tested it to be the perfect length for most situation. Now you can use your phone comfortably while charging. No more awkward & tiring position.

 

With a reversible Type A connector, it’s instant connection EVERY TIME. You’ll never have to flip the USB multiple times just to plug in.

 

 

All Charby Sense comes with an international 1 year warranty.

 

 

 

 

 

1. How do I choose my color and USB connector type?

You will be able to choose your USB and color option(s) after selecting the perk you want. You can choose any combination of color and USB types for your order. For instance, if you have ordered Twin Pack, you can choose to have 1 Lightning cable & 1 Type-C cable.

2. What payment option do I have?

You can pay via credit or debit card. Select a perk and you'll see the payment option upon checkout.

3. How long will the shipping takes?

The shipping time varies with region. After the initial processing stage that takes 3 working days, it will take:

i) 3 - 4 working days to deliver in the U.S. (USPS or FedEx)
ii) 1 - 3 working days to deliver in Malaysia
iii) 7 - 14 working days for international delivery (DHL or China Post)

4. What countries do you ship to?

Charby Sense can be shipped to all countries available in the country drop-down menu in the checkout page. If you would like to ship to countries not available on the list, contact us at team@charbycharge.com for a shipping arrangement.

5. I paid for the wrong perk. How can I get a refund?

No worries. You can get a refund within 7 days of backing, please follow the steps here. As we need to lock orders to go into production and shipment, we will not be able to offer refunds after 7 days has passed.

6. What is the length of the cable?

The length of all Charby Sense cable is 1.2m (4ft).

7. Does it include a warranty?

Yes. All Charby Sense cable comes with an international 1-year warranty.

8. Does Charby Sense support data transfer for Apple and Android devices?

Yes. Charby Sense supports both data transfer and charging.

9. What USB version does Charby Sense support?

Charby Sense supports USB 2.0.

10. What iPhone model does your lightning cable support?

Lightning tip of Charby Sense supports iPhone XR / XS Max / XS / X / 8 Plus / 7 Plus / 7 / 6 Plus / 6 / 5S / 5, iPad 6th / 5th / 4th gen, iPad Mini / 5 / 4 / 3 / 2, iPad Air / 3 / 2, iPad Pro 2017 / 2016 / 2015, iPod touch 7th / 6th / 5th gen, and iPod nano 7th gen.

It is tested to work with most iPhones. At the moment, it doesn't have an MFI certification. All feature is functional with iPhone 5 (up to XS Max) and iPad.

11. What phone model does your Type-C cable support?

Charby Sense Type-C is fully compatible with Samsung Galaxy S10+ / S10 / S9+ / S9 / S8+ / S8 / Note 8 / Note FE, HTC 10, Sony Xperia XZ, LG V20 / G5 / G6, Xiaomi Pocophone F1 / Xiaomi 9 / 8 / 6 / 5 / Note 3 / Mi Max 3 / Mi Max 2 / Mi Mix 3 / Mi Mix 2 / Pad 4 / Pad 3 / Pad 2, and Redmi Note 7 Pro / 7S / 7.

Compatible devices with limited charging speed include Macbook pro 2019 / 2018 / 2017 / 2016, Macbook Air 2018, Macbook 2017 / 2015, Google Chromebook / Pixel C, Huawei Mate 30 Pro / 30 / 20 Pro / 20 / 10 Pro / 10 / 9 / P30 Pro / P30 / P20 Pro / P20 / P10, Moto Z / Z Force, One Plus 7 Pro / 7 / 6T / 6 / 5T / 5 / 3T / 3, Nintendo Switch, Nexus 5X / 6P, and iPad Pro 2018.

12. What phone model does your Micro USB cable support?

The Micro USB of Charby Sense supports Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge / S7 / S6 Edge / S6 / S5 / S4 / S3 / Note 5 / Note 4 / Note 3 / Tab 4 / Tab 3 / Tab A / Tab E / Tab S2 / Tab S / Tab Pro, Google Nexus 10 / Nexus 9 / Nexus 7, Huawei Mate SE / P8 / P8 Lite / Honor 7X / 6X, HTC One M8 / M9 / E8 / One A9 / One Remix / One S / V / X / X+ / Desire 626 / 626S, LG G4 / G3 / G3 Stylus / G2 / V10 / Optimus / Flex 2 / K40 / K30 / Tribute Empire, Motorola Moto G6 Play / G5S Plus / G5S / G5 Plus / G4 / G3 / Moto Turbo / Moto X / G / E, and NOKIA Lumia Series / NOKIA X Series / BlackBerry Z10 / Z3 / Z10 / DTEK 50 / Aurora / Leap.

For other devices: Amazon Kindle Fire Tablet / Fire Notebook / Fire TV Stick / Fire HD 10 / HD 8 / HDX 8.9” / Fire 7 Kids Edition / Kindle Voyage / Kindle Paperwhite / Kindle Oasis / Echo Dot (2nd Gen) / Echo Auto / Tap / eReader / MP3 player / Portable camera / handheld game controller (PS4, DualShock 4, Xbox One) / PS Vita / E-reader / Nintendo DS-reader / Printer / Bluetooth speaker / Wireless keyboard / Portable charger / GPS device / Windows notebook.

13. Does Charby Sense support fast charging?

Yes. It supports Qualcomm QC2.0 and QC3.0, as well as Samsung Adaptive fast charging. However, it does not support proprietary charging such as Oppo VOOC Flash Charge, Huawei SuperCharge, and Oneplus Dash Charge.

14. Does auto cutoff feature work on wall chargers or power banks?

Yes. The auto cutoff feature works on all USB ports, including car charger, wall charger, power bank, and laptop.

15. Will Charby Sense cutoff when I’m transferring or tethering data?

Charby Sense features a unique mode for these situations. Simply long press on the button on Charby Sense, and it will temporarily turn off its auto cutoff mode. The mode will reset once the power supply goes off.

16. Doesn’t modern smartphone already have auto cut off?

Yes, smartphone will do that to prevent overcharging. It automatically cuts off at 100% then trickle charges to maintain it at full charge, which is fine unless it is charged overnight frequently. Lithium-ion batteries are stressed when they stay at full charge for a prolonged period. It causes them to lose their capacity significantly in the long term. Its effect is very little but accumulates over time and leads to shorter and shorter battery capacity. Source

17. What does Charby Sense's auto cut off actually do?

Charby Sense stops the power supply from entering your phone entirely after it cuts off at full charge, instead of letting it recharges when the battery level drops. This prevents the battery to be kept at its full-state-of-charge for a prolonged period, which hastens the battery degradation.

18. Why does it take around 30 minutes for Charby Sense to auto cut off?

Your phone isn’t fully charged after it displays 100% charge level. It takes about 30 minutes or more after that to reach full charge (limit set by the manufacturer).

19. Why do you need a laptop Charge Booster?

Charging your phone on a laptop port is much slower because your phone is charging in data transfer mode, whereby your phone automatically requests for a lower charging current. What Charby Sense’s Charge Booster button does is disabling data transfer to allow your phone to automatically request for higher current, thus doubling the charging speed. Macbook from Apple however usually produces a higher charging current as compared to other laptop brands, hence the charging speed will only increase slightly when Charge Booster is activated.

20. Does Charge Booster work on wall chargers or power banks? 

Charge Booster mode is only applicable when your device is plugged into a USB port with data transfer capabilities such as those on laptops or car chargers. Charby Sense will have the fastest charging mode set by default when it is used on USB port which does not have data transfer capabilities such as those on wall chargers or power banks.

21. Why does the charging seem to have slowed down after I activated Charge Booster?

Some smartphone companies integrated proprietary charging system into their devices. The device uses the data lines of the cable to communicate with a wall charger to enable fast charging capabilities. Pressing the button on Charby Sense cuts off the data communication capabilities, hence the proprietary wall charger will not deliver its maximum speed. Therefore, we advise against pressing the charge booster button when you are using a wall charger or power bank. 

Shipping Policy

There will be a reshipping fee if our courier service provider attempts to deliver to your address and the package is returned because of any of these reasons: your location provided is not accessible, no-one is available to receive the package, you've provided the wrong address or you have moved without notifying us before your package is dispatched.

All delivery issues need to be reported within 1 month after the tracking number is provided. Otherwise, we won't be able to trace the delivery and any loss won't be covered.

Return and Exchange Policy

There will be no returns or exchanges for change of mind. If there is any manufacturing defect, please email us on team@charbycharge.com and our team will arrange an assessment and replacement if deemed defective.

Press

If you want to write about us, feel free to email us at team@charbycharge.com. Download our Press Pack! 

We welcome distributors /co-partners globally.

Don't hesitate to contact us if you are interested in becoming our distributor or making a single bulk order, we are looking forward to helping you find a solution. Contact us at team@charbycharge.com.

 

Stay connected with us on social media to check out our latest news!
story_txt:
To make sure you'll never have to experience these problems again. Whether it is prolonging battery life, charging faster to save your time or makes charging your smartphone more convenient – Charby Sense has it all covered. Not to mention, it’ll also save your money from frequently replacing fragile cables.We combine the best material to give you the best quality that you deserve. Integrated with sophisticated technology – Charby Sense has current sensing ability which allows it to cut off charging automatically, detect charging speed, and also boosts charging from laptop USB port.  Charby Sense prolongs your battery life by helping you to stop charging completely when your device is fully charged, so it won't be kept at its max capacity for a longer time than it needs which puts stress on the battery. As we charge our devices overnight, we are decreasing its lifespan at the same time.That is why we invented Charby Sense, to allow you to charge overnight without compromising your battery life. We know your time is precious, that is why Charby Sense is integrated with smart charging to ensure you a faster charging speed in every scenario.Charby Sense allows you to spend less time charging and more time using your device.Takes forever to charge on your laptop? Just press the button to enter CHARGE BOOSTER mode which disables data transfer and instantly charges 2x faster. Often find yourself forgetting to charge your phone? The LED lights up when you plug in, so you will know whether the power source is connected.With Smart LED indicator, never find yourself forgetting to plug in your charger or unknowingly charging with a slow charger again. Reinforced with Aramid fiber, Charby Sense is so strong, it can even support your own weight! Charby Sense has been tested in lab to be able to bend for over 15,000 times, which is up to 3x more than any regular cables.Charby Sense is 4 ft./1.2m long as we tested it to be the perfect length for most situation. Now you can use your phone comfortably while charging. No more awkward & tiring position. With a reversible Type A connector, it’s instant connection EVERY TIME. You’ll never have to flip the USB multiple times just to plug in.  All Charby Sense comes with an international 1 year warranty. 

      
1. How do I choose my color and USB connector type?
You will be able to choose your USB and color option(s) after selecting the perk you want. You can choose any combination of color and USB types for your order. For instance, if you have ordered Twin Pack, you can choose to have 1 Lightning cable & 1 Type-C cable.
2. What payment option do I have?
You can pay via credit or debit card. Select a perk and you'll see the payment option upon checkout.
3. How long will the shipping takes?
The shipping time varies with region. After the initial processing stage that takes 3 working days, it will take:
i) 3 - 4 working days to deliver in the U.S. (USPS or FedEx)ii) 1 - 3 working days to deliver in Malaysiaiii) 7 - 14 working days for international delivery (DHL or China Post)
4. What countries do you ship to?
Charby Sense can be shipped to all countries available in the country drop-down menu in the checkout page. If you would like to ship to countries not available on the list, contact us at team@charbycharge.com for a shipping arrangement.
5. I paid for the wrong perk. How can I get a refund?
No worries. You can get a refund within 7 days of backing, please follow the steps here. As we need to lock orders to go into production and shipment, we will not be able to offer refunds after 7 days has passed.
6. What is the length of the cable?
The length of all Charby Sense cable is 1.2m (4ft).
7. Does it include a warranty?
Yes. All Charby Sense cable comes with an international 1-year warranty.
8. Does Charby Sense support data transfer for Apple and Android devices?

12. What phone model does your Micro USB cable support? 
The Micro USB of Charby Sense supports Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge / S7 / S6 Edge / S6 / S5 / S4 / S3 / Note 5 / Note 4 / Note 3 / Tab 4 / Tab 3 / Tab A / Tab E / Tab S2 / Tab S / Tab Pro, Google Nexus 10 / Nexus 9 / Nexus 7, Huawei Mate SE / P8 / P8 Lite / Honor 7X / 6X, HTC One M8 / M9 / E8 / One A9 / One Remix / One S / V / X / X+ / Desire 626 / 626S, LG G4 / G3 / G3 Stylus / G2 / V10 / Optimus / Flex 2 / K40 / K30 / Tribute Empire, Motorola Moto G6 Play / G5S Plus / G5S / G5 Plus / G4 / G3 / Moto Turbo / Moto X / G / E, and NOKIA Lumia Series / NOKIA X Series / BlackBerry Z10 / Z3 / Z10 / DTEK 50 / Aurora / Leap.

story:
The First Sketchbook iPad Case Ⅱ

Featured on:

Hello backers! Two years ago, we created the first wire-bound iPad case and successfully funded it with your support. We are back again with a new campaign, hoping to expand our product line to the new iPad series.

*All pictures in this campaign are unedited in order to show what the product really looks like.

What’s the point of using wire bound

It’s all about making a difference.

99% of iPad cases on the market are fundamentally identical. With the launch of Apple Pencil, iPad has become more of a productivity and creativity tool instead of a toy. We believe iPad cases can also take a step closer to “unique” and rather than stopping at “ordinary.”

 

We are amateur designers, artists and film makers, iPad and Apple Pencil is what we used daily to seek a moment of joy, peace and sense of accomplishment. We believe that what we hold inside the iPad is special and unique, and that deserves an equally special case. What is the one thing almost every artist has? A wire bound sketchbook. That’s why we designed the wire bound iPad case.

 

And no, wire-bound is not making the world a better place.Mainstream acceptance is not what we are looking for. We know that out there, some people share the same mindset as us, we too,are sick of being ordinary, and really want to be unique, even starting from a tiny little thing.

 

Positive Reviews

Luckily, with the help of crowdfunding platforms, we were able to start from scratch and make the first wire-bound iPad case happen with little to no marketing efforts. We started selling on Amazon later and continued to receive positive reviews from users, and customers began asking for a new model for iPad 10.5. This gave us the confidence to launch another campaign for the new iPad series.

 

Features

 

Reinforced wires

Interior Apple Pencil Holder

High Quality PU Leather

Sturdy Protection

2 Stand modes

Perks

Timeline

Why crowdfunding

Everything from the leather to the wire is customized. There is a sizable upfront fee for the module and printing, as well as a minimum order quantity. If you too want to make a difference in how you pack your creativity, please support us to make it happen.

Thank you

www.longocase.com

story:
Short Summary
  • Hello my name is Chris Stover and i have been developing apps for 
    6 years.  Android Blackberry Windows and several others.
  • I have been waiting for sometime now for the next big thing and Atheer is it.
  • I need the help from others to see this project through.


What We Need & What You Get

  • I currently need 5,000 to help out source some of the aspects of such 
    large under taking.  The goal is to create a full feature line of apps for the Atheer 
    one and have them available on the Playstore beforeAtheer is released to the general public.  If you have seen this really cool product you know the extreme 
  • potential it holds.
  • Your Perks.  As a founder you will receive all apps before there release in beta 
    stages all apps will be paid in full for life.
  • Application List........
  • Dragon integration on all apps and widgets.
  • Weather and clock widgets.
  • Dock bar with unlimited apps.
  • Fully editable notification 5 email clients 5 social network clients Rss feeds. 
  • Youtube and video adjust dimming. 
  • Swipe close apps widgets. 
  • 3d carousel videos photos contacts messages. 
  • Now for the games.
  • 3 games to start all pov "Point of View" Simple shooter think duck hunt Racer think Rad Racer And Angry Birds style.  these's games are ready to go old project i just need to test and debug i don't want anyone experiencing motion sickness.
  • Anyone who donates will be entered in a chance to win one of three pairs of the official Ahteer One augmented reality glasses.

  • All apps have been developed and tested for the Oculus Rift and now im in the process of revamping them for by far the best augmented reality glasses to hit the market.


  • Videos and demos will but posted soon this is just a soft launch to see if the general public is interested in this campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Please if you cant donate share........................
  • Please send me a pm or a comment on items you would like to see or add.  Suggestion's are great. 

    Also I am hiring coders and graphic designers just send me a pm if interested.
     
    Please if you don't want to invest in me keep looking on indiegogo and make someone else's dream come true. Thanks

story:
Get December Delivery for $89



Kids Love It, Parents Approve It.

With Pipsqueak, your child now has an age-appropriate device for learning, playing games and connecting with loved ones.

  

Giving your child their own Pipsqueak puts just the right amount of connected technology in their hand while you - the parent/guardian - maintains full control. 

  

Pipsqueak was designed with safety in mind, which our adult smartphones do not adequately address. 


In addition to the fun and educational features that parents/kids love, we’ve created a safety-first platform for children to interact on their own device, with limitations that our smartphones do not have.

 

  


No more asking mom or dad to 'play' on their phone...



Instead of handing your large, expensive & breakable smartphone to a child's tiny hands, kids can now have their own age-appropriate, kid-sized device!  

Pipsqueak fits perfectly into a child’s smaller hands and is loaded with their favorite features.


 

From games, to talking with friends and family, to listening to music, or watching videos, Pipsqueak is the new go-to gadget for kids.

 
 

  

 

  

Kids can talk on Pipsqueak the same way they would talk on any mobile phone.

 

Pipsqueak gives kids and parents a cost-effective solution for connecting small children to loved ones because it requires no additional phone service or plan - there are no usage fees.


Using Yip Yap’s FREE Smartphone App, parents will be able to create approved caller lists from their contacts and transmit only those approved contacts to Pipsqueak, ensuring their child can never dial out to anyone that hasn’t been parent-approved.


Incoming calls will only be routed from the app to Pipsqueak if they correspond to the approved caller list.  Even if a caller is approved, parents can still choose to block the call from going to Pipsqueak.
 

“Play games on it” is the #1 answer we hear when asking small children what they would do with their own mobile device.

 

With a color LCD display, built-in speakers, plenty of storage and directional keypad, Pipsqueak is perfect for gameplay.

Our launch game, Snake, is a timeless favorite and a throwback to the very earliest days of mobile gaming.

Our goal is to build a robust gaming catalog that will keep children engaged using critical thinking, problem solving and creativity skills (without even realizing it!). 


Pipsqueak is also a Music Player and can hold hundreds of songs!


Listen out loud through the built-in speakers or plug in the headphones.


 

Load Pipsqueak up with your child’s favorite MP3’s and watch them sing and dance throughout their day, adding a personalized soundtrack to their adventures. 

Pipsqueak comes with at least 2G of removable micro SD memory, which users can upgrade the memory card to 4, 8, 16 or 32G. 


Watch videos, animated movies, TV shows or videos shot with a parent’s phone.


Videos loaded to Pipsqueak are automatically rotated to fill the robust and colorful 2.4” TFT display horizontally when played.

Parents can optimize videos to manage file size and match Pipsqueak’s screen size using the free video converter on the Yip Yap website.


 

Kids say the darndest things and often crack themselves (and sometimes parents) up doing it.

They will love recording their own silly messages on CopyCat then altering the playback speed to make their voices sound SSSLLLOOOWWW and DEEEEEEP or speed them up really, really, really fast!  Never-ending fun!

 

The soundboards are a great way for children to use Pipsqueak to enhance their creative playtime by playing sound effects, voice clips, music clips and any other type of audio file they might want. 

Soundboards themes will be available to download on the Yip Yap website.

 

 

“My Pipsqueak is cooler than yours!”

 

Because we all know that what kids love this month will be old news next month, we created multiple ways for kids to personalize their Pipsqueaks easily.

 


They’ll love swapping out the front and back cover-plates, Yip Chips (photo discs), and Dangles (charms) on the outside to complement what we hope will turn into a huge selection of digital media content on the inside.

 


Within our ecosystem, the Yip Yap Yuniverse ™ we’ve already begun developing custom games, soundboards, videos, wallpapers and screen savers. 

Our vision is that the explorable area of the YY Yuniverse™ is ever-expanding, but always only accessible to kids with approval.  


  

Pipsqueak offers parents peace-of-mind knowing Yip Yap has built an age-appropriate platform that they control.

 

 

 

 

  


 

The Pipsqueak home screen menu.

Pipsqueak in its case.

The Pipsqueak key to customize the main image.

Pipsqueak approved caller menu.

Pipsqueak comes with headphones for kids.

Kids love it... 

Shhhhhh. It's movie time.

Hours of entertainment with each child loving a different feature.

Grandma is calling. Pipsqueak lights up, so does your child's face. 

Games, movies, etc... All on a color LCD screen.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS


How does Pipsqueak® work?

Pipsqueak® pairs to an existing smartphone just like a Bluetooth headset, so you can route calls from your smartphone to Pipsqueak® allowing your child to talk on their own phone instead of yours.

Who is Pipsqueak® meant for?

Pipsqueak® was designed specifically for kids aged 3-8+, who are too young for their own cellular device but are ready to have an age-appropriate mobile device suitable for their desires and needs.  Kids who want to connect (to mommy, daddy, gramma, etc.) and kids who want to have a mobile device to call their very own will Love having their very own Pipsqueak®!

Does Pipsqueak® have a SIM card?

No. Pipsqueak® does not have a SIM card, nor cellular antenna. It does not have its own phone number or mobile service plan either, incoming and outgoing calls are simply routed through the parents mobile number and wireless plan.

It has no cellular antenna – does that mean it’s safer than a cell phone?

Some experts suggest Bluetooth is a safer alternative than cellular, because Bluetooth devices have an electro-magnetic frequency output of around 0.001 watts/kg, which is less than one thousandth the SAR limit for cell phones as set by the FDA and FCC (source: www.cancer.org). Experts further contend that parents should exercise caution when handing children cellular/wifi enable devices because children are more susceptible than adults to any potentially harmful effects of strong EMF radiation due to the thinness of their skulls (2 millimeters) and developmental stage of their brains.

Does Pipsqueak® require its own calling plan?

No. Pipsqueak® is an extension device, so it’s connected through the parent’s existing smartphone and calling plan. There are no additional fees, calling plan, nor contract to use Pipsqueak®. When Pipsqueak®  is receiving or making a call, the call is hosted on the parent’s smartphone.

Can anyone call my child / can my child dial out to anyone?

Through the Yip Yap smartphone app, you can set Approved Callers so that only those calls/callers will be able to route to Pipsqueak®, and your child will only be able to initiate a call out to those Approved Callers when you have approved them to be connected to your smartphone.

What if I don’t have the app?

The app is free to download, but you still have control without it. Calls will only route to Pipsqueak® when Pipsqueak® is paired to your smartphone. If you don’t want Pipsqueak® to receive or make calls, simply unpair it in your phone’s Bluetooth settings.

How will I know if Pipsqueak® is connected to Bluetooth?

The light bands on the sides of Pipsqueak®  will glow blue when it’s connected to Bluetooth. You can also see that it is paired in the Bluetooth menu of your smartphone.

Does Pipsqueak® work with any phone?

Pipsqueak® should work with any phone equipped with Bluetooth calling capability.

Where will Pipsqueak® work?

Pipsqueak® can receive a call anywhere within Bluetooth range of the parent’s smartphone to which it’s paired. Depending on the environment that’s around 50 feet, but could be closer or farther. So, around the house, in the backseat of the car, out shopping, etc.  Range only matters when the child is taking a phone call on Pipsqueak®. Pipsqueak® does not have to be in range of the parent’s device when the child is playing with Pipsqueak’s® other features such as games, playing music, sounds, copycat and watching videos.

What else does Pipsqueak® do?

When your child is not using it to talk, Pipsqueak® is built for play!

MUSIC – Pipsqueak® is also a Music Player capable of holding hundreds of songs, with a standard 3.5mm audio jack to plug in headphones (the Pipsqueak® starter Bundle comes packaged with earbuds!), or listen out-loud through the built-in speakers.

GAMES – Pipsqueak® can play games. A couple games will come pre-loaded on Pipsqueak® and you can download even more games from YipYap.com.

PHOTOS & VIDEOS – Pipsqueak® can store and display photos and play videos on its color LCD display.

COPYCAT – Pipsqueak® has a CopyCatTM record and playback function, so a child can record their voice and play it back with funny voice-altering effects.

CUSTOMIZE IT – Pipsqueak® has removable covers so a child can change the color and theme of their Pipsqueak® as often as they want. They can go from Red to Pink, Pirates to Ninjas or Fairies to Princesses, allowing Pipsqueak® to easily keep up with their changing interests. They can also change out the photo Yip Chips on the back to a picture of their pet, best friend, favorite character, or even a photo of them self.

SOUNDS – Play and customize the sounds on your Pipsqueak® ® ® using the soundboard. If you want your Pipsqueak® to ‘zoom’ like a racecar, you can add and change sound effects easily.

Will Pipsqueak® work with other Bluetooth devices?

Currently Pipsqueak® is only enabled to connect via Bluetooth to make/receive calls.  In the future Pipsqueak® will be able to connect via Bluetooth to perform other cool features.

Is Pipsqueak® durable?

Pipsqueak® was designed for kids, so it’s built to take a tumble without breaking.  We’ve beefed up the thickness of the plastics and taken extra measures to makes sure the electronics stay protected while being subjected to the “torture” of a small child.

What’s the battery life?

That, of course, depends on how much your child is using it, but it has a big lithium polymer battery and can generally go at least a couple days between charges.  Pipsqueak® recharges quickly with the included USB cable and wall charger. 

How much storage does Pipsqueak® have?

Pipsqueak® will have at least 2 GB of storage capacity via a “parent-only accessible” micro SD card.

When is Pipsqueak® available?

The first mass product run of Pipsqueaks® will be available for customers in May 2016. Yip Yap plans to make small initial production run which should arrive in December 2015.

Where can I buy one?

Get yours first exclusively on Indiegogo, which is the quickest way to get your hands on a Pipsqueak®. Pipsqueak® will be available in some retailers in the second half of 2016. Sign-up for updates at YipYap.com.

How much does Pipsqueak® cost?

Pipsqueak® will retail starting at $129, but be on the lookout for special pricing on bundles and multi-packs for our first Pipsqueak® users!

​What is the warranty on Pipsqueak?
Pipsqueak comes with a 1 year repair/replacement warranty against any defects in materials and workmanship as long as the Pipsqueak has been previously registered with Yip Yap and is accompanied by the original proof of purchase. The warranty cannot cover physical damage, loss or theft.
story_txt:
Get December Delivery for $89
Kids Love It, Parents Approve It.

With Pipsqueak, your child now has an age-appropriate device for learning, playing games and connecting with loved ones.
  


Giving your child their own Pipsqueak puts just the right amount of connected technology in their hand while you - the parent/guardian - maintains full control. 
  


Pipsqueak was designed with safety in mind, which our adult smartphones do not adequately address. 

In addition to the fun and educational features that parents/kids love, we’ve created a safety-first platform for children to interact on their own device, with limitations that our smartphones do not have.
 

  

No more asking mom or dad to 'play' on their phone...




Instead of handing your large, expensive & breakable smartphone to a child's tiny hands, kids can now have their own age-appropriate, kid-sized device!  


Pipsqueak fits perfectly into a child’s smaller hands and is loaded with their favorite features.

 

From games, to talking with friends and family, to listening to music, or watching videos, Pipsqueak is the new go-to gadget for kids.
 
 


  
 
  
Kids can talk on Pipsqueak the same way they would talk on any mobile phone.
 
Pipsqueak gives kids and parents a cost-effective solution for connecting small children to loved ones because it requires no additional phone service or plan - there are no usage fees.


Using Yip Yap’s FREE Smartphone App, parents will be able to create approved caller lists from their contacts and transmit only those approved contacts to Pipsqueak, ensuring their child can never dial out to anyone that hasn’t been parent-approved.



Incoming calls will only be routed from the app to Pipsqueak if they correspond to the approved caller list.  Even if a caller is approved, parents can still choose to block the call from going to Pipsqueak.
 



“Play games on it” is the #1 answer we hear when asking small children what they would do with their own mobile device.

 
With a color LCD display, built-in speakers, plenty of storage and directional keypad, Pipsqueak is perfect for gameplay.

Our launch game, Snake, is a timeless favorite and a throwback to the very earliest days of mobile gaming.
Our goal is to build a robust gaming catalog that will keep children engaged using critical thinking, problem solving and creativity skills (without even realizing it!). 




Pipsqueak is also a Music Player and can hold hundreds of songs!

Listen out loud through the built-in speakers or plug in the headphones.

 
Load Pipsqueak up with your child’s favorite MP3’s and watch them sing and dance throughout their day, adding a personalized soundtrack to their adventures. 
Pipsqueak comes with at least 2G of removable micro SD memory, which users can upgrade the memory card to 4, 8, 16 or 32G. 




Watch videos, animated movies, TV shows or videos shot with a parent’s phone.

Videos loaded to Pipsqueak are automatically rotated to fill the robust and colorful 2.4” TFT display horizontally when played.

Parents can optimize videos to manage file size and match Pipsqueak’s screen size using the free video converter on the Yip Yap website.


 

Kids say the darndest things and often crack themselves (and sometimes parents) up doing it.



They will love recording their own silly messages on CopyCat then altering the playback speed to make their voices sound SSSLLLOOOWWW and DEEEEEEP or speed them up really, really, really fast!  Never-ending fun!
 

The soundboards are a great way for children to use Pipsqueak to enhance their creative playtime by playing sound effects, voice clips, music clips and any other type of audio file they might want. 
Soundboards themes will be available to download on the Yip Yap website.
 
 

“My Pipsqueak is cooler than yours!”
 
Because we all know that what kids love this month will be old news next month, we created multiple ways for kids to personalize their Pipsqueaks easily.
 

They’ll love swapping out the front and back cover-plates, Yip Chips (photo discs), and Dangles (charms) on the outside to complement what we hope will turn into a huge selection of digital media content on the inside.
 

Within our ecosystem, the Yip Yap Yuniverse ™ we’ve already begun developing custom games, soundboards, videos, wallpapers and screen savers. 

Our vision is that the explorable area of the YY Yuniverse™ is ever-expanding, but always only accessible to kids with approval.  

  

Pipsqueak offers parents peace-of-mind knowing Yip Yap has built an age-appropriate platform that they control.
 







 


 
 

  


 


The Pipsqueak home screen menu.

Pipsqueak in its case.

The Pipsqueak key to customize the main image.

Pipsqueak approved caller menu.

Pipsqueak comes with headphones for kids.

Kids love it... 

Shhhhhh. It's movie time.

Hours of entertainment with each child loving a different feature.

Grandma is calling. Pipsqueak lights up, so does your child's face. 

Games, movies, etc... All on a color LCD screen.

story:
Summary

OK - so if you don't know what Uniscorn is, this isn't for you.

I launched 'scorn almost 6 years ago (I think - it may be five) at the request of the WLA.  Since then, it's run and run and run...

However, it costs money to keep it going. The cost has varied widely over the years... sometimes free, sometimes 1 cent per week. Most of the time, it has cost me just over $2 per week - which is where it's at now.

What We Need & What You Get

So - I haven't really worried about it the costs, but I've been asked about receiving donations for a while. Hence the campaign. 

The Impact

Well, less guilt?

The reality is that nothing will probably change if the funding doesn't go through. I'd ask for less, but this is the least amount I can start a campaign for.

$500 would pay me back for most, if not all (I haven't really kept track) of what I've spent on hosting over the years and help ensure that the 'scorn will stay running for the foreseeable future.

Risks & Challenges

Well, I guess you can give me money and I'll turn off Uniscorn anyway?  I dunno.

P.S. They made me put in a video, so I chose the first hit for "Denard Highlights"

story:
Life Power Station

SUBTLE ENOUGH FOR YOUR PHONE, YET STRONG ENOUGH FOR YOUR SUV


Evidence of Major Breakthough

There are many PowerBanks on the market. They can do this and they can do that. But How many of you that did buy these type of devices and ended up regretting it.  There are the Current Hottest Phones that exploded to the Plane that had malfunction using these batteries.
Iphone 6 explosion:
http://www.complex.com/pop-culture/2014/10/iphone-6-caused-explosion-in-mans-pantsthat
Boeing 787 Battery Problems
http://www.reuters.com/article/2013/01/10/uk-boeing-787-batteries-idUSLNE90900N20130110
Many of Power Banks today uses the cheaper Lithium Iron Phosphate or Lithium Magnesium Oxide to save on cost. But We use a stronger and more expensive: Lithium Ion Colbalt
HERE IS THE PROOF OF OUR MAJOR BREAKTHOUGH:
" CAUTION: DO NOT TRY THIS ANYWHERE "


You can start your car, charge your device and inflate your tires with just one item. The Intelicharge is your solution!

The Intelicharge system is really cool. We came up with this idea based on a need to have one power pack to do what several of them can.  It can Jump Start a vehicle and the Inflator provides instant power to get you back on the road fast. The integrated 120 PSI inflator is ideal for filling vehicle tires, sporting equipment, air mattresses, and other inflatable items.  


This is not your basic jump starter kit.

 It has multiple ports for a variety of devices to plugin. Smart phones, tablets, laptops, and other electronic items. We have even included ports to plugin most international devices too. This jump starter features an innovative low-profile design for easy storage in your vehicle or garage, and it keeps you safe with visual and audible reverse polarity alarms to warn against an improper connection to the battery terminals. It also comes equipped with an ultra-bright area light for easy use at night, and the cable clamps store easily on the unit.


 We are in need of your support and funding. 

We want to make the system stronger and even more versatile. We have the plan to add many more uses for the power pack. Our goal is to eventually create a power pack that has over One Hundred uses for home and professionals. Please support us with our project and get everyone on the road faster and smoother. 


 FAQ:

1. How many times can I jump start my car with intelicharge?

A: It is able to jump start a car 20 times when fully charged.

2. How many Tires can it inflates when fully charged?

A: Under normal circumstances, it is able to pump all 4 tires for a full size sedan, and 3 - 4 tires for a pickup. For larger trucks it will inflate at least 1-2 tires.

3. How long will it take to inflate one car tire?
A: Depending on the tire sizes, for a full size sedan tire, it will take 5~8 minutes.

4. How long will the power bank keep its charge if not used?
A: It will last for up to 6 months, with at least 90% juice remaining.

5. Will this work with my Iphone, Ipad, or Ipod?

A: So long as you have a USB charging Cable, you should be able to charge all your portable devices with it.

6. I understand that it is able to charge my phone and tablet. How about my laptop?

A: We have a wide range of charging port heads packed-in as accessories that will fit most charging ports for laptop, for example, dell, Asus, HP, etc.

7. What are the differences between intelicharge and other powerbank on the market?

A: For the benefit of our customers, we packed in handy accessories to best serve your needs. We have charging port heads for laptops, and jump start kit for you to jump start you car, and a inflator for you to check tire pressure and inflate your tires. We also use the highest grade of Li-ion battery cells that provide the best reliable power supply even in the extreme weather conditions -4°F ~ 140°F.

8. How long will it take to fully charge my intelicharge?

A: 3-4 hours.

9. How soon till it greets the market?

A: If you are able to help us reach our funding goal, thanks a million, we are able to start mass producing in about 6 weeks.

10. Will this item be available shipping anywhere outside of U.S?

A: No, we only ship this item in United States.

11. Are you able to select output voltage?

A: Yes, you are able to switch between 12v, 16v, and 19v along with 2A, 2.5A, and 3.5A.

12. What if my charging cable to too short for a convenient charge?

A: Our multiple head charging cable that comes with intelicharge, includes an extension port for to you extend your charging cable.

Risks and challenges

Honestly we have no challenges. We have created the first version of the Intelicharge and its about 95% done. All we need to do is finalize the packaging, add a few more device plugins and get some final testings done. Your generous funding will make all of this possible. 
Thanks to everyone that read our story and watched our videos.

story:
Help us stream meetings!

Hello! I'm Martin, and I'm one of the organizers for the Gator Linux Users group in sunny Gainesville, Florida. We meet once a month, on the third Wednesday, at 6pm. We usually cover topics like open source, linux, and software programming.

Years ago, we used old tower computers and Icecast to stream meeting audio. Now, in the Google era, we have options like Hangouts on Air and YouTube Live. Some of our members have requested that we stream more meetings, but unfortunately, it takes some equipment to make this happen. Rather than asking for members to disconnect and uncable their own hardware, we thought we could raise money for some GatorLUG-owned equipment.

What We Need

We consulted various sites for what they recommend for streaming Hangouts on Air. Here's what we came up with:
  • Laptop computer: we will still use a member provided laptop
  • $200 - 2x Shure SM57 microphones, plus XLR cables
  • $100 - Logitech C930e webcam, plus USB extension cable
  • $60 - Three Pyle Pro mic stands (one to mount webcam)
  • $150 - TASCAM US-366 USB minimal, portable mixer with XLR inputs
  • $40 - USB extension cable for webcam, XLR cabling for mics
  • 7-10% percent for the Indiegogo project fees and per-transaction fees

What you get

You will get more streaming, Linux Users Group content! With this investment, we'll stream all future meetings (barring technical hurdles such as power or internet outages), and maybe even stream other events like local installfests, Linux related presentations in the community, and more.

Risks & Challenges

  • Equipment could break over the long term. We would be unable to replace it without further fundraising or donations.
  • We won't be able to have remote speakers until we have a more solid PA system. We estimate another $500 as a stretch goal could buy us a very decent PA system.
  • We can't have multiple cameras from a single meeting room, without much more advanced video hardware.
  • We are not truly a nonprofit or legal organization, so there's nothing stopping a meeting organizer from walking off with the equipment. We hope you'll trust us with this gear. If you have concerns in that regard, please let us know.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Do you own any of the items above? Donations of actual streaming equipment works great too!
  • Do you know of a supportive individual or business? Please, pass along our campaign link to them!

 Hello! I'm Martin, and I'm one of the organizers for the Gator Linux Users group in sunny Gainesville, Florida. We meet once a month, on the third Wednesday, at 6pm. We usually cover topics like open source, linux, and software programming.
Years ago, we used old tower computers and Icecast to stream meeting audio. Now, in the Google era, we have options like Hangouts on Air and YouTube Live. Some of our members have requested that we stream more meetings, but unfortunately, it takes some equipment to make this happen. Rather than asking for members to disconnect and uncable their own hardware, we thought we could raise money for some GatorLUG-owned equipment.

7-10% percent for the Indiegogo project fees and per-transaction fees

story:
Contact us:   info@gokey.com

 

Cables are messy, batteries are bulky, you don't always carry them and

 your phone drains out of battery when you need it.

You always carry phone, wallet, keys. GOkey goes on your key-ring,

 

It is also a handy charge and sync USB cable.

GOkey connects with the phone through bluetooth, with a radius of 100 feet.

FIND YOUR KEYS: app displays bluetooth signal strength. Once you get close enough to your keys, press the button in the app and make GOkey ring.

FIND YOUR PHONE: A double click of its button will ring your phone even if it's on silent.

GOkey App remembers the last location of your keys.

Single click to snap a picture or capture video with your phone's native app.

When will I get to choose the color and model of my GOkey? 

We have sent survey invites to all backers to select between black and white and between MicroUSB, Lightning or USB-C.

What if i have changed shipping address or bought another phone and i need to modify my order?

No problem, a few weeks before shipment a second survey will be send to verify address.

When are you going to be shipping my GOkey? 

Indiegogo isn't like Amazon or any other online store. When you contribute to a pledge, like GOkey, you are funding with your contribution all of the engineering, software, manufacturing and shipping. Many challenges do arise that delay that process.

What are the current challenges?

At this stage Made for iPhone (MFi) compliance testing is being a hurdle. GOkey combines a battery and a sync product that makes things challenging. We partnered with an experienced  MFi certified manufacturer to  pass the certification.

A GOkey charges gives my phone energy for how long?

About 2 to 3 hours

What is the battery size of GOkey?

GOkey has a small size battery of 835 mAh. It is meant to be used as an emergency supply to keep you going for an hour or two. Once you get to a USB port, you can use GOkey as a cable to fully charge your phone.

Why didn't you put a bigger battery like other back ups?

We want GOkey to give a substantial phone battery boost and yet be unobtrusive on your keychain. The ideal balance is the goal.

Will GOkey make my phone ring if it is on silent?

Yes, it will bypass silent mode and ring your phone

Is GOKey compatible with the new iPhone 7 and 7 plus? 

It sure is!

What is the range of the Bluetooth?

Bluetooth range is typically around 100 feet and 200 feet in line of sight.

Will I be notified if my battery is running low?

GOkey shares its battery level with the phone. It can let you know.

Will GOkey work with my iPhone case?

It is annoying to have to remove your case, so we kept the port small.

story:
Presenting Belay Cords

Inspired by rock climbing ropes, Belay Cords are a more durable and personalized way to charge your Apple or Android product. Belay on!

 

 

 

Problem

You are a unique, creative, and fun individual but for some reason, your phone charging cord falls short of that. 

We love our phones, and if you use them as often as we do, charging is not something you do in the privacy of your home. We charge everywhere! In the car, at work, in class, coffe shop anyone?, in the airport, in the library... And besides fighting for available outlets, we have two major problems with the current phone charging cables:

1. Design. Phone cases are the accessories that get all the attention these days. Why not share some love with the charging cord? Traditional iPhone charging cords wear out easily over time, get dirty, and only come in plain white colors. iPhone cords do come in a variety of colors from third party vendors, but some of these cords are of inferior quality and sometimes look, feel, or act cheaply. 

2. Quality. Tired of broken cords and interrupted syncing? We sure are! The joint where the cable connects to the USB or 30-pin connector tends to wear out quickly unless reinforced with a third party product. When charging your iPhone, sometimes a small movement of the cord will stop your device in the middle of syncing or charging. 

Broken Cord
Charging Not Supported

Solution

I am an internet entrepreneur from Chapel Hill, North Carolina. I studied CAD, 3D Modeling, and Product Design in college. Now, with my team of developers I create products that enhance life and add to the way we interact with technology. We have already developed several iPhone gadgets, and today we are putting an end to boring with Belay Cords! 

Why does every charging cable have an outer rubber housing? They get dirty quickly, wrap themselves into horrendous knots in your purse, and breakdown with day to day use. Why not protect your cables with something more durable, more colorful, and more....You.

We re-thought the current design of the iPhone charging cables and after many iterations, landed on an amazing product. We borrowed the design structure from rock climbing ropes, traditionally used to belay climbers while moving up a rock face. The design lended itself perfectly to what we were trying to accomplish. A more durable, sleeker, and reinforced iPhone charging cable. We don't recommend taking it with you for climbing, but it would fit right in.

Belay Cords on your climbing rack
2x Charging

We can make Belay Cords the best charging accessory and can create them in an amazing number of color combinations! 

Tie Belay Cords to your bag

Our design reinforce the iPhone charging cable, making it more durable, keep it looking clean, and the result is even more flexible than traditional charging cords.

Shown in Orange

The optional 6 foot length allows you the versatility of connecting your iPhone to the wall, without connecting yourself as well. Easily use the cable as a bedside charger. And because of the longer length, you can set the alarm every evening without hassle.

With a simple knot you can shorten Belay Cords for use next to your computer. For the more organized, tie Belay Cords to the loop of your bag and show off your smart investment.

Orange with white tips
Shown in black and green braided

We will offer a range of basic color and color blends (or you could suggest your own). All funderse will have the ability to vote for their favorite. The top 4 will be manufactured and you can select which ones you would like to receive. If we raise more than our goal, we'll add stretch goals and manufacture more color options!

We've come up with some great color schemes for Belay Cords. But we wanted to leave the final choice to our funders. We'll post all of the color options on our Indiegogo page, and you can even suggest your own by messaging us with a description or picture of your color preference. Once the project is complete, we'll allow every funder to vote for their favorite color combinations. The top 4 will then become our initial color choices for the launch. Each backer may then chose which of the most popular Belay Cords they would like to receive for their pledge. And if we pledge more than our goal, we'll increase the amount of colors for production.

Belay Cords in the car
 

What's the plan?

Production is ready. The molds are made, the electronics and manufacturing is sourced. We need you to select the best colors, then we'll start the engines. 

Our goal is to keep manufacturing of Belay Cords in the United States, but this will require a good amount of funding. Our back up plan is to use an overseas manufacturer. 

Project timeline:

Project Funding Begins - day 0

Project Funding Ends - 45 days

Color Preferences are voted on and chosen - 10 days

Manufactured -30 days

Packaged - 5 days

Shipped - 5 days

Total - 95 days

You'll receive your Belay Cords by February, at the latest. We hope to get you this exceptional product, in your favorite color, by January.

Vote for your favorite color!

Red with Black Braid
Blue with Yellow Braid
Red
White
White with Purple Braid
Yellow with Blue Braid and Blue with Yellow Braid
Blue with White Braid
Yellow with Red Braid
Blue with White Braid, Red with Black Braid, and Yellow with Black Braid (Left to right)
White Checkered

story:
Be a part of the growth and success of UPLO!

UPLO is built by a photographer, for photographers! 

  • My name is Patrick Cline, I have been in the photo industry for 20 Years! UPLO is my newest venture, since Co-Founding Lonny.com (an online interior design magazine).  Which I had a successful exit from, to build the UPLO community. 
  • My fund raising campaign is simple, I want to get UPLO to a global audience of buyers and sellers of great photography in print and framed archival quality offerings.  
  • By donating to UPLO, you will be helping me take the frame options to its next level, enable worldwide shipping, improve the user experience and get the App onto the Android Platform.  

What We Need & What You Get

UPLO is looking to raise $40,000, and as contributors of any level, you will have the opportunity to be part of a large movement in the Photography industry, have your names put on a permanent page on the website UPLO.COM, and benefit from many exciting perks on all levels of donation. 

  • We are looking to raise $40,000, which will go specifically to improving the user experience for both seller and buyer, take the offerings worldwide with international shipping, and get us on to other mobile app platforms, primarily Android. 
  • There are many exciting perks at many levels of donations, ranging from free prints of your choice for life every month, to getting the opportunity to win camera equipment and accessories, with great odds of winning! 
  • As mentioned, $40,000 is our goal to achieve this next major step, but if not met, the money that is raised will go to the priority of improving user experience on App and Website, and going global with shipping, so that the whole world can benefit whether a buyer or seller. 

The Impact

Photography is a passion and obsession for so many people in the world, whether that be collecting peoples work, or creating amazing art for the world to see and buy, and own a piece of something special.  By becoming part of the UPLO community, you will be helping us improve and change the ease of connecting seller with buyer.  I want to see the Photo world flourish! And be THE go to for anyone at any level to either have an outlet to showcase their work, or to buy pieces from thousands of passionate artists. 


Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways in which you can help me, and therefore UPLO.  If donating is not an option, here are a couple of things that can help the cause! 

  • Make some noise about this campaign! Spread the word, download the free UPLO App from the iTunes App Store, register an account, interact with other people within the UPLO crowd. 
  • Share and forward the fundraising link, Indiegogo has many tools to make it easy to pass along. 

If you like Art, if you have an interest in Photography, get involved!

story:
Livid has built quality instruments for musicians since 2004. The popularity of smartphones, tablets, and laptops has made creative software more accessible than ever before. We believe that anyone can create music, and we want to make our instruments available to everyone. Minim can control music apps and software with the feel and expression of a real instrument, making it easy and fun for anyone to pick up and play.

  • Eight ultra expressive pads, 15 buttons, one touch fader
  • RGB LED’s for colorful feedback
  • 3D motion control to make music with movement
  • Connect wirelessly to iOS and OSX devices
  • Long lasting lithium ion battery
  • No-slip rubberized bottom surface
  • Dimensions (LxWxH) 6.5 x 3.25 x 0.5 inches

Minim is designed symmetrically and can be held or turned any way.  Clamp minim to your mic stand, hold it in your hand, or play it on a table top.  Minim is the same size as a smartphone and feels like a portable handheld device, making it easy to learn and intuitive to play.

Minim is not limited to built in sounds, but instead controls audio running on your iOS or OS X device. Each control can make thousands of sounds by connecting Minim to the software on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac.

We are designing the Minim app to make it even easier for people to play Minim right out of the box. Our app seamlessly bridges your favorite apps with Minim's controls, allowing you to customize your layout and play how you want. Follow along with the campaign for updates.


Hardware

  • August - Successfully funded!
  • September - Begin tooling production parts
  • October - Approve tooling samples
  • November - Order FSR's, circuit boards, rubber pads, and plastic
  • January - Assemble Minims at our shop here in Austin, TX
  • February - Deliver Minims to our backers


Software

  • September to November - Finalize development of Minim app
  • December to January - Test app integration and functionality
  • February - Upload to the app store for free download

Livid Instruments is a small company working to make a big difference. We believe Minim can truly change the way people play music with mobile devices, making it accessible, fun, and intuitive. We invite you to be a part of putting mobile music creation in the hands of everyone. We need your support to offset the upfront cost of manufacturing the Minim, and help us make it affordable for all. Together we can make Minim a reality.

Risks and challenges

With 10 years experience in the industry and building on the success of our Guitar Wing Kickstarter campaign, we see very little risk associated with the successful move from prototype to production with the Minim hardware.

Our challenge is in developing an app that allows Minim to be played and paired with the maximum number of music creation apps. Our software team is working diligently to develop an app that is fun to play as soon as you unbox the Minim and allows you all the flexibility needed to control the numerous apps available for iOS.
story_txt:
Minim is the world's first wireless, pocket-sized instrument designed for mobile music making.
Use Minim with your favorite music creation apps with tactile control that goes beyond the touchscreen.
Minim's expressive pads, 3D motion control, and touch sensitive technology allow you to play intuitively.
Play any sounds like drums, guitar, synths, or samples all on one device.
Minim's long-lasting battery empowers you to sketch out songs on the go.
Designed with over a decade of experience manufacturing innovative instruments in Austin, TX
