story:
PortPilot available from Hak5

PortPilot Pro (now known simply as PortPilot) is now available for pre-order from Hak5. Order yours today at hakshop.com/portpilot.

Thanks again

Thanks again to all of our supporters for making the PortPilot campaign a success. For up-to-date information about PortPilot products, please visit www.PortPilot.net.

If you'd like to be notified when PortPilot products are available for sale, add your contact info here and we'll keep you posted.

Best regards,

loren and the PortPilot team

Last Day!!

We're excited here at PortPilot - our supporters have brought us to almost 5 times our campaign goal!  We're busy getting the units ready, but there are still a few hours left for you to lock in the campaign pricing. 

Hey all you developers - be sure to check out the updates and comments for more technical information on the great features of the Pro unit.

Introducing PortPilot and PortPilot Pro

USB ports are popping up everywhere today -- airports, coffee shops, taxicabs, hotels, convention centers, and other public spaces. But how do you know it’s safe to charge your brand new phone in that convenient outlet on concourse A? Will it steal data from your phone or install a virus? Is it putting out the right voltage? And with only minutes till your next flight, which port will give you the quickest charge?

Enter PortPilot, a pocket sized tool that helps protect your devices and get them the fastest charge. 

PortPilot protects you from rogue chargers by preventing data transfer to or from your phone, and blocks a charger that is putting out the wrong voltage. Use PortPilot to practice safe charging!

PortPilot Pro - made for hardware, software, and firmware developers - provides even more features, including a display with detailed information and the ability to pass data through to the connected device, allowing you to monitor the energy consumed by USB devices during normal use.

Phone not charging as fast as you'd like? PortPilot shows you if you are plugged in to an Apple or Android charger and how much power is going into your device so that you can get the quickest charge. Plus, you can use PortPilot to quickly pinpoint faulty chargers and cables. Use PortPilot on the go!

 

Easy to use

The PortPilot display is easy to read. When plugged into a charger, it shows the charger type, capacity, and if the voltage is ok, high, or low. When you plug in a device, the display changes to show how much current is actually flowing.

PortPilot Pro

PortPilot Pro has all the great features of PortPilot, a built in screen to display more detailed information, and advanced capabilities that make it an essential development tool. PortPilot Pro can send data transparently through, allowing you to measure the power used by devices in normal operation. Or, the data lines can be disconnected, and the output port can emulate the input charger type, as with PortPilot.  PortPilot Pro has an auxiliary data port, which can be used to record current and voltage data over time, and to connect or disconnect the output port (listen up, driver developers!) Through the auxillary port, you can configure PortPilot Pro as a programmable fuse, automatically disconnecting the USB output port when a configurable current limit is reached. 

 

 

 

Charger Types

There are a confusing number of charger types in use today. PortPilot and PortPilot Pro automatically identify the following chargers:

  • Android (USB DCP "Dedicated Charge Port")
  • Apple 500mA charger
  • Apple 1A charger
  • Apple 2.1A charger
  • PC/computer
  • USB Charger Downstream Port (CDP)

PortPilot and PortPilot Pro both allow firmware upgrades, and can potentially support detection of future charging standards. 

How your support will help

The PortPilot and PortPilot Pro designs are essentially finished, and working prototypes of both are undergoing extensive testing by our team. This IndieGoGo campaign is focussed on raising funds for the first production runs of the PortPilot and PortPilot Pro, so we can bring our tools into your hands.

Why PortPilot?

Loren made PortPilot Pro because he needed a tool to analyze the power a USB device uses so he could quickly develop USB products with stringent power requirements. PortPilot, the convenient pocket sized version, was the logical spin-off to help navigate the confusing array of chargers out there.

Now we want to make these tools available to you.

More About USB Privacy Issues

USB ports can transfer both power and data, so whenever you charge your phone at an unknown port, it is vulnerable to unwanted data transfer. Your data can be stolen or compromised, and the charger might install a virus. This issue has been termed "Juice-Jacking." 

PortPilot and PortPilot Pro can help with juice-jacking by alerting you if a charging port is actually a computer. Most importantly, PortPilot never allows data to be transferred to or from your device. Wouldn't it be nice to know you can keep your device safe when you need to charge it?

Recent coverage:

CNN: Researchers say they can hack an iPhone through the charger

BBC: Apple devices vulnerable to attack via bogus charger

(Excerpt: "The team created their malicious charger using a tiny bare-bones computer ..."This hardware was selected to demonstrate the ease with which innocent-looking, malicious USB chargers can be constructed," wrote the researchers in their conference summary.")

PCWorld: Charging Stations May be 'Juice-Jacking' Data from Your Cellphone

Managed Solutions: Why you should avoid Public Charging Kiosks

In the Press

EDN Magazine: "Innovative Inline Analyzer Measures USB Power"

http://www.edn.com/design/power-management/4418332/Innovative-inline-analyzer-measures-USB-power

 

Korben.info: "Pour charger votre téléphone en toute sécurité"

http://korben.info/portpilot-pour-charger-votre-telephone-en-toute-securite.html

Questions or comments?

Email us: support@portpilot.net
story_txt:
PortPilot available from Hak5
PortPilot Pro (now known simply as PortPilot) is now available for pre-order from Hak5. Order yours today at hakshop.com/portpilot.

Thanks again
Thanks again to all of our supporters for making the PortPilot campaign a success. For up-to-date information about PortPilot products, please visit www.PortPilot.net.
If you'd like to be notified when PortPilot products are available for sale, add your contact info here and we'll keep you posted.
Best regards,
loren and the PortPilot team
Last Day!!
We're excited here at PortPilot - our supporters have brought us to almost 5 times our campaign goal!  We're busy getting the units ready, but there are still a few hours left for you to lock in the campaign pricing.  
Hey all you developers - be sure to check out the updates and comments for more technical information on the great features of the Pro unit.
Introducing PortPilot and PortPilot Pro

USB ports are popping up everywhere today -- airports, coffee shops, taxicabs, hotels, convention centers, and other public spaces. But how do you know it’s safe to charge your brand new phone in that convenient outlet on concourse A? Will it steal data from your phone or install a virus? Is it putting out the right voltage? And with only minutes till your next flight, which port will give you the quickest charge?
Enter PortPilot, a pocket sized tool that helps protect your devices and get them the fastest charge. 
PortPilot protects you from rogue chargers by preventing data transfer to or from your phone, and blocks a charger that is putting out the wrong voltage. Use PortPilot to practice safe charging!
PortPilot Pro - made for hardware, software, and firmware developers - provides even more features, including a display with detailed information and the ability to pass data through to the connected device, allowing you to monitor the energy consumed by USB devices during normal use.
Phone not charging as fast as you'd like? PortPilot shows you if you are plugged in to an Apple or Android charger and how much power is going into your device so that you can get the quickest charge. Plus, you can use PortPilot to quickly pinpoint faulty chargers and cables. Use PortPilot on the go!

 
Easy to use
The PortPilot display is easy to read. When plugged into a charger, it shows the charger type, capacity, and if the voltage is ok, high, or low. When you plug in a device, the display changes to show how much current is actually flowing.

PortPilot Pro
PortPilot Pro has all the great features of PortPilot, a built in screen to display more detailed information, and advanced capabilities that make it an essential development tool. PortPilot Pro can send data transparently through, allowing you to measure the power used by devices in normal operation. Or, the data lines can be disconnected, and the output port can emulate the input charger type, as with PortPilot.  PortPilot Pro has an auxiliary data port, which can be used to record current and voltage data over time, and to connect or disconnect the output port (listen up, driver developers!) Through the auxillary port, you can configure PortPilot Pro as a programmable fuse, automatically disconnecting the USB output port when a configurable current limit is reached. 
 

 

 
Charger Types
There are a confusing number of charger types in use today. PortPilot and PortPilot Pro automatically identify the following chargers:

Android (USB DCP "Dedicated Charge Port")
Apple 500mA charger
Apple 1A charger
Apple 2.1A charger
PC/computer
USB Charger Downstream Port (CDP)

PortPilot and PortPilot Pro both allow firmware upgrades, and can potentially support detection of future charging standards. 
How your support will help
The PortPilot and PortPilot Pro designs are essentially finished, and working prototypes of both are undergoing extensive testing by our team. This IndieGoGo campaign is focussed on raising funds for the first production runs of the PortPilot and PortPilot Pro, so we can bring our tools into your hands.

Why PortPilot?
Loren made PortPilot Pro because he needed a tool to analyze the power a USB device uses so he could quickly develop USB products with stringent power requirements. PortPilot, the convenient pocket sized version, was the logical spin-off to help navigate the confusing array of chargers out there.
Now we want to make these tools available to you.
More About USB Privacy Issues
USB ports can transfer both power and data, so whenever you charge your phone at an unknown port, it is vulnerable to unwanted data transfer. Your data can be stolen or compromised, and the charger might install a virus. This issue has been termed "Juice-Jacking." 
PortPilot and PortPilot Pro can help with juice-jacking by alerting you if a charging port is actually a computer. Most importantly, PortPilot never allows data to be transferred to or from your device. Wouldn't it be nice to know you can keep your device safe when you need to charge it?
Recent coverage:
CNN: Researchers say they can hack an iPhone through the charger
BBC: Apple devices vulnerable to attack via bogus charger
(Excerpt: "The team created their malicious charger using a tiny bare-bones computer ..."This hardware was selected to demonstrate the ease with which innocent-looking, malicious USB chargers can be constructed," wrote the researchers in their conference summary.")
PCWorld: Charging Stations May be 'Juice-Jacking' Data from Your Cellphone
Managed Solutions: Why you should avoid Public Charging Kiosks
In the Press

EDN Magazine: "Innovative Inline Analyzer Measures USB Power"http://www.edn.com/design/power-management/4418332/Innovative-inline-analyzer-measures-USB-power 
Korben.info: "Pour charger votre téléphone en toute sécurité"
http://korben.info/portpilot-pour-charger-votre-telephone-en-toute-securite.html
Questions or comments?
Email us: support@portpilot.net

story:
Micro-Phone is now shipping. If you missed the campaign and want to get a Micro-Phone you can go to our website (click the Now Shipping link) As an Indiegogo supporter you will receive a $25 discount on your purchase.

If you have any questions regarding Micro-Phone or your Perk, please email us at hello@micro-phone.net We will be updating you as production continues and prior to shipping of your Perks.

To confirm you address for shipping or what Perk you have backed, please email us at fulfillment@micro-phone.net

Micro-Phone the tiny mobile device with a big idea.



Micro-Phone Campaign Update

Our final pre production sample has been completed and approved and we have added some images below for everyone to get a sneak peak at it. There was an issue with the font style and size but we have resolved this so the final production will be correct.

As this is the pre production version the keypad (being hand made) is not 100% even but the full production version will have the same raised finish as the 3D design models.







The icon's for our menu interface have been finalized and they are below.



It's a Phone, It's a Tracker, It's a Locator

Our first full production of Micro-Phone has sold out - That's right we have sold out our complete first production of 5,000 Micro-Phones thanks to your overwhelming support and contributions. We want to thank all our early adopters for believing in our campaign and supporting us in the way you have.

As a result of this the team at Indiegogo have allowed us to extend our campaign for another 30 days, which will allow us to build more momentum for Micro-Phone and our new model Micro-Phone + Tracker.

All contributors' who have supported our campaign up to 30 June will receive their Perks from the first batch, which will be shipped out between mid August and early September.

Contributors from 1 July will receive their Perks from early October.

Enhancements

The amazing thing about Crowd Funding is that it allows you our valued contributor's to give us feedback about the features and functions you want in a phone, even one as small as Micro-Phone. Well, we have been listening and we have been looking at all your comments, suggestions and ideas to come up with some neat enhancements.

You said you wanted to be able to connect to earphones, so we have included this function in the software. It will require an adaptor (we have added one in our Perks for $5 if you don't already have one) so you can use your phone hands free with any 3.5mm earphones (like the ones for your iPhone).

You said you wanted vibration, so we have incorporated a vibrator in the phone for you. It took a little work due to the size of the phone and the size of the vibration motor but we have managed to do it.

You said you wanted multi language support so we have upgraded the software to include 10 languages. We are currently working on the languages we can incorporate in the phone at present based on the geographical location of contributors. We will update you on this once we have a confirmed list of languages we will support.

Hot News

We will be adding one more model to the range - Micro-Phone + Tracker. Micro-Phone + Tracker will utilize a Bluetooth 4.0 BLE module to allow users to track the phone within a small radius using Bluetooth. We will be incorporating this module into the phone and users will be able to download an App to connect to Micro-Phone from their smart phone.

To reduce the costs associated with development we are currently talking with a handful of companies who already have a Bluetooth 4.0 BLE device and App on the market. Once we have determined which company we will partner with we will have a license agreement for users of Micro-Phone to connect to that App to use our Tracker.



Micro-Phone

As designers, we strive to create beautiful, functional objects to complement your busy lifestyle. Micro-Phone is just that. It's simple, clever and easy-to-use design transforms the idea that a mobile phone has to be a smartphone to be smart.

A compelling combination of beauty and brains, the Micro-Phone is not only the smartest looking micro phone available its also a sleek, discrete and affordable take anywhere, use anytime mobile phone.

Wafer thin at just 5.5mm and the size of a credit card Micro-Phone is truly micro sized and weights less than 40g.



Micro-Phone - Basic

The advent of smartphones and associated technology has changed our lives - we can now, on the move, shop for groceries, pay bills, even calculate our sleeping patterns and calorific intake. That's great. But what if you need a phone that is small, convenient and can fit in your wallet or purse, for an emergency, for travelling or to give to your child to make sure you know where they are at all times?





Micro-Phone + Tracker

Locating your wallet, bag, luggage or even your car when you go shopping just got a whole lot simpler. Introducing Micro-Phone + Tracker the tiny device that just got a whole lot smarter and certainly more desirable. It can make a call, send a text and now it can assist you to keep track of things.

Micro-Phone + Tracker will change the way you think about how to find your wallet, bag, luggage or anything think you can never quite remember where you left it. It will also alert you when your wallet or bag moves outside a set range. Perfect for when you travel and you don't want to lose your bag or if you are shopping and forget your wallet or phone at the store.

Utilizing the most advance Bluetooth technology available Micro-Phone + Tracker incorporates a tiny Bluetooth 4.0 BLE module which sync's to an App in your smart phone and allows you to find your phone within a small radius (up to 15m indoors and 50m outdoors). Perfect when you can quite remember where you parked the car for example.

We are currently negotiating with different companies who already have an App developed for this technology to reduce the cost of incorporating it in our phone. We will keep you updated on the progress of this. Our desire is to work with the App that offers the most functions and features for our users. The App will of course be free to owners of Micro-Phone + Tracker.

Micro-Phone + Locator

Locating your child, your partner, your best friend, anytime, anywhere is now a cinch thanks to the Micro-Phone + Locator - with its optional integrated locator it is positively brilliant. Using mobile tower triangulation and Micro-Phone's 'Locate Me' App you can be sure it is readily and easily locatable.

Micro-Phone + Locator will change the way you think about where your child, your partner, your best friend are when they are not where you can see them.

Using Micro-Phone + Locator is simple, just log-in to the ‘Locate Me’ App, click the Micro-Phone + Locator you want to find and get an instant update of it’s current location in real time.*

*Based on mobile/cell tower's location and your network provider's service availability in the area.





What We Need & What You Get

We have spent over $100,000 in the development phase of our project and have successfully tested the logic board which is now complete. The good news is, it works and it's functional. We have also completed a production run to prove the technology and the usability of the design.

We now need to move to the next phase of our development which is the tooling for full production and making moulds. Our investment in R&D and field-testing has taken over 1 year so we know that the design is sound and all that remains is funding the final phase of our project.

By backing our project you will enable us to bring Micro Phone to the world and our dream to reality. You will also be enabling us to continue our work and designs for the future.

We Need You

Without your help we would need to sell Micro-Phone through our existing supply channels. This means it will :

  • We will have to be sold at considerably higher price,
  • It will enter the market at much later time,
  • It will have less features, and
  • No customisation possibilities.

By backing us now, you will be ensuring our development team can complete our goal, and help us realise the full potential of this great product concept.





What's in it for you?

As a backer of our project you will be one of the first to get a smart new Micro-Phone in your hand, wallet or child's back pack. By being a part of our project in its infancy you will receive your very own Micro-Phone and the knowledge that you were a part of something big that created something very small.

What do I get?

As a token of our appreciation of your support you will receive your very own Micro-Phone from the first full production run and the satisfaction of knowing you were there when we needed you most.

So, where are we now?

The platform and the industrial design are complete, we are currently doing testing on the App and the first production samples have arrived in our office.

Now, we need your help to finish development, buy new tooling, moulds and expand our manufacturing capabilities.





Where will your funding go?

We have already invested heavily in the development of this project. Your funding is the critical link to the completion of our project and will be used to realise our dream of the world's thinnest quad band mobile phone with a built in locator.

Use of Funds

We have working prototypes and a supply chain that's ready to go. We need your help to take the next step.

We see the following funding milestones:

We will use the first $50,000 raised through the campaign to buy the additional tooling and make the moulds we require for the casings, internal sections, components, connectors, logic board and screens and all of these parts add up quickly.

Our manufacturing facility in Shenzhen, China will be enhanced to incorporate the full production of Micro-Phone.







What will we do if we not only reach our goal but surpass it?

Get us to $100,000 and we will upgrade every backer to a blue tooth enabled Micro-Phone.

Get us to $200,000 and we will upgrade every backer to an extended 1 year warranty, up from the standard 3 months.

Get us to $300,000 and we will upgrade every backer to an extended 2 year warranty up from the extended 1 year warranty.

Get us to $400,000 and we will give every backer free shipping.*

*Backers must have chosen a perk with a value of $49 or higher.

Your contribution

We have put a lot of time, funding and effort into our project but like many things in life not everything can be completed by just a few. You and your contribution will enable us to reach our goal. You will be a part of a world first in enabling us to complete production of the world's thinnest GSM quad band mobile phone with built in locator!

Why Trust Micro-Phone

Micro-Phone has more than 10 years experience with design and development of mobile technology. We have worked with mobile phone integration and development with our partners in China and are at the cutting edge of micro mobile technology.

We have completed more than 30 projects for large international companies and now want to take it one step further by developing our own designs.

We see this as a natural progression to move our business into production of a micro-phone with locator at an affordable price. Today, it is rare to be able to design a product, which can totally change how we see or use a technology, but here we are.

Give the gift of Crowd Funding!

The participation in creating Micro-Phone is a great gift to give for any occasion. We have many perks at affordable price levels. All of them have one thing in common: they let you (or your loved one) participate in a great innovation!

Here is a quick summary of our coolest perks:





Frequently Asked Questions

Who is Micro-Phone?

Micro-Phone is a collaboration of Australian and Chinese companies who believe in bringing the best technology's to the world sooner rather than later. We have offices in Melbourne, Hong Kong, Shenzhen and Guangzhou and a design development facility in sunny North Queensland.

What is Micro-Phone?

Micro-Phone is a credit card sized quad band mobile phone. It is just 5.5mm thick and has a battery life of approximately 21 days but more importantly it's a locator that can tell you at anytime* where your child is when they are not with you.

How does Micro-Phone work?

Micro-Phone works with any GSM sim card. It can operate on any network which supports 850/900/1800/1900 bands. The locator function uses mobile phone towers to accurately triangulate the position of the Micro-Phone when you want to locate it.





How does Micro-Phone connect?

Micro-Phone connects via sim card to any GSM 850/900/1800/1900 network.

How does the Locator Function work?

TThe Locator Function uses mobile phone towers to locate the phone. Its called 'triangulation'. Using our free OS or Android App you can simply click the Micro-Phone you want to locate and get an update on its location.

Do I need a special sim card to use Micro-Phone?

No. Micro-Phone can use any standard sim card. For owners of micro or nano sims we will include an adaptor to use with your Micro-Phone.

How did you Design Micro-Phone?

We designed Micro-Phone in Australia with an emphasis on small, light and practical. Our design concept was to make it not only look smart but to be functional at the same time. We will used the finest poly materials for the casing and internal parts. Micro-Phone will be hand assembled in our own production facility Shenzhen, China.

What features does the Micro-Phone have?

Micro-Phone is a fully featured Quad Band Mobile Phone with 1.8" LCD Screen, Lithium-ion Battery (with up to 21 days standby), full sized key pad.   It also has all the standard functions you would expect with a large phone.   Phone Book, Messaging, Call Centre, Alarm, Calculator, Calendar and Tasks.   

What color’s are available?

We will produce Micro-Phone in Black and White initially and if we get to $150,000 in funding our backers can opt to change the color of their Micro-Phone.

How far are you in the development of Micro-Phone?

Pretty far, the platform, industrial design and logic board are fully complete and we have the first production samples already in our office. We are currently working on the App and App integration. Now we need your help to finish development, fund the tooling and extend our manufacturing capabilities.

How can you be sure the technology will work?

Micro-Phone has already completed beta testing and passed without any issues. We have invested heavily in developing the design, technology and sample production. The majority of this has been devoted to logic board development, battery technology and locator functionality.

We now need your help with the costs associated with moving forward into the full production.





What are the risks?

We do not see any risks at all as we have a proven design and working product already completed. We have also applied for patents for our design internationally.

However, with all technology there are always risks, in this case we believe we have identified all possibilities for issues and are in a position where the only delay is lack of the available funding to complete the project.

Where do we ship?

We ship to over 220 countries world wide. Please ensure the address provide is the address you want us to ship to.

What else can you do to help?

We know it is not always possible to contribute funds, but you can help us considerably if you can forward this link to your network via Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Reddit or any other social media outlet.

We thank you so much for your support.

I have more questions. Who do I ask?

email us at hello@micro-phone.net

Micro-Phone is a credit card sized quad band mobile phone. It is just 5.5mm thick and has a battery life of approximately 21 days but more importantly it's a locator that can tell you at anytime* where your child is when they are not with you.
How does Micro-Phone work?
Micro-Phone works with any GSM sim card. It can operate on any network which supports 850/900/1800/1900 bands. The locator function uses mobile phone towers to accurately triangulate the position of the Micro-Phone when you want to locate it.
How does Micro-Phone connect?
Micro-Phone connects via sim card to any GSM 850/900/1800/1900 network.
How does the Locator Function work?
TThe Locator Function uses mobile phone towers to locate the phone. Its called 'triangulation'. Using our free OS or Android App you can simply click the Micro-Phone you want to locate and get an update on its location.
Do I need a special sim card to use Micro-Phone?
No. Micro-Phone can use any standard sim card. For owners of micro or nano sims we will include an adaptor to use with your Micro-Phone.
How did you Design Micro-Phone?
We designed Micro-Phone in Australia with an emphasis on small, light and practical. Our design concept was to make it not only look smart but to be functional at the same time. We will used the finest poly materials for the casing and internal parts. Micro-Phone will be hand assembled in our own production facility Shenzhen, China.


What features does the Micro-Phone have?



Micro-Phone is a fully featured Quad Band Mobile Phone with 1.8" LCD Screen, Lithium-ion Battery (with up to 21 days standby), full sized key pad.   It also has all the standard functions you would expect with a large phone.   Phone Book, Messaging, Call Centre, Alarm, Calculator, Calendar and Tasks.   

What color’s are available?
We will produce Micro-Phone in Black and White initially and if we get to $150,000 in funding our backers can opt to change the color of their Micro-Phone.
How far are you in the development of Micro-Phone?
Pretty far, the platform, industrial design and logic board are fully complete and we have the first production samples already in our office. We are currently working on the App and App integration. Now we need your help to finish development, fund the tooling and extend our manufacturing capabilities.
How can you be sure the technology will work?
Micro-Phone has already completed beta testing and passed without any issues. We have invested heavily in developing the design, technology and sample production. The majority of this has been devoted to logic board development, battery technology and locator functionality. We now need your help with the costs associated with moving forward into the full production.
What are the risks?
We do not see any risks at all as we have a proven design and working product already completed. We have also applied for patents for our design internationally. However, with all technology there are always risks, in this case we believe we have identified all possibilities for issues and are in a position where the only delay is lack of the available funding to complete the project.
Where do we ship?
We ship to over 220 countries world wide. Please ensure the address provide is the address you want us to ship to.
What else can you do to help?
We know it is not always possible to contribute funds, but you can help us considerably if you can forward this link to your network via Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Reddit or any other social media outlet. We thank you so much for your support.
I have more questions. Who do I ask?
email us at hello@micro-phone.net

story:
Short Summary

Hi, 

My name is Obi and when I was asked what I would do with Google Glass my response was simple. I would use it to help troubleshoot technical problems from anywhere using Google+ Hangounts.

Helping people through their technical issues has always been a focus for me. It is why I started 44technology.com, and it's my life goal to teach people about technology on a broad scale. 

I have worked as a tech for a few years now and I do love the office, but I need more mobility.  Health reasons aside it's just not fun to sit for hours at a time.  Screen sharing with Google+ would allow me to do my job anytime anywhere.  The sort of mobility and functionality that Google Glass provides can change the lives of every person who spends their days sitting in front of a computer.  

Thankfully I have been given a chance to realize that dream.  Google has given me the opportunity to purchase this technology, but the cost is $1500. 

That's where you come in. 

What I need.

Google Glasses will cost me 1500 Dollars + Tax

My estimated cost of accomodations is 1000 Dollars.  (I'm hoping to be able to drive there but we'll see how that goes)

The Impact

I currently run a start-up that focuses on Mobile Technology and Small businesses. In all honesty the publicity for my company would be worth more than I can imagine.  An event like this is a perfect platform for a business like mine (no advertising money).

Plus

All Extra Proceeds will go to Teaming for Technology a United Way Charity. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please feel free to get the word out whenever possible.

Every little bit helps.

"The path of the One is made by the many" "The only way to get there is together" 

 

Remember every dollar donated above the goal will go to the United Way Charity "Teaming for Technology"

story:
About the Photo Center

The Photo Center is a national and regional platform for the photographic arts, serving the community through education programs, exhibitions, and public facilities.  It is the region's only organization offering intensive ten-week courses, a nationally accredited certificate program, workshops, a full schedule of exhibitions, and gallery programs.  Our programs are open to all:  the photo-curious, amateurs, and professional artists and photographers.  www.pcnw.org

What We Desperately Need:

10 new Desktop Computers with monitors.

1 new server for file storage, backup, and network management.

Indiegogo.com fundraising goal: 22,000

All equipment and technology needs and have been specified by our friends at Microsoft, who are generously donating over 50 hours of their personal time to help us get everything set up professionally!

Technology has made all of our lives so much easier over the past few years.  Imagine if you still had to engage a print bureau every time you wanted to make a new brochure or print a report, or if all of your professional correspondence went through postal mail.  Imagine if every time you went to open your email program or an accounting software package, it took 1 or 2 minutes to finish opening. Or if saving and printing attachments from your email took longer than it takes to get a cup of coffee.

Now, imagine it's not just affecting you, but everyone you work with.  Welcome to life in the administrative offices of Photo Center NW.  Here, the average age of the desktop system is 7 years old, and the server is approaching 6 years old and some of our software is approaching its 10 year anniversary.

In years past, we have had many generous donations of used systems. Used systems, however, come with their own hidden costs that directly affect the Photo Center. For this hardware refresh, we would like to plan and build an office productivity system that will enable us to work efficiently for at least the next 3-5 years.

Why It Matters

In addition to offering educational courses and workshops, a gallery exhibiting regional and nationally acclaimed artists, and community outreach programs, the Photo Center provides traditional darkrooms, studios, digital labs, project sponsorship and offers a peer-to-peer creative environment to hundreds of emerging and professional artists annually.  We are the hub of photographic activity in Seattle and beyond, and in order to sustain the organization, we must become even more efficient in our day-to-day work which supports the greater artistic community.

So, please consider the next time you open your email program - if you were to spend 60-120 seconds in quiet reflection before getting to work, to spend that time thinking of Photo Center NW  - and what your donation could do to help someone else get right to work. We are pumped to do this project and hope you are too!  Every donation matters - thank you for your consideration.

If by chance we exceed our fundraising goal:  WE HAVE GONE TO HEAVEN! Actually, if we exceed our goal, all funds will be used exclusively to support Photo Center programs. For some fun entertainment from the Photo Center Staff, please watch our video :  indiegogo.com/pcnw

P.S. Don't forget to check with your company on matching dollars!
